[\[23a.4\]]kyi zhing dag tu mchi zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu chos ston par 'gyur ba de ltar thugs brtse bas spro bar mdzad du gsol/_de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu dag khyed cag je rang rang gi sangs 
[\[23a.5\]]rgyas kyi zhing rnams su ltos shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su bltas so/_/bltas pa na phyogs bcu kun gyi rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sgra snyan 
[\[23a.6\]]pa yang thos/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi spyan snga na 'dug cing lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid 'dri ba la chos ston pa dang /_de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de snyed dang /_lha'i bu 'dus pa 
[\[23a.7\]]de snyed kyang mthong ngo /_/mthong bas kyang 'di snyam du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas kyang mi g.yo la/_thams cad du yang bzhin nye bar ston pa ni ngo mtshar to/_/ngo mtshar to snyam du ngo mtshar dang ldan par gyur to/_/de nas 'jam 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma mkhan ni sgyu ma shin tu bslabs pa'i phyir stan las kyang mi g.yo la/_gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang ston par byed do/_/de bzhin du 
[\[23b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la legs par bslabs pa yang sgyu ma lta bu'i chos rnams la sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed du bzhin nye bar ston par 'dod pa de snyed du sprul pa dag sprul par byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos 'di sgyu ma lta 
[\[23b.3\]]bur rig pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'dra'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang 
[\[23b.4\]]'dra'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'dra'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'dra'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de ni dgra bcom pa nyid dang 'dra ste/_'jam dpal chos kyi rnam 
[\[23b.5\]]grangs 'di la mos shing yid ches pa dang /_byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa gang yin pa de ni 'dra ba yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin lags te/_de ni stong pa nyid ji lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lags so/_/de ni mtshan ma ma 
[\[23b.6\]]mchis pa ji lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lags so/_/de ni smon pa ma mchis pa ji lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lags so/_/de ni de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lags so/_/de ni chos kyi dbyings ji lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lags so/_/de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' ji lta ba de ltar 'dra ba 
[\[23b.7\]]lags so/_/de ni mnyam pa nyid ji lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lags so/_/de ni rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lags so/_/de ni dben pa ji lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ci nas kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha mar gyur pa na spyod par 'gyur zhing /_rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo dag gi rna lam du grag par 'gyur ba de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis 
[\[24a.2\]]brlab tu gsol/_de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na lha dang mi rnams kyi rol mo'i sgra gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ma dkrol bar sgra grag cing shing ljon pa thams cad las kyang me tog sna tshogs dag rab tu rgyas shing lhags 
[\[24a.3\]]par gyur to/_/rdzing bu dag nas kyang pad ma mang po dag rab tu 'thon par gyur to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos shing snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur nas nyi ma dang zla ba 'di dag kyang mi snang bar gyur to/_/lha 
[\[24a.4\]]bye ba 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas me tog gi char dag mngon par rab tu 'bebs shing phye ma dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa'i char dag kyang mngon par rab tu 'bebs so/_/sil 
[\[24a.5\]]snyan dag kyang rab tu gsil zhing lha'i glu dbyangs mang po dag kyang bsgrags nas thams cad kyis kyang thal mo sbyar ba btud de kha 'thun par tshig 'di skad ces a la la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa'i chos/_a la la chos/_a la la chos/_'jig rten du 
[\[24a.6\]]chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor ba yang mthong ngo /_/sems can gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa dang /_thos nas kyang mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma yin no/_/gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas skrag par mi 
[\[24a.7\]]'gyur ba de dag ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/_zab mo la bzod pa yin no zhes kyang smras so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab pa'i slad du 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]snga ltas 'di dag byung ba lags na/_de ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na spyod par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de de bzhin te/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir snga ltas 'di dag byung ba yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_
[\[24b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bden pa'i byin gyis rlabs mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis rnam par thar pa'i 
[\[24b.3\]]sgo gsum la brten nas rnam par grol ba'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma na spyod par gyur cig_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag ma 
[\[24b.4\]]mchis pa dang /_sems can ma mchis pa dang /_srog ma mchis pa dang /_gang zag ma mchis pa dang /_shed las skyes ma mchis pa dang /_shed bu ma mchis pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang /_rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i 
[\[24b.5\]]bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma na spyod par gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis 'dod chags ma mchis pa dang /_zhe sdang ma mchis pa dang /_gti mug ma mchis pa dang /_
[\[24b.6\]]ming ma mchis pa dang /_gzugs ma mchis pa dang /_rgyu ma mchis pa dang /_lta ba ma mchis pa dang /_srid pa ma mchis pa dang /_srid pa yongs su 'tshal ba ma mchis pa dang /_lus ma mchis pa dang /_lus su gdags pa ma mchis pa dang /_sems ma 
[\[24b.7\]]mchis pa dang /_sems su gdags pa ma mchis pa dang /_dran pa ma mchis pa dang /_dran par bgyid pa dag ma mchis pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dag ma mchis pa dang /_gzhag pa ma mchis pa dang /_nye bar gzhag pa ma mchis pa dang /_gzugs ma 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]mchis pa dang /_tshor ba ma mchis pa dang /_'du shes ma mchis pa dang /_'du byed rnams ma mchis pa dang /_rnam par shes pa ma mchis pa dang /_mig ma mchis pa dang /_gzugs ma mchis pa dang /_rna ba ma mchis pa 
[\[25a.2\]]dang /_sgra ma mchis pa dang /_sna ma mchis pa dang /_dri ma mchis pa dang /_lce ma mchis pa dang /_ro ma mchis pa dang /_lus ma mchis pa dang /_reg ma mchis pa dang /_yid ma mchis pa dang /_chos ma mchis pa dang /_'dod pa'i khams ma 
[\[25a.3\]]mchis pa dang /_gzugs kyi khams ma mchis pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams ma mchis pa dang /_'di la rtag pa ma mchis pa dang /_chad pa ma mchis pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma na spyod 
[\[25a.4\]]par gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa ma mchis pa dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma mchis pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba ma mchis pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis pa dang /_phyir 
[\[25a.5\]]mi 'ong ba ma mchis pa dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis pa dang /_dgra bcom pa ma mchis pa dang /_dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams ma mchis pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas ma mchis pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma mchis pa dang /_de 
[\[25a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa ma mchis pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams ma mchis pa dang /_stobs rnams ma mchis pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams ma mchis pa dang /_ye shes ma mchis pa dang /_rnam par shes pa ma mchis pa dang /_stong 
[\[25a.7\]]pa nyid ma mchis pa dang /_mtshan ma ma mchis pa ma mchis pa dang /_smon pa ma mchis pa ma mchis pa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba nyid ma mchis pa dang /_rang bzhin ma mchis pa dang /_'thob pa ma mchis pa dang /_mngon sum du bgyi ba ma 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]mchis pa dang /_mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa dang /_rig pa ma mchis pa dang /_rnam par grol ba ma mchis pa dang /_'gram ma mchis pa dang /_pha rol ma mchis pa dang /_tshu rol ma mchis pa dang /_thar pa ma mchis pa dang /_ming ma mchis 
[\[25b.2\]]pa dang /_ming du gdags pa ma mchis pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma na spyod par gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis chos bstan pa 'dis 'ga' yang ma sbyar/_ma grol 
[\[25b.3\]]mi sbyor/_mi 'grol ba'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma na spyod par gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[25b.4\]]rgyas de dag gis sems can 'ga' yang ma bkrol/_yongs su mya ngan las ma bzlas pa de dag gis sems can 'ga' yang ma brnyes/_ma bshig_/chos 'ga' yang ma bskyed/_ma bkag_/rnam par ma bshig_/ma bskyod pa dang /_ma 'ongs 
[\[25b.5\]]pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis sems can 'ga' yang 'grol bar mi 'gyur/_yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar mi 'gyur/_de dag gis sems can 'ga' yang brnyes par mi 'gyur/_'jig par mi 'gyur/_
[\[25b.6\]]chos 'ga' yang skyed par mi 'gyur/_'gog par mi 'gyur/_rnam par 'jig par mi 'gyur/_skyod par mi 'gyur ba dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis sems can 'ga' yang mi 
[\[25b.7\]]'grol/_yongs su mya ngan las mi zlo/_de dag gis sems can 'ga' yang mi brnyes/_mi 'jig_/chos 'ga' yang mi skyed/_mi 'gog_/rnam par mi 'jig_/mi skyod pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]dus lnga brgya tha ma na spyod par gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis chos bstan pa 'di la cung zad kyang ma smras/_ma brjod/_ma bshad/_ma bstan/_ma brtags/_ma bsgrags/_ma bsnyad/_ma 
[\[26a.2\]]smos/_ma bzlas shing /_chos bstan pa 'di la yi ge gcig kyang ma brjod la/_chos bstan pa 'di gang gis kyang ma mnyan/_'ga' yang nyan par mi 'gyur/_'ga' yang rnam par grol bar mi 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[26a.3\]]'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma na 'dzam bu'i gling na spyod par gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis 'di la tshul khrims ma mchis pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu ma mchis pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin ma mchis pa dang /_
[\[26a.4\]]ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas ma mchis pa dang /_shes rab ma mchis pa dang /_shes rab kyi dbang po ma mchis pa dang /_rnam par grol ba ma mchis pa dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ma mchis pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs 
[\[26a.5\]]pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma na 'dzam bu'i gling na spyod par gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa stsol bar mi bgyid/_tshul khrims srung bar mi bgyid/_bzod pa sgrub par mi bgyid/_brtson 'grus rtsom par 
[\[26a.6\]]mi bgyid/_bsam gtan rnams sgom par mi bgyid/_shes rab spyod par mi bgyid/_byang chub don du gnyer bar mi bgyid/_yang dag pa la 'jug par mi bgyid/_byang chub thob par mi bgyid/_stobs rnams thob par mi bgyid/_mi 'jigs pa 
[\[26a.7\]]rnams thob par mi bgyid/_dbang po rnams thob par mi bgyid/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams thob par mi bgyid/_chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar mi bgyid/_sems can grol bar mi bgyid/_smra bar mi bgyid pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma na 'dzam bu'i gling na spyod par gyur cig_/de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams 
[\[26b.2\]]pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du dog sa cher g.yos par gyur pa 'di'i rgyu ni gang lags/_rkyen ni gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[26b.3\]]to/_/byams pa dman pa la mos pa'i sems can 'di dag 'dzin par mi 'gyur nam legs kyis thong shig_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das skye bo mang 
[\[26b.4\]]po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don gyi slad du bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sa phyogs 'di nyid du sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bdun cu 
[\[26b.5\]]rtsa bzhis bstan te/_thams cad du yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis zhus so/_/byams pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis chos kyi 
[\[26b.6\]]rnam grangs 'di thos nas ji srid cig lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa rigs kyi bu 'di dag gis bskal pa grangs med pa phrag 'bum 'das pa na de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas me tog mngon par 'phags pa seng ge'i rtsal gyi 
[\[26b.7\]]yon tan phung po zhes bya ba las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos so/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sems can gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/de'i nyis gyur snyed kyis ni phyir mi ldog pa'i 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]bzod pa thob bo/_/de'i nyis gyur snyed kyis ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur 
[\[27a.2\]]pa dang /_lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas dang /_ji ltar 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_lha'i bu de dag dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_gnas brtan 'od srung chen po dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 
[\[27a.3\]]'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis zhus pa 
[\[27a.4\]]zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa drug pa rdzogs so//_//ban de klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis zhus pa//[ {D81}]@##/_/'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa 
[\[27a.5\]]las le'u sum cu rtsa bdun pa ste 'phags pa seng ges zhus pa/_sho lo ka drug cu/_rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sing ha pa ri pr-its+tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa seng ges zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub 
[\[27a.6\]]sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_byang chub sems 
[\[27a.7\]]dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs cig go/_/thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs/_/rgyal ba gang zag mtshungs pa med/_/rgyal po ma skyes dgra yi bu/_/seng ge zhes ni grags pa zhig_/tshong dpon bu pho lnga brgya yis/_/mdun du bdar te lhan 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]cig tu/_/rgyal po'i khab nas de byung nas/_/rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po yis/_/gser las byas pa'i gdugs thogs te/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gan song nas/_/zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_/lnga brgya po yis gdugs de dag_/
[\[27b.2\]]tshang bar thub pa che la phul/_/kun kyang byang chub don du zhugs/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mthu yis ni/_/de dag mi 'jigs skyes gyur nas/_/seng ges thal mo sbyar byas te/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas la zhus pa ni/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 
[\[27b.3\]]gang /_/de ni 'dren pas bdag la gsungs/_/gang gis mdzes par 'gyur ba lags/_/gang gis rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/_/skye ba dran par ji ltar 'gyur/_/thub pa chen pos lung bstan gsol/_/de dag lhag bsam ye shes kyis/_/mkhyen 
[\[27b.4\]]nas sangs rgyas lung bstan pa/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyod gang zhes/_/khyod kyi dris pa de bstan to/_/bzod pa yis ni mdzes par 'gyur/_/tshangs par spyad pas rdzus te skye/_/chos kyi sbyin pas skye ba dran/_/gzhon nu de ltar shes par gyis/_/
[\[27b.5\]]gang gis sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan/_/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /_/gser mdog 'dra ba'i lus 'gyur zhing /_/de mthong sems can dga' bar 'gyur/_/sbyin pa kun gyis mtshan du 'gyur/_/byams pas de bzhin dpe byad bzang /_/sems 
[\[27b.6\]]can kun la sems mnyam pas/_/rgyal ba gser gyi mdog 'drar 'gyur/_/gzungs ni gang gis thob par 'gyur/_/gang gis ting 'dzin skye 'gyur lags/_/gzung ba'i tshig tu gang gis 'gyur/_/thub pa chen pos lung bstan gsol/_/chos la 
[\[27b.7\]]bzod pas gzungs rnams 'thob/_/sems bsgoms pas ni ting 'dzin skye/_/kyal ba'i tshig rnams spang byas na/_/gzung bar 'os pa'i tshig tu 'gyur/_/dran dang ldan par ji ltar 'gyur/_/thub pa ji ltar blo gros ldan/_/ji ltar chos spyod 'gyur 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]ba lags/_/skyes bu dam pa mkhas cis 'gyur/_/g.yo med pas ni dran ldan 'gyur/_/don la sems pas blo gros ldan/_/gus dang bcas pas chos spyod 'gyur/_/chos kyi mtshan nyid rtogs pas mkhas/_/'jig rten mgon 
[\[28a.2\]]po'i spyan sngar ni/_/las gang gis ni skye bar 'gyur/_/'jig rten mgon gyi mngon sum du/_/zhu ba zhu bar ji ltar 'gyur/_/gang zhig chos kyi sbyin pa la/_/nam yang bar chad mi byed pa/_/de ni des na myur rab tu/_/'jig rten mgon dang phrad par 
[\[28a.3\]]'gyur/_/gang gis mi khom spong bar 'gyur/_/gang gis bzang 'gror mchi 'gyur lags/_/skye ba kun tu skye ba na/_/bag mchis par ni ji ltar 'gyur/_/dad pas mi khom spong bar 'gyur/_/tshul khrims kyis ni bzang 'gror 'gro/_/stong pa nyid 
[\[28a.4\]]ni bsgom byas na/_/rtag tu bag dang ldan par 'gyur/_/thub pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams/_/ji ltar las rnams dag par 'gyur/_/ji ltar bdud kyi snyis mi thogs/_/ji ltar chos kyis phongs 'gyur spong /_/rnam par grol bas las rnams 
[\[28a.5\]]'dag_/brtson 'grus kyis ni bdud 'dul 'gyur/_/ci smras de bzhin byed pas ni/_/chos kyis phongs pa spong bar 'gyur/_/ka la ping ka'i sgra snyan dang /_/tshangs pa'i dbyangs 'drar ji ltar 'gyur/_/thub pa mos pa sna tshogs kyi/_/sems 
[\[28a.6\]]can rnams ni gang gis dga'/_/bden par smras pas tshangs pa'i dbyangs/_/ngag rtsub spangs pas sgra snyan 'gyur/_/kyal ba'i tshig dang phra ma rnams/_/spangs pas sems can dga' bar 'gyur/_/ji ltar tshe ring 'gyur ba lags/_/bro nad nyung bar ji ltar 
[\[28a.7\]]'gyur/_/rnam par 'dren pa gang gis na/_/g.yog 'khor rnams ni mi phyed 'gyur/_/gsod pa mi byed tshe ring 'gyur/_/mi 'tshe bas ni nad nyung 'gyur/_/mi 'thun pa dag bsdums byas na/_/g.yog 'khor rnams ni mi phyed 'gyur/_/don rnams ji ltar 'grub 'gyur 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]lags/_/gang gis longs spyod mi nyams 'gyur/_/gang dang gang du skye ba der/_/dbang chen grags par ji ltar 'gyur/_/chags pa med pas don rnams 'grub/_/ser sna med pas longs spyod 'phel/_/gang dang gang du skye ba der/_/phrag dog med pas 
[\[28b.2\]]dbang cher grags/_/ji ltar lha yi mig 'thob 'gyur/_/lha yi rna ba ji ltar 'thob/_/sems can 'chi 'pho skye ba dag_/'dren pa gang gis 'tshal bar 'gyur/_/mar me byin pas mig 'thob 'gyur/_/rol mo'i sgra yis rna ba 'dag_/'chi 'pho skye shes ye shes 
[\[28b.3\]]kyis/_/de dag de ltar 'grub par 'gyur/_/'dren pa byang chub sems dpa' yi/_/zag pa gang gis bas par 'gyur/_/tshe rabs snga dran cis 'gyur lags/_/rdzu 'phrul ci yis 'thob par 'gyur/_/bzhon pa byin pas rdzu 'phrul 'thob/_/dran pa bsgoms pas rjes su dran/_/
[\[28b.4\]]mtha' gnyis rab tu spang byas na/_/zag pa zad par reg par 'gyur/_/gang gis zhing ni phun sum tshogs/_/cis ni dge 'dun phun sum tshogs/_/gang gis phun sum tshogs 'od 'gyur/_/gang gis phyogs bcur lhang nger gda'/_/smon lam gyis ni phun sum zhing /_/bsdu bas dge 'dun phun 
[\[28b.5\]]sum tshogs/_/'dir ni rin chen gdugs phul bas/_/phyogs bcur lhang nger snang bar 'gyur/_/chos rnams thams cad bsdu ba ni/_/chos gang gis ni thob par 'gyur/_/gang dang gang du skyes pa der/_/byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba 'thob/_/sems can 
[\[28b.6\]]thams cad thar bya'i phyir/_/byang chub don du sems btud pa/_/des ni chos rnams bsdu ba 'thob/_/der ni dga' ba'ang 'thob par 'gyur/_/bslab pa ci 'dra bslabs pa dang /_/sems ni ci 'dra bsgoms pa yis/_/thub pa chen po khyod 'dra ba'i/_/ston pa 
[\[28b.7\]]thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur/_/sems can ma lus thams cad la/_/mnyam pa'i sems nyid bslabs pa dang /_/mnyam par sems ni bsgoms pas na/_/thams cad zil gnon rgyal bar 'gyur/_/skye ba kun tu byang chub sems/_/rmi lam na yang sems de ni/_/
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]'dor mi 'gyur na ma nyal tshe/_/smos ci 'tshal bar gang gis 'gyur/_/grong dang grong khyer rnams su'am/_/gang du gnas pa'i yul rnams su/_/byang chub la ni yang dag 'dzud/_/des na sems 'dor mi 'gyur ro/_/gang dang gang du skye bar yang /_/ji 
[\[29a.2\]]ltar stobs ni che 'gyur zhing /_/rtag tu mthu yis 'phags pa dang /_/bdud rnams bye bas mi tshugs 'gyur/_/'dir ni snying po lnga byin zhing /_/skrag la mi 'jigs byin na ni/_/gang dang gang du skye bar yang /_/des ni stobs ni che 'gyur te/_/rtag tu mthu yis 
[\[29a.3\]]'phags pa dang /_/bdud rnams bye bas mi tshugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de/_/'jig rten mgon gyis mngon sum du/_/lung bstan pa 'di thos nas su/_/seng ge yid ni dga' bar 'gyur/_/seng ge grogs dang lhan cig tu/_/'di skad kyi ni tshig 
[\[29a.4\]]smras te/_/spyod pa bstan pa 'di la ni/_/bdag cag rjes su bslab par bgyi/_/de nas sangs rgyas 'dzum mdzad de/_/stong gsum po yang g.yos gyur nas/_/ma pham pas ni sangs rgyas la/_/ci zhig slad du 'dzum mdzad pa/_/thub chen lung bstan gsol zhes zhus/_/
[\[29a.5\]]de skad zhu ba zhus pa dang /_/ma pham pa la sangs rgyas kyis/_/'di skad ces ni bka' stsal to/_/gang gi phyir ni 'dzum mdzad pa/_/ma pham nga las 'dir nyon cig_/sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad cu dang /_/gzhan yang khrag khrig phrag bcu la/_/byang chub don du 'dus nas ni/_/mi yi 
[\[29a.6\]]'dren pa rnams la mchod/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog_/mar me mdzad pa tshun chad du/_/bram ze'i khye'u 'di dag rnams/_/nga yis yongs su smin par byas/_/snang ba che zhes bya ba yi/_/bskal pa mdzes pa 'byung 'gyur te/_/de dag bskal pa gcig de la/_/
[\[29a.7\]]rnam par 'dren par 'gyur ba ste/_/ye shes tog gi rgyal mtshan zhes/_/'jig rten 'dren pa rnams su 'gyur/_/'od dpag med kyi bkod pa ltar/_/de dag gi yang de 'drar 'gyur/_/byams pa nas ni bzung nas su/_/bskal pa sum brgya tshang bar ni/_/de yi bar du dus 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]kun tu/_/rtag tu sangs rgyas phrad par 'gyur/_/'di dag byang chub thob pa yi/_/ming ni gang sus thos pa rnams/_/de dag thams cad 'jig rten du/_/kun mkhyen gang zag mtshungs med 'gyur/_/gang zhig lung bstan 'di thos nas/_/mos pa skyed par byed pa ni/_/
[\[29b.2\]]'jig rten gsum po 'di dag na/_/de dang mtshungs pa'i bsod nams med/_/gang gis bskal pa drug stong du/_/sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad du/_/rin chen rnams kyis bkang byas nas/_/byang chub phyir 'dir byin pa bas/_/gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di/_/
[\[29b.3\]]thos nas byang chub phyir 'jug na/_/sngar smos pa yi bsod nams kyis/_/grangs dang char yang mi phod do/_/chos 'di bshad pa'i tshe na ni/_/'jig rten mgon po'i mthu yis ni/_/lha rnams me tog char pa 'bebs/_/stong gsum po yang g.yos par gyur/_/seng ge 
[\[29b.4\]]grogs dang bcas pa yis/_/mngon par shes pa lnga thob nas/_/nyin bdun bar du mchod byas nas/_/bstan pa la ni rab tu byung /_/de dag kun gyis ting 'dzin 'thob/_/zad mi shes pa'i gzungs kyang thob/_/sems can rnams kyi don byed de/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[29b.5\]]chos la 'dzud par byed/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na sems can bye ba phrag brgyad cu byang chub mchog la zhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_seng ge grogs dang bcas pa dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_
[\[29b.6\]]dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/_seng ges zhus 
[\[29b.7\]]pa'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dA na shI la dang /_mu ni bar ma dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/_/
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]{D82}]'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u sum cu rtsa brgyad pa ste sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen thabs la mkhas pa byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dam pas zhus pa/_bam po dang po/_/rgya gar skad du/_
[\[30a.2\]]Ar+ya sarba bud d+ha ma hA ra ha s+yo pA ya kau sha l+ya dz+ny+yA nod ta ra bo d+hi satwa pa ri pr-its+tsha pa ri brta nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen thabs la mkhas pa byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dam pas zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_
[\[30a.3\]]sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/_slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong brgyad stong gi dge slong gi 
[\[30a.4\]]dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khri drug stong thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa gzungs thob pa/_spobs pa thogs pa med pa/_mngon par shes pa sgrub pa la mkhas pa/_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa/_yon tan 'bum 
[\[30a.5\]]phrag du ma dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas ring po ma lon par 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te/_tshangs par spyod pa/_
[\[30a.6\]]thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba/_don bzang po/_tshig 'bru bzang po/_ma 'dres pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba yang dag par ston to/_/de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 
[\[30a.7\]]'dug par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]gsol to/_/gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs dbye bar gnang na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_
[\[30b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de gshegs pa la dris shig dang /_ngas dris pa de dang de nyid kyi lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/_/de skad ces 
[\[30b.3\]]bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa thabs la mkhas pa zhes bgyi na thabs la mkhas pa 
[\[30b.4\]]de gang lags/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[30b.5\]]to/_/rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_lha rnams dang /_mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_da ltar dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i byang 
[\[30b.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes pa rjes su yongs su gzung ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i 
[\[30b.7\]]phyir zhugs te/_rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa yongs su dri bar sems pa ni rigs kyi bu yang khyod legs so/_/rigs kyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la tshul bzhin du yid la zung shig dang /_ngas byang chub 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa khyod la bshad par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[31a.2\]]de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni zan kham gcig tsam yang sems can thams cad la sbyin par byed de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs 
[\[31a.3\]]la mkhas pa ni gang gi tshe dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa la zan kham gcig tsam yang sbyin par byed na de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sbyin par byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par bya bar yongs su 
[\[31a.4\]]bsngo ba'i phyir ro/_/de rgyu gnyis kyis na sems can thams cad la yongs su sngo bar byed de/_gnyis gang zhe na/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang /_yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa nyid kyis te/_rigs kyi bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[31a.5\]]thabs la mkhas pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni gzhan gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus byas pa la rjes su yi rang bar byed cing /_rjes su yi rang nas kyang sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo zhing 
[\[31a.6\]]btang ste yongs su sngo bar yang byed do/_/de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des byang chub kyi sems dang bral ba'i sbyin pa po dang /_sbyin bdag gang dag yin pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon par byed la/_len pa po gang dag yin pa de dag kyang 
[\[31a.7\]]zil gyis gnon par byed de/_rigs kyi bu de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa ni phyogs bcu dag na me tog gi shing ljon pa dang /_
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]spos kyi shing ljon pa dang /_me tog dang /_me tog phreng dang /_spos dang /_phye ma dang /_byug pa bdag gir ma byas shing yongs su ma bzung ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bsam pas yongs su bzung zhing yongs su bsdus nas sangs rgyas thams cad la 'bul bar byed cing dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[31b.2\]]ba de yang sems can thams cad la gtong bar byed de/_yongs su btang nas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo bar byed do/_/phyogs bcu dag na me tog gi shing ljon pa dang /_spos kyi shing ljon pa dang /_me tog dang /_me tog phreng dang /_spos dang /_phye ma dang /_
[\[31b.3\]]byug pa bdag gi dang bcas shing yongs su bzung ba dang bcas pa gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi dri rlung gis btab pa'i ngad de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas sangs rgyas thams cad la 'bul bar byed cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bdag dang /_sems can thams cad kyis 
[\[31b.4\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do/_/de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po 
[\[31b.5\]]dpag tu med pa 'thob par 'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na sems can 
[\[31b.6\]]sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas sems can de dag gi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de dag thams cad bsdus te 'chags par byed cing /_'di ltar sems can de dag gi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba gang dag yin pa de dag 
[\[31b.7\]]thams cad bdag gi lus la 'bab par 'gyur zhing sems can de dag bde bar gyur cig ces go cha gyon par yang byed do/_/phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na sems can bde ba'i tshor ba myong bar gyur pa gang dag yin pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]pas de dag yang dag par bsdus te rjes su yi rang bar byed cing /_rjes su yi rang nas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs pa'i sems bskyed pas sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs 
[\[32a.2\]]su bsngo bar byed do/_/de dge ba'i rtsa ba des sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad rnams 'thob par 'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[32a.3\]]thabs la mkhas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la phyag byas/_bkur stir byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas/_bsnyen bkur byas nas 'di ltar so sor rtog par byed de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings gcig las nges par byung ba dang /_
[\[32a.4\]]tshul khrims gcig pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gcig pa dang /_shes rab gcig pa dang /_rnam par grol ba gcig pa dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba gcig pa dang /_ye shes gcig pa dang /_rig pa gcig pa yin no zhes so sor rtog par byed do/_/des de ltar so sor 
[\[32a.5\]]brtags nas 'di ltar shes par byed de/_de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la phyag byas/_bkur stir byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas/_bsnyen bkur byas pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas pa dang /_bkur sti byas pa dang /_bla mar byas pa dang /_
[\[32a.6\]]ri mor byas pa dang /_mchod pa byas pa dang /_bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur ro snyam du shes par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mchod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad bsam pas yongs su bzung 
[\[32a.7\]]nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo bar byed de/_rigs kyi bu de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa ni gang gi tshe blo rtul bar gyur na yang de 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]bdag nyid khyad du gsod par mi byed cing /_zhum par mi byed par de tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam la yang 'jug par byed cing de 'di ltar so sor rtog par yang byed de/_tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig po 'di'i don gang yin pa de ni gsung rab tu gtogs pa thams 
[\[32b.2\]]cad kyi don yin no zhes so sor rtog par byed do/_/des de ltar tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig kha ton du bslabs nas zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis snying rje chen po bskyed de/_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_grags pa 'dod pa med pas grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_
[\[32b.3\]]yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu skye bo mang po la tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de rgya cher yang dag par ston par byed cing 'di ltar smon lam 'debs par yang byed de/_sems can gang su dag gis bdag gi tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di thos par gyur pa de dag 
[\[32b.4\]]thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs par yang byed do/_/de dge ba'i rtsa ba thabs la mkhas pas yongs su zin pa des sems can thams cad kun dga' bo ltar mang du thos par 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa nyid 
[\[32b.5\]]kyang 'thob par 'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa ni gal te brgya la brgya lam na dbul por gyur na yang des tha 
[\[32b.6\]]na gzhan gyi las kyang byas te/_kha zas nal ze gang tsam yang blangs nas zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis dge 'dun nam/_gang zag la 'bul bar yang byed do/_/phul nas kyang de 'di ltar so sor rtog par byed de/_bcom ldan 'das kyis sems rgya chen pos byin na sbyin pa yang rgya 
[\[32b.7\]]chen por 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pas na 'di ltar bdag gi sbyin par bya ba'i chos 'di ni chud mod kyi/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis byin pas dpag tu med par 'gyur ro snyam du so sor rtog par byed do/_/de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems tshad med par gyur pa 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]des kha zas nal ze gang tsam po de sbyin par byed cing /_bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag dang sems can thams cad 'di lta ste dper na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ji lta ba bzhin du skyes 
[\[33a.2\]]bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog 'grub par 'gyur zhing lag na rin po che grub par gyur cig ces yongs su sngo bar byed do/_/de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa des byang chub kyi sems dang bral ba'i sems can rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams 
[\[33a.3\]]bya ba'i dngos po yang zil gyis gnon par 'gyur la/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog kyang 'grub par 'gyur/_lag na rin po che yang 'grub par 'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[33a.4\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni gal te nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas par gyur kyang de dag la dga' bar mi byed cing /_
[\[33a.5\]]gal te byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur lhag pa dag yod la/_bdag la de lta ma yin par mthong na yang de rgyu gnyis kyis bdag la rtog par byed de/_gnyis gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' las nges par byung ba ni 
[\[33a.6\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yin la/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las nges par byung ba ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams yin no snyam du bdag nyid la rtog par byed cing /_de 'di ltar so sor rtog par yang byed de/_'di dag la bsnyen bkur ba lhag 
[\[33a.7\]]pa dag yod mod kyi/_'on kyang 'dir ni bdag nyid shin du mchog dang /_shin tu gtso bo yin gyi/_'di dag ni ma yin no/_/'di dag ni bdag gi pha'i nor gyi phung po la yongs su spyod par byed pa yin pas bdag gis 'di dag la dga' bar yang mi bya la/_'di dag la phrag 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]dog kyang mi bya'o snyam du so sor rtog par byed do/_/des lhag pa'i bsam pas sems bskyed pa des gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur byas kyang khengs par mi 'gyur la/_bsnyen bkur ma byas kyang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing sems can thams cad la thugs mnyam pa 
[\[33b.2\]]kun du 'dzin par mdzad pa lta bu'i rjes su chags pa dang /_khong khro ba spangs pa 'thob par 'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la 
[\[33b.3\]]mkhas pa ni sbyin pa sbyin pas pha rol du phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni gang gi tshe slongs mo ba mthong ba na de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 
[\[33b.4\]]dmigs te/_ser sna'i sems tshar gcod par byed cing gtong ba chen po yang spel bar byed la/_sbyin no snyam pa'i sems kyang skyed par byed pa gang yin pa de ni de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yin no/_/tshul khrims yang dag par blangs shing tshul khrims dang ldan pa la sbyin pa sbyin 
[\[33b.5\]]par byed pa dang /_sems can tshul khrims 'chal ba gang dag yin pa de dag tshul khrims la 'god par byed cing sbyin pa sbyin nas 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'god par byed pa gang yin pa de ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yin no/_/byams 
[\[33b.6\]]pa'i sems dang /_phan pa'i sems dang /_ma 'dres pa'i sems dang /_ma 'khrugs pa'i sems dang /_le lo med pa'i sems dang /_rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang /_snyoms pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/_/
[\[33b.7\]]bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_bldag pa dang /_myang ba dag la mngon par gus pa yang dag par sgrub par byed cing rtsol bar byed pa dang /_lus kyis zhal ta byed pa dang /_sems kyis zhal ta byed pa dang /_ldang ba dang /_'gro ba dang /_'ong bar byed pa gang 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]yin pa de ni de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yin no/_/byin pa gang yin pa de la sems rtse gcig pa nyid dang /_dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba'i bsam pa dang /_rnam par g.yeng ba med pa gang yin pa de ni de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol 
[\[34a.2\]]du phyin pa yin no/_/sbyin pa byin nas chos nyid kyi rjes su yang dag par gzhol bar byed de/_sus byin/_su la byin/_ci zhig byin/_'di'i rnam par smin pa sus myong bar 'gyur zhes chos nyid kyi rjes su yang dag par gzhol bar byed cing des de ltar yongs su btsal nas kyang gang gis 
[\[34a.3\]]byin pa dang /_gang la byin pa dang /_ci zhig byin pa dang /_de'i rnam par smin pa myong bar byed pa gang yin pa'i chos 'ga' yang mi dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la 
[\[34a.4\]]mkhas pa ni sbyin pa sbyin pas kyang pha rol du phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems 
[\[34a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pas sbyin pa gang gis sems can rnams kyang 'khor ba las yongs su 'dzin par bgyid la/_sbyin pa de nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[34a.6\]]rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa de ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni thabs la mkhas pa dang /_thabs la 
[\[34a.7\]]mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sbyin pa chung ngu yang chen por byed la/_chen po ni dpag tu med pa dang /_grangs med par byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni gal te brgya la brgya lam na sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang ngam/_sems kun du rmongs pas nyes pa byung na yang de 'di ltar so sor slob ste/_gal te bdag phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched 'di 
[\[34b.2\]]dag nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur na ni de lta na bdag gis yongs su gdung bar bya dgos par 'gyur bas bdag gis 'di ltar go cha bgo bar bya ste/_bdag sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bar du 'khor bar 'khor bar bya ba la bdag 
[\[34b.3\]]gis sems zhum par mi bya/_'jigs par mi bya/_sems skrag par mi bya/_yongs su gdung bar mi bya zhing /_ji lta ji ltar 'khor ba na 'khor bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_nyes pa 'di yang chos bzhin du phyir bya zhing phyin chad kyang nyes pa 
[\[34b.4\]]mi 'byung bar bya ba dang /_bdag gis sems can thams cad kyang nyes pa las dbyung ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o zhes go cha gyon par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu yongs su brtag pa nye bar bzung na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ni gal te rtsa ba'i nyes pa bzhi po thams cad byung 
[\[34b.5\]]bar gyur na yang thabs la mkhas pa des sel bar byed na/_rigs kyi bu nga ni byang chub sems dpa' la nyes pa med ces smra'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[34b.6\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nongs pa dang bcas pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' so sor thar pa'i bslab pa la slob par byed pa na bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du rtsa ba dang 'bras bu za 
[\[34b.7\]]bar byed cing sems can thams cad kyi legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras so cog bzod par byed du zin kyang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis gnas par gyur na/_rigs kyi bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rtsa ba'i nyes pa lci 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]ba zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag rtsa ba'i nyes pa byung bar gyur pa ni phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched de dag nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i skal ba med pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[35a.2\]]yang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag ma bshags ma spangs kyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i skal ba med cing sangs rgyas kyi sa 'thob par 'gyur ba'i skal pa med de de ni gnas med 
[\[35a.3\]]do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi ston pa lags te/_mi mkhyen pa 'am/_ma gzigs pa 'am/_thugs su ma chud pa 'am/_mngon 
[\[35a.4\]]sum du ma mdzad pa cung zad mi mnga' lags mod kyi/_'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pas 'di skad ces dge slong gis nyes pa byung ba mthong na bcab par mi bya bar tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa gzhan dag gam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar smros shig ces bka' stsal 
[\[35a.5\]]pas/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po 'dir mthar chags su bsod snyoms kyi slad du mchi ba na/_grong khyer gzhan zhig na byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po zhes bgyi ba khri'i steng na bud med zhig dang lhan cig mchis pa 
[\[35a.6\]]mthong ba de bdag byams pa dang ldan pa dang /_nongs pa ma mchis pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol lags so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshig 'di skad ces gsol nas ring po ma lon par de nas de'i mod la sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par 
[\[35a.7\]]gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar steng gi bar snang la ta la bdun srid tsam du 'phags te 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/_
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]nyes pa'i chos dang ldan pa bar snang la 'dug par nus snyam 'am/_kun dga' bos smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de ni mi nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal pos smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du gyur pa 'di la 
[\[35b.2\]]ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyes pa'i chos dang ldan pa dris shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yul yul por gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gtso bo chen 
[\[35b.3\]]po 'di lta bu la nongs pa yongs su glengs pa gang lags pa'i nongs pa la nongs par 'chags shing mchis na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi nongs pa la nongs par bshags pa gang lags pa de nongs pa la nongs par yongs su gzung du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 
[\[35b.4\]]'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo khyod theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa dag la nyes pa'i 'du shes ma skyed cig_/kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/_dper na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag gcig pu zla 
[\[35b.5\]]med par zhi gnas kyi gnas pas gnas par byed pa ni zag pa zad pa mngon sum du bya ba la bar chad med par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ldan pa bud med kyi 'khor dam 
[\[35b.6\]]pa'i nang na 'dug cing dga' ba dang /_rtse ba dang /_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bar du gcod pa med par rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni dkon mchog gsum mo/_/
[\[35b.7\]]gsum gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang /_chos dkon mchog dang /_dge 'dun dkon mchog dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la ma bkod pa'i g.yog 'khor gang yin pa de mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo gang gi tshe khyod kyis byang chub 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral ba 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtse ba dang /_dga' ba dang /_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa mthong na kun dga' bo khyod kyis skyes bu dam pa de ni de bzhin 
[\[36a.2\]]gshegs pa lta bu'i dbang po lnga dang ldan zhing gnas pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/kun dga' bo gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po khri gcig gi steng na bud med dang lhan cig 'dug par gyur pa yang nyon cig_/kun dga' bo bud med de ni 'das pa'i dus na tshe 
[\[36a.3\]]rabs lnga brgyar byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po'i chung mar gyur te/_de sngon gyi tshul bzhin ma yin pa de nyid kyis rigs kyi bu de la lhag par sems kyis 'brel par gyur kyang byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po de'i dpal dang /_gzi brjid 
[\[36a.4\]]dang /_tshul khrims kyi stobs bskyed pa mthong nas/_gnas ngan len gyi tshig brjod par ma nus nas de gcig pu dben par 'dug pa na 'di lta bu'i sems skyes par gyur te/_gal te byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po bdag dang lhan cig khri gcig gi steng na 
[\[36a.5\]]'dug par gyur na bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal pos sring mo de'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang snga 
[\[36a.6\]]dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs dang chos gos bgos te lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so/_/de mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba na sring mo de'i khyim ga la ba der zhugs nas nang gi sa'i khams gang yin pa 
[\[36a.7\]]dang /_phyi rol gyi sa'i khams gang yin pa'i sa'i khams de dag ni gcig pa yin pa'i chos kyi sgo 'dis des sa dang mnyam pa'i sems kyis lag pa g.yas pas sring mo de bzung ste khri gcig la 'khod do/_/'khod ma thag tu des de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang smras so/_/
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]sangs rgyas 'dod pa bsngags mi mdzad/_/de ni byis pa'i spyod yul yin/_/'dod la sred pa spangs byas na/_/mi mchog sangs rgyas rnams su 'gyur/_/kun dga' bo de nas sring mo des tshigs su bcad pa de thos nas dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/_khri de las 
[\[36b.2\]]babs nas byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po'i rkang pa la gtugs te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad smras so/_/'dod gang sangs rgyas smad pa dag_/slan chad don du gnyer mi bgyid/_/'dod la sred pa spangs bgyis nas/_/mi mchog sangs rgyas 
[\[36b.3\]]grub gyur cig_/bdag gi sems kyis gang bsams pa'i/_/nongs pa de ni khyod la 'chags/_/srog chags kun la sman slad du/_/bdag ni byang chub 'dun pa skyed/_/kun dga' bo de ltar byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal pos thabs la mkhas pa des 
[\[36b.4\]]sring mo de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par rab tu bzhag nas stan las langs te song ngo /_/kun dga' bo de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i khyad par la ltos/_kun 
[\[36b.5\]]dga' bo nga ni sring mo de 'di nas shi 'phos nas bud med kyi lus bsgyur te bskal pa grangs med pa 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu 'das pa'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te/_'jig rten 
[\[36b.6\]]du 'byung bar 'gyur zhing des byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can mi dge ba'i kun nas ldang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar lung ston to/_/kun dga' bo rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khor gang bzung na log par ltung 
[\[36b.7\]]ba'i chos su 'gyur ba de 'dzin par mi byed par rig par bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po bar snang de las babs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas ni thabs la mkhas pa dang snying rje chen po la gnas par bgyi lags te/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di la bdag ni 'di snyam du gal te byang chub sems dpas ni sems can gcig gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed pa'i slad du 'di 
[\[37a.2\]]lta bu'i nongs pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing nongs pa ji lta bu byung bas bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du sems can dmyal ba chen por sreg par 'gyur yang /_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas ni nongs pa 'byung ba de dang /_sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de la spro bar bgyi 
[\[37a.3\]]lags kyi/_sems can gcig po de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su btang ba la ni ma lags so/_/snyam du sems lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_skyes bu dam pa legs so legs 
[\[37a.4\]]so/_/byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po de lta bu dang ldan pa ni nyes pa'i chos dang ldan par yang mi 'gyur la/_nyes pa thams cad spong bar yang byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu ngas mngon par shes pa'i phyir te/_sngon 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang 
[\[37a.5\]]ches grangs med pa/_rgya che ba/_dpag tu med pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol tu gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u skar ma zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur te/_des lo bzhi khri nyis stong gi bar du nags 'dab dag tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa 
[\[37a.6\]]byas nas des lo bzhi khri nyis stong po de dag 'das pa dang rgyal po'i pho brang legs 'byor ces bya bar zhugs so/_/des grong khyer chen po der zhugs pa na tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig gis bram ze'i khye'u gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa de mthong nas de 'dod pa la 'dod 
[\[37a.7\]]chags kyis kun nas dkris pa'i sems kyis bram ze'i khye'u de'i mdun du rab tu brgyugs te rkang pa la gtugs so/_/rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma des bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sring mo khyod ci 'dod des de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bram ze'i 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]khye'u kho mo ni khyod 'tshal lo/_/des de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sring mo kho bo ni 'dod pa rnams don du gnyer ba ma yin gyi/_kho bo ni tshangs par spyod pa yin no/_/des de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bram ze'i khye'u gal te khyod dang lhan cig tu 'grogs par mi 'gyur ba lta na 
[\[37b.2\]]bdag 'gum par 'gyur lags so/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_bdag gis lo bzhi khri nyis stong gi bar du tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas deng brtul zhugs gzhig pa 'di ni bdag gi tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin no snyam nas/_des bu mo de mthus 
[\[37b.3\]]spangs te bor nas gom pa bdun bor ba dang /_de'i gom pa bdun pa la gnas pa'i tshe snying rje skyes par gyur nas 'di ltar bdag gis brtul zhugs bshig ste sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar gyur kyang bdag gis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba de bzod par bya 
[\[37b.4\]]zhing bu mo 'di bde bar 'gyur ba dang /_'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma de de nas phyir log ste/_lag pa g.yas pas bu mo de bzung ste/_de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bzang mo longs shig dang 
[\[37b.5\]]kho bos khyod ci 'dod pa bzhin bya'o/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma de lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du de'i khyim na gnas nas yang mngon par byung ste/_tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi bskyed nas de nas shi 'phos ma thag tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de'i 
[\[37b.6\]]tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u skar ma zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan yin snyam du khyod yid gnyis dang the tshom za bar gyur na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u skar ma zhes bya ba der gyur to/_/shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma ni de'i tshe de'i 
[\[37b.7\]]dus na tshong dpon gyi bu mor gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu ngas snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa des cung zad tsam zhig 'dod pa dang ldan par byas pas kyang bskal pa khrir 'khor ba bsnyil cing spangs par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu sems can gzhan dag gi sems can dmyal 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i las gang yin pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba la ltos/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa la 'di skad 
[\[38a.2\]]ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu gal te dge slong shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu dag thabs la mkhas pa yin par gyur na ni dge slong ko ka li ka yang sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu ngas mngon par shes pa'i phyir te/_sngon 
[\[38a.3\]]'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gi gsung rab la dge slong dri med ces bya ba chos smra ba zhig byung bar gyur to/_/de dgon pa'i phug zhig na gnas so/_/de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba na drang srong lnga brgya zhig 
[\[38a.4\]]kyang gnas te/_de'i tshe na dus ma yin par sprin chen po 'dus shing char chen po babs par gyur to/_/de nas bud med gnyis shig grong bar gyi lam na 'dug pa de gnyis char pa de bskyab pa'i phyir dge slong dri med gnas pa'i phug tu zhugs te/_phug de nas phyir byung ba dang /_
[\[38a.5\]]drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag gis bud med de gnyis dge slong dri med kyi phug nas phyir byung ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag 'di snyam du e ma'o dge slong dri med 'di ni sdig pa 'dod pa mi tshangs par spyod pa yin no snyam nas thab dang zhe sdang gi 'du shes 
[\[38a.6\]]skyes par gyur to/_/de nas dge slong dri med kyis drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas de'i tshe steng gi bar snang gi nam mkha' la ta la bdun srid tsam du mngon par 'phags te 'dug pa drang srong de dag gis mthong nas de dag 'di 
[\[38a.7\]]snyam du sems te/_bdag cag gi bstan bcos dag las mi tshangs par spyod pas ni steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags te 'dug par mi nus so zhes 'byung snyam nas/_de dag gis de'i mod la dge slong dri med kyi rkang pa la yan lag lngas gtugs te nyes pa la nyes 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]par bshags so/_/rigs kyi bu gal te dge slong dri med de de'i tshe steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags te 'dug par ma gyur na ni drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag rang rang gi lus de nyid kyis sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_
[\[38b.2\]]de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong dri med ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod yid gnyis dang the tshom za bar gyur na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong dri med ces bya ba der gyur to/_/rigs 
[\[38b.3\]]kyi bu rnam grangs des na khyod kyis 'di ltar gal te dge slong shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu gnyis de'i tshe steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags te 'dug par gyur na ni dge slong ko ka li ka yang sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu rnam 
[\[38b.4\]]grangs des kyang khyed kyis 'di ltar gang du byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa'i ye shes 'jug par 'gyur ba de ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin par rig par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na smad 'tshong ma sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi'i 
[\[38b.5\]]bya ba shes shing legs par lobs pa ni de'i 'og tu nor 'dod pa'i phyir skyes bu gzhan gyi drung du ci nas kyang bdag nyid yongs su gtang zhing dga' ba ston pa dang /_ji srid du skyes bu de las don thams cad ma bsgrubs kyi bar du de la yo byad thams cad kyang sri bar mi byed pa de 
[\[38b.6\]]lta de ltar gnas par byed do/_/de nas don bsgrubs zin pa'i 'og tu ni de la mi lta mi sems par spong bar byed cing de gzhi de las 'gyod pa'i sems gcig tsam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yang thabs 
[\[38b.7\]]la mkhas pa des sems can 'di dag yongs su smin par bya'o zhes bya bar shes te/_rnam grangs des sems can de dag gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du drung du sbyor bar byed cing de dag la yo byad thams cad mi sri bar byed do/_/sems can rnams kyi dge ba la dga' 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]bas bdag nyid kyang yongs su gtong bar byed kyi yo byad la dga' bas ni ma yin no/_/gang gi tshe kye ma sems can 'di dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba byas par gyur pa dag ste/_'di dag gis phyis yongs su nyams par byed mi nus par shes na ni de'i 'og tu 'dod pa'i 
[\[39a.2\]]dga' ba dang rtsed mo thams cad la mi lta bar spangs te 'gro zhing de de dang 'brel pa'i sems la gnas par mi byed do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na mes yongs su gdungs pa'i sa bon rnams ni kha dog yongs su nyams pa med pa la myu gu 'byung ba'i skal ba med pa de bzhin 
[\[39a.3\]]du rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_bdag med pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su gdungs na de 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad la yongs su spyod pa byed kyang /_
[\[39a.4\]]log par ltung bar 'gro ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa yongs su 'dzin par mi byed la/_sangs rgyas kyi kha dog las yongs su nyams par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags bung ba ni me tog thams cad las dri 
[\[39a.5\]]snom zhing ro myong bar byed kyang gang la yang rtag pa'i 'du shes sgom par mi byed/_gnas kyi sred pa skyed par mi byed cing de dag las dri dang /_'dab ma dang /_sdong bu dang /_me tog 'phrog par mi byed pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yang 
[\[39a.6\]]sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang rtsed mo thams cad la yongs su longs spyod par byed kyang de dag la rtag pa'i 'du shes sgom par yang mi byed/_gnas kyi sred pa skyed par yang mi byed la/_bdag kyang rmas par mi 'gyur/_gzhan yang 
[\[39a.7\]]rmas par mi 'gyur bar byed do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na nya pa shin tu legs par bslabs pa ni srad bu gcig la gzan ma btags te mchil pa byas nas mtsho chen po'i nang du 'dor ro/_/de srad bu legs par bsrungs pa gcig po des gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe na mtsho 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]chen po nas mchil pa de 'dren par byed pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yang stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_bdag med pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsgoms pa'i sems thams cad mkhyen 
[\[39b.2\]]pa nyid la brtan par gtad pas 'dod pa'i 'dam chen por 'jug par byed kyang de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems legs par bsrungs pa des gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe na 'dod pa'i khams spangs te tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar byed do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na skyes 
[\[39b.3\]]bu rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags 'chang ba ni rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis bzung ste zhags pa lnga'i chings mas bcings par gyur kyang de ni gang gi tshe 'gro bar 'dod pa de'i tshe rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa gcig gis chings ma de dag thams cad bcad 
[\[39b.4\]]nas gang du 'gro bar 'dod pa der 'gro bar byed pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir gang gi tshe 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po de dag gi dga' ba myong bar byed cing de dag dang 'dres par gnas par byed kyang 
[\[39b.5\]]de gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe shes rab kyi rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems legs par bsrungs pa gcig gis 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i chings ma de dag thams cad rab tu bcad de/_de nas shi 'phos 
[\[39b.6\]]nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar byed do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na 'phong gi slob dpon legs par bslabs pa zhig ral gri rnon po ras bcos bus dkris pa zhig thogs te 'dron pa mang po sgrol bar byed pa de na sems can mi mkhas pa 'phong gi shes pa'i bya ba 
[\[39b.7\]]mi shes pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni 'phong gi slob dpon de la snying rje ba dang /_brnyas pa'i 'du shes skyed par byed cing /_tshig 'di skad ces gzhu yang med/_ral gri yang med/_dong pa yang med/_'khor kyang med pa 'dis ni 'dron pa 'di dag bsgral bar mi nus 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]te/_'dis ni bdag nyid kyang thar par byed mi nus na 'dron pa thams cad bsgral ba dang /_chom rkun pa'i sde pham par bya ba lta ci smos te/_de ni gnas med pas 'di ni tshul ma yin pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang zer bar 'gyur la/_de nas 'phong gi slob 
[\[40a.2\]]dpon de 'brog dgon par son te chom rkun pa'i tshogs lhags par gyur pa na/_mda' gzhu thogs te go cha sra ba bgos nas mtshon cha de gzas te chom rkun pa rnams la 'debs par byed cing /_des chom rkun pa de dag thams cad srog dang phral nas yang mtshon cha lag tu len par 
[\[40a.3\]]byed pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshon cha legs par thogs te/_thabs la mkhas pas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis dga' ba dang /_rtse ba dang /_
[\[40a.4\]]dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa gang dag de'i thabs la mkhas pa'i shes pa de khong du ma chud pa de dag gis de mthong ba'i tshe de dag de la ma dad pa dang /_snying rje skyed par byed cing tshig 'di skad ces 'di ltar bag med pa'i gnas pas gnas pa 'dis ni bdag nyid 
[\[40a.5\]]kyang thar par byed mi nus na sems can thams cad bsgral ba lta ci smos shing bdud kyi sde pham par byed par lta ga la 'gyur te/_de ni gnas med pas 'di ni tshul ma yin pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang zer mod kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa dang /_shes 
[\[40a.6\]]rab kyis legs par yongs su zin pa ni gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe shes rab kyi mtshon des nyon mongs pa'i dra ba thams cad dral cing rab tu gtubs nas shes rab dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bud med dang bral ba dang /_'khrig pa dang bral ba shin tu yongs su dag pa dag tu 'gro 
[\[40a.7\]]bar byed do/_/gtam 'di brjod par gyur pa de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed ces bya ba mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs par gyur te/_de mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms spyod pa na tshong dpon zhig gi 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]khyim du phyin pa dang /_tshong dpon de la bu mo dpal yon can gyi mchog ces bya ba phyug chung zhig yod par gyur pa khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng na 'dug pa des dge slong de'i skad thos nas bsod snyoms thogs te byang chub sems dpa' dga' byed ga la ba der song ngo /_/de nas bu mo dpal 
[\[40b.2\]]yon can gyi mchog gis byang chub sems dpa' dga' byed mthong ma thag tu 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa'i sems kyis dpe byad las byad bzhin dang sgra skad dang /_kha dog gi mtshan ma gzung ba dang /_de 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa'i sems dang /_'dod 
[\[40b.3\]]chags kyis kun nas bslang ba'i sems dang /_'dod chags kyis yongs su gtugs pa'i sems dang /_'dod chags kyis yongs su gdungs pa'i sems kyis bsregs pas lus rngul bar gyur nas 'greng bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur to/_/byang chub sems 
[\[40b.4\]]dpa' dga' byed kyang bu mo dpal yon can gyi mchog mthong nas tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'di lta ste/_'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems skyes par gyur nas yud tsam zhig na de la dran pa 'di lta bu skyes par gyur te/_chos gang la chags 
[\[40b.5\]]par gyur pa'i chos de gang yin/_ci mig mig la chags sam/_mig ni chags pa mi yin te/_g.yo ba med pa/_byed pa med pa/_sems pa med pa/_'dus byas pa/_rim pa bdun pa/_sha'i ri lu yin te/_mig de ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir sems par mi 
[\[40b.6\]]byed/_tshor bar mi byed do/_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid dang /_pags pa dang /_mdog dang /_sha yang de dang 'dra ste/_des rkang mthil yan chad [{]glad pa [,]klad pa [}]man chad kyi bar la so sor brtags na nang dang phyi rol na gang chags par 'gyur ba'am/_sdang bar 
[\[40b.7\]]'gyur ba'am/_rmongs par 'gyur ba'i chos 'ga' yang ma dmigs so/_/des ma dmigs nas 'dod chags kyi sems dang bral bar gyur cing /_des sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor brtags pas chos thams cad ma skyes par rig nas mi skye ba'i chos la 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/de dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis steng gi bar snang la ta la bdun srid tsam du mngon par 'phags te/_mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas nam mkha' de nyid las rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal 
[\[41a.2\]]ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo //_//bam po gnyis pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed steng gi bar snang las ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar chags pa med par 'ong ba gzigs so/_/gzigs 
[\[41a.3\]]nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed steng gi bar snang las ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar chags pa med par 'ong ba mthong ngam/_kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong 
[\[41a.4\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed 'dis ni 'dod chags kyi sems la brten te/_chos thams cad yongs su btsal bas bdud kyi sde btul zhing chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor to/_
[\[41a.5\]]de nas bu mo dpal yon can gyi mchog 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bud med kyi lus spangs te/_mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skyes pa'i lus thob cing sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes so/_/skyes ma thag tu de la rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i 
[\[41a.6\]]gzhal med khang dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa yang byung bar gyur/_de'i rim gro byed pa'i bsnyen bkur ma lha'i bu mo khri bzhi stong yang nye bar gnas par gyur to/_/de'i mod la des bdag gi las ci zhig byas shing bsags pas 'dir skyes par gyur snyam du bsams pa dang /_
[\[41a.7\]]de 'di snyam du gyur te/_bdag ni mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por tshong dpon gyi bu mor gyur pa las de na bdag gis kun du chags pa'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed la bltas pa dang /_bdag 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]dkris pa'i sems kyis 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bud med kyi lus rjes te/_bdag gis 'dir skyes pa'i lus thob cing bdag la 'byor pa dpag tu med pa 'di lta bu dag kyang byung bar gyur to snyam nas sngon gyi las rjes su dran pa'i shes pa yang skyes par gyur to/_/de nas lha'i bu 
[\[41b.2\]]de 'di snyam du sems te/_'dod chags kyi sems las kyang rnam par smin pa 'di lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur na/_bdag gi dad pa'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed la phyag byas shing /_bsnyen bkur byas na lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_bdag 
[\[41b.3\]]'dod pas dga' ba dang /_rtse ba dang /_dga' mgur spyod cing bag med pa'i gnas pas gnas pa ni bdag gi tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin zhing mi rigs kyi/_bdag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed ga la ba der 'gro bar 
[\[41b.4\]]bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas lha'i bu de 'khor lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu lha'i me tog dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dag thogs te/_bcom ldan 'das dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed ga la ba der song nas kha dog shin du 
[\[41b.5\]]'phags pa shin du 'phags pa'i snang ba chen pos rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal snang bar byas te/_lha'i me tog dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_
[\[41b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi rkang pa la yang mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo pug pug 
[\[41b.7\]]por sbyar nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/sangs rgyas mi mchog rnams ni bsam mi khyab/_/byang chub mchog la zhugs rnams bsam mi khyab/_/bde gshegs rnams kyi chos kyang bsam mi khyab/_/grags chen rnams kyi spyod pa'ang bsam mi khyab/_/
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]mnyan yod du ni bdag sngon bu mor gyur/_/tshong dpon bu mo dpal yon mchog ces bgyi/_/mdzes shing thog mar phyug chung gyur pa lags/_/pha ma'i glo bar mchi zhing rab tu byams/_/sangs rgyas sras po smad par ma gyur pa/_/mthu chen dga' byed 
[\[42a.2\]]ces bgyi gang lags pa/_/bsod snyoms spyod cing mnyan yod rgyu ba'i tshe/_/de ni bdag gi pha yi khyim du mchis/_/skad snyan yid du mchi ba thos gyur nas/_/bdag cag sems kyis bsod snyoms thogs nas ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras po gang lags pa/_/dga' 
[\[42a.3\]]byed mthu chen ga la mchis par mchis/_/mthong ma thag tu bdag ni 'dod chags dang /_/ldan pa tshul bzhin ma lags sems skyes te/_/gal te ji ltar bsams bzhin ma mjal na/_/srog la mi lta 'gum pa'i dus bgyi snyam/_/tshul bzhin ma lags 'dod pas rab 
[\[42a.4\]]gdungs nas/_/de la bka' mchid brjod par bgyi ba dang /_/bsod snyoms stsol ba'i rngo yang ma thog nas/_/rngul byung der ni 'greng bzhin gum par gyur/_/bcom ldan bdag ni 'chi 'phor gyur pa'i tshe/_/skad cig de la bud med lus spangs te/_/shi 'phos mtho ris 'jig 
[\[42a.5\]]rten skyes gyur nas/_/bdag gi 'od gsal skyes pa nyid 'di thob/_/rin chen sna tshogs blta na sdug pa yi/_/gzhal med khang mchog mdzes pa grub gyur cing /_/bdag gi g.yog 'khor lha yi bu mo ni/_/khri dang bzhi stong tshang ba byung bar gyur/_/bdag la sems bzang byung 
[\[42a.6\]]bar gyur pa ni/_/sug las gang gi rnam smin 'di 'dra ba/_/rjes su dran nas bdag ni 'di snyam bgyid/_/chags bcas sems kyi rnam smin 'di 'dra ste/_/dga' byed yid dga' 'od gsal mkhas pa la/_/chags bcas sems kyis bdag gis bltas gyur pas/_/sug 
[\[42a.7\]]las de yi rnam smin bzang po des/_/bdag ni gzi brjid mthu stobs 'di 'dra bas/_/chags bcas sems kyi rnam smin 'di 'dra na/_/gang gis de la mchod bgyis ci smos te/_/gang la bde gshegs mkhyen pa 'jug 'gyur ba/_/de ni nyan thos rang rgyal sa ma lags/_
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar ni/_/sangs rgyas ye shes mchog rab bsgrub pa dang /_/bskal pa gang gA'i bye snyed spyad bgyi bar/_/bdag gi dam bcas 'di ni spang mi bgyi/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen dga' byed dam pa la/_/chos kyi mchod pa mchog gis mchod 
[\[42b.2\]]par bgyi/_/gang dag byang chub 'tshal ba ma gtogs par/_/gzhan gyis 'di la 'dren rnams mchod mi 'gyur/_/bud med gang dag 'dod chags sems kyis ni/_/bdag la rtog pa bud med lus bsgyur nas/_/de kun 'jigs med skyes pa 'thob 'gyur bar/_/byang chub 
[\[42b.3\]]spyod mchog dam pa spyad par bgyi/_/lus rngul shi bar gyur pa mthong nas ni/_/bu mo'i pha ma cho nges 'debs byed cing /_/dge slong de yis byad stems byas snyam ste/_/ngu zhing dge sbyong rnams la mi snyan brjod/_/sangs rgyas mthu yis lha yi bu de ni/_/song nas pha ma dag la tshig 
[\[42b.4\]]smras pa/_/dge sbyong la ni zhe sdang khro ma byed/_/yun ring sdug bsngal 'gyur bar ma byed cig_/bu mo dpal yon shi 'phos gang yin de/_/sum cu rtsa gsum skal ba mnyam gyur cing /_/des ni bud med lus kyang spangs byas te/_/de ni lha yi bu pho 'od gsal gyur/_/bde 
[\[42b.5\]]bar gshegs kyi spyan sngar khyed deng la/_/khro ba'i sems kyi nyes pa 'di shogs shig_/sangs rgyas mi mchog rnams ni ma gtogs par/_/sems can rnams kyi dpung gnyen gnas gzhan med/_/'jigs med de yis legs par bskul byas pas/_/pha ma gnyis 
[\[42b.6\]]kyis sangs rgyas sgra thos nas/_/nye du'i tshogs dang lhan cig 'grogs gyur te/_/shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar dong bar gyur/_/mi mchog zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_/khro ba'i sems kyi nyes pa bshags byas nas/_/de bzhin gshegs la gus dang bcas byas te/_/
[\[42b.7\]]bde gshegs rang byung la ni zhu zhus pa/_/ji tsam gyis na 'dren pa mchod par 'gyur/_/chos dang dge 'dun ji ltar mchod pa lags/_/zhus pa de yi lan ni stsal du gsol/_/thos nas de bzhin gnas bgyi gzhan ma lags/_/rgyal bas de dag bsam pa dag mkhyen nas/_/
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]'jig rten mgon pos 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas thams cad mchod 'dod pa/_/de yis brtan par byang chub sems skyed cig_/bu mo'i pha dang ma dang nye du ni/_/lnga brgya tshang ba nyung ba ma yin pas/_/skyes bu khyu mchog de yi gsung thos 
[\[43a.2\]]nas/_/byang chub phyir ni sems kyang brtan par bskyed/_/rgyal bas kun dga' bzang la bka' stsal pa/_/kun dga' ji ltar bshad pa 'di nyon cig_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsam yas te/_/shes rab thabs la mkhas pa'ang de bzhin no/_/dga' byed smon 
[\[43a.3\]]lam yang dang yang 'debs pa/_/bud med gang dag chags pa'i sems kyis ni/_/bdag la rtog pa bud med lus spangs nas/_/de dag myur du skyes bu 'jigs med shog_/bud med gcig min gnyis dang gsum min te/_/bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag mang po rnams/_/gang 
[\[43a.4\]]dag dga' byed la na chags gyur pa/_/de dag thams cad shi 'phos skyes par gyur/_/kun dga' 'dod chags bskyed pa gang gis ni/_/sems can gzhan dag sems dmyal 'gro 'gyur ba/_/de yis dpa' rnams mtho ris 'gro 'gyur zhing /_/skyes par 'gyur ba'i yon 
[\[43a.5\]]tan de 'dra ltos/_/lha'i bu gang gis nga la mchod byas te/_/gus dang bcas pas byang chub mchog zhugs pa/_/des ni sangs rgyas bye mang mchod byas nas/_/rgyal ba blta na mdzes zhes bya bar 'gyur/_/lnga brgya gang dag byang chub zhugs gyur pa/_/de dag mi mchog rnams 
[\[43a.6\]]su 'byung 'gyur ba/_/gang la dad byas bde ba bsam yas pa'i/_/'jig rten mgon la su zhig gus mi byed/_/gang dag nyon mongs rnams kyang bde sbyin na/_/gang dag gus byed de la ci smos pa/_/grags chen sman gyi rgyal po lta bu yi/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[43a.7\]]la su sdang skyed/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na sems can rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'am/_dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'am/_chags pa'i sems 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]dang ldan pa'am/_chos kyi bar du gcod pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang la la dag ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi drung du mchis na de dag thams cad 'di lta ste/_gser gyi kha dog tu kha dog gcig par 'gyur ba de bzhin du btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sems can rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan 
[\[43b.2\]]pa'am/_dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'am/_chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa'am chos kyi bar du gcod pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang la la dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi drung du mchis na yang de dag thams cad 'di lta ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyi kha 
[\[43b.3\]]dog tu sems gcig tu 'gyur lags pas/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni deng slan cad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang 'dra bar 'dzin lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na sman gyi rigs chen po blta mdzes zhes 
[\[43b.4\]]bgyi ba mchis te/_sems can rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'am/_dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'i sems can bro nad sna tshogs kyis thebs pa gang la la dag gis de mthong na de dag thams cad kyi bro nad rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 
[\[43b.5\]]sems can gang dag rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'am/_dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi drung du mchis na de dag thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang nyon mongs pa'i bro nad rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lags so/_/
[\[43b.6\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa kun dga' bo ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gi 
[\[43b.7\]]slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de ltar zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyi gnas pa dag gis kyang gnas par bgyid la/_sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i slad du 'dod pa'i khams na yang kun du gda' ba dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma ma mchis pa 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]dang /_smon pa ma mchis pa dang /_mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i chos rnams kyis kyang gnas par bgyid la nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la yang reg par mi bgyid pa dang /_snying rje chen po yang kun du skyed par bgyid la thams cad mkhyen 
[\[44a.2\]]pa nyid kyi sems la yang 'jug par bgyid pa de ni btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar lags te/_bde bar gshegs pa de ni mchog tu ngo mtshar lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[44a.3\]]dpa' chen po gang dag chags pa thams cad srung bar bgyid cing 'di lta ste/_gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya'i chags pa dag la spyod par bgyid kyang de dag la chags par yang mi 'gyur ba de dag ni thabs la mkhas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa
