[\[85a.3\]]'dis lus dang phrad pa rnyed nas dga' ba skyed nas chags pa 'phel bar byed do/_/dper na lus kyi rkyen gyis bud med kyi gzugs mthong na skyes pa'i 'dod chags skyed la/_yang phrad pa las bral na phyir ldog par 'gyur ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis lus 
[\[85a.4\]]yongs su blangs nas yang bor te gzhan du 'gyur ba med par 'gyur ro/_/'di la pha ma phrad pa dang /_dri za nye bar gnas pa dang /_las la dmigs pa'i dngos po las rnam par shes pas lus 'grub par byed de/_las de dag kyang gzugs can ma yin la skyes pa dang bud med 
[\[85a.5\]]kyi rkyen gyi ngo bo de yang gzugs can ma yin no/_/len pa'i rkyen las 'dod pa 'byung ste/_de bas na 'dod pa'i len pa zhes bya'o/_/gzugs kyis 'dod pa len pas na de'i phyir yang 'dod pa'i len pa zhes bya'o/_/sman chen gzhan yang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin 
[\[85a.6\]]pa'i len pa de gang zhe na/_'di la tshul khrims ni srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_'bru'i chang dang /_sbyar ba'i chang myos par byed pa bag med pa'i gnas spong ba'o/_/de mchog tu 'dzin pa ni rgyun tu 
[\[85a.7\]]zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/_/de'i len pa ni srid pa ste/_lha dang mir skye zhing skye ba yongs su 'dzin pa skyed pa ste/_de ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa'i dge ba yongs su smin par byed do/_/phung po rnams kyi sa bon yang rlan par 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]byed do/_/las dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams kyang sdud par byed do/_/rnam par shes pa yang sbyong bar byed do/_/nyon mongs pa blangs pa rnams kyang sreg par byed de/_de bas na 'di ni tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'i len pa zhes bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' 
[\[85b.2\]]stsal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa 'dis ji ltar lha'i nang du lus yongs su len pa lags/_sems can dmyal ba rnams su ji ltar len pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[85b.3\]]sman chen de'i phyir nyon cig_/'di la rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis chos kyi khams yongs su blangs nas lha'i lta ba skyed de/_de'i lta ba de yang sha'i mig la rten pa ma yin no/_/de'i lta bas mthong ba gang yin pa de ni len pa zhes bya ste/_de bas na lta ba'i len pa 
[\[85b.4\]]zhes bya'o/_/de'i lha'i lta ba bsod nams la dmigs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa des 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du lha'i gnas mthong ste/_der lha rnams lha'i rtse ba dag gis rtse ba mthong nas de der chags pa skye'o/_/'di snyam du yang sems te/_bdag ni 
[\[85b.5\]]der 'gro'o snyam mo/_/des der chags su rung zhing dran pa dang ldan pa'i srid pa rab tu shes so/_/dur khrod na 'dug pa'i khog pa de yang des mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ni bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te/_'dis bdag lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba 
[\[85b.6\]]yongs su len pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags so snyam mo/_/de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa khog pa de la chags na ci'i slad du mi gnas/_khog pa de nyid 
[\[85b.7\]]la ci'i slad du mi rten/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman chen dper na mi la la'i skra dang kha spu bregs te/_skra dang kha spu de mthong nas mi de 'di snyam du sems te/_skra 'di dag ni dri zhim zhing gnag pa yin gyi 'di dag ni phyir yang mgo la bskyed par bya'o snyam 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]na/_sman chen 'di ji snyam du sems/_ci skra de dag phyir skye bar 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman chen de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis khog pa bor nas phyir 
[\[86a.2\]]yang khog pa de nyid la gnas pa 'di ni gnas med do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams cha phra zhing mi mngon pa 'dis glang po che'i lus bong chen po ji ltar sgrub par bgyid cing rdo rje 
[\[86a.3\]]ltar sra ba'i khog pa yang ji ltar rtol bar bgyid/_glang po che dgu stong gi stobs dang ldan pa'i mi dang glang po che'i rgyal po yang ji ltar 'dzin par bgyid/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman chen dper na rlung gi khams gzugs med cing bstan du med pa ri'i phrag na 
[\[86a.4\]]gnas pa de yang ri'i phrag de nas byung ste/_ri rab dang 'dra zhing mtshungs pa'i ri'i rtse mo snyil bar byed cing 'gyes par byed na/_sman chen 'di ji snyam du sems/_rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_ri de'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_sman chen gyis gsol pa/_rlung gi khams 
[\[86a.5\]]ni snyi zhing lus ma mchis par blta bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman chen de de bzhin te/_ji ltar rlung gi khams snyi zhing lus med pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa 'di yang zhan cing lus med mod kyi lus chen po dag dang chung ngu dag kyang skyed par byed de/_
[\[86a.6\]]sbrang bu'i yang rnam par shes pa de nyid yin no/_/glang po che'i yang de nyid yin no/_/dper na mar me'i me lce chung yang ra ba 'am/_khang pa'i nang gi mun pa chen po sel bar byed pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis kyang las len pa'i rgyu des na gzugs chung ngu dang chen 
[\[86a.7\]]po rnams 'grub par byed do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_de gzugs can zhig lags sam/_'on te gzugs ma mchis pa zhig lags/_rang bzhin ni ji lta bu lags/_
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]rkyen ni ji lta bu dag las blta bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman chen 'di la las rnams kyi spyod yul ni lha'i bde ba dag dang /_'byor pa dag dang /_lha'i kha zas 'thob pa yin te/_dper na mi dbul po gnyis shig 'brog tu 'khyams pa las der gcig 
[\[86b.2\]]gis ni chu bsil ba rnyed la/_gcig ni skom ste shi na chu de la la zhig gis snyim pas bcus te mi de la byin pa yang med/_la la zhig gis mi cig shos de la bkag pa yang med kyi bsod nams kyi mthu 'ba' shig gis gcig gis ni chu rnyed la gcig gis ni chu ma rnyed pa de bzhin du dge 
[\[86b.3\]]ba dang mi dge ba'i chos de dag blta bar bya'o/_/zla ba yar gyi ngo dang mar gyi ngo ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba dang mi dge ba yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o/_/dper na shing thog rlon pa yongs su smin pa na kha dog gzhan du 'gyur te/_kha dog de dang yongs su smin pa yang me'i khams 
[\[86b.4\]]kyi dbang gis 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du lus 'di yang bsod nams kyi dbang gis tshong dpon gyi khyim nor dang gser 'byor pa dag tu rgyan nye bar ston to/_/lha'i gnas dag tu lha'i rgyan dag nye bar ston te/_dbang phyug gi rgyan gang yin pa de ni bsod nams kyi dper bstan to/_/dper 
[\[86b.5\]]na sa bon sa la btab na shing gi rtse mor snang bar 'gyur la/_sa bon de yang sdong bu nas sdong bu'i rtse mor 'pho ba med cing shing gi nang na yang sa bon de mi dmigs la/_mi la la zhig gis lag pa gnyis kyis sa bon blangs te shing gi rtse mor bzhag pa yang med cing sa bon rtsa ba nas 
[\[86b.6\]]'pho ba yang mi dmigs pa de bzhin du dge ba dang mi dge ba lus la gnas pa rnams kyang lus la mi snang ngo /_/dper na sa bon las me tog 'grub pa na sa bon gyi nang na yang me tog mi snang zhing me tog gi nang na yang 'bras bu mi dmigs la/_sa bon dang me tog kyang gnyis su dbyer 
[\[86b.7\]]med pa de bzhin du lus las kyang las 'byung las las kyang lus 'byung mod kyi/_lus kyi nang na yang las mi snang las kyi nang na yang lus mi snang ngo /_/dper na me tog yongs su smin pa na 'bras bu dmigs pa de bzhin du lus smin na las rnams dmigs so/_/dper na gang 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]na sa bon gnas pa der me tog 'byung bar snang ba de bzhin du lus 'di gang dang gang du skyes par gyur pa de dang der las dge ba dang mi dge ba 'byung bar snang ste/_las de yang gzugs can ma yin la rnam par smin pa yang gzugs can ma yin no/_/dper na 
[\[87a.2\]]mi'i lus las grib ma mi gsal zhing gzugs can ma yin pa 'byung la mi de nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/_grib ma de yang mi de'i lus dang 'brel ba ma yin la lus med par yang grib ma 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du lus 'di la dge ba dang mi dge ba 'brel bar 'dug ste/_
[\[87a.3\]]lus gang dang gang du 'pho ba de dang der las rnams 'gro bar 'gyur te/_lus kyi dbang gis las rnams 'brang ba yang ma yin la lus med na yang las rnams skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/dper na sman tsha ba dang /_kha ba dang /_bska ba la sogs pa'i bye brag gis lus la bkru 
[\[87a.4\]]sman btang na nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur zhing lha'i mdog rgyas pa yang lus la snang bar 'gyur te/_ji ltar sman tsha ba dang /_kha ba rnams kyis lus kyi mdog gzhon shar 'dug pa dang /_yid du 'ong ba sgrub par byed cing 'di snyam du mi 'dis ni sman zos gor ma 
[\[87a.5\]]chag go snyam du shes par 'gyur mod kyi/_sman de dag gi ro dang smin pa de yang gzugs can ma yin la ro dang smin pa gzugs can ma yin pa yang mi'i mdog rgyas pa la las snang bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_dge ba'i las 'di yang gzugs can ma yin te/_de las lus grub 
[\[87a.6\]]nas kha zas dang /_nye bar spyad pa dang /_longs spyod dang /_gos kyi bye brag gi dbang gis rkang lag mnyam zhing mchog tu bde ba dang ldan te/_nor bu dang /_gser dang /_dngul 'byor par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu yin no/_/rigs dang 
[\[87a.7\]]longs spyod rgyas shing 'byor pa las nyams pa dang /_nye bar spyad pa dang bral zhing gzhan la re ba dang /_kha zas ngan pa za zhing mal stan ngan pa dang /_gzugs ngan cing mi sdug pa'i lus can gang yin pa de dag ni mi dge ba'i las de'i 'bras bu yin no/_/dper na me long 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]gi dbang gis bzhin gyi mdog sdug pa 'am mi sdug pa snang la/_me long gi gzugs brnyan de yang gzugs can ma yin pa de bzhin du dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyi dbang gis rnam par shes pa 'di lha rnams dang /_mi rnams dang /_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /_
[\[87b.2\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/_sman chen las rnams ni de ltar blta bar bya'o/_/de ltar na las 'di dag ni rnam par shes pa'i rjes su 'brang ngo /_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa 'dis dbang po rnams ji ltar 'debs/_lus chen po yang ji ltar 
[\[87b.3\]]yongs su 'dzin par bgyid/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman chen 'di lta ste dper na rngon pa nags thibs po'i nang du song nas gzhu shin tu bkang ste/_dug [{]mangs [,]mang [}]spos kyi glang po che bong tshod che ba la snun la/_dug de yang khrag dang phrad na yan lag dang nying 
[\[87b.4\]]lag rnams su 'pho zhing 'gro ste/_dbang po'i spyod yul thams cad 'dor la gnad rnams su bsnun cing khrag gi kha dog bsgyur te/_yan lag dang nying lag thams cad du 'pho zhing 'gro la/_phyir yang lus bor nas dug de lus las phyir byung na/_sman chen 'di ji snyam du 
[\[87b.5\]]sems/_dug de dang glang po che'i khog pa de'i tshad ji tsam/_gsol pa/_ri rab dang yungs 'bru bzhin lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_dug de ji ltar 'pho ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang lus yongs su spong zhing dbang po rnams kyang 'dor la khams rnams 
[\[87b.6\]]kyang yongs su gtong ngo /_/de ltar na rnam par shes pa 'di dbang po rnams 'dor bar byed do/_/sman chen gzhan yang khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa 'di ji ltar lus chen po yongs su 'dzin par bgyid ces zer ba ni ji ltar kho lag che zhing rags pa'i lus 'di la 
[\[87b.7\]]mi sems pa bzhin te/_dper na ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi 'phang du dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod la de yang klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_nye dga' gnyis kyis sum khris su yongs su dkris te/_klu'i rgyal po de gnyis kyis dbugs phyi nang du rgyu bas rgya mtsho btung du mi rung 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]bar 'gyur zhing de gnyis kyi dbugs kyis ri rab kyang g.yo bar byed de/_de gnyis ji ltar dug che la spro ba che zhing yangs pa bzhin du nor rgyas kyi bu dang 'jog po gnyis kyang de dang 'dra'o/_/sman chen 'di ji snyam du sems/_de dag gi rnam par shes pa 
[\[88a.2\]]yang gzhan la/_sbrang bu'i yang gzhan no snyam na de ltar blta bar mi bya ste/_sman chen 'di ltar rnam par shes pa de nyid sbrang bu'i yang yin la de nyid de dag gi yang yin no/_/dper na dug bad sa nA b+ha dang /_ha la ha la'i thigs pa chung ngu yang klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_nye 
[\[88a.3\]]dga' la sogs pa de dag gis zos na de dag kyang 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/sman chen 'di ji snyam du sems/_dga' bo dang nye dga' la sogs pa'i dug gang yin pa dang /_bad sa nA b+ha dang ha la ha la'i dug gi thigs pa gang yin pa de'i nang na ches mang ba gang yin/_gsol 
[\[88a.4\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis kyi dug ches mang bar blta bar bgyi ste/_bad sa nA b+ha dang /_ha la ha la'i dug ni de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman chen de bzhin du lus chen po glang po che dgu stong gi stobs dang 
[\[88a.5\]]ldan pa de dag gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang chung zhing mi gsal la gzugs can ma yin par blta bar bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa de yang las kyi rkyen gyis lus chen po mngon par 'grub par byed de/_dper na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i sa bon chung ngu las shing gi rgyal po mtho zhing 
[\[88a.6\]]rgya che la yal ga dang /_yal ga phre'u brgya stong gis rgyas pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/sman chen 'di ji snyam du sems/_sa bon de'i tshad ni ji tsam/_shing de'i tshad ni ji tsam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das yungs 'bru'i nang dang bar snang bzhin te khyad che lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[88a.7\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman chen de bzhin du sa bon de'i nang na yang shing mi snang la sa bon med na yang shing skye ba mi dmigs te/_ji ltar sa bon phra mo las shing chen po skye ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa cha phra ba las gzugs chen po 'grub par 'gyur te/_lus la yang rnam 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]par shes pa mi dmigs la rnam par shes pa med na yang lus skye ba mi dmigs so/_/de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i snying po lta bu'i rnam par shes pa des lus nyam chung ba 
[\[88b.2\]]rnams ji ltar mngon par 'grub par bgyid/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman chen dper na mi dbul po la la zhig gis yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rnyed na/_des yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che de blangs nas lha'i gnas dang /_skyed mos tshal dang /_skyed 
[\[88b.3\]]tshal dang /_zhing dang /_ra ba dang /_sgo khang dang /_shing gel pa dang /_'khri shing sna tshogs kyis 'khor ba dang /_khang pa me tog gis gtor ba dang /_rdzas dang /_yo byad dag sprul na/_sman chen de dag thams cad ni mi brtan zhing nyam chung la myur du 'gyes 
[\[88b.4\]]shing 'jig pa'i chos can yin te/_yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che de mi de'i lag nas stor na de'i bde ba'i longs spyod de dag kyang med par 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che de rdo rje stong gis kyang mi phyed la/_de'i yo byad de dag 'jig pa'i rang bzhin can 
[\[88b.5\]]yin pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rdo rje'i snying po'i rang bzhin lta bu yin la lus gang yin pa de ni snying po med do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i khams zhan pa des ji ltar gzugs mkhrang zhing sra ba phye ste 'pho zhing mchi/_bcom ldan 
[\[88b.6\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman chen dper na chu'i rgyun shin tu 'jam po ri'i gseb na 'dug pas ri de nyid rtol te byung na/_sman chen de ji snyam du sems/_de'i nang na ches sra ba gang yin/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ri ni rang bzhin gyis mkhrang la rdo rje ltar brtan 
[\[88b.7\]]zhing sra ba lags la/_chab ni rang bzhin gyis 'jam zhing reg na bde ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin du rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis zhan pas lus chen po dag phye ste 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]sems can gyi ris nas/_sems can shi 'phos te lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba len pa lags ji ltar sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye ba yongs su len pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman chen de'i phyir nyon cig_/sems 
[\[89a.2\]]can de shi 'phos nas bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba'i 'du byed kyis yongs su zin na lus yongs su btang nas rnam par shes pa des mi'i lta ba yongs su spangs te lha'i lta ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/de lha'i lta ba des 'dod pa na spyod pa drug gi lha rnams mthong ngo /_/sems 
[\[89a.3\]]can dmyal ba chen po brgyad kyang mthong ngo /_/lus de yang 'dor bar mthong ngo /_/lha rdzas kyi lha'i gnas dang /_dga' tshal dang /_'dres tshal dang /_me tog gi rna rgyan dang /_shing ku she sha ya dang /_ko kan da dang /_gzhal med khang dang /_tshal stug po dang /_
[\[89a.4\]]lha'i bu mo rtse bas bskor ba yang mthong ngo /_/rtag tu me tog rgyas shing rnam par bkra bar byas pa'i lha'i longs spyod sdug gus mdzes par byas pa dang /_se mo do dang /_gdub zlum dang /_gdub leb dang /_dpung rgyan spa zhing spras pas brgyan pa de dag kyang des mthong 
[\[89a.5\]]ngo /_/lha gzhon nu dang lha mo khri'i steng na 'dug cing yid rab tu dga' ba yang des mthong ngo /_/des de dag mthong nas kun tu chags pa skyed do/_/de der kun tu chags pas dga' ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/dga' ba thob pas yid rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/de snying 
[\[89a.6\]]dga' bas de'i tshe lus kyi kha dog rgyas par 'gyur te/_'di ltar bzhin gyi mdog pad ma lta bur snang bar 'gyur zhing lta ba phyin ci ma log par 'gyur ro/_/sna yang yo bar mi 'gyur/_de'i kha yang mnam par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du de'i mig ud pa la sngon po'i 'dab ma 
[\[89a.7\]]'dra bar snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i gnad rnams kyang 'chad par mi 'gyur/_de'i khrag kyang zag par mi 'gyur/_phyi sa yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de spu zing zhes byed par mi 'gyur de'i sen mo rnams kyang nag por mi 'gyur/_lag pa yang ser por snang bar mi 'gyur/_
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]rkang lag kyang g.yob par mi 'gyur/_rkang lag 'khums bzhin du 'chi ba'i chos dang ldan par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/sman chen de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe lha'i ltas 'byung bar 'gyur te/_'di ltar khang pa brtsegs pa ka ba brgya stong gis brgyan pa mthong ste/_lha'i dril bu 
[\[89b.2\]]g.yer ka'i dra ba sgra snyan pa 'byung ba dang ldan pa dang /_lha'i me tog sna tshogs spel ba'i phreng ba shin tu dri zhim pa dag mthong ngo /_/lha gzhon nu rgyan dang /_gser gyi mchog dang /_se mo do dang /_gdub bu dang /_dpung rgyan gyis mdzes par byas shing lus brgyan pa 
[\[89b.3\]]dag kyang mthong ngo /_/des lha gzhon nu dag mthong nas mchog tu dga' ba skye'o/_/de yid dga' bas khog pa la ltas gnyis 'byung bar 'gyur te/_so me tog kun da dang /_ku mu da ltar dkar bar snang ngo /_/mig ha cang yang mi 'dzums ha cang yang mi 'byed do/_/sgra snyan 
[\[89b.4\]]pa dag kyang 'byung ngo /_/de'i bzhin yang pad ma lta bur snang bar 'gyur ro/_/shi ba'i khog pa yang ha cang tsha bar yang mi 'gyur/_ha cang grang bar yang mi 'gyur ro/_/de'i gnyen sdug pa rnams kyang smre sngags chen po 'don par mi byed do/_/de nyi ma 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe 
[\[89b.5\]]'chi ba'i chos dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro/_/phyogs kyang mun par snang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe phyogs shin tu dri zhim zhing shin tu yongs su dag pa tshor bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i mig kyang ser bar mi 'gyur/_de'i lta ba yang phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur/_de 
[\[89b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs mthong na yid ches shing dang ba skye bar 'gyur/_gnyen sdug pa dag mthong na ga zhig nas phyir 'ongs pa'am/_ring mo zhig tu gud na 'dug 'dug pa bzhin du mgul nas 'khyud cing yid rab tu dga' ste/_'di skad du srid par skyes pa 
[\[89b.7\]]thams cad kyi tshul ni 'di yin gyis/_da nga dang bral ba'i phyir gdung bar ma byed par thong shig ces des gnyen de dag yang dag par dbugs 'byin par byed do/_/sman chen gal te sems can bsod nams su nye bar 'gro bas 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe sbyin pa la sred cing yud tsam 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]re re la tshigs bcad dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dang /_gtam sna tshogs dang /_gtan tshigs sna tshogs rjod cing smra la/_de'i tshe gnyid la yang sred par mi 'gyur zhing gnyid kyi dbang du yang mi 'gro la/_bde ba thams cad dang ldan pas tshe'i 'du byed 
[\[90a.2\]]'dor bar 'gyur ro/_/de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe lha dang lha mo lhan cig tu khri gcig gi steng na 'dug la/_lha mo khri'i steng na 'dug pa de'i lag pa lha'i lag pa'i steng du bzhag cing de'i lag pa gnyis las me tog dag 'byung ste/_lha mo des me tog byung ba dag mthong nas 
[\[90a.3\]]lha de la 'di skad du lha gzhon nu skye ba'i dga' ba'i dus la bab kyis dgyes par mdzod cig ces zer ro/_/des kyang me tog rnams lag pas mnyes shing 'phur bar byed do/_/des me tog de dag mnyes pas sems can de 'chi ba'i chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de'i rnam 
[\[90a.4\]]par shes pa des kyang dbang po rnams bor zhing dbang po'i spyod yul rnams btang ste/_khams rnams yongs su btang nas khams kyi don yongs su blangs te/_mi gsal zhing gzugs can ma yin la rta zhon pa lta bu dang /_nyi ma dang /_me shel dang /_bsreg bya lta bu dang /_
[\[90a.5\]]chu la zla ba'i gzugs brnyan lta bu dang /_sbubs kyi nang gi rlung ltar dge ba la dmigs pa bsdus nas byung ste 'pho zhing 'gro'o/_/de yang de'i tshe me tog la brten nas pha ma khri gcig la 'dug cing phrad pas rnam par shes pa me tog de dag gi nang du 'dres par 'gyur ro/_/yang 
[\[90a.6\]]der bdud rtsi 'dod pa zhes bya ba'i rlung ldang ste/_rlung des rnam par shes pa de zhag bdun lon pa na lha gzhon nu rna cha gdub kor dri ma med cing 'gul ba dang ldan pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces 
[\[90a.7\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa gzugs can ma lags pa'i rkyen gyi dbang gis gzugs rnams ji ltar mngon par 'grub par bgyid/_rkyen rnams la yang ji ltar gda' bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman chen dper na 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]rlung gi khams gzugs med cing bstan du med pa'i rkyen gyi dbang gis lha'i gnas dang /_ri dang /_nags tshal la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rnams 'grub par byed pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa 'di yang rkyen gyi dbang gis gzugs rnams 'grub par byed do/_/sman chen 
[\[90b.2\]]gzhan yang shing 'dzings pa gnyis phan tshun phrad de gcig la gcig drud cing gtsubs pa las me 'grub par 'gyur te/_me de yang shing gi nang na mi snang la shing med na yang me 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_me de yang rkyen gyi dbang gis shing las 'grub par 'gyur gyi rkyen med par 
[\[90b.3\]]ni mi 'byung ngo /_/gzugs kyi dbang gis kyang shing gi nang na yang me mi snang la shing ma gtogs par yang me mi dmigs so/_/sman chen de bzhin du rnam par shes pa de yang pha ma'i dbang gis 'jug ste/_rnam par shes pa yang lus kyi nang na mi dmigs la lus med par 
[\[90b.4\]]yang rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ngo /_/sman chen dper na me ma byung bar gzugs dang /_dro ba dang /_kha dog gsal bar mi snang ngo /_/sman chen de bzhin du lus ma grub par rnam par shes pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams mi snang ngo /_/sman chen 
[\[90b.5\]]dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po gsal bar snang zhing gzi brjid kyis lam mer 'dug kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis nyi ma'i gzugs gnag gam/_ser ram/_dkar ram/_dmar ser du mi mthong ngo /_/sman chen de bzhin du rnam par shes pa ni lta ba dang /_
[\[90b.6\]]nyan pa dang /_snom pa dang /_ro myang pa dang /_reg pa'i rnam pa dag gis rtogs par 'gyur gyi lus la rnam par shes pa gnag pa'am/_dkar ba 'am/_gzugs su snang bar mis mi mthong ngo /_/dper na nyi ma tsha ba dang /_ser ba dang /_'gro ba dang /_phyir yang 'char ba dag 
[\[90b.7\]]gi rtags las snang ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa yang rtags dag gis blta bar bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i rtags ji ltar blta bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_'du byed kyi rtags dang /_tshor ba'i rtags dang /_'du shes kyi rtags dang /_sems pa dang /_mya ngan dang /_gdung ba dang /_yid mi bde ba ni rnam par shes pa'i rtags su blta'o/_/gzhan yang rnam par shes pa'i bag chags 'di ltar dge bar nye bar 
[\[91a.2\]]'gro ba'i sems dang /_mi dge bar nye bar 'gro ba'i sems las blta bar bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar rnam par shes pa lus las byung ste myur du skye ba yongs su len pa lags/_
[\[91a.3\]]rnam par shes pa lus las byung nas ma skyes shing yongs su ma bzung ba des ji ltar lus gzhan la gnas par bgyid/_rnam par shes pa 'di ni ji ltar blta bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman chen dper na mi la la lag pa ring zhing thur du brkyang la g.yul gyi go 
[\[91a.4\]]cha gyon te/_lha'i rta rlung gi shugs dang 'dra bar mgyogs pa la zhon nas g.yul du 'gro ste/_de g.yul ngo der song nas mdung dang /_ral gri dang /_mda' dag gis snying myos te/_g.yul ngor rta'i mchog de las sa la lhung la/_de yang lus kyi 'phong rtsal yongs su sbyangs pa zhig ste/_
[\[91a.5\]]myur ba myur bar sa las rta'i rgyab tu 'gong bar byed na/_ji ltar mi de lhung nas rta zhon pa dang 'god che bas ji ltar rta nye bar gnas pa la rta la 'gong ba na rta 'gro bzhin du 'gong ba chen pos 'gong bar byed pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa yang blta bar bya'o/_/ji ltar mi pha rol gyi 
[\[91a.6\]]dmag tshogs kyis 'jigs shing skrag nas rta zhon te 'bros pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa 'di thog ma shi 'phos nas lha'i dmigs pas yongs su zin cing lha dang lha mo khri'i steng na 'dug pa mthong nas shin tu myur bar skye ba yongs su len to/_/sman chen gzhan yang dang po shi 
[\[91a.7\]]'phos nas/_da dung ma skyes pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa ji ltar blta bar bya zhes gang khyod kyis smras pa de ni dper na mi'i grib ma chu'i steng du bab pa gzugs su snang mod kyi/_de gzugs su gtogs par yang blta bar mi bya'o/_/sman chen dper na rkang lag mnyam pa dang 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]ldan pa'i gzugs chu'i steng du bab pa de la ni dro ba 'am/_grang ba 'am/_lus ngal bar 'gyur ba med cing lus de la ni sha'i dum bu yang med do/_/grib ma de la ni khams kyis blangs pa yang med do/_/mi'i gzugs brnyan chu'i nang du byung ba de las ni sdug bsngal ba'i sgra 'am/_bde 
[\[91b.2\]]ba'i sgra 'byung ba yang med do/_/de bzhin du rnam par shes pa dang po shi 'phos nas lus kyi khog pa bor te gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa lta bur 'gyur ro/_/sman chen de ltar na rnam par shes pa bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba ni lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba yongs su len par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[91b.3\]]de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa sems can dmyal ba rnams su ji ltar skye ba yongs su len pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman chen bsod nams ma 
[\[91b.4\]]yin par nye bar 'gro ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye ba yongs su len pa de nyon cig_/sman chen 'di la sems can las mi dge bas yongs su zin pa ni sems can gyi ris nas 'chi 'pho ste/_shi 'phos pa de 'di snyam du mi de ni nga nyid yin te/_sems can dmyal ba 
[\[91b.5\]]'di nas shi 'phos so/_/'di gnyis ni bdag gi pha ma yin no snyam du dran pa skye'o/_/shi 'phos pa de'i lus de ni tha mal pa'i gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyi rnam pa dang ldan par 'gyur te/_yan lag skyes pa rnams kyang de dang 'dra ba nyid du snang ngo /_/dang po shi 'phos pa de mya 
[\[91b.6\]]ngan gyis g.yengs nas sems can dmyal ba sna tshogs snang ba mthong ngo /_/rnam par shes pa dang po shi 'phos pa de'i las sems can dmyal ba dang 'brel bar 'gyur te/_phyogs kha cig na ni sems can dmyal ba'i sa gzhi khrag gis gtor ba mthong nas de der chags pa 
[\[91b.7\]]skyed par 'gyur ro/_/de chags par gyur nas sems can dmyal ba'i lus 'grub par 'gyur te/_de'i rnam par shes pa de las kyi rkyen gyi dbang gis chu'i rjen shul shin tu rul cing mchog tu dri mi zhim pa mnam pa'i nang du lus skye ba yongs su len te/_dper na mi gtsang ba dang /_ljan 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]ljin mnam po'i rkyen gyis srin bu skye ba dang /_dper na zho dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_chang mnam por gyur pa'i phyir srog chags skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sman chen de bzhin du sems can rnams sems can dmyal bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_bzang skyong gis thal mo sbyar 
[\[92a.2\]]te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi kha dog gi rnam pa ji lta bu lags/_lus kyi rnam pa ni ji lta bur 'grub par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bzang skyong der khrag gi nang du skye ba gang yin pa de dag ni khrag gi 
[\[92a.3\]]mdog 'dra bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/chu klung rgal du med pa dag gi nang du skye ba gang yin pa de dag ni sprin sngon po'i kha dog ltar 'gyur ro/_/ba tshwa can gyi chu klung gi nang du skye ba gang yin pa de dag ni sha gzi gur 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag gi lus ni rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu bde dgur rim gror byas pa ltar 
[\[92a.4\]]gzhon sha can du 'gyur ro/_/bzang skyong de na de dag lus bong che bar 'gyur te/_mgo bo ma gtogs par khru brgyad par 'gyur ro/_/sen mo ring zhing kha spu yod la spun por 'gyur zhing rkang lag mi sdug par 'gyur te/_gal te 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi sems can dmyal ba pa'i mi la ltar 'gro na mthong 
[\[92a.5\]]ma thag tu 'chi ba'i chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/bzang skyong gzhan yang sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kha zas za mod kyi de dag la bde bar 'gyur ba cung zad kyang med do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[92a.6\]]ldan 'das sems can de dag kha zas ci 'tshal/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman chen sems can dmyal ba de na de dag yongs su 'khyam la shin tu rgyang ring ba nas zangs dang ra gan dmar por snang ba mthong bar 'gyur te/_de dag mthong nas kha zas kyi tshig rjod par byed de/_kha 
[\[92a.7\]]zas 'dod pa khyed tshur shog ces zer ro/_/de dag kun nas 'phungs te snyim pa bzed nas zangs dang ra gan bskol ba ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas snyim pa bzed cing zangs dang ra gan bskol ba'i kha zas de dag 'dod pas kha gdangs te zangs dang ra gan za bar byed do/_/de dag zangs dang 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]ra gan rab tu 'bar ba des su ru rur rab tu 'bar zhing khog pa rab tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/sman chen de dag kha zas 'dra bas bslus nas sdug bsngal shin tu che ba myong bar 'gyur ro/_/sman chen sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag gi rnam par shes pa de rus pa'i lus dag la 
[\[92b.2\]]gnas par 'gyur zhing rus pa'i tshogs dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur te/_sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag rnam par shes pa dang mi 'bral ba'i phyir/_'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de dag bru ba tsha bas gzir bzhin du de na kha zas kyi bya ba yang med do/_/de na lha'i skyed 
[\[92b.3\]]mos tshal shing ljon pa brgya phrag mang po me tog shin tu rgyas pa dag dang /_gsing ma sngon po yangs pa'i sa phyogs dag kyang yod par mthong ngo /_/de dag gis skyed mos tshal de dag mthong nas yid rab tu dga' ste 'di skad du grogs po dag skyed mos tshal 'di na reg na bde ba'i ser bu ldang 
[\[92b.4\]]ba yod kyis tshur shog ces zer te/_de dag 'dus nas myur ba myur bar skyed mos tshal de'i nang du 'gro'o/_/de dag de'i nang du song nas yud tsam zhig bde ba'i 'du shes skyed do/_/de dag gis shing de dag las byung ba'i me tog de dag dang /_lo ma de dag ral grir 'gyur te/_ral 
[\[92b.5\]]gri de dag gis de dag gi yan lag gcod cing gshegs par byed de/_de dag ral gris bcad nas nyam thag pa'i sgra chen po 'byin par byed cing phyogs phyogs su 'byer ro/_/de dag 'byer ba na yang rang gi las las byung ba'i gshin rje'i mi lag na sog le dang tho ba thogs shing so 
[\[92b.6\]]dang bzhin bsgyur la skra 'bar zhing lus 'bar ba'i phreng bas yog la mtshon cha gzas pa dag phyi bzhin du sgra 'byin cing 'di skad du khyed cag sdod cig da gar 'bros/_khyed rang gi las kyis bsgrubs pa'i tshul 'di nyams su myong bar gyis shig ces zer te/_sman chen de ltar na sems can 
[\[92b.7\]]dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams skyo ba skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sman chen gzhan yang zhag bdun lon nas sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyis las nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_bung ba me tog la 'pho ba bzhin du dngos po sna tshogs kyi rkyen gyi dbang gis rnam par shes pa sems can 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]dmyal ba rnams su skye ba yongs su len to/_/de yang dang po shi 'phos nas dbang med par khrid de sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bar gyur nas mun pa mun nag chen por zhugs te/_mi rgod kyis khrid pa bzhin du 'di snyam du sems te/_kyi hud da ni bdag 'dzam bu'i gling rnam par bkra 
[\[93a.2\]]ba bor te/_gnyen sdug pa yongs su spangs nas sems can dmyal ba dag tu mngon du gnas par gyur cing 'dug cig gud ni mtho ris kyi lam mi mthong ngo snyam mo de yang dar gyi srin bu rgyud gcig gis dkris pa bzhin du shin tu myur bar skye ba yongs su len te/_de yang bdag nyid kyi mgul nas 
[\[93a.3\]]zhags pas btags par shes so/_/bzang skyong de ltar na sems can dmyal bar sems can rnams su skye bar 'gyur zhing de ltar na de dag la rgyu'i bye brag dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bzang skyong spu zing zhes byed nas thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su song ngo /_/rgyal po'i 
[\[93a.4\]]bu gzhon nu sman chen gyis kyang 'di skad du dam pa'i chos mnyan pa 'dis na bdag 'khor ba nas 'khor ba'i tshe log par ltung ba'i chos can du ma gyur cig_/bdag sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye ba yongs su len par ma gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[93a.5\]]la bzang skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/yang bcom ldan 'das la bdag zhu ba zhu'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bzang skyong ci dang ci 'dod pa bzhin du 'dod pa dris shig_/bzang skyong gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bsags pa ni gang lags/_spungs 
[\[93a.6\]]pa ni gang lags/_phung po rnams ni gang lags/_'pho ba ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bzang skyong 'di la khams phrad pa'i phyir khams bzhi po dag gis lus 'grub par byed de/_shes rab dang /_lta ba dang /_yid dang /_ma rig pa dang /_khams dang /_spyod 
[\[93a.7\]]yul dang /_rnam par shes pa rnams ni bsags pa zhes bya'o/_/de la spungs pa ni khams drug po nyid dang /_skye mched kyi spyod yul drug dang /_khams kyi rang bzhin gsum dang /_skye mched len pa'i rgyu gnyis dang /_skra dang /_kha spu dang /_sen mo dang /_ba spu dang /_pags pa dang /_sha dang /_
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]rnag dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan dang /_snabs dang /_tshil dang /_chu ser dang /_rkang dang /_mig dang /_yan lag dang /_nying lag tshogs pa la spungs pa zhes bya'o/_/dper na 'bru spungs pa bzhin te/_nas dang /_til dang /_gro dang /_mon sran sde'u mang po la spungs pa zhes bya ba de 
[\[93b.2\]]bzhin du lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag tu gtogs pa tshogs pa la spungs pa zhes bya'o/_/khams drug po dag gang zhe na/_de la sa'i khams dang /_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya'o/_/skye mched 
[\[93b.3\]]drug gang zhe na/_'di la mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid ces bya ba'o/_/skye mched kyi spyod yul drug gang zhe na/_'di la gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos kyi skye mched ces bya ba ste/_de dag ni spyod yul drug yin no/_/de la khams 
[\[93b.4\]]kyi rang bzhin gsum gang zhe na/_'di la 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug ces bya ba'o/_/de la de dag nyid kyi kun nas ldang ba gsum gang zhe na/_rlung dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan rnams so/_/de la skye mched len pa'i rgyu gnyis gang zhe na/_'di la tshul khrims dang /_dad 
[\[93b.5\]]pa dang /_gtong ba dang /_nor dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_dge ba dang /_mi dge ba zhes bya ba'o/_/de la phung po zhes bya ba'i don gang zhe na/_'di la tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ste/_bzhi po 'di dag ni 
[\[93b.6\]]gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po rnams so/_/de la tshor ba ni myong ba'o/_/'du shes ni shes pa'o/_/bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni 'du byed rnams so/_/lta ba dang /_nyan pa dang /_snom pa dang /_ro myang ba dang /_reg bya rnams rig pa ni rnam par shes pa ste/_dngos po thams cad 
[\[93b.7\]]kyi khongs su gtogs pas na lus la dbang ba'i dbang phyug dang len pa dang 'thun pa yin no/_/de la 'pho ba zhes bya ba ni tshul khrims shin tu yongs su dag pa dang /_lus dang ngag gi las kyi 'bras bu thob pa 'chi ba'i dus byed pa gang yin pa de'i tshe rnam par shes pa des 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]phung po rnams yongs su btang nas yang srid par mi skye zhing phyir mi ldog pas na shin tu bde bar 'pho zhing 'gro ste/_'phos pa de'i phyir yang 'pho ba can ma yin pa de lta bu ni de'i 'pho ba 'gyur ba yin no/_/de nas bzang skyong dang sman chen gnyis kyis bcom 
[\[94a.2\]]ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pas sems can rnams tshim par bgyid pa gang lags pa'i chos kyi tshogs 'di legs par gsungs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[94a.3\]]bzang skyong de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'di ni bcos ma ma yin te/_'di'i rang bzhin ni thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin pas rig pa ma yin no/_/shes rab kyi snang ba 'di ni dka' ba spyad pa brgya stong du mas bsgrubs pa ste/_'di ni ngas ji skad bstan pa de kho na bzhin no/_/chos 
[\[94a.4\]]kyi nyi ma thams cad mkhyen pa nyid snang bar byed pa/_yon tan gyi grags pa rgyas par byed pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho'i mdzod sems can rnams kyi rgyud 'dul bar byed pa 'dul ba ston pa 'di yul gang na gnas sam/_de ston par 'gyur ba der ni mi ma yin pa 
[\[94a.5\]]rnams srung bar byed de/_lha dang /_lha ma yin dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams phyag bya ba'i phyir 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa gang yin pa de la ni mtshon 
[\[94a.6\]]gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/_dug gi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/_me'i 'jigs pa dang /_rgyal po dang /_chu dang /_chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag khyed kyis deng phan chad ma dad pa rnams la bshad par mi bya'o/_/klan ka tshol ba rnams la ma yin/_
[\[94a.7\]]gcer bu ba rnams la ma yin/_gcer bu ba'i nyan thos rnams la ma yin/_gnas gzhan la zhugs pa la bshad par mi bya'o/_/ma dris par yang bshad par mi bya'o/_/de bas na gal te la la 'khrul par gyur na de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/dge 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]slong ngam khyim na gnas pa gang la las 'di rtogs pa de ni phyag bya ba'i gnas su 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la bya ba bzhin du gus pa bskyed par bya zhing 'di ni mdzod 'dzin pa yin no snyam du gzung bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' 
[\[94b.2\]]bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/shod cig_/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig_/kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung 
[\[94b.3\]]bar 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rnam par shes pa 'pho ba zhes bya bar zung shig_/
[\[94b.4\]]bzang skyong gis zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya/_/sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde rnams gzhom par bya/_/gang zhig rab tu bag yod par/_/chos 'dul 
[\[94b.5\]]'di la spyod 'gyur ba/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal mtha' mar 'byin par 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu sman chen dang /_tshong dpon bzang skyong dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin 
[\[94b.6\]]dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las tshong dpon 
[\[94b.7\]]bzang skyong gis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu rtsa dgu pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_su ren dra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//_
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]{D84}]'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bzhi bcu pa ste/_bu mo rnam dag dad pas zhus pa/_bam po gcig pa/_rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya dA ri kA bi ma la shrad d+hA pa ri pr-its+tshA nA ma ma 
[\[95a.2\]]hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa bu mo rnam dag dad pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na 
[\[95a.3\]]rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po lnga brgya dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_thams cad kyang shes par bya ba rnams rab tu shes pa/_gzungs dang 
[\[95a.4\]]thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa thob pa/_bzod pa rnams phun sum tshogs pa/_bdud kyi dpung rab tu bcom pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis brnyes pa'i chos rnams rab tu thob pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten 'dzin dang /_byang chub 
[\[95a.5\]]sems dpa' lam 'dzin dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sa 'dzin dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sa 'dzin chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mos pa'i blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mos byed dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gzugs mdzes bkod pa dang /_
[\[95a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i tog dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rin chen sems pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'byung gnas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rin chen blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[95a.7\]]rin chen yon tan dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od dang /_gzhan yang bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la sogs pa gtso bor gyur pa dang thabs cig go_/gzhan yang sems pa dpe zla med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la sogs pa gtso 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]bor gyur pa drug cu po dag dang yang thabs cig go_/gzhan yang skyes bu chen po byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong la sogs pa gtso bor gyur pa bcu drug dang yang thabs cig go_/gzhan yang dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu nyi khri 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur pa dag dang 
[\[95b.2\]]yang thabs cig go_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das bkod pa chen po'i mdzod ces bya ba'i seng ge'i gdan la 'khor brgya stong tshad med pa dag gis yongs su bskor nas bzhugs pas nyi zla lta bu'i 'od zer gyis ni kun du snang bar mdzad/_brgya byin dang tshangs pa'i rgyal po ltar gzi 
[\[95b.3\]]byin ni khyad par du 'phags/_ri'i rgyal po ri rab lta bur shin tu mtho zhing phal las ni mngon par 'phags par gyur/_sgron ma chen po lta bur 'od zer dag ni rab tu 'bar/_glang po che'i rgyal po ltar phan tshun du ni gzigs par mdzad/_seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa ltar 
[\[95b.4\]]bsnyengs pa mi mnga' bar ni chos ston par mdzad/_lha ma yin gyi rgyal po sgra gcan zin ltar 'khor mang po rnams ni zil gyis mnan/_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dag gis ni sku rab tu brgyan/_gzi byin dang mthu stobs dag ni rab tu 'bar bar gyur te/_sems can thams cad 
[\[95b.5\]]nges pa'i don mchog la 'god cing khong du chud par mdzad pa'i phyir tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu bsgrags nas 'khor mang po'i dbus su chos ston par mdzad do/_/de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi bu mo rnam dag dad pa 
[\[95b.6\]]zhes bya ba gzhon nu ma byad bzhin sdug cing mdzes pa/_sems can rnams kyis mthong bar mos pa/_sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/_theg pa chen po bsgoms pa zhig yod pa de bu mo gzhon nu ma lnga brgyas yongs su bskor te/_so so nas gser gyi phreng ba thogs nas grong khyer 
[\[95b.7\]]mnyan yod nas byung ste/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te phyag byas nas/_lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas tshigs su bcad de mngon par bstod pa/_
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]yun ring bsod nams rnam dag phrin las bsags/_/yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas yongs rdzogs shing /_/mang po dad mos dga' bar mdzad pas na/_/de slad thub mchog khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal/_/gzi byin lham me ya mtshan rab ston cing /_/rin 
[\[96a.2\]]chen 'byung gnas chos sgo ston par mdzad/_/sku yi 'od zer 'dom gang rtag gsal ba/_/blo chen bsil ba'i rdzing la bdag phyag 'tshal/_/yon tan ljon shing bsod nams bas ma 'tshal/_/mi mchog khyod la 'jig rten kun gyis bsngags/_/smon lam chen po tshul 
[\[96a.3\]]khrims yongs rdzogs pas/_/de slad mchod 'os gtso la bdag phyag 'tshal/_/chos mchog rab gnas rtag par zhi zhing dben/_/'jig rten kun la thugs snyoms bu gcig bzhin/_/mkhyen pa dag gis spyod rnams rab mkhyen pas/_/'dren mkhan bzhin du mnyam pa'i 
[\[96a.4\]]shul yang ston/_/rab brtan brtson 'grus ldan pa mchis gyur na/_/byams dang thugs rjes sems can sman mdzad pas/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gang lags pa/_/de bzhin gshegs pas bkas ni bshad du gsol/_/ji ltar rab brtan stobs ni thob gyur nas/_/
[\[96a.5\]]'khor bar gnas kyang bdud dpung pham bgyid lags/_/ji ltar mnyam pa'i chos ni thob 'gyur zhing /_/ji ltar sems can yongs su smin bgyid lags/_/ji ltar bgyis na sa gzhi nam mkha' dang /_/rlung dang chu me ji lta bzhin du 'gyur/_/ji ltar yid ches 
[\[96a.6\]]thob nas chos gnas shing /_/ri rab seng ge'i rgyal po bzhin du 'gyur/_/ji ltar byams sdang sems ni yongs spangs nas/_/sems gtsang drang la g.yo sgyu ma mchis 'gyur/_/ji ltar sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang /_/brtson 'grus bsam gtan rnam grol skye 
[\[96a.7\]]'gyur zhing /_/shes rab nyon mongs mun pa rab bcom nas/_/rtag par thabs chen la ni gnas pa dang /_/ting 'dzin gzungs la thogs pa ma mchis shing /_/tshad med bzhi dang mngon shes lnga la gnas/_/ji ltar sangs rgyas spyan sngar gnas gyur nas/_/rtag par rdzus 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]te skye zhing tshe rabs dran/_/sbyangs pas rtsod pa ma mchis dgon gnas nas/_/sems ni rab btul nyon mongs zhi bgyid dang /_/tshul khrims ldan zhing byang chub lam bsgoms dang /_/bdud rtsi 'gog thob bdud dpung 'joms pa dang /_/bde stsol chos kyi 'khor 
[\[96b.2\]]lo skor 'gyur ba/_/de 'dra'i yang dag lam ni bkas bshad gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo rnam dag dad pa la bka' stsal pa/_bu mo byang chub sems dpa' gang stobs rnam pa brgyad dang ldan par gyur na 'khor ba na gnas kyang rab tu brtan pa'i 
[\[96b.3\]]dpa' bor 'gyur zhing yongs su ngal ba med par 'gyur ro/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_dang po ni sems kyis 'dun pa'i stobs te g.yo sgyu med pa'i phyir ro/_/gnyis pa ni mos pa'i stobs te/_sdig pa rnams spong bar byed pa'i phyir ro/_/gsum pa ni sbyor ba'i stobs te/_
[\[96b.4\]]rtag tu dge ba bsgrub pa'i phyir ro/_/bzhi pa ni mngon par yid ches pa'i stobs te/_las kyi rnam par smin pa dag la shin tu mngon par yid ches pa'i phyir ro/_/lnga pa ni byang chub kyi sems kyi stobs te/_theg pa dman pa yongs su mi tshol ba'i phyir ro/_/drug pa ni 
[\[96b.5\]]byams pa chen po'i stobs te/_sems can la gnod pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/bdun pa ni snying rje chen po'i stobs te gnod pa byas pa rnams dang du len par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/brgyad pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi stobs te/_dus dus su sad par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/bu mo 
[\[96b.6\]]'di ni stobs rnam pa brgyad ces bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' gang stobs brgyad po 'di dag dang ldan par gyur na rab tu bstan pa'i dpa' bor 'gyur bas 'khor ba na gnas kyang mngon par zhen cing chags pa med par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su 
[\[96b.7\]]bcad de bka' stsal pa/_sems 'dun dpa' bo gang yin pa/_/g.yo sgyu dag ni spong byed cing /_/rtag par drang por spyod pas na/_/yang dag byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/_/mos pa'i stobs ni gang yin pa/_/nyes pa mang po spong byed cing /_/dge ba 'ba' zhig spyod 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]pas na/_/yang dag brtson la gnas par 'gyur/_/sbyor ba phun sum tshogs gyur pa/_/rtag tu legs par rab bstan nas/_/brtson 'grus brtan par gyur pas na/_/sems can rnams ni bde bar byed/_/mngon par yid ches stobs dbang gis/_/
[\[97a.2\]]las kyi rnam smin rig pas na/_/sangs rgyas ye shes yid ches shing /_/'jig rten yongs su sdud par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems stobs gang yin des/_/theg pa dman pa spong byed cing /_/sangs rgyas gdung ni mi gcod pas/_/chos nyid la ni gnas par 'gyur/_/
[\[97a.3\]]byams chen stobs kyi dbang gis ni/_/sems can snyoms par lta byed cing /_/byams sdang dag ni med pas na/_/zhe sdang gnod sems skyed mi 'gyur/_/snying rje chen po'i stobs kyis ni/_/sems can dang du len byed cing /_/'khor ba dag la zhen med pas/_/yongs su skyo 
[\[97a.4\]]zhing ngal ba med/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen stobs kyis ni/_/rtag par phan tshun sad byed cing /_/sems ni bying bar mi 'gyur bas/_/byang chub la ni gnas par 'gyur/_/dpa' bo gang yin de dag gis/_/stobs brgyad 'di dag thob gyur na/_/byang chub snying 
[\[97a.5\]]por 'dug nas ni/_/bdud dpung mang po bcom par 'gyur/_/gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan par gyur na mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/_/brgyad gang zhe na dang po ni sems can thams cad mnyam par gyur pa ste rang bzhin 
[\[97a.6\]]gyis bdag med pa'i phyir ro/_/gnyis pa ni chos thams cad mnyam par gyur pa ste chos rnams rab tu dben pa'i phyir ro/_/gsum pa ni zhing thams cad mnyam par gyur pa ste/_stong pa nyid kyi khams su 'jug par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/bzhi pa ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[97a.7\]]pa thams cad mnyam par gyur pa ste/_snyoms pa nyid du ston pa'i phyir ro/_/lnga pa ni spyod pa thams cad mnyam par gyur pa ste/_rgyu dang rkyen la rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro/_/drug pa ni theg pa thams cad mnyam par gyur pa ste/_'dus ma byas su mtshungs pa'i 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]phyir ro/_/bdun pa ni sems mnyam par gyur pa ste/_sems sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro/_/brgyad pa ni bdud rnams mnyam par gyur pa ste/_nyon mongs pa'i thog ma mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/'di ni chos rnam pa brgyad kyis mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas pa 
[\[97b.2\]]zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_sems can rang bzhin bdag med pas/_/skad cig tsam yang dmigs mi 'gyur/_/mnyam pa nyid la gang gnas pa/_/de lta bur ni blta bar bya/_/chos rnams thams 
[\[97b.3\]]cad mnyam pas na/_/rang bzhin rtag par stong zhing dben/_/yi ges tha dad phye bar zad/_/chos rnams rang bzhin bye brag med/_/phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams thams cad kun/_/mu mtha' dag ni mi dmigs pas/_/de yi rang bzhin nam mkha' 'dra/_/sangs 
[\[97b.4\]]rgyas zhing ni rtag tu mnyam/_/dus gsum de bzhin gshegs pa kun/_/chos dbyings gnas par mnyam pas na/_/ye shes mtha' yas rnam par grol/_/sangs rgyas kun kyang de bzhin no/_/sems can rang bzhin rgyu rkyen rnams/_/thams cad kun kyang mnyam 
[\[97b.5\]]pa dang /_/de yi spyod pa rab shes pas/_/ci rigs par ni go bar byed/_/sems can ji snyed tha dad pa/_/sgyu sbrul lta bur rab tu rtogs/_/phyi nang gnyis ka len med pas/_/rang bzhin rtag tu rnam par dag_/theg pa sna tshogs rab bshad kyang /_/'dus 
[\[97b.6\]]ma byas su rab tu mnyam/_/'dren pas thabs ni rab mkhyen pas/_/rnam par phye ste theg gsum bshad/_/nyon mongs bdud la rab gnas kyang /_/nyon mongs dngos po ci yang med/_/lha dang phung po 'chi bdag bdud/_/spyod yul thams cad stong pa yin/_/
[\[97b.7\]]gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad dang ldan na byams sdang rnams yongs su spong bar byed do/_/brgyad gang zhe na byams pa dang ldan pa dang /_snying rje dang ldan pa dang /_rtag par phan 'dogs par byed pa dang /_'jig rten pa'i chos la ma chags pa dang /_
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]rang gi lus la chags pa med pa dang /_rtag tu ting nge 'dzin gyi sems sgom pa dang /_lus dang srog yongs su gtong ba dang /_nyon mongs pa rnams la so sor rtog pa ste/_chos brgyad po 'di dag mngon par sgrub par nus na byams sdang yongs su spong 
[\[98a.2\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_byams sems go cha rab bgos nas/_/thams cad kun la snying brtse zhing /_/mnyam pa'i sems la gang gnas pa/_/byams sdang sems la skye mi 'gyur/_/blo 
[\[98a.3\]]ldan phan 'dogs spyod pas na/_/rtag par gzhan la bde ba gtong /_/rnyed pa thob kyang rang mi mthong /_/brnyas shing smad kyang 'khon 'dzin med/_/rlung brgyad kyis ni mi bskyod pas/_/byams sdang dag ni mi skye zhing /_/bdag gam gal te gzhan yang rung /_/byams 
[\[98a.4\]]sdang 'du shes yongs mi skyed/_/'du shes rnams ni rab spangs nas/_/spyod yul dag la zhen pa med/_/rtag par rang gi lus rtogs pas/_/lus srog dag la phongs pa med/_/mkhas rnams sdug bsngal bde ba yis/_/g.yos par mi 'gyur nam mkha' bzhin/_/
[\[98a.5\]]nyon mongs legs par rtogs byed na/_/bdag dang bdag gi gnyi ga spong /_/spyod 'dzin rtag par sa 'dra bas/_/byams sdang dag ni yongs mi skyed/_/gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan na 'khor bas yongs su ngal bar mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[98a.6\]]brgyad gang zhe na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba yangs shing rgya che ba'i phyir dang /_sems can la so sor rtog par byed pa'i phyir dang /_rtag par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong zhing mchod pa byed pa'i phyir dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa rnams mthong ba'i phyir dang /_rtag 
[\[98a.7\]]par sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa yongs su gnyer ba'i phyir dang /_'khor ba rmi lam lta bur rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir dang /_chos khyad par can dag la zhum pa med pa'i phyir dang /_sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang yang dag pa'i mtha' la so sor rtog pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_rnal 'byor lam ni gang sgom pa/_/dge sbyong skyon 'phen dri ma med/_/bar snang zla ba rnam dag bzhin/_/sdug bsngal sems can sgrol bar byed/_/yon tan rnams ni bsdu ba'i phyir/_/'khor bas 
[\[98b.2\]]yongs su ngal mi 'gyur/_/sems can rang bzhin rtog byed cing /_/rab brten brtson 'grus spyod par byed/_/sangs rgyas zhing ni tshad med du/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni gus mchod pas/_/de phyir stobs bcu gang ldan pa/_/'khor bas yongs su ngal mi 'gyur/_/
[\[98b.3\]]'jig rten tshad med dpag med du/_/bsam gyis mi khyab chos ston cing /_/dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi gcod/_/chos rgyal nyid du mngon 'tshang rgya/_/tshul khrims dam pa gang srung ba/_/'khor bas ngal bar mi 'gyur zhing /_/'khor ba'i rang bzhin 
[\[98b.4\]]gang yin pa/_/rmi lam sprin dang glog ltar shes/_/chos las gang zhig rnam grol ba/_/'khor bas yongs su ngal mi 'gyur/_/byang chub la ni rab gnas shing /_/dga' ba'i sems kyis rtag tu bde/_/thabs kyis pha rol gang phyin pa/_/'khor bas 
[\[98b.5\]]yongs su ngal mi 'gyur/_/rtag par dam chos sgrub pa yang /_/bar snang zla bzhin 'phel bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas yon tan gang mos pa/_/'khor bas yongs su ngal mi 'gyur/_/'khor ba mu mtha' med gyur kyang /_/rtag par yang dag mtha' la 
[\[98b.6\]]gnas/_/yud tsam shes rab rjes 'thun pa/_/'khor ba dag gis ngal mi 'gyur/_/gzhan yang bu mo chos brgyad dang ldan na sems kyi khams mnyam par 'gyur ro/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_sems sa dang mtshungs par gyur pa'i phyir dang /_sems chu dang mtshungs 
[\[98b.7\]]par gyur pa'i phyir dang /_sems me dang mtshungs par gyur pa'i phyir dang /_sems rlung dang mtshungs par gyur pa'i phyir dang /_sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs par gyur pa'i phyir dang /_sems chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par gyur pa'i phyir dang /_sems 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]rnam par grol ba dang mtshungs par gyur pa'i phyir dang /_sems mya ngan las 'das pa dang mtshungs par gyur pa'i phyir te/_'di ni sems kyi khams mnyam pa nyid rnam pa brgyad ces bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de 
[\[99a.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_sems ni sa dang mtshungs pas na/_/thams cad khur du khyer bar byed/_/dge ba dang ni sdig pa 'ang rung /_/'phel ba med cing 'grib pa med/_/sems ni chu dang mtshungs pas na/_/dri ma mi gtsang 'khru byed cing /_/'jig rten rnams ni 
[\[99a.3\]]gso ba dang /_/nyon mongs gdung ba sel bar byed/_/sems ni me dang mtshungs pas na/_/nyon mongs dag ni sreg byed cing /_/sgron ma chen po snang ba yis/_/gsal bar mi byed gang yang med/_/sems ni rlung dang mtshungs pas na/_/gnas pa med 
[\[99a.4\]]cing rten med par/_/tshul khrims thos pa'i dri yis ni/_/dus gsum kun tu khyab par byed/_/sems ni nam mkha' mtshungs pas na/_/lta ba spong zhing rnam par dag_/thams cad kun tu 'jug byed kyang /_/bdud kyi rjes su 'brang mi byed/_/sems 
[\[99a.5\]]ni chos dbyings mtshungs pas na/_/bde ba nyid du rab gnas shing /_/'phel ba med cing 'grib med par/_/rtag par mnyam pa nyid la gnas/_/nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal gyi/_/rnam par grol ba thob gyur kyang /_/'ching ba dag kyang yod min la/_/grol ba 
[\[99a.6\]]dag kyang yod pa min/_/'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/_/'ong ba med cing 'gro med ces/_/rab dben nyer zhir gnas nas ni/_/dus gsum kun tu 'gro bar byed/_/gzhan yang bu mo chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub kyi 
[\[99a.7\]]'byung gnas su 'gyur ro/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_dang po ni sbyin pa 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te/_ci bdog pa rnams yongs su gtong ba'i phyir ro/_/gnyis pa ni tshul khrims 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te/_nyams pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsum pa ni bzod 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]pa 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te/_zhe sdang med pa'i phyir ro/_/bzhi pa ni brtson 'grus 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te/_/le lo med cing nur ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/lnga pa ni bsam gtan 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te/_thabs la mkhas pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[99b.2\]]drug pa ni shes rab 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te/_tshul khrims srung zhing mang du thos pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/bdun pa ni tshangs pa'i gnas pa 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te/_rnam par grol bas nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/brgyad pa ni mngon par 
[\[99b.3\]]shes pa 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te/_rtag par mnyam par bzhag pa la rab tu gnas pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_rtag par sbyin pa gang gtong ba/_/'dod chags gdung ba spong bas na/_/'bras 
[\[99b.4\]]bu rnam smin mi re bar/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sngo bar byed/_/khrims ldan theg pa che ba'i phyir/_/bcad cing gtubs kyang khong khro med/_/rtse gcig bde chen gnyer byed cing /_/bag chags spangs nas 'gog mngon med/_/byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus can/_/
[\[99b.5\]]bskal mang sems can ched du ni/_/sdug bsngal bzod cing 'jig rten rgyu/_/brtson 'grus stobs ni 'phel bar byed/_/bsam gtan dag ni gang sgom pa/_/spros pa rnams ni spong byed cing /_/bsam gtan pha rol phyin gyur kyang /_/bsam gtan rjes su yong 
[\[99b.6\]]mi skye/_/shes rab chen po mtshungs med pas/_/mthar lta rnams ni spong byed cing /_/'jig rten stong dben rig pas na/_/gti mug mun pa ma lus sel/_/nyer zhi tshangs gnas gang sgom pa/_/ngan song rnams ni spangs pas na/_/rtag par brgya byin tshangs par 
[\[99b.7\]]'gyur/_/don gyi phan pa nan tan sgom/_/mngon shes sangs rgyas zhing rgyu ba/_/sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur chos kyang nyan/_/rang bzhin mos pa rab shes pas/_/chos bshad sems can zlos par byed/_/gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa' ni chos brgyad dang 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]ldan pa'i phyir gzungs dang /_thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_chos la bla mar byed pa'i phyir dang /_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon la rim gro byed pa'i phyir dang /_chos yongs su gnyer ba la skyo ba med pa'i 
[\[100a.2\]]phyir dang /_ji skad thos pa bzhin du yang dag par ston par byed pa'i phyir dang /_chos la ser sna mi byed pa'i phyir dang /_gzhan gyi nyes pa sgrogs par mi byed pa'i phyir dang /_/chos smra ba dag la mkhan po bzhin du gus pas sri zhu byed pa'i phyir dang /_gzhan 
[\[100a.3\]]gyi nyes pa mi mthong zhing nyes pa spong bar skul bar byed pa'i phyir te/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad dang ldan na gzungs dang /_thogs pa [(]mad [,]med [)]pa'i spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ba zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs 
[\[100a.4\]]su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_rtse gcig rtag tu chos gnyer ba/_/mkhan po dge bshes rim gro byed/_/sdig pa'i grogs po spong bas na/_/mi zad gter 'dzin thob par 'gyur/_/mang thos yongs su skyo med par/_/rab brtson chos ni gnyer bar 
[\[100a.5\]]byed/_/ji skad thos bzhin ston byed pas/_/rnyed pa dag la re tshol med/_/spobs pa rnam dag gang thob pa/_/'khor mang dga' bar byed pas na/_/chos sbyin pa la rab mos shing /_/ser sna phrag dog spong bar byed/_/chos spyod mngon par zhen med 
[\[100a.6\]]cing /_/gzungs ni gang zhig thob 'gyur ba/_/khrims srung rang lus lta bas na/_/gzhan gyi nyes skyon yong mi tshol/_/byams dang snying rje gnas gyur cing /_/dus min tshig ni mi smra bas/_/thogs med spobs pa thob gyur nas/_/spro tshig pha rol 
[\[100a.7\]]phyin pa ston/_/chos ni legs par smra ba la/_/mkhan po bzhin du gus par byed/_/skyon 'chab nyes pa spong skul bas/_/mi zad kun 'dzin rgya mtsho 'thob/_/gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]rnams kyi spyan sngar pad ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_srog la bab par gyur kyang gzhan gyi nyes pa mi rjod pa dang /_sems can rnams dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar skul ba dang /_thams cad byang chub kyi sems la 
[\[100b.2\]]'god pa dang /_tshangs par spyod pa la gos pa med pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dag byas nas pad mo'i gdan la 'jog pa dang /_sems can mya ngan byed pa dag gi mya ngan sel bar byed pa dang /_khengs shing nga rgyal byed pa dag gi mdun du 
[\[100b.3\]]rtag par bdag nyid dman par byed pa dang /_gzhan la 'tshe bar mi byed pa gang yin pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_gal te sdug bsngal gzir gyur kyang /_/nam yang gzhan gyi skyon mi smra/_/rtag par 
[\[100b.4\]]dkon mchog gang bsngags pa/_/sangs rgyas spyan sngar rdzus te skye/_/byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang /_/thams cad mkhyen pa gnyer bskul nas/_/rtag par tshangs par gang spyod pa/_/sangs rgyas spyan sngar rdzus te skye/_/gser gyis sangs rgyas gzugs 
[\[100b.5\]]brgyan te/_/rin chen pad ma'i gdan la bzhag_/sems can mya ngan gang sel ba/_/sangs rgyas spyan sngar rdzus te skye/_/nga rgyal byed pa de dag la/_/slob ma bzhin du bdag dman zhing /_/gzhan la gang zhig mi 'tshe ba/_/sangs rgyas spyan sngar rdzus te skye/_/
[\[100b.6\]]gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan par gyur na sbyangs pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs par 'gyur zhing rtag par dgon pa na gnas pa la mos par 'gyur ro/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_'dod pa chung ba dang /_chog shes pa dang /_dge 
[\[100b.7\]]ba'i chos yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dang /_dge bas bdag nyid gso bar byed pa dang /_rtag par 'phags pa'i rigs yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_'khor ba'i nyes dmigs mthong bas sems la rtag par skyo ba dang /_rtag par mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]stong pa dang /_bdag med par lta ba dang /_dad pa shin tu brtan zhing gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa gang yin pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_'dod pa chung zhing chog shes pas/_/chos dga' 
[\[101a.2\]]dge mang bdag nyid gso/_/rtag par 'phags rigs sgrub la mos/_/'khor ba'i skyon mthong sems la skrag_/sbyangs pa dag la rtag mos pas/_/bse ru gcig ltar grogs kyang med/_/'dus byas sdug bsngal bdag med ces/_/blo yis rab 
[\[101a.3\]]dang brtson 'grus gnas/_/chos mthong gzhan gyi rjes mi 'brang /_/rtag par dben gnas sangs rgyas bsngags/_/sbyangs pas thag bsrings gdung ba med/_/rtsod pa nyes dmigs mang po med/_/gnyen bshes yongs spangs bsngags pa rjod/_/des na 
[\[101a.4\]]dgon par gnas la mos/_/gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i ni chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i phyir bdud kyi dpung rab tu pham par byed do/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la zhugs pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa la mngon par yid ches pa 
[\[101a.5\]]dang /_smon pa med pa la mngon par yid ches pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med par rab tu shes pa dang /_de la the tshom dang som nyi med pa dang /_skye ba med par rab tu bzod pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med par rab tu rtogs pa dang /_thabs la mkhas pas 
[\[101a.6\]]chos thams cad la so sor rtog cing de bzhin nyid 'jig par mi byed pa gang yin pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_stong dang mtshan ma med dang smon med pa/_/rnam thar gsum thob bdud dpung rab tu 'joms/_/
[\[101a.7\]]'dus byas 'dus min mtshan nyid gnyis su med/_/skye med thob pas rnam par grol bar 'gyur/_/chos rnams skye med de ltar gang bzod pa/_/de dag bdud dpung rab tu pham par byed/_/skye ba med dang 'gag med 'di dag dang /_/phung po khams la bdag 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]med sgyu ma 'dra/_/chos la ngo bo nyid med rab tu rtogs/_/de bzhin nyid ni mi 'jig thabs mkhas pas/_/chos rnams bdud kyi las zhes gang 'byed pa/_/rnam rtog spangs nas bdud ni pham par byed/_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis ka rab spyod cing /_/yod dang stong 
[\[101b.2\]]la gnas pa med par ni/_/de ltar chos mchog gang zhig sgom byed pa/_/thabs mkhas gzugs lus mdzes pa 'thob par 'gyur/_/gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa' ni/_chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i phyir byang chub dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur 
[\[101b.3\]]ro/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_yang dag pa'i lta bas log par lta ba'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang /_yang dag pa'i dran pas log par sems pa'i sems can la snying brtse bar byed pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ngag gis log par smra ba rnams la snying 
[\[101b.4\]]brtse bar byed pa dang /_yang dag pa'i las kyi mthas log pa'i las can rnams yongs su sdud pa dang /_yang dag pa'i rtsol bas log par rtsol ba rnams yongs su zlog pa dang yang dag pa'i 'tsho bas log par 'tsho ba'i sems can rnams spong bar mi byed pa dang /_
[\[101b.5\]]yang dag pa'i rtog pas log par yid la byed pa spong bar byed pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis log pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa dag bslang nas gong du rtsol du gzhug pa gang yin pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' 
[\[101b.6\]]stsal pa/_yang dag lta dang gang ldan pa/_/log lta de dag smin par byed/_/rtag par yang dag dran sgom pa/_/log sems dag la brtse bar byed/_/rnam dag yang dag dag gis ni/_/log smra rnams la brtse bar byed/_/yang dag las mtha' gnas 
[\[101b.7\]]pa yis/_/log pa'i las can sdud par byed/_/rtag par yang dag rtsol bsgoms nas/_/log brtson dag ni spong bar byed/_/yang dag 'tsho bas rjes 'thun pas/_/log 'tsho gang yin sdud par byed/_/blo ldan yang dag rtog pa yis/_/log par 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]yid byed brtse bar sems/_/yang dag ting 'dzin rtag gnas nas/_/log pa'i ting 'dzin sdud par byed/_/bla med yang dag lam brgyad kyis/_/chu bo dag la sgrol bar byed/_/rgyun phyogs ded pa zlog byed pas/_/de ni byang chub lam chen 
[\[102a.2\]]yin/_/nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal rnams/_/rtswa yi gzings bzhin bdag nyid zlos/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun zlos pas/_/dper na gru chen 'dren mkhan 'dra/_/gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i phyir/_bdud rtsi'i 
[\[102a.3\]]lam mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_rtsod pa med pa'i chos la gnas pa dang /_thogs pa'i sems legs par rab tu srung bar byed pa dang /_rtag par de kho na nyid kyi don la lta bar byed pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems la rab tu gnas 
[\[102a.4\]]nas/_rjes su dran pa drug sgom par byed pa dang /_nan tan brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams sgom par byed pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags nas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang /_snying rje chen po la gnas nas yang dag pa'i chos 
[\[102a.5\]]yongs su sdud par byed pa dang /_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas/_phyir mi ldog pa la rab tu gnas pa gang yin pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_rtag par rtsod med spyod bsgrubs nas/_/dge sbyong chen po'i 
[\[102a.6\]]chos la gnas/_/zhe sdang nyes pa yongs spangs nas/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs par byed/_/yang dag don la rab lta bas/_/mi zad spobs rnams 'thob par byed/_/byang chub sems la rab gnas nas/_/rtag par dran byed rjes su dran/_/pha rol phyin pa 
[\[102a.7\]]thams cad la/_/rab brtson bsgrubs pas log pa med/_/thabs mkhas stobs rnams thob pas na/_/des ni sems can sgrol bar byed/_/chos kyi mnga' bdag nor gyis ni/_/brtse sems thams cad kun sdud pas/_/myur du mi skye bzod thob nas/_/byang 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]chub las ni ldog mi 'gyur/_/gal te de ltar spyod nus na/_/sangs rgyas chos ni thob mi dka'/_/ring por mi thogs bdud btul nas/_/byang chub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/_/de nas bu mo des chos de lta bu thos nas dga' mgu rangs par gyur nas bcom ldan 
[\[102b.2\]]'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos du dang ldan par gyur na bud med kyi dngos po las ldog par 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bu mo chos brgyad dang ldan par gyur na bud med kyi dngos po las ldog par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[102b.3\]]brgyad gang zhe na/_phrag dog mi byed pa dang /_ser sna mi byed pa dang /_g.yo sgyu med pa dang /_khong khro ba med pa dang /_bden par smra ba dang /_ngag rtsub po mi smra ba dang /_'dod chags spangs pa dang /_log par lta ba rnams spangs pa gang yin pa ste/_bu 
[\[102b.4\]]mo chos brgyad po 'di dag mngon par bsgrubs na/_myur du bud med kyi dngos po las ldog par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_gzhan la phrag dog mi byed cing /_/ser sna spangs nas chos mos dang /_/g.yo sgyu dag 
[\[102b.5\]]ni mi spyod cing /_/bud med lus la skyo ba dang /_/byams sems zhe sdang rab spangs nas/_/rtag par bden tshig smra ba dang /_/'dod bsal ngag rtsub spangs nas ni/_/yang dag lta la gnas par bya/_/gang gis bud med lus skyo nas/_/'di 'dra'i chos ni sgrub 
[\[102b.6\]]byed na/_/myur du bud med dngos spangs nas/_/skyes pa'i lus bzang len par 'gyur/_/gzhan yang bu mo chos brgyad dang ldan par gyur na/_bud med kyi dngos po las ldog par 'gyur ro/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas la bla mar byed cing /_chos la 
[\[102b.7\]]shin tu mos pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_mang du thos pa dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze dag la bsnyen bkur dang rim gror byed pa dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khyim gyi dngos po dag la mngon par zhen cing /_chags pa med pa dang /_
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]bslab pa'i dngos po yang dag par blangs pa rnams 'jig par mi byed pa dang /_srog chags rnams la log pa'i bsam pa mi skyed pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pas bud med kyi dngos po la yongs su skyo bar 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[103a.2\]]byang chub kyi sems kyis skyes bu chen po'i chos la gnas pa dang /_'jig rten pa'i khyim gyi 'tsho tshis rnams la sgyu ma lta bu dang rmi lam lta bur lta ba gang yin pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_sangs rgyas rab gus 
[\[103a.3\]]chos la mos/_/tshul khrims mang thos bla mar byed/_/'dod chags sred sems mi skyed na/_/bud med dngos po myur du spong /_/khrims srung ngo tsha khrel yod ldan/_/gzhan la mi bden bsam mi byed/_/byang chub sems la rab gnas nas/_/theg pa gzhan la 
[\[103a.4\]]mos med na/_/des ni myur ba kho nar yang /_/mi gtsang bud med dngos po spong /_/bsam pa mchog gis sems skyo nas/_/thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang /_/chos rnams rang bzhin g.yo med dang /_/rgyu rkyen rang bzhin stong dben zhes/_/nan tan yang dag chos 
[\[103a.5\]]bsgoms na/_/myur du skyes pa'i lus 'thob 'gyur/_/de nas bu mo rnam dag dad pas gser gyi phreng ba thogs pa de dag bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor ba dang /_/steng gi bar snang la gser yang dag pa'i gzhal med khang /_khang pa brtsegs pa 
[\[103a.6\]]dag tu gyur nas gzhal med khang de dag gi nang na sprul pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi gdan la bzhugs pa/_sha stag mngon du byung bar gyur to/_/de nas bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis kyang so so nas/_lus kyi rgyan rnams bkrol nas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[103a.7\]]mngon par gtor ba dang /_steng gi bar snang la gser gyi gzhal med khang dang /_rin po che'i gur dang /_rin po che'i gdugs dang /_bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs su gyur to/_/de nas bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis de lta bu'i cho 'phrul chen po mthong ba dang /_skad 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]'thun par tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_bcom ldan mi mchog khyad par 'phags pas na/_/thugs rjes sems can rnams la sman par mdzad/_/bdag cag deng ni byang chub sems bskyed nas/_/mos pa rjes 'thun rab tu dul la gnas/_/bcom ldan 'dren 
[\[103b.2\]]pa bde ba rab stsol ba/_/bdag cag mi mchog la ni mchod par bgyi/_/chos thos dbang gis rdul rnams rab spangs nas/_/bdag cag the tshom nem nur yongs ma mchis/_/des na bud med nyon mongs mang spangs nas/_/nyon mongs gtan bcom bdud ni pham 
[\[103b.3\]]par bgyi/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bye ba tshad med rnams/_/bdag cag dga' bas rtag tu mchod par 'tshal/_/sbyin dang tshul khrims brtson 'grus rab gnas nas/_/bzod dang bsam gtan sems ni rab tu bgyi/_/thabs dang shes rab sems can yongs 
[\[103b.4\]]bsdus nas/_/byang chub mchog lam gang lags mngon du bgyi/_/lha mi'i 'khor ni tshad med sman btags nas/_/thams cad theg chen sems ni bskyed par bskul/_/bdag cag seng ge'i sgra ni sgrogs par 'gyur/_/bdag cag lha mi'i ston pa bgyid par 
[\[103b.5\]]mchi/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid ni nam 'dzum pa mdzad pa na 'od zer kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs 'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_le brgan dang /_dngul dang /_shel 
[\[103b.6\]]gyi kha dog lta bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas byung ste/_'jig rten gyi khams tshad med dpag tu med pa dag nas/_tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du khyab par snang bar byas nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_de bzhin 
[\[103b.7\]]gshegs pa'i dbu'i gtsug tu thim par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rgyu rkyen gang gi slad du 'dzum pa 'di lta bu bstan par mdzad lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis bu mo rnam dag dad pa 'di mthong ngam/_kun dga' bos gsol pa/_mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo bu mo rnam dag dad pa la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po 'di dag ni/_
[\[104a.2\]]'di nas tshe zad pa dang /_bud med kyi lus spangs nas dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skye ste/_bcom ldan 'das byams pa dang /_bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bkur sti dang /_rim gro dang /_mchod pa byed par 'gyur bas bu mo rnam dag dad pas 
[\[104a.3\]]bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgyad khri bzhi stong 'das pa'i 'og tu 'jig rten gyi khams glog gi 'od ces bya bar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi bkod pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa'i ming ni rtag par snang ba zhes 
[\[104a.4\]]bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni dga' ldan gyi lha bzhin du/_tshe lo stong phrag bcu gnyis thub par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams de na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ba' zhig gi 'khor tshad med dpag tu med pa dag gis 'khor 
[\[104a.5\]]byed par 'gyur ro/_/bu mo lnga brgya po 'di dag kyang 'khor de dag gi nang na gtso bo mchog byed par 'gyur te/_ji ltar da ltar nga'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la sogs pa drug cu po 'di dag gtso bor gyur pa bzhin no/_/kun dga' bo bud med gang la la 
[\[104a.6\]]zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas yongs su 'dzin par byed/_klog par byed/_kha ton du 'don par byed na bud med kyi lus 'di dag gtugs nas phyis yang len par mi 'gyur zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[104a.7\]]'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_bu mo rnam dag dad pa la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rab tu dga' 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]nas mngon par bstod do//_//[{D85}]'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las bu mo rnam dag dad pas zhus pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa rdzogs so//_//'phags pa dkon 
[\[104b.2\]]mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa ste/_'phags pa byams pas zhus pa lung bstan pa/_bam po gcig pa/_rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya mai tri ya pa ri pr-i ts+tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_
[\[104b.3\]]'phags pa byams pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das yul brga na chu srin byis pa gsod lta bu'i ri 
[\[104b.4\]]'jigs su rung ba'i nags [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po mngon par shes pa mngon par shes pa gnas brtan nyan thos chen po sha stag la/_'di lta ste/_tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kau Di n+ya dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang /_
[\[104b.5\]]tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ming chen dang /_tshe dang ldan pa bzang ldan dang /_tshe dang ldan pa dri ma med dang /_tshe dang ldan pa gang po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag dang /_tshe dang ldan pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mgo dang /_tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung 
[\[104b.6\]]dang /_tshe dang ldan pa chu klung 'od srung dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srung dang /_tshe dang ldan pa byin pa 'od srung dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa don yod rgyal po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa blo gros bzang dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i 
[\[104b.7\]]bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ri rgyal dang /_tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang /_tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang /_de dag la sogs pa dge slong lnga brgya 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]tsam dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa mngon par shes pa khri dang yang thabs cig la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' blo gros 'phel dang /_byang chub 
[\[105a.2\]]sems dpa' blo gros bzang dang /_byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan dang /_blo gros yangs pa dang /_spobs pa brtsegs dang /_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_mthu chen thob dang /_tog dpal dang /_'jam dpal dang /_mngon par shes pa'i me 
[\[105a.3\]]tog shin tu rgyas pa dang /_dmigs pa med pa yid la byed pa dang /_dad ldan dang /_rin po che'i tog dang /_dbang po'i lha dang /_chu lha dang /_sgra dbyangs snyan dang /_zhing rnam par sbyong dang /_lhun po brtsegs dang /_spobs pa phun sum tshogs dang /_dbang po'i 
[\[105a.4\]]dpal dang /_sa 'dzin dang /_sems can dmyal ba skems dang /_ngan song spong dang /_rin chen ze ba can dang de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' khri dang thabs cig ste/_de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis 
[\[105a.5\]]bltas nas chos ston to/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po de 'dus par rig nas stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar 
[\[105a.6\]]nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na 
[\[105a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/byams pa 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]dri ba lung bstan pa'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu skabs phyes/_byams pa khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /_dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas/_sems rangs par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[105b.2\]]po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos du dang ldan na ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par mchi bar mi 'gyur la/_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs 
[\[105b.3\]]par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/byams pa khyod ni 'di ltar sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[105b.4\]]bskyed pa/_tshe rabs dran pa/_spobs pa thob pa/_yun ring po nas tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa ste/_byams pa khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_
[\[105b.5\]]phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo da ltar gyi dang /_ma 'ongs pa rnams yongs su gzung ba'i phyir zhugs nas khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa legs so legs so/_/byams pa 
[\[105b.6\]]de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/byams 
[\[105b.7\]]pa byang chub sems dpa' chos gcig dang ldan na ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_chos gcig gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lhag pa'i bsam pa phun 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]sum tshogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems te/_byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos gcig po de dang ldan na ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[106a.2\]]'tshang rgya'o/_/byams pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos gnyis dang ldan na ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
