[\[106a.3\]]zhi gnas yongs su tshol ba dang /_lhag mthong la mkhas pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' chos gnyis po de dag dang ldan na ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang 
[\[106a.4\]]rgya'o/_/byams pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos gsum dang ldan na ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta 
[\[106a.5\]]ste/_snying rje chen po thob pa dang /_stong pa nyid kyi chos nges par sems pa dang /_des kyang rlom sems mi byed pa ste/_byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/_myur 
[\[106a.6\]]du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/byams pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[106a.7\]]byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_tshul khrims la gnas pa yin/_chos thams cad la som nyi med pa yin/_dgon pa la mngon par dga' ba yin/_yang dag par zhugs shing yang dag par blangs pa las mi g.yo ba yin 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]te/_byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/byams pa gzhan yang byang chub 
[\[106b.2\]]sems dpa' chos lnga dang ldan na ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang /_gzhan dag gi 
[\[106b.3\]]'khrul pa mi tshol ba dang /_bdag lta rtog pa dang /_chos la mngon par dga' ba dang /_gzhan la phan 'dogs par zhugs pa yin te/_byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la 
[\[106b.4\]]myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/byams pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos drug dang ldan na ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[106b.5\]]pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_drug gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_brkam pa med pa yin/_sdang ba med pa yin/_rmongs pa med pa yin/_dris ma thag tu yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lan ldon pa yin/_bsnyen par dka' ba med pa yin/_stong pa 
[\[106b.6\]]nyid spyod yul ba yin te/_byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos drug po de dag dang ldan na ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/byams pa gzhan 
[\[106b.7\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bdun dang ldan na ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_bdun gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dran pa la mkhas pa 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]yin/_chos la mkhas pa yin/_brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin/_dga' ba thob pa yin/_shin tu sbyangs pa dang ldan pa yin/_ting nge 'dzin la mkhas pa yin/_shes rab kyis rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa yin te/_byams pa byang 
[\[107a.2\]]chub sems dpa' chos bdun po de dag dang ldan na ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/byams pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[107a.3\]]chos brgyad dang ldan na ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_yang dag pa'i lta ba can yin/_yang dag pa'i rtog pa 
[\[107a.4\]]can yin/_yang dag pa'i ngag can yin/_yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' can yin/_yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba can yin/_yang dag pa'i rtsol ba can yin/_yang dag pa'i dran pa can yin/_yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin can yin te/_byams pa chos brgyad po de dag dang 
[\[107a.5\]]ldan na ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/byams pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos dgu dang ldan na ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig 
[\[107a.6\]]pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_dgu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod pa dag las dben pa/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams 
[\[107a.7\]]las dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas so/_/rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang rab tu dang ste/_sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/_
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]dpyod pa med pa/_ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas so/_/dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas/_btang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/_bde ba lus kyis myong la/_'phags 
[\[107b.2\]]pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o/_/zhes brjod pa ste/_dga' ba med pa bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas so/_/bde ba yang spangs te/_snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba yang 
[\[107b.3\]]nub pas bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa/_btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas so/_/rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/_thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams 
[\[107b.4\]]nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas so/_/rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_rnam par shes pa 
[\[107b.5\]]mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas so/_/rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_ci yang med do snyam nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas so/_/rnam pa thams cad du ci 
[\[107b.6\]]yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas so/_/rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste/_
[\[107b.7\]]byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos dgu po de dag dang ldan na ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/byams pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]chos bcu dang ldan na ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan 
[\[108a.2\]]pa yin/_gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mngon par brtson pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/_thabs kyis 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/_rnam par snang byed kyi ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/_kun nas snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/_
[\[108a.3\]]kun du gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/_rin chen zla ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/_zla ba sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/_nyon mongs pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/_rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang 
[\[108a.4\]]ldan pa yin te/_byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/de nas 
[\[108a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/_stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[108a.6\]]ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/sngon cad sbyin pa sbyin mdzad pa/_/sdug pa'i bu dang zas dang skom/_/mgo dang mig kyang btang mdzad de/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[108a.7\]]sbyin kun pha rol phyin/_/g.yag rnga bzhin du yun ring nas/_/khyod kyis tshul khrims ma nyams bsrungs/_/khrims kyis khyod 'dra ma mchis te/_/sangs rgyas khrims legs pha rol phyin/_/bzod pa'i stobs ni bskyed mdzad nas/_/byis pas nongs pa bgyis pa 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]bzod/_/bzod pa'i stobs rnams kun dang ldan/_/sangs rgyas bzod legs pha rol phyin/_/brtson 'grus stobs ni bskyed mdzad nas/_/zhi bde bla na med pa brnyes/_/brtson 'grus stobs kyis stobs dang ldan/_/sangs rgyas brtson legs pha rol phyin/_/
[\[108b.2\]]sdig pa thams cad bsreg mdzad nas/_/'dren pa skyes chen bsam gtan dgyes/_/bsam gtan stobs kyis stobs dang ldan/_/sangs rgyas bsam legs pha rol phyin/_/chos rnams de dag rang bzhin stong /_/ngo bo nyid kyis gang mi skye/_/shes rab kyis 
[\[108b.3\]]ni pha rol gshegs/_/sangs rgyas shes legs pha rol phyin/_/mkhyen chen byang chub shing drung du/_/sder bcas bdud ni khyod kyis btul/_/don gyi mchog kyang brnyes par gyur/_/sangs rgyas bdud kyi tshogs ngan 'joms/_/skyes chen bA ra NA sir ni/_/
[\[108b.4\]]chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/_/mu stegs tshogs ngan skrag par mdzad/_/sangs rgyas mu stegs can tshogs 'joms/_/shes rab chen po bla na med/_/kun nas zla dpe yong ma mchis/_/dkon mchog chos de ston par mdzad/_/'dren pa sangs rgyas 'od mdzad 
[\[108b.5\]]lags/_/sbyin pa dang ni khrims stobs dang /_/bzod brtson khyod dang 'dra ma mchis/_/kun gyi pha rol phyin par gyur/_/sangs rgyas yon tan mang pos 'phags/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra 
[\[108b.6\]]ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di 'di ltar 
[\[108b.7\]]spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_'di ltar shin tu rnam par nges pa'i tshig gis chos ston pa dang /_'di ltar tshig dang yi ge mtshungs pa'i chos ston pa dang /_'di ltar zab mo'i tshig gis chos ston pa dang /_'di ltar legs par 'brel pa'i tshig gis chos ston pa 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]dang /_dran pa'i tshig gis chos ston pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' byams pa spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan zhing byang chub sems 
[\[109a.2\]]dpa' byams pa shin tu rnam par nges pa'i tshig gis chos ston pa nas rjes su dran pa'i tshig gi bar gyis chos ston pa ni ngo mtshar to/_/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' byams pa ni da ltar nga la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bstod par yang ma zad de/_de ci'i 
[\[109a.3\]]phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa bcur tshang bar gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_
[\[109a.4\]]skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das snang bas rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag ces bya ba gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_
[\[109a.5\]]blta na sdug pa/_kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod pa de skyed mos tshal du 'gro ste/_grong bar du phyin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang bas rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa mdzes pa/_
[\[109a.6\]]dad par bya ba/_dbang po zhi ba/_thugs zhi ba/_dul ba dang zhi gnas kyi mchog brnyes pa/_dul ba dang zhi gnas kyi dam pa brnyes pa/_dbang po bsrungs pa/_glang po che dbang po thul ba lta bu/_mtsho ltar dang zhing rnyog pa med la gsal ba/_skyes bu chen po'i 
[\[109a.7\]]mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po dag gis sku legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu po dag gis sku rnam par spras pa/_shing sA la'i rgyal po me tog shin tu rgyas pa 'dra ba/_ri'i rgyal po ri rab ltar mngon par 'phags pa/_zhal zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar zhi ba/_
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar lham me lhan ne lhang nge ba/_shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa 'od 'bar ba'i sku dpal chen pos 'bar ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de bcom ldan 'das la sems dad par gyur to/_/de sems dad nas 'di snyam du sems te/_a la la de bzhin 
[\[109b.2\]]gshegs pa'i sku 'di rnam par spras shing kha dog dang gzi brjid dang /_dpal dang mtshan rnams kyis 'bar zhing lham me lhan ne lhang nge ba ngo mtshar to/_/snyam mo de nas bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag gis 'di skad ces smras te/_a la la bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na lus 
[\[109b.3\]]'di 'dra ba dang ldan par gyur cig kha dog dang /_gzi brjid dang /_dpal dang /_mtshan rnams kyis 'di ltar 'bar zhing lham me lhan ne lhang nge bar gyur cig ces des smon lam de skad btab nas sa la nyal te 'di snyam du bsams so/_/gal te bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i 
[\[109b.4\]]dus na 'di lta bu'i lus dang ldan par gyur te/_kha dog dang /_gzi brjid dang /_dpal dang /_mtshan rnams kyis 'bar zhing lham me lhan ne lhang nger 'gyur zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs bdag gi lus la reg par gyur cig snyam mo/_/kun dga' bo de 
[\[109b.5\]]nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang bas rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa des bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag ga la ba der gshegs te/_bram ze'i khye'u 
[\[109b.6\]]bzang dag la zhabs kyis reg par mdzad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snang bas rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa des bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag la zhabs kyis reg par mdzad ma thag tu/_de nas de'i tshe mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/kun dga' 
[\[109b.7\]]bo de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snang bas rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa des snam logs su gzigs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed gang gis kyang bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag de'i lus la rkang pas ma rdzi shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas de nyid kyi tshe bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag gis lha'i mig dang /_lha'i rna ba dang /_pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang /_sngon gyi gnas rjes su 
[\[110a.2\]]dran pa mngon sum du bya ba'i shes pa thob bo/_/rdzu 'phrul yang mngon par bsgrubs so/_/des de bzhin gshegs pa snang bas rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spyan sngar tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis kyang mngon par bstod do/_/
[\[110a.3\]]phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su bskor te btsal bgyis kyang /_/'jig rten dag na mi dbang khyod 'dra yod ma mchis/_/'gro ba kun na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags/_/rnam par 'dren pa rang byung khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal/_/dper na 
[\[110a.4\]]bar snang na ni nyi ma lhan ne ltar/_/phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun gyi 'jig rten khams rnams na/_/'jig rten 'di dag thams cad 'od kyis lham mer gyur/_/sangs rgyas yon tan gzi mnga' khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal/_/ji ltar seng ge nags khrod dag na 
[\[110a.5\]]sgra sgrogs pa/_/wa tshogs phal chen thams cad zil gyis gnon par bgyid/_/de ltar mi yi dam pa mthu chen mnga' ba yang /_/mu stegs can mang 'dus pa thams cad zil gyis gnon/_/bde bar gshegs pa smin mtshams bar gyi mdzod spu dkar/_/
[\[110a.6\]]dngul dang kha ba'i tshogs bzhin mtha' yas gzi brjid can/_/des ni 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad snang bar bgyis/_/'jig rten kun na sangs rgyas khyod ni mi mnyam mnyam/_/skyes bu khyu mchog zhabs la lha yi 'khor lo mnga'/_/gsal zhing mdzes la 
[\[110a.7\]]rtsibs stong tshang zhing mu khyud 'khor/_/de dag gis ni ri dang nags bcas sa 'di rnams/_/rab tu g.yo bgyid thub pa gang zag mtshungs med pa/_/nyon mongs shas chen dor bar bgyi ba thams cad bor/_/'phags pa nges par 'byin pa'i lam ni rab tu brnyes/_/
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]nor rnams kun dang ldan zhing yon tan rnams kyis phyug_/bsam pa bzhin du 'phags pa'i nor rnams bkod pa mdzad/_/sa dang mtshungs shing sbyin pa'i gnas gyur mtshungs ma mchis/_/yon tan kun la mnga' brnyes tshul khrims rnam dag pa/_/ji ltar 
[\[110b.2\]]nam mkhar lag pa mi thogs mi chags ltar/_/'jig rten dag na khyod la rjes chags khro mi mnga'/_/bzod pa zad kyis gtugs pa don dang chos rnams kun/_/snying po ma mchis pa dang gsob dang gsog tu mkhyen/_/srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad dag na 
[\[110b.3\]]gang rnams la/_/rlom sems 'gyur ba'i sems can srog dang dngos ma brnyes/_/khams dang spyod pa dag dang sbyor dang bsam pa mkhyen/_/rmad du byung dang rnam par 'byed mdzad sgron mar gyur/_/chu bo chen pos ded pa'i 'gro ba gzigs gyur nas/_/sngon 
[\[110b.4\]]chad brtson 'grus stobs brtan mthu ni bskyed pa mdzad/_/skye ba spangs shing nyon mongs zhi ba'i thugs dang ldan/_/thugs rgya chen po skye dang rga shi mtha' mar 'byin/_/nam mkha'i dkyil dang mtshungs par chags pa mi mnga' rgyu/_/'jig rten chos kyis mi 
[\[110b.5\]]gos 'jig rten gsum na rgyu/_/bdag nyid chen po shes rab kyis ni snang bar mdzad/_/mun pa mun gnag gyur pa thams cad rnam par sel/_/'dod chags rdul zhi mdzad cing zhe sdang gti mug gi_/dri ma sna tshogs mun bsal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/kun 
[\[110b.6\]]dga' bo de tshun chad bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag de'i rdzu 'phrul rnams sam/_mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su nyams par ma gyur to/_/kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod dogs shing yid 
[\[110b.7\]]gnyis za 'am/_the tshom za na de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag ces bya bar gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]pa'i sangs rgyas snang bas rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[111a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di gal te yun ring po de srid nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa lags na/_ci'i slad du myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas/_
[\[111a.3\]]de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bkod pa dang yongs su gzung ba ni gnyis po 'di dag ste/_gnyis gang zhe na/_sems can 
[\[111a.4\]]bkod pa dang sems can yongs su gzung ba dang /_zhing bkod pa dang zhing yongs su gzung ba dang /_gnyis po 'di dag yin na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas ni sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe zhing bkod pa rnam par sbyangs 
[\[111a.5\]]shing yongs su gzung ba yongs su bzung ngo /_/kun dga' bo nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_ngas ni sems can bkod pa rnam par sbyangs/_sems can yongs su gzung ba yongs su bzung /_zhing bkod pa yang rnam par sbyangs/_zhing 
[\[111a.6\]]yongs su gzung ba yang yongs su bzung ngo /_/kun dga' bo ngas mngon par shes te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa yang dag par zhugs nas bskal pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis lon pa'i 'og tu ngas gdod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[111a.7\]]pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_kun dga' bo bskal pa bzang po 'di 'das nas bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa bzhi na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar rigs pa las/_kun dga' bo ngas brtson 'grus 'bar bar 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]byas pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_kun dga' bo ngas brtson 'grus rlabs po ches myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/kun dga' 
[\[111b.2\]]bo chos bcu po 'di dag gis nga myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_bcu gang zhe na/_bdog pa phangs pa thams cad yongs su btang ba dang /_chung ma phangs pa yongs su btang ba dang /_bu phangs pa yongs 
[\[111b.3\]]su btang ba dang /_mgo phangs pa yongs su btang ba dang /_mig phangs pa yongs su btang ba dang /_rgyal srid phangs pa yongs su btang ba dang /_longs spyod phangs pa yongs su btang ba dang /_khrag phangs pa yongs su btang ba dang /_rus pa dang rkang 
[\[111b.4\]]phangs pa yongs su btang ba dang /_yan lag phangs pa thams cad yongs su btang bas nga myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_kun dga' bo chos bcu po de dag gis nga myur du bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[111b.5\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang nga chos bcus myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_bcu gang zhe na/_kun dga' bo nga tshul khrims kyi yon tan gyi 
[\[111b.6\]]chos la gnas te myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/kun dga' bo nga bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/kun dga' 
[\[111b.7\]]bo nga brtson 'grus 'bar ba brtsams pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/kun dga' bo nga bsam gtan gyi yon tan la gnas te myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]par sangs rgyas so/_/kun dga' bo nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/kun dga' bo ngas sems can thams cad yongs su ma btang bas 
[\[112a.2\]]myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/kun dga' bo nga thabs la mkhas pa la gnas te myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/kun dga' bo nga sems can 
[\[112a.3\]]thams cad la sems snyoms pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/kun dga' bo ngas stong pa nyid kyi chos rtogs pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/
[\[112a.4\]]kun dga' bo ngas mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i chos rtogs pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_kun dga' bo chos bcu po de dag gis nga myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[112a.5\]]chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/kun dga' bo ngas tshor ba sdug bsngal ba drag pa rtsub pa ji lta bu dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de/_gal te khyod kyis shes su zin na kun dga' bo 
[\[112a.6\]]khyod spobs par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu nor thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_kha dog bzang po/_/rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/_rgyal 
[\[112a.7\]]po'i 'byor pa chen po dang rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang ldan pa zhig yod pa de skyed mos tshal du 'gro ste/_grong bar du phyin pa dang gnod pas nyen cing sdug bsngal la nad tshabs chen pos btab pa'i mi zhig mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de snying rje bar gyur te/_de mi de ga la ba der 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye mi khyod ci sdug bsngal lam/_des smras pa/_lha bdag ni nad kyis btab bo/_/des smras pa/_kye mi khyod kyi nad cis zhi bar 'gyur/_khyod la ci sbyin/_des 'di skad ces smras so/_/gal te bdag gis lha khyod kyi lus 
[\[112b.2\]]las ji tsam gyis tshim par 'gyur ba'i khrag cig btung du thob pa lta na bdag gi nad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu nor thams cad sbyin pa des mtshon rnon po blangs te/_rang gis lus phug nas khrag gzags te mi de la btung bar byin no/_/
[\[112b.3\]]kun dga' bo mi des de 'thungs ma thag tu mi de'i nad sos par gyur to/_/kun dga' bo rgyal bu gzhon nu nor thams cad sbyin pas rang gi lus phug ste khrag thams cad gzags kyang 'gyod pa'i sems gcig kyang med do/_/kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon 
[\[112b.4\]]nu nor thams cad sbyin par gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing yid gnyis sam/_the tshom za na de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu nor thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya bar gyur to/_/kun dga' bo rgya mtsho chen po 
[\[112b.5\]]bzhi'i chu'i phung po ni tshad gzung du yod kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di yongs su tshol zhing ngas sngon sems can rnams la khrag byin pa ni tshad med do/_/kun dga' bo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu me tog ces bya ba gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes 
[\[112b.6\]]pa/_blta na sdug pa/_kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/_rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang /_rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang ldan pa zhig yod pa de skyed mos tshal gyi sar 'gro ste/_grong bar du phyin pa dang skya rbab kyis nad kyis btab pa'i mi gnod pas nyen pa/_
[\[112b.7\]]sdug bsngal ba/_nad tshabs chen po zhig mthong ngo /_/des de mthong nas kyang snying rje bar gyur te/_de mi de ga la ba der song ste/_'di skad ces smras so/_/kye ci zhig gis mi khyod kyi nad 'di zhi bar 'gyur/_khyod la ci zhig sbyin/_des 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]gal te bdag gis lha khyod kyi lus las ji tsam gyis tshim par 'gyur ba'i rkang zhig thob pa lta na bdag gi nad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu me tog de tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' nas bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/_
[\[113a.2\]]rang gi lus brdungs nas rkang brus te mi de'i lus la bskus so/_/kun dga' bo bskus ma thag tu mi de'i nad sos par gyur to/_/kun dga' bo rgyal bu gzhon nu me tog gis rang gi lus brdungs te/_rkang gzags kyang sems la 'gyod pa med par gyur to/_/
[\[113a.3\]]kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu me tog ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing yid gnyis sam the tshom za na de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu me tog ces bya bar gyur 
[\[113a.4\]]to/_/kun dga' bo rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu'i phung po ni tshad bzung du yod kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di yongs su tshol zhing ngas sngon sems can rnams la rkang byin pa ni tshad med do/_/kun dga' bo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na rgyal po zla 'od 
[\[113a.5\]]ces bya ba gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/_rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang ldan pa zhig yod pa de skyed mos tshal du 'gro ste/_grong bar du phyin pa dang /_mi mig med pa long ba/_dbul po/_
[\[113a.6\]]bkren pa/_slongs mo byed pa zhig mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de snying rje bar gyur to/_/de nas mi de rgyal po zla 'od ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha khyod ni skyid do/_/lha khyod ni dgyes so/_/bdag ni sdug bsngal lo/_/long ngo /_/
[\[113a.7\]]mig ma mchis so/_/dbul lo bkren no/_/slongs mo pa'o/_/mgon ma mchis pa'o/_/kun dga' bo de nas rgyal po zla 'od kyis mi de yang mthong /_tshig kyang thos nas ngus te mchi ma zag bzhin du de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye mi khyod la ci dgos/_
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]khyod la bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_bzhon pa dang /_rgyan dang /_gser dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_rin po che sna tshogs sbyin par bya 'am/_khyod la gang dgos pa de smros shig_/mi des smras pa/_bdag la mig 'tshal na bdag la mig stsal du gsol/_
[\[113b.2\]]kun dga' bo de nas rgyal po zla 'od des rang gi mig phyung ste mi de la byin no/_/kun dga' bo de nas rgyal po zla 'od kyis rang gi mig phyung ste mi de la byin yang de'i sems la 'gyod pa med par gyur to/_/kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po zla 'od ces bya bar gyur 
[\[113b.3\]]pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing yid gnyis sam the tshom za na de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po zla 'od ces bya bar gyur to/_/kun dga' bo ri'i rgyal po ri rab la ni tshad gzung du yod kyi bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[113b.4\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di yongs su tshol zhing ngas sems can rnams la mig byin pa ni ches mang ste tshad med do/_/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas ni sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na theg pa bde ba/_'jug pa 
[\[113b.5\]]bde ba/_lam bde bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs so/_/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas ni sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe lag pa yongs su btang ba ma byas/_rkang 
[\[113b.6\]]pa yongs su btang ba ma byas/_rkang yongs su btang ba ma byas/_chung ma phangs pa yongs su btang ba ma byas/_bu phangs pa yongs su btang ba ma byas/_grong dang /_grong rdal dang /_grong khyer dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 
[\[113b.7\]]'khor phangs pa yongs su btang ba ma byas te/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas ni sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na thabs mkhas pas yongs su zin pas theg pa bde ba/_'jug pa bde ba/_lam bde bas bla na 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 
[\[114a.2\]]thabs la mkhas pa gang la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa de gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces 
[\[114a.3\]]bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs 
[\[114a.4\]]te thal mo sbyar nas sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du byas te tshig 'di skad ces smras so/_/sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/drang srong lha mig ldan pa yi/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang yang /_/nyan thos rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ngan 'gro thams 
[\[114a.5\]]cad zlog bgyid cing /_/mtho ris lam ni rab ston la/_/rga shi med par 'dren bgyid pa/_/byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sems kyi dbang du gyur pas na/_/bdag gis sdig pa ci bgyis pa/_/sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis nas su/_/bdag gis de 
[\[114a.6\]]dag bshags par bgyi/_/bdag las rnam pa gsum gang gis/_/bsod nams tshogs ni skyed pa de/_/bdag gi kun mkhyen sa bon te/_/bdag gi byang chub mi zad shog_/phyogs bcu dag gi zhing rnams su/_/sangs rgyas mchod pa gang byung ba/_/
[\[114a.7\]]sangs rgyas mkhyen pa yi rang bas/_/de la bdag ni yi rang ngo /_/sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi/_/bsod nams kun la yi rang ngo /_/sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag ni ye shes mchog thob shog_/phyogs bcu dag gi phyogs rnams 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]na/_/sa bcu dag la gnas pa yi/_/byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mchog_/'tshang rgya bgyid par skul ma 'debs/_/byang chub dam par sangs rgyas shing /_/sde dang bcas pa'i bdud btul nas/_/srog chags kun la sman slad du/_/chos 
[\[114b.2\]]kyi 'khor lo skor gyur cig_/chos rnga chen po'i sgra yis ni/_sdug bsngal sems can thar bgyid shog_/bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su/_/chos ston mdzad cing bzhugs gyur cig_/'dod pa'i 'dam du bying gyur cing /_/sred pa'i srad bus dam bcings pa/_/
[\[114b.3\]]'ching ba kun gyis bcings bdag la/_/rkang gnyis mchog rnams gzigs su gsol/_/sems kyi dri mar bgyis pa la/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni smod mi mdzad/_/sems can rnams la byams thugs ldan/_/srid pa'i mtsho las sgrol bar shog_/rdzogs pa'i 
[\[114b.4\]]sangs rgyas gang bzhugs dang /_/gang dag 'das dang ma byon pa/_/[(]da [,]de [)]dag rjes su bdag slob cing /_/byang chub spyad pa spyod gyur cig_/pha rol phyin drug rdzogs bgyis nas/_/'gro drug sems can thar bgyid shog_/mngon shes drug po mngon bgyis nas/_/
[\[114b.5\]]bla med byang chub reg gyur cig_/ma skyes pa dang mi 'byung dang /_/rang bzhin ma mchis gnas ma mchis/_/rnam rig ma mchis dngos ma mchis/_/stong pa'i chos ni rtogs par shog_/sangs rgyas drang srong chen po ltar/_/sems can ma mchis srog ma mchis/_/
[\[114b.6\]]gang zag ma mchis gso ma mchis/_/bdag ma mchis pa'i chos rtogs shog_/bdag 'dzin bdag gir 'dzin par ni/_/dngos po kun la mi gnas par/_/sems can kun la bde slad du/_/ser sna ma mchis sbyin gtong shog_/dngos po dngos po ma 
[\[114b.7\]]mchis pas/_/bdag gi longs spyod lhun grub shog_/dngos po thams cad rnam 'jig pas/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs shog_/khrims kyi tshul khrims skyon med cing /_/tshul khrims rnam par dag dang ldan/_/rlom sems med pa'i tshul khrims 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]kyis/_/tshul khrims pha rol phyin rdzogs shog_/sa 'am yang na chu 'am me/_/rlung gi khams ltar mi gnas shing /_/bzod pa'am khro ba ma mchis par/_/bzod pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs shog_/brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i brtson 
[\[115a.2\]]'grus kyis/_/brtan spro le lo ma mchis shing /_/stobs dang ldan pa'i lus sems kyis/_/brtson 'grus pha rol phyin rdzogs shog_/sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin dang /_/dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin dang /_/rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/bsam gtan 
[\[115a.3\]]pha rol phyin rdzogs shog_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_/dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang yang /_/rig gsum mngon sum bgyis pa yis/_/shes rab pha rol phyin rdzogs shog_/sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa dang /_/'od dang gzi brjid 'bar 
[\[115a.4\]]ba dang /_/byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyis/_/bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs gyur cig_/de ltar spyad pa spyod byed cing /_/byams pa grags dang ldan pa yis/_/pha rol phyin drug rdzogs byas nas/_/sa bcu po la rab tu gnas/_/kun dga' bo byang 
[\[115a.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas gang la gnas nas thabs la mkhas pas theg pa bde ba/_'jug pa bde ba/_lam bde bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa ni de yin no/_/
[\[115a.6\]]kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe sems can rnams 'dod chags chung ba dang /_zhe sdang chung ba dang /_gti mug chung ba dang /_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur la/_
[\[115a.7\]]phyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas na ci ma rung zhes de ltar zhing rnam par sbyangs so/_/kun dga' bo dus de dang tshod de 'byung ba yod de/_de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can dag 'dod chags chung ba dang /_/zhe sdang chung ba 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]dang /_gti mug chung ba dang /_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa smon lam gyi dbang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[115b.2\]]'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo ngas ni sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gnas pa'i tshe sems can 'dod chags kyi shas che ba dang /_zhe sdang gi shas che ba dang /_gti mug gi shas che ba dang /_'dod 
[\[115b.3\]]chags bdo ba dang /_zhe sdang bdo ba dang /_gti mug bdo ba dang /_chos ma yin pa la chags shing zhen pa dang /_chags pa'i ya nga bas zil gyis non pa dang /_chos log pas yongs su zin pa dang /_pha la 'khu ba dang /_ma la 'khu ba dang /_spun la 'khu ba 
[\[115b.4\]]dang /_ming sring la 'khu ba dang /_khyo shug la 'khu ba dang /_nye du la 'khu ba dang /_'phags pa la 'khu ba dang /_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon la 'khu ba dang /_bdag la 'khu ba dang /_mi gzhan la 'khu ba dang /_mi dri ma can dang /_mi dmu rgod dang /_mi cang shes

[\[115b.6\]]po dang ldan pas nga da ltar grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams su zhugs te chos ston pa na/_nga la kha ngan zer zhing gshe rgya ste tshogs par mi dbyung ba rtsub pa brlang pos smra bar byed do/_/kun dga' bo nga 
[\[115b.7\]]la chad par smra ba yin no zhes kyang zer ro/_/rtag par smra ba yin no zhes kyang zer ro/_/'khor 'dod pa mang ngo zhes kyang gleng ngo /_/'dod pa che'o zhes kyang gleng ngo /_/khyim gyi nang du zhugs na yang nga la sas kyang 'thor ro/_/dug dang bsres pa'i zas kyang byin no/_/me'i phung po yang 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]nye bar bsgrubs so/_/'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas su gyur kyang mdzes ldan ma dang zhes bya ba lta bu 'khrig pa'i chos dang ldan pas nga la skur pa yang btab bo/_/kun dga' bo nga ni snying rje chen po mdun du byas te/_snying rje chen po dang ldan pas da ltar sems can de lta bu de dag la chos

[\[116a.4\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma dul ba 'dul ba/_khur chen po bsnams pa/_dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa gang dag sems can de lta bu dag la chos ston pa ni dka' ba mdzad pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar snying rje chen pos yongs su zin pa'i phyir ro/_/de skad ces bka'

[\[116a.7\]]yang zung shig_/byang chub kyi dgongs pa 'byung ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/byams pas zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /_dge slong lnga brgya po de dag dang thams 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las byams pas 
[\[116b.2\]]zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_su ren dra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//[{D86}]'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa 
[\[116b.3\]]chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa ste 'phags pa byams pas chos brgyad zhus pa lung bstan pa/_bam po phyed pa/_rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya mai tri ya pa ri pr-i ts+tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa byams pas zhus pa zhes bya ba 
[\[116b.4\]]theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub 
[\[116b.5\]]sems dpa' khri dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go_/de nas

[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/byams pa khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /_dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan

[\[117a.3\]]du dang ldan na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du 'gyur zhing mi nyams la yongs su mi nyams te/_khyad par thob par 'gyur ba dang /_bdud phyir rgol ba bcom par 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa 
[\[117a.4\]]spyod pa na chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs nas 'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo ba dang /_yongs su mi skyo ba'i yid dang ldan par gyur nas kyang gzhan gyi kha na ma las pa'i ye shes kyis myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub

[\[117a.6\]]la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa khyod yang legs so/_/byams pa de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bcom 
[\[117a.7\]]ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos brgyad dang ldan na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du 'gyur 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]zhing mi nyams la yongs su mi nyams te/_khyad par thob par 'gyur/_bdud phyir rgol ba bcom par 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs nas 'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo bar 'gyur/_yongs su 
[\[117b.2\]]mi skyo ba'i yid dang ldan par gyur nas kyang gzhan gyi kha na ma las pa'i ye shes kyis myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems

[\[117b.4\]]thabs la mkhas pa yin/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par byung ba yin no/_/byams pa ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[117b.5\]]chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa 'am/_bsngags pa ma yin pa thos kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bsam pa nges pa yin/_chos kyi bsngags pa 'am bsngags pa ma yin pa thos kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 
[\[117b.6\]]bsam pa nges pa yin/_dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa 'am bsngags pa ma yin pa thos kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bsam pa nges pa yin te/_byams pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa ni 
[\[117b.7\]]yin no/_/byams pa ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni srog gcod pa spangs pa yin/_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pa la log 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]par g.yem pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_phra ma'i tshig dang /_ngag rtsub po dang /_tshig kyal ba spangs pa yin te/_byams pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/byams 
[\[118a.2\]]pa ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge sbyong dang /_bram ze rnams dang /_phongs pa dang slong ba rnams la gos dang /_zas dang /_mal 
[\[118a.3\]]cha dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams gtong ba dang /_sbyin pa dag tu gyur pa yin te/_byams pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/byams pa ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[118a.4\]]dpa' chen po yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa yin zhe na/_byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lus dang ngag dang /_yid kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byed pa gang ci yang rung ste/_de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[118a.5\]]byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed de/_byams pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa yin no/_/byams pa ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_byams 
[\[118a.6\]]pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byams pa'i lus kyi las dang ldan pa yin/_byams pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan pa yin/_byams pa'i yid kyi las dang ldan pa yin te/_byams pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[118a.7\]]po byams pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/byams pa ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gnod sems med pa'i lus kyi las dang ldan pa yin/_
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]gnod sems med pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan pa yin/_gnod sems med pa'i yid kyi las dang ldan pa yin te/_byams pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/byams pa ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[118b.2\]]sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa yin zhe na/_byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni kun rdzob kyi don la mkhas pa yin/_dam pa'i don la mkhas pa yin/_gnyi ga'i don la mkhas pa yin te/_byams pa de ltar na byang chub 
[\[118b.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa yin no/_/byams pa ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung ba yin zhe na/_byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 
[\[118b.4\]]'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/_'di yod pa'i phyir 'di 'byung /_'di skyes pas 'di skye ba ste/_'di lta ste/_ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/_'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/_rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/_ming dang gzugs kyi 
[\[118b.5\]]rkyen gyis skye mched drug_/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/_reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/_tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/_sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/_len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/_srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/_skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don 
[\[118b.6\]]pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'di med pa'i phyir 'di mi 'byung /_'di 'gags pas 'di 'gag ste/_'di lta ste/_ma rig pa 
[\[118b.7\]]'gags pas 'du byed 'gag_/'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag_/rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag_/ming dang gzugs 'gags pas/_skye mched drug 'gag_/skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag_/reg pa 'gags pas tshor 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]ba 'gag_/tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag_/sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag_/len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag_/srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag_/skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde 
[\[119a.2\]]ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/_de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/snyam pa ste/_byams pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung ba yin no/_/byams pa 
[\[119a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du 'gyur zhing mi nyams la yongs su mi nyams te/_khyad par thob par 'gyur/_bdud phyir rgol ba bcom par 'gyur/_
[\[119a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs nas 'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo bar 'gyur/_yongs su mi skyo ba'i yid dang ldan nas kyang gzhan gyi kha na ma las pa'i ye shes kyis myur du bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[119a.5\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_
[\[119a.6\]]lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las byams pas zhus pa 
[\[119a.7\]]chos brgyad pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]{D87}]'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa ste/_'phags pa 'od srung gis zhus pa lung bstan pa/_bam po dang po/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya kAsh+ya pa pa ri brta nA ma ma hA yAn sU tra/_bod skad 
[\[119b.2\]]du/_'phags pa 'od srung gi le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_/sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab ni bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/_dge slong brgyad stong gi dge slong gi dge 
[\[119b.3\]]'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas/_'dus pa khri drug stong thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po 
[\[119b.4\]]'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug go_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la bka' stsal pa/_'od srung chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos dang chos smra 
[\[119b.5\]]ba la mi gus pa yin/_chos la ser sna byed cing chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud byed pa yin/_chos 'dod pa'i gang zag rnams la chos kyi bar chad byed cing 'dun pa zlog par byed/_rnam par 'khrug par byed de/_mi ston cing rab tu 'chab pa yin/_mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis bdag 
[\[119b.6\]]la bstod cing gzhan la smod pa yin te/_'od srung chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba'o/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_chos smra ba la gus pa med pa yin/_/chos la ser sna byed par gyur pa dang /_/chos la slob dpon dpe mkhyud 
[\[119b.7\]]byed pa yin/_/chos 'dod rnams la bgegs ni byed gyur cing /_/'dun pa zlog la de bzhin rnam 'khrug byed/_/rgyal bas bsngags pa'i chos ni yong mi ston/_/le lo can de bdag bstod rtag tu brtson/_/gzhan la smod par byed la mngon par dga'/_/chos bzhi 'di dag rgyal 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]ba'i sras rnams kyi/_/shes rab nyams par 'gyur bar rgyal bas gsungs/_/chos bzhi 'di dag rab tu spang byas la/_/rgyal bas gsungs pa'i chos bzhi gzhan bsgom mo/_/'od srung chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab chen 
[\[120a.2\]]por 'gyur ba ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos dang chos smra ba la gus pa dang bcas pa yin/_zang zing med pa'i sems kyis rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa la mi re bar ji ltar thos pa dang /_ji ltar khong du chud pa'i chos rnams gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag 
[\[120a.3\]]par rab tu ston par byed pa yin/_mang du thos pa las shes rab 'byung bar rig nas mgo'am gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du thos pa yongs su tshol zhing ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams 'dzin par byed pa yin/_nan tan snying por byed kyi smra ba dang brjod pa'i tshig lhur len pa ma yin pa ste/_'od 
[\[120a.4\]]srung chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab chen por 'gyur ba'o/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_chos smra ba la gus dang bcas pa yin/_/zang zing med cing rnyed dang bkur sti la/_/re ba med cing tshigs bcad mi sems par/_/ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams 
[\[120a.5\]]gzhan la ston/_/thos las shes rab 'byung bar des rig nas/_/mgo la 'bar bzhin rtag tu thos pa tshol/_/de ni ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams 'dzin/_/chos bzung nas ni nan tan bya phyir gnas/_/mkhas de nan tan snying por byed pa yin/_/tshig lhur mi len smra ba 
[\[120a.6\]]lhur mi len/_/mkhas pas chos bzhi 'di dag bsten byas na/_/rgyal bas bsngags pa'i shes rab thob par 'gyur/_/'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_slob dpon dang /_bla ma 
[\[120a.7\]]dang /_sbyin gnas la slu ba dang /_gzhan 'gyod pa med pa dag la 'gyod pa nye bar sgrub pa dang /_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la bsngags pa ma yin pa dang /_mi snyan pa dang /_brjod pa ma yin pa'i sgra tshigs su bcad pa 'byin pa dang 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]sgyu dang g.yos gzhan la nye bar spyod kyi lhag pa'i bsam pas ma yin pa ste/_'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_sbyin gnas bla mas bsgo bzhin mi byed dang /_/gzhan dag la yang 
[\[120b.2\]]the tshom nyer sgrub dang /_/sems can gang dag byang chub rab zhugs pa/_/de la bsngags min mi snyan smra ba dang /_/sgyu dang g.yo dang rgyan la dor byed pas/_/gzhan la sten gyi bsam pas ma yin pa/_/chos bzhi 'di dag kun tu bsten byas na/_/sangs rgyas byang 
[\[120b.3\]]chub sems mchog nyams par 'gyur/_/de lta bas na chos 'di sten byed na/_/byang chub mchog las de ni ring bar 'gyur/_/de las bzlog pa sten par byed na ni/_/byang chub mchog rab bsngags pa reg par 'gyur/_/'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang 
[\[120b.4\]]ldan na skye ba thams cad du skyes ma thag tu byang chub kyi sems mngon du 'gyur te/_byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du bar ma dor brjed par mi 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste srog gi phyir ram/_tha na bzhad gad kyi phyir yang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi tshig mi smra ba dang /_sgyu dang 
[\[120b.5\]]g.yo med par sems can thams cad kyi drung na lhag pa'i bsam pas gnas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ston par 'du shes skyed cing de dag gi yang dag pa'i bsngags pa phyogs bzhir rjod pa dang /_nyi tshe ba'i theg pa mi 'dod pa'i phyir sems can gang rnams 
[\[120b.6\]]yongs su smin par byed pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ste/_'od srung chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' skye ba thams cad du skyes ma thag tu byang chub kyi sems mngon du 'gyur te/_byang 
[\[120b.7\]]chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du bar ma dor brjed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_srog gi phyir yang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]tshig mi smra zhing /_/rtag tu don dang ldan pa'i tshig rnams smra/_/sgyu dang g.yo ni rtag tu rnam spangs te/_/lhag pa'i bsam pas rtag tu sems can lta/_/
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]sems can dag pa byang chub gang zhugs pa/_/byang chub sems dpa' de la ston par sems/_/ston pa'i 'du shes nye bar bzhag nas kyang /_/de dag bsngags pa phyogs bzhir rjod par byed/_/sems can gang dag yongs su smin byed pa/_/bla med ye shes 
[\[121a.2\]]yang dag 'dzin du 'jug_/chos de dag la rab tu gnas pa rnams/_/byang chub sems ni nams kyang brjed mi 'gyur/_/'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i chos skyes shing byung ba rnams yongs su zad par 'gyur te/_dge ba'i chos de dag gis 
[\[121a.3\]]rgyas par mi 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i gsang tshig tshol ba dang /_rnyed pa dang bkur sti la lhag par zhen pas khyim la lta ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par sdang zhing skur pa 'debs pa dang /_ma thos pa dang /_
[\[121a.4\]]ma zin pa'i mdo sde rnams spong ba ste/_'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i chos skyes shing byung ba rnams yongs su zad par 'gyur te/_dge ba'i chos de dag gi rgyas par mi 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_nga rgyal gyis ni 'jig rten 
[\[121a.5\]]rgyang pan tshol/_/rnyed kyi phyir na khyim la sbyor bar byed/_/byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas sras la sdang /_/de dag bsngags min kun tu smra bar byed/_/de ni ma thos pa dang ma zin mdo/_/bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa spong bar byed/_/chos 'di dag dang ldan par gyur 
[\[121a.6\]]pa ni/_/dge ba'i chos kyis rgyas par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltas byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa yis/_/chos bzhi 'di dag rgyang sring rnam par spong /_/'di dag bsten na byang chub rab ring ste/_/gnam sa ring bas shin tu ring bar 'gyur/_/'od srung byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[121a.7\]]chos bzhi dang ldan na khyad par du 'gro bas yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can du 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod tshol ba la brtsams nas legs par thos pa tshol gyi nyes pa mi tshol te/_sems can thams 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]cad la nga rgyal med pa'i phyir sems khyi dang 'dra ba yin/_chos kyi rnyed pas chog par 'dzin te/_log pas 'tsho ba thams cad yongs su spangs shing 'phags pa'i rigs kyis chog par 'dzin pa yin/_gzhan dag gi ltung ba byung ba dang ma byung ba mi gleng zhing gzhan dag gi 
[\[121b.2\]]'khrul pa gzhan dang gzhan mi tshol ba yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo gang dag de'i blos mi rtogs pa de la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni mtha' yas shing sems can mos pa tha dad pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos bstan pa 'jug ste/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[121b.3\]]pa nyid kyis mkhyen kyi bdag gis ni mi shes te/_de bzhin gshegs pas mngon sum mo zhes byas nas mi spong ba ste/_'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na khyad par du 'gro bas yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_
[\[121b.4\]]de ni rtag tu pha rol phyin rnams dang /_/thabs la mkhas dang byang chub sde snod brtson/_/nga rgyal med pas khyi 'dra'i sems kyis su/_/sems can kun la nga rgyal bcag pa yin/_/chos dang 'thun pa'i rnyed pas chog sems shing /_/'tsho ba yongs dag 'phags pa'i 
[\[121b.5\]]rigs la gnas/_/gzhan gyi 'khrul pa tshol bar mi byed cing /_/gzhan gyi ltung ba gleng bar mi byed do/_/gang la de yi blos ni mi rtogs pa/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum ste/_/bde gshegs bshad pa'i byang chub mtha' yas pas/_/rgyal bas mkhyen gyi bdag gis 
[\[121b.6\]]mi shes so/_/chos bzhi 'di dag rig par gyur pa ni/_/ye shes khyad par 'phags mchog nyams mi 'gyur/_/chos 'di dag la rab tu gnas pa ni/_/rgyal bas bsngags pa'i byang chub rnyed mi dka'/_/'od srung chos bzhi po 'di dag ni gya gyu can gyi sems bskyed pa ste/_
[\[121b.7\]]de dag byang chub sems dpas yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la som nyi dang yid gnyis dang the tshom za ba dang /_sems can rnams la nga rgyal dang /_rgyags pa dang /_'chab pa dang /_khro ba dang /_gnod par 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]sems pa dang /_gzhan gyi rnyed pa rnams la phrag dog dang ser sna byed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bsngags pa ma yin pa dang /_mi snyan pa dang /_brjod pa ma yin pa'i sgras tshigs su bcad pa 'byin pa ste/_'od srung bzhi po de dag ni gya gyu can 
[\[122a.2\]]gyi sems bskyed pa ste/_de dag byang chub sems dpas yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_chos rnams la ni som nyi yid gnyis byed/_/sems can rnams la nga rgyal rgyags khro sten/_/gzhan gyi rnyed la ser sna phrag dog byed/_/rgyal ba la ni nams kyang 
[\[122a.3\]]dad mi byed/_/mi mkhas rtag tu byang chub sems dpa' la/_/bsngags pa min dang brjod min mi snyan brjod/_/gya gyu can gyi sems bzhi rnam par spang /_/byang chub sems dpas rtag tu sems can bsten/_/'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' drang po'i drang ba'i 
[\[122a.4\]]mtshan nyid yin te bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ltung ba byung ba rnams mi 'chab cing rjod de rnam par 'byed pa dang /_'chags pas kun nas ldang ba med pa yin/_de'i bden pa'i tshig gang gis rgyal srid stor ba 'am/_nor yal ba 'am/_srog gi bar chad du 'gyur yang bden pa'i tshig 
[\[122a.5\]]mi mkhyud cing gzhan nas gzhan du sgyur ba'i tshig mi smra ba yin/_gzhan gyis gnod par bya ba skur pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_smod pa dang /_bshung ba dang /_sdigs pa dang /_rdeg pa dang /_gsod pa dang /_'ching bar byed pa'i nyes pa thams cad la bdag gis nyes par 
[\[122a.6\]]sems shing las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton pas gzhan dag la mi 'khrug cing 'khon du 'dzin pa med pa yin/_de dad pa la rab tu gnas pa yin te/_bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir thams cad dad par mi 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la mngon par dad pa ste/_'od srung bzhi 
[\[122a.7\]]po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' drang po'i drang ba'i mtshan nyid yin no/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_ltung ba byung ba 'chab par mi byed kyi/_/rjod cing rnam par 'byed de nyes par 'dod/_/nor dang rgyal srid phyir dang srog phyir yang /_/'du shes bsgyur te [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'i tshig mi smra/_/
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]skur dang smod dang bshung dang gsod pa dang /_/'ching bar byed dang go rar bcug pa la/_/bdag gis nyes sems gzhan la 'khrug mi byed/_/las ni bdag gir bya bas 'khon mi 'dzin/_/de ni bde gshegs rnams kyi byang chub dang /_/dad la gnas shing bsam pa dag 
[\[122b.2\]]ldan pa/_/'di dag drang ba'i mtshan du sangs rgyas gsungs/_/sems can mchog gis rtag tu bsten par bya/_/'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgod de/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_thos pa la gces pa 'dor ba'i chos su gnas shing chos kyi rjes su 'thun 
[\[122b.3\]]pa'i chos sgrub pa la nan tan du mi byed pa yin/_rjes su bstan pa la gces pa 'dor ba'i chos su gnas shing slob dpon dang mkhan po la sri zhu mi byed pa yin/_dam bcas pa las nyams kyang dad pas byin pa la kun du spyod de/_dad pas byin pa log par ltung bar byed pa yin/_
[\[122b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' dul ba cang shes rnams mthong na mi gus shing nga rgyal 'dzin pa yin te/_'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgod do/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_thos pas rgod par gnas par byed pa yin/_/rjes su bstan pa'i chos nyid rtogs mi 'gyur/_/
[\[122b.5\]]de ni chos kun gces pa 'dor ba sten/_/'phags pa rnams la nam yang sri zhu med/_/dam bcas nyams kyang dad pas byin pa yi/_/kha zas rnams la de ni rtag tu za/_/byang chub sems dpa' cang shes thob pa dag_/mthong bar gyur na gus par mi byed cing /_/dmu rgod 
[\[122b.6\]]de ni nga rgyal 'phel bar byed/_/byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal bcag mi sten/_/'di dag dmu rgod bde bar gshegs pas gsungs/_/de dag rgyal sras rnams kyis yongs su spang /_/'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' cang shes pa ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_
[\[122b.7\]]'di lta ste/_legs par thos pa nyan cing de la nan tan du byed de don la rton kyi/_tshig 'bru la mi rton pa yin/_gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa la 'thun par 'dzin cing bka' blo bde la legs par byed pa'i las byed cing bla ma la sri zhu bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/_tshul khrims dang ting 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]nge 'dzin las ma nyams te cang shes pas zas za ba yin/_byang chub sems dpa' dul ba cang shes rnams mthong na gus pa dang bcas shing rje sa dang bcas par de la gzhol/_de la 'bab/_de la bab cing de'i yon tan 'dod pa yin te/_'od srung bzhi po de 
[\[123a.2\]]dag ni byang chub sems dpa' cang shes so/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_gang mnyan de ni legs par thos par byed/_/chos don snying por byed cing nan tan gnas/_/rjes su bstan pa 'thun par 'dzin byed cing /_/chos 'dod bka' blo bde bar bla ma sten/_/tshul 
[\[123a.3\]]khrims ting nge 'dzin la rtag gnas shing /_/tshul khrims bsdams nas de ni bza' ba za/_/gus dang bcas shing rje sar bcas pa yin/_/de la gzhol zhing der 'bab yon tan 'dod/_/rgyal sras gang dag cang shes thob gyur pa/_/de dag la ni rtag tu dga' bas lta/_/
[\[123a.4\]]bde bar gshegs pas bstan pa 'di bzhi ni/_/bde gshegs sras po cang shes thob pa yin/_/'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can yongs su smin par ma byas pa rnams la yid rton pa byang chub 
[\[123a.5\]]sems dpa'i 'khrul pa dang /_sems can snod du ma gyur pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po ston pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa dang /_rgyu chen po la mos pa'i sems can rnams la theg pa dman pa ston pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa dang /_sems 
[\[123a.6\]]can yang dag pa la rab tu gnas pa tshul khrims dang ldan pa dge ba'i chos can rnams la brnyas shing tshul khrims 'chal pa sdig pa'i chos can kun du sdud pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa ste/_'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa'o/_/de la 'di 
[\[123a.7\]]skad ces bya ste/_yongs smin ma byas rnams la yid mi brtan/_/snod min rnams la rgya chen chos mi bshad/_/rgya chen sems can rnams la theg pa dman/_/byang chub sems dpa' mchog gis bshad mi bya/_/yang dag gnas shing tshul khrims yon tan ldan/_/
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]dge ba'i chos can rnams la brnyas mi bya/_/tshul khrims 'chal pa'i sems can yongs mi bsdu/_/sdig pa'i chos rnams yongs su spang bar bya/_/'khrul ba'i chos bzhi 'di dag shes gyur nas/_/byang chub sems dpas rgyang bsring rnam par spong /_/'di dag bstan na 
[\[123b.2\]]byang chub 'tshang mi rgya/_/de lta bas na mkhas pas chos 'di spong /_/'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa dang /_sems can thams cad la mtshungs par chos ston pa dang 
[\[123b.3\]]sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /_sems can thams cad la yang dag par sbyor ba ste/_'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam mo/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_sems can rnams la rtag tu sems snyoms 
[\[123b.4\]]bya/_/sangs rgyas theg mchog yang dag 'dzin du 'jug_/rgyal bas bsngags pa'i chos ni bstan par bya/_/sems can kun la dang ba'i sems su bya/_/yang dag sbyor zhing nan tan byed par gnas/_/sems can kun la mtshungs par spyad par bya/_/chos bzhi 'di 
[\[123b.5\]]dag rgyal bas rab bsngags te/_/rgyal sras rnams kyis de dag rtag tu bsten/_/'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i bshes gnyen ngan pa grogs po ngan pa ste/_de dag byang chub sems dpas yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nyan 
[\[123b.6\]]thos kyi theg pa pa dag la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa don nyung zhing bya ba nyung ba dang /_'jig rten rgyang pan pa gsang tshig sna tshogs kyi spobs pa can dang /_gang la brten pas 'jig rten gyi zang zing kun sdud par 'gyur gyi/_chos kun mi sdud pa ste/_
[\[123b.7\]]'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i bshes gnyen ngan pa grogs po ngan pa ste/_de dag byang chub sems dpas yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_nyan thos gang dag bdag phan brtson pa dang /_/gang dag rab tu byung nas rnal 'byor spyod/_/
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]rang sangs rgyas pa gang dag byed nyung zhing /_/bdag gi don du 'du 'dzi rnam par spong /_/byis pa gang dag 'jig rten rgyang pan klog_/ji ltar bstan bzhin gang dag 'dir rtsod byed/_/gang la brten na zang zing kun sdud kyi/_/chos ni nam yang sdud par mi byed 
[\[124a.2\]]pa/_de bzhi byang chub sems dpas rab spangs nas/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen bzhi la bsten par bya/_/'di dag bshes gnyen ngan dang grogs ngan du/_/rgyal bas gsungs te thag bsring yongs su spong /_/'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i 
[\[124a.3\]]bshes gnyen te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub kyi lam rton pa'i phyir slong ba byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang /_thos pa'i shes rab rton pa'i phyir chos smra ba byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rton pa'i phyir 
[\[124a.4\]]rab tu 'byung ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rton pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/_'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[124a.5\]]dge ba'i bshes gnyen no/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_byang chub yongs su rton phyir len pa po/_/sbyin byed rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin/_/chos don smra ba thos dang shes rab byed/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par bde gshegs gsungs/_/gang dag rab 
[\[124a.6\]]'byung yang dag 'dzin 'jug pa/_/de dag dge rtsa yin pas bshes gnyen gsungs/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi lam ni rton pa'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni bde gshegs sras kyi bshes/_/rgyal bas bsngags pa bzhi po 'di dag ni/_/bde gshegs sras kyi dge 
[\[124a.7\]]ba'i bshes gnyen te/_/'di dag bsten cing rtag tu bag yod na/_/bde gshegs bstan pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur/_/'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' ltar bcos pa ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti don du gnyer gyi 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]chos don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang /_brjod pa'i sgra tshigs su bcad pa don du gnyer gyi yon tan don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang /_bdag bde ba don du gnyer gyi sems can gyi sdug bsngal bsal ba don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang /_'khor gyi tshogs don du gnyer gyi dben pa 
[\[124b.2\]]don du gnyer ba ma yin pa ste/_'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' ltar bcos pa'o/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_rnyed pa don du gnyer gyi chos 'dod min/_/brjod pa don gnyer yon tan don gnyer min/_/bdag bde rtag tu don du gnyer byed cing /_/sems 
[\[124b.3\]]can sdug bsngal bsal ba don mi gnyer/_/'khor tshogs don du gnyer gyi dben mi 'dod/_/bde la chags kyi yon tan ma chags pa/_/bzhi po de dag bcos par gsungs pa ste/_/de dag byang chub sems dpas yongs su spang /_/'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems 
[\[124b.4\]]dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i yon tan te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_stong pa nyid la yang mos la las kyi rnam par smin pa la yang yid ches pa dang /_de bdag med par yang bzod la sems can thams cad la yang snying rje che ba dang de'i bsam pa mya ngan 
[\[124b.5\]]las 'das pa la yang gnas la sbyor ba 'khor ba na yang gnas pa dang /_de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sbyin pa yang gtong la rnam par smin pa la yang mi re ba ste/_'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i yon 
[\[124b.6\]]tan no/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_chos rnams stong pa nyid du rtag mos kyang /_/las kyi rnam par smin la 'ang yid ches so/_/bdag med bzod pas mnyam pa nyid gnas kyang /_/sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skyed/_/de bsam rtag tu mya ngan 'das la gnas/_/
[\[124b.7\]]de yi sbyor ba 'khor bar gnas pa yin/_/yongs smin bya phyir sbyin pa sbyin byed kyang /_/las kyi rnam par smin la re ba med/_/'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i gter chen po rnyed pa ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]pa dang /_pha rol du phyin pa drug nyan pa dang /_chos smra ba la khong khro ba med pa'i sems kyis lta ba dang /_bag yod par dgon pa la gnas par mngon par dga' ba ste/_'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i gter chen po rnyed pa'o/_/de la 'di skad 
[\[125a.2\]]ces bya ste/_tshe rabs kun tu sangs rgyas mnyes par byed/_/pha rol phyin pa drug po rnams kyang nyan/_/chos smra ba la sems ni rab tu dang /_/mthong na rtag tu gus pa skyed par byed/_/rtag tu bag yod gyur nas dgon par gnas/_/de ni de nyid la yang rtag tu dga'/_/
[\[125a.3\]]bzhi po 'di dag rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyi/_/gter chen yin par bde bar gshegs pas gsungs/_/'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi lam las yang dag par 'da' ba'i chos te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang /_
[\[125a.4\]]sems can thams cad la khong khro ba'i sems med pa dang /_lta bar gyur pa thams cad rtog pa dang /_sems can thams cad la mi brnyas pa ste/_'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi lam las yang dag par 'da' ba'i chos so/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_
[\[125a.5\]]byang chub sems ni yongs su gtong mi byed/_/sems can rnams la khong khro rtag tu spong /_/lta bar gyur pa thams cad 'dor bar byed/_/sems can tshogs la brnyas par yong mi byed/_/bde bar gshegs pas bzhi po 'di dag ni/_/bdud las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i 
[\[125a.6\]]chos su gsungs/_/'di dag bsten na rgyal ba rnam 'dren pa/_/gser 'dra'i sku mnga' mtshungs pa med par 'gyur/_/'od srung chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_tshul 'chos 
[\[125a.7\]]pa med par dgon pa na gnas pa dang /_lan du phan 'dogs par re ba med par 'gyur ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag dang /_sems can thams cad la lus dang srog gtong zhing dam pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba dang /_thos pa dang don gyis ngoms mi myong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]cad yang dag par sdud pa'i brtson 'grus te/_'od srung chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad sdud par 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_dgon par gnas shing tshul 'chos rnam par spong /_/rgyal gsungs bsdu ba sems can rnams 
[\[125b.2\]]la byed/_/dam chos yongs su btsal ba brtsam byas nas/_/lus dang srog kyang yongs su gtong bar byed/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu mi nyung ba/_/yang dag bsgrub phyir rtag tu ngoms mi myong /_/dge ba'i chos rnams yang dag bsdu ba'i phyir/_/chos bzhi 'di dag bde bar 
[\[125b.3\]]gshegs pas gsungs/_/'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la cher snying rje ba dang /_sems can 
[\[125b.4\]]thams cad la byang chub kyi sems ston pa dang /_nyam chung ba rnams la bzod pa sten pa ste/_'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa'o/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_dag cing zang zing med pa'i sems kyis su/_/chos kyi 
[\[125b.5\]]sbyin byed rgyal bas rab tu bsngags/_/tshul khrims mi ldan pa la snying rje che/_/gzhan dag byang chub phyir ni sems skyed 'jug_/nyam chung rnams la bzod pas dang du len/_/'di ni dge chos sdud par gsungs pa ste/_/'di dag bsten na rgyal bar 'gyur bas na/_/byang 
[\[125b.6\]]chub sems dpas de dag rtag tu bsten/_/'od srung chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i ma rig pa'i bag chags kyi sa'i nyon mongs pa 'joms par 'gyur ba ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par 'dzin pa dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs 
[\[125b.7\]]su 'dzin pa dang /_sgron ma sbyin pa dang /_tha na 'dris pa rnams la yang sbyin pa ste/_'od srung chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i ma rig pa'i bag chags kyi sa'i nyon mongs pa 'joms par byed pa'o/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_tshul khrims sdom pa yang dag 'dzin byed 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]dang /_/dam chos 'dzin dang sgron ma sbyin pa dang /_/de bzhin tha na 'dris la sbyin byed cing /_/mkhas pa ma rig sa las rnam par 'byed/_/'od srung chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ba ste/_bzhi 
[\[126a.2\]]gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dam pa'i chos sbyin pa dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_phrag dog med pa dang /_gzhan dag la mi brnyas pa ste/_'od srung chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ba'o/_/de la 'di 
[\[126a.3\]]skad ces bya ste/_gang dag byang chub la ni sgrib byed pa/_/sdig pa bzhi pa bcu po rnam spangs nas/_/mkhas pas de bzhin bcu gnyis gzhan bsten na/_/'chi med reg nas byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/sems can dam pa gang dag chos tshul 'di/_/'dzin tam klog gam 
[\[126a.4\]]rab tu sten byed pa/_/de dag bsod nams mtha' yas rgyal bas gsungs/_/de yi tshad ni rgyal ba rnam brjod do/_/gang gis zhing ni gang gA'i bye ma snyed/_/rin chen bkang ste rgyal la phul ba bas/_/gang gis 'di la tshig bzhi'i tshigs bcad klog_/bsod nams 'di yi grangs 
[\[126a.5\]]su'ang mi phod do/_/'od srung byang chub sems dpa' ni ming tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya'i 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos spyod pa dang /_snyoms par spyod pa dang /_dge ba spyod pa dang /_chos la gnas pa dang ldan pa la byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/_/
[\[126a.6\]]'od srung gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ste/_sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye 
[\[126a.7\]]shes la 'dzud pa dang /_bdag ci re zhes yongs su 'jal zhing gzhan gyi shes pa la mi smod pa dang /_nga rgyal med pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa dang /_bcos ma ma yin pa'i byams pa dang /_mdza' ba dang mi mdza' ba la sems snyoms pa dang /_mya ngan 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]las 'das pa'i mtha'i bar du gtan du mdza' ba dang /_tshig ran cing 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis gsong por smra ba dang /_khur blangs pa rnams la sgyid lug pa med pa dang /_sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po yongs su ma bcad pa dang /_yid yongs su mi skyo ba dang /_
[\[126b.2\]]dam pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba'i phyir thos pa dang /_don gyis ngoms mi myong ba dang /_bdag gi 'khrul pa rnams la skyon du lta zhing gzhan gyi 'khrul pa rnams la mi gshe bar bsgo ba dang /_spyod lam thams cad du byang chub kyi sems yongs su sbyong ba dang /_rnam par smin pa 
[\[126b.3\]]la mi re ba'i gtong ba dang /_srid pa'i 'gro bar skye ba thams cad la mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims dang /_sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i bzod pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa'i brtson 'grus dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams rnam par 
[\[126b.4\]]gsal ba'i bsam gtan dang /_thabs mkhas pas bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang rab tu ldan pa'i thabs kyis zin pa'i shes rab dang /_tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la gnyis su med pa'i byams pa dang /_gus par byas te chos nyan pa dang /_gus 
[\[126b.5\]]par byas te dgon pa la gnas par mngon par dga' ba dang /_'jig rten gyi sna tshogs rnams la mi dga' zhing 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams la mngon par dga' ba dang /_theg pa dman pa la mi 'dod cing theg pa chen po la phan yon du lta ba dang /_sdig pa'i grogs 
[\[126b.6\]]po yongs su spong zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sten pa dang /_tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi sgrub pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lngas rnam par rtsen pa dang /_ye shes la rton pa dang /_sgrub pa dang log par sgrub pa la gnas pa'i sems can rnams mi gtong ba dang /_gcig tu 
[\[126b.7\]]chad par smra ba dang /_bden pa gces su byed pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba ste/_'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_sems can kun la phan dang bde bya 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]ba'i/_/lhag pa'i bsam la mos par byed pa yin/_/kun mkhyen ye shes la ni sems grol zhing /_/ri 'am mi ri snyam du bdag la dpog_/smod pa med cing lhag pa'i nga rgyal med/_/bsam pa brtan zhing bcos pa med par byams/_/mdza' 
[\[127a.2\]]dang mi mdza' rnams la sems kyang snyoms/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i mtha' la thug bar du/_/sems can rnams la gtan du rab tu mdza'/_/'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis 'jam por smra bar byed/_/khur blangs pa la sgyid lug zhum pa med/_/sems can dag la snying rje yongs 
[\[127a.3\]]ma bcad/_/dam chos yongs su tshol la skyo ba med/_/thos pas mi ngoms bdag gi 'khrul skyon lta/_/gzhan la gshe bas gdung bar byed pa med/_/spyod lam rnams su sems ni rab tu sbyong /_/gtong ba rnam par smin la re ba med/_/tshul khrims srid pa'i 'gro 
[\[127a.4\]]bar gnas ma yin/_/sems can rnams la bzod cing khong khro med/_/dge ba yang dag sgrub pa'i brtson 'grus dang /_/gzugs med khams spangs pa yi bsam gtan dang /_/thabs kyis yang dag zin pa'i shes rab dang /_/bsdu ba rnam bzhis yang dag zin thabs 
[\[127a.5\]]dang /_/khrims ldan khrims med gnyis med byams pa dang /_/gus par byas te dus su chos nyan dang /_/gus par byas te dgon zhi gnas pa dang /_/'jig rten sna tshogs dga' bar mi byed dang /_/theg pa dman la dga' bar mi byed cing /_/theg pa che la 'dod pa skyed 
[\[127a.6\]]pa dang /_/sdig pa'i grogs po rnam par spong byed cing /_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen rtag tu sten pa dang /_/tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi la sgom pa dang /_/mngon shes rnam lngas rtag tu rtsen pa dang /_/ye shes rjes su rtag tu 'brang ba dang /_/sgrub dang ldan pa gtong bar 
[\[127a.7\]]mi byed dang /_/sgrub dang mi ldan gzhan yang mi gtong dang /_/gcig tu chad par rtag tu smra ba dang /_/bden la rtag tu gus dang bcas pa dang /_/byang chub sems ni sngon du btang nas su/_/rgyal bas bsngags pa'i chos ni sgom par byed/_/bde gshegs gsungs 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]pa'i sum cu rtsa gnyis chos/_/'di dag bde gshegs sras kyis bsten par bya/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang yin de dag ni/_/chos 'di ldan zhes bde bar gshegs pas gsungs/_/'od srung dpe nye bar 'god pa bstan pa gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rab 
[\[127b.2\]]tu shes par byed pa'i dpe nye bar dgod pa khyod la bstan par bya'o/_/'od srung 'di lta ste/_dper na sa chen po 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba ste/_'gyur ba med cing lan du phan 'dogs pa la re ba med do/_/'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po 
[\[127b.3\]]bskyed pa yang byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba yin te/_'gyur ba med cing lan du phan 'dogs par re ba med do/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_dper na sa 'di skye bo kun gyi 'tsho/_/lan la mi re 'gyur ba med pa bzhin/_/byang chub sems 
[\[127b.4\]]dpa' thog mar sems gnas pa/_/rgyal mchog bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas su/_/ma gyur bar du skye bo kun gyi 'tsho/_/lan la re ba med cing 'gyur ba med/_/bu dang dgra la yid kyis mtshungs par sems/_/byang chub mchog rab rtag par yongs su tshol/_/'od srung
