[\[208a.7\]]bslab par bya'o zhes gyis shig_/'jam dpal gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par rol ba'i bar de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las bstan to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni bstan du med pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]ni mi ston pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma 'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa tsam yang 'dzin pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa nas 
[\[208b.2\]]yang dag par ston pa'i bar du byed pa de dag kyang phyir mi ldog par nga 'chad na/_gang dag de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa lta ci smos te/_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byang chub tu nges par rig par bya'o/_/gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ma skyes pa dang /_
[\[208b.3\]]dngos po med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa'i bar 'di thos nas mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi yul la gnas pa'o/_/gong du yang mos par byed na de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la nges par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal ngas sangs rgyas kyis gnang 
[\[208b.4\]]ba/_de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par mkhyen pa/_dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mnos pa'i rgya 'di bzhag par bya ste/_rgya 'di ni mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa rnams la gzhag go_/'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi bar du yang chags pa med pa 
[\[208b.5\]]yongs su ston pa'o/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo rgya 'dis btab pa ni/_ngan song du 'gro ba'i skal ba can ma yin no/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'gro ba 'am/_
[\[208b.6\]]'jug pa'i skal ba can ma yin no/_/de nas de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang /_lha'i gser gyi phye ma dang /_lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po dang /_
[\[208b.7\]]lha'i spos dang /_lha'i ud pa la dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_lha'i rol mo'i sgra dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yang mchod cing /_bcom ldan 'das dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la yang 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]gtor mngon par gtor nas 'di skad ces dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis gang dag phyag rgya 'dis btab pa de dag gis bla na med pa'i chos rin po che 'di mchod pa dang /_phyi phyir zhing thos par gyur cig ces smras so/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 
[\[209a.2\]]kyang tshig 'di skad ces smras te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang ma byung ba dang /_ma skyes pa'i bar gyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir spyod par 'gyur ba dang /_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de 'dra ba de dag gi rna lam 
[\[209a.3\]]du grag par 'gyur ba nas de dag nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bsgrub par 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i bar gyi slad du brtson par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gi rna lam du tshegs chung 
[\[209a.4\]]ngus grag la thos nas kyang mos pa dang /_mos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_'chang ba'i bar du bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis bdag cag gi 'di ni lhas bsgrub pa'o zhes the tshom ma mchis par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/_/de skad ces gsol 
[\[209a.5\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kau'u shi ka de de bzhin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'grub par blta'o/_/de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang nges par 
[\[209a.6\]]shes par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa byin gyis brlab tu 
[\[209a.7\]]gsol/_tshig 'di smras ma thag tu de'i tshe skad cig de nyid la sangs rgyas kyi mthus sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to/_/sa chen po g.yos ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe shes 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa byin gyis rlob pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[209b.2\]]'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di byin gyis brlabs pa'i snga ltas lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de de bzhin no/_/'jam dpal 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 
[\[209b.3\]]'di byin gyis brlabs pa'i snga ltas rnams te/_ltas 'di dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di byin gyis brlabs par shes par bya'o/_/'jam dpal gang dag chos gang yang mi spong zhing mi zlog la bsngags par mi byed pa de dang de dag ni phyag rgya 'dis btab par shes par bya'o/_/
[\[209b.4\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal dmigs pa yod na spong bar byed pa dang bsngags par byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal de lta bas na gang dag rgya 'dis btab pa de dag gi ched du ngas rgya 'di bzhag ste/_'di ltar de dag gis thos nas kyang chos gang la yang ston pa 'am 
[\[209b.5\]]rnam par rtog pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal chos thams cad don dam par ma skyes pa'i phyir ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang nyan thos chen po 
[\[209b.6\]]de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong 
[\[209b.7\]]phrag brgya pa las/_'jam dpal gyis zhus pa'i le'u shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdun brgya pa zhes bya ste le'u bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//_
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]{D91}]'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa ste 'phags pa gtsug na rin po ches zhus pa/_bam po dang po/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+yarat+na tsU Da pa ri pr-i ts+tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_
[\[210a.2\]]'phags pa gtsug na rin po ches zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya 
[\[210a.3\]]rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong bzhi khri nyis stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/_sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_shes rab shin 
[\[210a.4\]]tu rnam par grol ba/_cang shes pa/_glang po chen po/_bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_khur bor ba/_bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_sems can thams cad 
[\[210a.5\]]kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag go_/byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang yang thabs cig ste/_thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/_dbang bskur ba thob pa/_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[210a.6\]]las byung ba/_pad ma bla ma'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/_rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gnas pa/_rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rol pa/_rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu rtogs pa/_yon tan 'byung gnas bkod pa'i 
[\[210a.7\]]ting nge 'dzin shin tu gtan la phebs pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon du gyur pa/_byang chub kyi snying por rab tu gzhol ba/_bdud kyi yul thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/_sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi gnas la rab tu gnas pa/_mi zad pa bstan pa'i gzungs 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]rab tu thob pa/_sems can thams cad kyi dbang po tshim par byed pa'i spobs pa rab tu thob pa/_mi 'jigs pa seng ge'i stabs kyis 'khor thams cad gnon pa la mkhas pa/_tshig bstan pa la phyad pas don yod par bskal pa'i bar du lung ston pa/_gzugs kyi 
[\[210b.2\]]mtshan bzang pos legs par brgyan pa/_'dus pa ngan pa'i tshogs pha rol rgol ba yang dag par rab tu 'joms pa/_grags pa dang brjod pa'i sgra mthon po phyogs bcur grags pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags te rab tu bkur ba/_sbyin pa dang /_tshul 
[\[210b.3\]]khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab dang /_thabs dpag tu med pa las byung ba/_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par shin tu sbyang ba byas pa/_sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad yongs su shes nas 
[\[210b.4\]]so so ci rigs par chos kyi sman gtong ba/_rkyen las byung ba'i chos zab cing gting dpag dka' ba la 'jug cing mtha' dang mtha' ma yin pa dang /_rtag pa dang chad par lta ba yongs su spangs pa/_dge ba dag cing dri ma med pa'i bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu 
[\[210b.5\]]yongs su dag pa/_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_bsdu ba dang /_kun rig pa dang /_rnam par rig pa'i tshul la mkhas pa/_rang gi sems la dbang sgyur ba/_sems dpa' zhing brtan la rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa/_dad pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_dran pa 
[\[210b.6\]]dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab kyi stobs dang ldan pa/_stobs bcu dang /_gzungs dang /_smon lam la yang dag par rab tu zhugs pa/_yon tan dang /_ye shes dpag tu med pa'i blo nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa rnams la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[210b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba dang /_rtag tu rnam par lta ba dang /_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_mthu chen thob dang /_seng ge dang /_seng ge'i blo gros dang /_seng ge'i stabs su 'gro dang /_seng ge'i sgra mngon par bsgrags dang /_
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]mchog gi blo gros dang /_rdo rje'i blo gros dang /_rdo rjes rnam par gnon dang /_rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan dang /_rdo rje'i sde dang /_mi g.yo ba'i gom pas rnam par gnon dang /_'jig rten gsum gom pas rnam par gnon dang /_mig [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_pad ma'i mig 
[\[211a.2\]]dang /_pad ma bkod pa dang /_rin po che bkod pa dang /_spobs pa chen po dang /_mthu bo che dang /_rin chen khar ba dang /_rin chen 'byung gnas dang /_lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang /_yon tan gyi rgyal po snang dang /_bkod pa'i rgyal po snang dang /_bkod pa'i 
[\[211a.3\]]rgyal po dang /_yid gnyis rnam par 'joms dang /_glog gi snang bas brgyan dang /_nam mkha' mdzod dang /_dbyangs snyan dang /_sprin dbyangs dang /_rnga sgra dang /_dbyangs rnam par dag dang /_rnam par dag pa'i blo gros dang /_bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu 
[\[211a.4\]]drug dang /_'jam dpal la sogs pa sems dpa' dpe med pa drug cu dang /_spos kyi glang po che la sogs pa dag pa'i sems can sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_byams pa la sogs pa thams cad kyang bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag 
[\[211a.5\]]go_/lha'i bu bdud las rgyal dang /_lha'i bu dge ba bkod dang /_lha'i bu mtshams rab dang /_bzang po'i rgyal po dang /_rgyal ba dang /_rgyal ba'i blo gros dang /_rab tu zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang phyug dang /_lha'i bu legs par sems pa dang /_de dag la sogs pa thams cad 
[\[211a.6\]]kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag nyi shu dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_lha'i bu ded dpon dang /_lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang /_de dag dang /_gzhan yang lha 
[\[211a.7\]]dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa du ma dang yang thabs cig go_/de nas bcom ldan 'das bkod pa chen po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te 'khor brgya stong du 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te/_seng ge ltar ni sgrogs/_nyi ma ltar ni lhan ne/_zla ba ltar ni lham me/_sgron ma ltar ni 'bar/_brgya byin ltar ni lhang nge /_tshangs pa ltar ni lhag ge_/rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus nas ri rab ltar ni 'phags te/_'khor 
[\[211b.2\]]chen po'i dbus su gshegs nas chos ston pa ni tshangs par spyod pa/_thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba/_don bzang po/_tshig 'bru bzang po/_ma 'dres pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[211b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo las brtsams nas/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa la spyod par 'gyur ba yang dag par rab 
[\[211b.4\]]tu ston to/_/yang de'i tshe shar phyogs logs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams legs par sprul pa zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su dag par rab 
[\[211b.5\]]tu gnas pa zhes bya ba da lta na bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa de'i gan nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong dang lhan cig tu lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_
[\[211b.6\]]lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_'jig rten gyi khams legs par sprul pa de nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 
[\[211b.7\]]'dir gnas par gyur to/_/de tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'dug nas rin po che'i gdugs gcig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khebs par byas te/_me tog kha dog du ma/_kha dog sna tshogs dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]gyi khams khebs par byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten de nyid du 'dug ste de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/gang gis sdug bsngal mtha' yas bzod byas shing /_/brtul zhugs brtan pas byang chub rab bsgrubs pa/_/drang srong chen po shAg thub sus 
[\[212a.2\]]mthong ba/_/lha mi rnams kyis rnyed pa rab tu rnyed/_/gang gA'i bye snyed byang chub sems dpa' mang /_/brtson 'grus dag gi stobs kyis phyir bor te/_/stong phrag bye ba'i bdud rnams rab btul nas/_/byang chub rdul bral mya ngan med pa thob/_/'gro ba kun gyi gtso bo bsnyen 
[\[212a.3\]]bkur bar/_/shar phyogs logs kyi mchog gi 'jig rten khams/_/legs par sprul nas spyod pa yongs dag pa'i/_/rgyal ba'i thad nas bdag ni 'dir mchis so/_/su dag chos kyi gtam rnams nyan pa dang /_/phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' blta ba dang /_/rkang 
[\[212a.4\]]gnyis gtso bo de yang blta 'dod pa/_/de dag bya rgod phung por myur du sheg_/'dren pa mthong ba shin tu rnyed par dka'/_/zhi ba'i chos kyang thos par shin tu dka'/_/dal 'byor mir skye shin tu rnyed par dka'/_/tshul khrims dad pa'ang rtag tu rnyed par dka'/_/'jig rten rnam 
[\[212a.5\]]par 'dren pa bzhugs bzhin du/_/bde 'dod gang zhig bsod nams mi byed na/_/mya ngan 'das nas des ni ci bya yis/_/de ni rgyal ba'i drung der 'dong bar bya/_/gang dag ngan 'gro thams cad spangs nas ni/_lha mi'i nang du bde ba 'thob pa dang /_/mya ngan 'das 'thob bde bar 
[\[212a.6\]]'gyur 'dod pa/_mtshungs med de yi gan du de dag dong /_/de ni sman pa'i rgyal po bdud rtsi sbyin/_/de ni ded dpon mchog gi lam mtshon pa/_/de ni chos rgyal rin chen dam pa 'chang /_/de ni sems can kun gyi rten dang dpung /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[212a.7\]]po gtsug na rin po ches tshigs su bcad pa mngon par sgrub pa 'di dag smras pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang dbyangs kyis go bar gyur/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos te/_thos nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i don dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gang nas byung /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ri'i bu shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu gnyis 
[\[212b.2\]]'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams legs par sprul pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su dag par rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa de'i gan nas/_
[\[212b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong dang bcas te nga la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag kyang blta ba'i 
[\[212b.4\]]phyir lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa brgya stong mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas rnga ni rab tu rdung /_me tog gi char ni rab tu 'bebs/_'od 
[\[212b.5\]]zer ni 'byin/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni g.yo bar byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams legs par sprul pa de nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi 
[\[212b.6\]]mjed 'dir phyin te/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che des sems can bag med pa rnams yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'dug nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/shA ri'i bu tshigs su bcad 
[\[212b.7\]]pa 'di dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams go bar byas nas sems can dpag tu med pa yang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong po de dag dang lhan cig 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]tu lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas rnga ni rab tu rdung /_me tog gi char ni rab 
[\[213a.2\]]tu 'bebs/_'od zer ni 'byin/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni g.yo bar byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 
[\[213a.3\]]la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang 
[\[213a.4\]]mi ma yin pa brgya stong mang po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na rin po ches 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[213a.5\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su dag par rab tu gnas pa/_bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_'tsho 'am/_stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol lo/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[213a.6\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa nyan pa'i slad du 'dir mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang la gnas na shin tu mthar phyin pa dang /_shin tu grub pa dang /_bde bar 'gyur ba dang /_shin tu yongs 
[\[213a.7\]]su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /_de dag la bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kun tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_rang gi spyod pa yongs su dag pas sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rab tu 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang /_spyod 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]pa'i mtshan nyid rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang /_ye shes kyi spyod pas 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi spyod pa rnam par spyod par 'gyur ba dang /_chos kyi spyod pas sems can mi 'thun par spyod pa la gnas pa rnams yang dag pa'i chos 
[\[213b.2\]]kyi nan tan la mos par bgyid par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la kha na ma tho ba ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang /_de dag la bdud thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /_de dag phyogs 
[\[213b.3\]]bcu'i 'jig rten na da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad lta ba la sgrib pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang /_de dag gi spyod pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod pas rig par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa de de bzhin 
[\[213b.4\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis legs par bstan du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu de'i 
[\[213b.5\]]phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i dpe tsam cung zad cig bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na rin po che bcom 
[\[213b.6\]]ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa ni 'di bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa 
[\[213b.7\]]yongs su dag pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang /_mngon par shes pa sgrub pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa ste/_rigs kyi bu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/de la pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa ni kun tu bsngo ba'i ye shes la mkhas par khong du chud par bya'o/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa ni lam smra ba'i ye shes la mkhas par khong du chud 
[\[214a.2\]]par bya'o/_/mngon par shes pa sgrub pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa ni bsam gtan la sems las su rung ba'i ye shes la mkhas par khong du chud par bya'o/_/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa ni snying rje chen pos lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa'i 
[\[214a.3\]]ye shes la mkhas par khong du chud par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/_'di lte ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/drug po de dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sbyin pa 
[\[214a.4\]]dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams so/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ser sna'i dri mas 
[\[214a.5\]]kun tu dkris pa'i sems sel ba dang /_gtong ba'i rjes su 'jug pa'i sems 'phel bar byed pa dang /_de ser sna'i dri ma bsal te gtong ba'i sems la gnas nas bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i sems la gnas so/_/de sbyin pa sbyin pa na tha dad pa bzhi mi 
[\[214a.6\]]byed de/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can tha dad du mi byed pa dang /_chos tha dad pa dang /_yongs su bsngo ba tha dad pa dang /_bsam pa tha dad du mi byed do/_/de la ji ltar na sems can tha dad du mi byed ce na/_'di la ni sbyin/_'di la ni mi sbyin/_'di la ni mang 
[\[214a.7\]]du sbyin/_'di la ni nyung ngu sbyin/_'di la ni bzang po sbyin/_'di la ni ngan pa sbyin/_'di la ni rtag tu sbyin/_'di la ni rtag tu mi sbyin/_'di la ni bsti stang du byas te sbyin/_'di la ni bsti stang du byas te mi sbyin/_'di la ni thams cad sbyin/_'di la ni thams cad mi sbyin/_
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_'di ni tshul khrims dang mi ldan pa/_'di ni sbyin pa'i gnas/_'di ni sbyin pa'i gnas ma yin/_'di la sbyin na sbyin pa rnam par dag par 'gyur/_'di la ni rnam par dag par mi 'gyur/_'di ni yang dag par zhugs pa/_'di ni log par 
[\[214b.2\]]zhugs pa'o zhes bya ba ste/_rigs kyi bu de ltar gang 'di lta bu'i sems 'phro ba spong zhing mnyam pa nyid dang /_tha dad pa ma yin pa dang /_mi mtho mi dma' ba dang /_sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa dang yang dag par sbyor ba dang /_mtshungs par sbyin pa dang /_mtshungs 
[\[214b.3\]]par byams pa dang /_mtshungs par snying rje ba dang /_bye brag med pa dang /_nam mkha' dang mtshungs par gyur pa de ni sems can tha dad pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na chos tha dad du mi byed ce na/_gang chos smra bar 'gyur ba de dag la ni sbyin/_gang chos mi yin par smra 
[\[214b.4\]]bar 'gyur ba de dag la ni mi sbyin no snyam du de ltar sems mi skyed de/_de chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid thob nas sbyin pa sbyin te/_so so'i skye bo rnams ni dman pa'o snyam du sbyin pa mi sbyin/_'phags pa rnams ni rgya chen po'o zhes sbyin pa mi sbyin gyi/_chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin gyis 
[\[214b.5\]]mnyam ste bye brag med pas sbyin pa sbyin pa 'di ni chos tha dad pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na yongs su bsngo ba tha dad du mi byed ce na/_gang sbyin pa sbyin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de brgya byin thob par mi sngo/_tshangs pa thob par ma yin/_rgyal po'i srid dang /_tshong dpon dang /_
[\[214b.6\]]khyim bdag dang /_gzugs dang /_longs spyod dang /_dbang phyug dang /_g.yog 'dod par ma yin/_srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad du 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba'i skye gnas rnams su dge ba'i rtsa ba de yongs su mi sngo/_nyan thos kyi theg par ma yin/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par ma 
[\[214b.7\]]yin te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las gzhan du mi sngo ba 'di ni bsngo ba tha dad pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na sbyin pa sbyin pa na bsam pa tha dad du mi byed ce na/_bsam pa mnyam pa/_sbyor ba mnyam pa/_rnam par smin pa 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]la mi re ba/_pha rol la byas pa'i lan re ba med pa/_g.yo med pa dang /_sgyu med pas sems thag pa nas shin tu yongs su btang ba'i blo sems 'gyod pa med pa gnas gsum du dad pa thob ste sbyin no snyam pa dang /_sbyin par byed pa dang /_byin nas dad pa rab tu 
[\[215a.2\]]thob pa 'di ni bsam pa tha dad pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin pa na tha dad pa 'di bzhi mi byed de/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yongs su dag pa'i rkang pa dang po'o/_/de lta ba brgyad yongs su 
[\[215a.3\]]dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/_brgyad po dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag tu lta ba yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin pa dang /_de bzhin du sems can du lta ba dang /_srog tu lta ba dang /_gang zag tu lta ba dang /_chad par lta ba dang /_rtag par lta ba dang /_'byung bar lta ba dang /_
[\[215a.4\]]'jig par lta ba yongs su dag pa ste/_lta ba brgyad po de dag yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/_/de bag la nyal bzhi yongs su spangs nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/_bzhi gang zhe na/_so so'i skye bo'i chos kyi bag la nyal dang /_nyan thos kyi chos kyi bag la nyal dang /_rang 
[\[215a.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bag la nyal dang /_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i bag la nyal te/_bag la nyal bzhi po de dag yongs su spangs nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/_/de 'du shes bzhi yongs su spangs nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/_bzhi gang zhe na/_rtag par 'du shes pa 
[\[215a.6\]]dang /_bde bar 'du shes pa dang /_gtsang bar 'du shes pa dang /_bdag tu 'du shes pa ste/_'du shes bzhi po de dag yongs su spangs nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/_de rnam pa bzhi yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/_bzhi gang zhe na/_lus yongs su dag pa dang /_
[\[215a.7\]]ngag yongs su dag pa dang /_sems yongs su dag pa dang /_bsam pa yongs su dag pa ste/_rnam pa bzhi po de dag yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/_/de chags pa gsum las shin tu 'das nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/_gsum gang zhe na/_rnam par smin 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]pa la chags pa dang /_'gyod pa la chags pa dang /_theg pa dman par bsngo ba la chags pa ste/_gsum po de dag las shin tu 'das nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/_/de 'jigs pa gsum las shin tu 'das nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/_gsum gang zhe na/_lhag pa'i nga rgyal gyi 'jigs 
[\[215b.2\]]pa dang /_rlom sems kyi 'jigs pa dang /_bdud kyi las kyi 'jigs pa ste/_gsum po de dag las shin tu 'das nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/_/de rgya bzhis btab nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/_bzhi gang zhe na/_nang stong pa nyid kyi rgyas btab pa dang /_phyi stong pa nyid kyi rgyas 
[\[215b.3\]]btab pa dang /_sems can stong pa nyid kyi rgyas btab pa dang /_byang chub stong pa nyid kyi rgyas btab pa ste/_rgya bzhi po de dag gis btab nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/_/de brtson 'grus rtsom pa bzhi dang mi 'bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sems can thams cad tshim par 
[\[215b.4\]]byed pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su sgrub pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa ste/_brtson 
[\[215b.5\]]'grus rtsom pa bzhi po de dag dang ma bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/_/de dran pa bzhi dang mi 'bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/_bzhi gang zhe na/_byang chub kyi sems dran pa dang /_sangs rgyas mthong ba dran pa dang /_byams pa chen po dran pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi 
[\[215b.6\]]nyon mongs pa spong ba dran pa ste/_dran pa bzhi po de dag dang ma bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/_/de 'khor gsum yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/_gsum gang zhe na/_bdag gi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can gyi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang /_byang chub 
[\[215b.7\]]kyi 'khor yongs su dag pa ste/_'khor gsum po de dag yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/_/de shes pa yongs su dag pa bzhi yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sbyin pa shes pa yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can gyi bsam pa 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]tshim par byed pa shes pa yongs su dag pa dang /_sgyu ma'i chos su so sor rtog pa shes pa yongs su dag pa dang /_bsngo ba la so sor rtog pa shes pa yongs su dag pa ste/_shes pa yongs su dag pa bzhi po de dag gis yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/_/
[\[216a.2\]]rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i chos la zhugs pa de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[216a.3\]]de la byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa ni rnam pa gcig ste/_rnam pa gcig gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub kyi 
[\[216a.4\]]sems mnyam pa med pa'i sems/_thun mong ma yin pa'i sems/_'jig rten gsum po thams cad las mchog tu bye brag tu 'phags pa'i sems/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i sems/_bdud thams cad 'dul ba'i sems/_las 
[\[216a.5\]]dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad yongs su zad par byed pa'i sems/_sems can thams cad sgrol ba'i sems/_yon tan rin po che dpag tu med pa thams cad kyi sems de nyid mi 'dor zhing srung ba dang /_sbed pa dang /_mi brjed pa ste/_rigs kyi bu 'di 
[\[216a.6\]]ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa gcig go_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa gnyis te/_rnam pa gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[216a.7\]]sems can thams cad la 'od zer thogs pa med pa dang /_sems can de dag kyang byang chub kyi bsam pa'i tshul khrims la 'dzud pa ste/_'di ni rnam pa gnyis so/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]gsum ste/_rnam pa gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lus kyi gnod pa thams cad bsal bas lus yongs su dag pa dang /_kha gsag dang /_gzhogs slong dang /_ngag gi skyon thams cad bsal bas/_ngag yongs su dag pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_gnod sems dang /_rnam 
[\[216b.2\]]par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa bsal bas sems yongs su dag pa ste 'di ni rnam pa gsum mo/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa bzhi ste/_rnam pa bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bslab pa yang dag par 'dzin 
[\[216b.3\]]pa dang /_bslab pa yang dag par bzung ba ma nyams pa dang /_sems can tshul khrims 'chal pa yongs su smin par byed pa dang /_tshul khrims dang ldan pa la ston pa bzhin du gus par byed pa ste/_'di ni rnam pa bzhi'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims 
[\[216b.4\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa lnga ste/_rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag la mi stod pa dang /_gzhan la mi smod pa dang /_ma bslabs pa la mi brnyas pa dang /_nyan thos kyi sems la mi re ba dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa mi 'dod pa ste/_
[\[216b.5\]]'di ni rnam pa lnga'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa drug ste/_rnam pa drug gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bslab pa las mi 'da' bas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /_tshul khrims la 'gyod pa med pas 
[\[216b.6\]]chos rjes su dran pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa la lta bas dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su spong bas gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /_skye ba thams cad la mi gnas pas tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /_dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su 
[\[216b.7\]]rdzogs par byed pas lha rjes su dran pa ste/_'di ni rnam pa drug go_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa bdun te/_rnam pa bdun gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mngon par dad pa dang /_
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]bdag nyid dpang du byas te ngo tsha shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du byas te khrel yod pa dang /_nga rgyal med pas gus pa dang /_bdag dang gzhan la gdung ba med pas nges pa dang /_'jig rten pha rol du kha na ma tho ba la 'jigs par lta bas rnam par 'tshe ba 
[\[217a.2\]]med pa dang /_sems kyi yongs su gdung ba nye bar zhi bas 'khon du mi 'dzin pa ste/_'di ni rnam pa bdun no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa brgyad de/_rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_zang zing med 
[\[217a.3\]]pa'i sems kyis tshul mi 'chos pa dang /_yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad 'dor bas kha gsag med pa dang /_rang bzhin gyis chog shes pas thob kyis 'jal ba mi byed pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pas 'phags pa'i rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa yongs 
[\[217a.4\]]su rdzogs pa dang /_dgon pa la gnas pa rjes su mi gtong bas lus la mi lta ba dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pas srog la mi lta ba dang /_'du 'dzi spong bas gcig pu na dga' ba dang /_khams gsum thams cad kyis 'jigs pas chos kyi dga' ba la mos pa ste 
[\[217a.5\]]'di ni rnam pa brgyad do/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa dgu ste/_rnam pa dgu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po dgu po rnams 'dul ba dang /_sems can gyi gnas dgu po rnams 
[\[217a.6\]]las shin tu 'da' ba dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po rnams kyi rtsa ba yongs su sbyong ba dang /_yongs su gdung ba med pas sems zhi ba dang /_sems las su rung bas zhi gnas kyi tshogs kun tu tshol ba dang /_cho ga dang tshul khrims dang lta ba 
[\[217a.7\]]nyams pa las shin tu 'das pas mi lhod pa dang /_theg pa chen po yongs su rdzogs pas sems can thams cad la mi slu ba dang /_tshul khrims la skyon med pas shin tu mthar thug pa dang /_yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pas sems phyad pa ste/_'di ni rnam pa dgu'o/_/
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa bcu ste/_rnam pa bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lus kyi las rnam gsum yongs su dag pa dang /_ngag gi las rnam bzhi yongs su dag pa dang /_yid kyi las rnam gsum yongs su dag 
[\[217b.2\]]pa dang /_g.yo sgyu dang bral te drang zhing tshul 'chos pa med pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa dang /_bslab pa thams cad dang mi 'gal ba dang /_phan par sbyor ba'i dngos po'i sngon du 'gro bas rjes su ston pa dang /_dul zhing cang shes kyi sa'i phyir sems dmu rgod ma yin pa dang /_bdag 
[\[217b.3\]]nyid byed pas sems can thams cad kyi slob mar gyur pa dang /_nga rgyal med pas sbyin pa'i gnas rnams la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal ba dang /_srog gi dbang por chos mdun du byed kyi 'jig rten gyi zang zing mdun du mi byed pa ste/_'di ni rnam pa bcu'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 
[\[217b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa gnyis te/_rnam pa gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mtshan ma dang bcas shing 'bad pa dang bcas pa'i tshul khrims ni srog gi phyir yang mi 'bral ba dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang 
[\[217b.5\]]lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul khrims ni chos thams cad la sgro mi 'dogs par slob pa ste/_'di ni rnam pa gnyis so/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gnyis te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nang rnam 
[\[217b.6\]]par dag pas skye mched rnam par dag pa dang /_phyi rnam par dag pas yul thams cad spangs pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gnyis te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub kyi ngo bo 
[\[217b.7\]]nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang /_mngon par 'du mi byed pas tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid de/_gnyis po de dag go_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/rigs 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni dag yongs su dag pas 'di ltar gshe yang slar mi gshe'o/_/lus yongs su dag pas brdegs kyang slar mi rdeg 
[\[218a.2\]]go_/sems yongs su dag pas khros kyang slar mi khro'o/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pas 'tshig par byas kyang slar mi 'tshig go_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can la lta ba'i phyir gzhan gyis ngan du smras sam/_ngan du brjod pa'i tshig gi 
[\[218a.3\]]lam thos kyang mi gshe'o/_/'jig rten pha rol la lta ba'i phyir lag pa dang /_bong ba dang dbyug pas brdegs kyang khong khro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kun tu srung ba'i phyir yan lag dang nying lag bcad kyang khong khro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems 
[\[218a.4\]]dpa' ni bsdu ba'i dngos po yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir slong ba la mi gshe'o/_/byang chub kyi lam gyis nye bar brtan pa'i phyir de dag la byams pa nye bar sgrub bo/_/smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir de dag la snying rje skyed do/_/bdud kyi las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad spang 
[\[218a.5\]]ba'i phyir gang slong yang de la phan par sems shing snying rje dang ldan te byang chub kyi yan lag tu nges par sbyin par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing bzod do/_/stobs bcu 
[\[218a.6\]]yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir byang chub rjes su dran zhing bzod do/_/dus gsum la chags pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ye shes rjes su dran zhing bzod do/_/byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir phan par 'dod pa rjes su dran 
[\[218a.7\]]zhing bzod do/_/snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'bras bu yod pa rnam par gnon pa rjes su dran zhing bzod do/_/mi 'jigs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir seng ge bsgyings pa rjes su dran zhing bzod do/_/sems can thams cad la 'dud pa'i phyir spyi 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]gtsug bltar mi snang ba rjes su dran zhing bzod do/_/'jig rten thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa'i phyir mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rjes su dran zhing bzod do/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes myang ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par rjes su dran 
[\[218b.2\]]zhing bzod do/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa ni stobs gnyis kyis yongs su dag par 'gyur te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_so sor rtog pa'i stobs dang sgom pa'i stobs so/_/de la gang lus dang sems la gnas te bzod pa ni so sor rtog pa'i stobs so/_/
[\[218b.3\]]gang chos thams cad la gnas te bzod pa ni sgom pa'i stobs so/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa ni gang sems can thams cad la bdag med par bzod cing chos thams cad la dben par bzod de/_gang chos 
[\[218b.4\]]thams cad la mi bzod pa de ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di la don dam par gang bzod pa 'am/_mi bzod pa'i chos gang yang med do/_/gang chos thams cad khas mi len pa de'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste/_chos khas len pa la ni bzod pa yongs su 
[\[218b.5\]]dag pa gang yang med do/_/gang chos thams cad la zhum pa med pa de'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste/_zhum pa la ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa gang yang med do/_/gang chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa de'i bzod pa yongs sa dag pa ste/_'dzin pa la ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa gang yang med 
[\[218b.6\]]do/_/gang la bdag med pa dang /_sems can med pa dang /_chos med pa de'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste/_bdag dang sems can dang /_chos la gnas pa la ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa gang yang med do/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol 
[\[218b.7\]]tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gnyis te/_gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_lus rnam par 'phrul pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang /_chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste/_gnyis po de dag go_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/_gang byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba/_dgos pa dang dgos pa ma yin pa la zhum pa med pa/_
[\[219a.2\]]rtsom pas mi ngal ba/_dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs pa la mi zhan pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag las phyir mi ldog pa/_chos thams cad yongs su tshol ba la brtson pa/_chos thams cad ston par rtsom pa/_chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa la spro ba/_mchod sbyin chen po las 
[\[219a.3\]]sgrol ba/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa la yongs su mi skyo ba/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par spyod pa/_theg pa dman pa las shin tu 'da' ba/_sngon dam bcas pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/_sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_thos pa'i tshogs 
[\[219a.4\]]sogs pa/_sngon gyi bsod nams bsags pa chud mi gzon pa/_nga rgyal med pas sems can thams cad la rim gro bya'o cog byed pa ste/_'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/de'i yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/_gang lus la mig yor dang gzugs brnyan du 
[\[219a.5\]]shes pa/_tshig la brjod du med par shes pa/_sems la shin tu nye bar zhi bar shes pa/_zad pa shes pa rnam par rig pa/_zad pa shes pa rab tu shes pa/_mi skye ba shes pa nges par rtogs pa'o/_/de rtsom pa gsum las rnam par grol bar brtson 'grus rtsom ste/_
[\[219a.6\]]gsum gang zhe na/_gnas pa'i rtsom pa dang /_dmigs pa'i rtsom pa dang /_yongs su rtog pa'i rtsom pa ste/_gsum po de dag go_/de chags pa gsum la mi chags par brtson 'grus rtsom ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_mig dang gzugs dang mig gi rnam par shes pa 
[\[219a.7\]]la mi chags pa/_rna ba dang /_sgra dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa/_sna dang /_dri dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa/_lce dang /_ro dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa/_lus dang /_reg bya dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa la mi chags 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]pa/_yid dang /_chos dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa'o/_/de 'dzin pa med cing 'dor ba med pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pas sbyin pa mi len/_ser sna mi 'dor/_tshul khrims mi len/_'chal pa'i tshul khrims mi 'dor/_bzod pa mi len/_gnod sems 
[\[219b.2\]]mi 'dor/_brtson 'grus mi len/_le lo mi 'dor/_bsam gtan mi len/_g.yeng ba mi 'dor/_shes rab mi len/_'chal pa'i shes rab mi 'dor/_dge ba mi len/_mi dge ba mi 'dor/_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mi len/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 
[\[219b.3\]]mi 'dor ro/_/de len pa med cing 'dor ba med pas gnyis yongs su dag pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par 'gyur te/_de la gnyis gang zhe na/_gang nang gi kun tu ldang ba las dmigs pa kun tu ldang ba dang /_phyi rol du rnam par shes pa mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ba de ni gnyis 
[\[219b.4\]]zhes bya'o/_/de la gnyis yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/_gang nang nye bar zhi bas phyi rol du mi rgyu ba dang /_spros pa med pa ste/_'di ni gnyis yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o/_/gang rgyu ba med cing ma spros pa/_spros pa med pa'i brtson 'grus 'di lta bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[219b.5\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/_gang bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams yang dag par sgrub cing yang dag par bsgrubs nas so sor 
[\[219b.6\]]rtog pa dang /_so sor brtags nas kyang snyoms par 'jug pa yin te/_de bsam gtan byed kyang gzugs la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/_de bsam gtan byed kyang tshor ba la ma yin/_'du shes la ma yin/_'du byed rnams la ma yin/_rnam par shes pa la gnas 
[\[219b.7\]]te bsam gtan mi byed do/_/de bsam gtan byed kyang mig la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/_de bsam gtan byed kyang rna ba la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/_sna la ma yin/_lce la ma yin/_lus la ma yin/_yid la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do/_/de bsam 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]gtan byed kyang gzugs la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/_sgra la ma yin/_dri la ma yin/_ro la ma yin/_reg bya la ma yin/_chos la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do/_/de bsam gtan byed kyang lus su rnam par rtog pa la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/_de bsam 
[\[220a.2\]]gtan byed kyang sems su rnam par rtog pa la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/_de bsam gtan byed kyang sa la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/_de bzhin du chu la ma yin/_me la ma yin/_rlung la ma yin/_nam mkha' la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do/_/de bsam gtan byed kyang 
[\[220a.3\]]zla ba la ma yin/_nyi ma la ma yin/_brgya byin la ma yin/_tshangs pa la ma yin/_skye dgu'i bdag po la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do/_/'dod pa'i khams la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/_gzugs kyi khams la ma yin/_gzugs med pa'i khams la gnas 
[\[220a.4\]]te bsam gtan mi byed do/_/de bsam gtan byed kyang 'jig rten 'di la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/_'jig rten pha rol la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do/_/de bsam gtan byed kyang mi mtho mi dma' bar gnas te mi g.yo bar gyur cing bsam gtan byed do/_/de bsam gtan 
[\[220a.5\]]byed kyang bdag nye bar len pa'i lta ba la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do/_/de bsam gtan byed kyang sems can la ma yin/_srog la ma yin/_gso ba la ma yin/_gang zag la ma yin/_shed las skyes pa ma yin/_shed bu nye bar len pa'i lta ba la gnas te bsam gtan mi 
[\[220a.6\]]byed do/_/de bsam gtan byed kyang chad par lta ba khas blangs te bsam gtan mi byed do/_/de bsam gtan byed kyang rtag par lta ba ma yin/_'byung bar lta ba ma yin/_'jig par lta ba khas blangs te bsam gtan mi byed do/_/de bsam gtan byed kyang zag pa shin tu zad par bya 
[\[220a.7\]]ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do/_/de bsam gtan byed kyang skyon med pa la 'jug pa dang /_'bras bu thob pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do/_/de bsam gtan byed kyang shin tu mngon par 'du mi bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do/_/de stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]'dris par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed kyang stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do/_/de mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'dris par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed kyang mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do/_/de 
[\[220b.2\]]smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'dris par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed kyang smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do/_/de byams pa chen po'i go bgos snying rje chen po'i byin gyi rlabs la gnas te rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong 
[\[220b.3\]]pa nyid kyi rnam pas mngon par bsgrubs pa bsam gtan du byed do/_/de la rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_sbyin pa ma tshang ba med pa/_tshul khrims ma tshang ba med pa/_bzod pa ma tshang ba med pa/_brtson 'grus ma tshang ba med pa/_bsam gtan 
[\[220b.4\]]ma tshang ba med pa/_shes rab ma tshang ba med pa/_thabs ma tshang ba med pa/_byams pa ma tshang ba med pa/_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms ma tshang ba med pa/_bden pa shes pa la 'jug pa ma tshang ba med pa/_byang chub kyi sems sems can la lta ba ma tshang ba med pa/_
[\[220b.5\]]bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sbyor ba ma tshang ba med pa/_sbyin pa dang /_snyan par smra ba dang /_don byed pa dang /_don 'thun pa ma tshang ba med pa/_dran pa dang shes bzhin ma tshang ba med pa/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_
[\[220b.6\]]dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma tshang ba med pa/_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong ma tshang ba med pa/_sbyin pa dang /_dul ba dang /_yang dag par sdom pa dang /_nges pa ma tshang ba med pa/_ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel 
[\[220b.7\]]yod pa/_ma tshang ba med pa/_mi dge ba'i chos dang mi ldan pa/_dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi 'chad pas byin gyis brlabs pa/_chos kyi tshul 'bar bas yang dag par bsdus pa/_dge 'dun gyi tshul yongs su sdud pa dang ldan pa/_
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]sems can thams cad la lta bas byin gyis brlabs pa/_sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su bsgrubs pas legs par brgyan pa/_sangs rgyas kyi dbyings yongs su rdzogs par bsngos pa/_sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 
[\[221a.2\]]'phrul dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang ldan pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs kyis yang dag par bzung ba/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi la rab tu gnas pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang rjes su 'thun pa/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ma 'dres pa/_
[\[221a.3\]]bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa bsal ba/_mngon par shes pa'i ye shes dang ma bral ba/_sems can thams cad kyi ston par gyur pa ston pa bzhi thob pa/_'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid thob pa/_sems can thams cad yongs su 
[\[221a.4\]]smin par byed pas ma smad pa/_drang ba/_mkhas pa/_sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal sel ba/_nyon mongs pa thams cad sbyong ba/_chu bo las sgrol ba/_'dzin pa thams cad gcod pa/_rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi ba/_las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis nye bar zhi ba/_
[\[221a.5\]]chos nyid kyis btang snyoms pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la lta ba/_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis bems po byin gyis brlabs bya ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba med pa/_rang gi ngang gis lung du ma bstan pa/_sangs rgyas kyi bya ba la rtag tu brtson pa/_nye bar zhi bas bsil bar gyur pa/_
[\[221a.6\]]sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la rtag tu 'bar ba ste/_'di ni rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod 
[\[221a.7\]]pa de dag thams cad ri mo mkhan bzo tha dad par bslabs pa/_yan lag rnam par phye ba tha dad du bslabs par gyur te/_de la la la ni sa gcod pa la mkhas kyang 'dri ba la mi mkhas/_la la ni gtan la 'bebs pa la mkhas kyang yan lag dang nying lag la mi mkhas/_kha 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]cig ni rkang lag 'dri ba la mkhas kyang mig dang mgo dang rna ba 'dri ba la mi mkhas pa dag cig yin la/_rigs kyi bu de ltar rnam pa tha dad du bslabs pa/_yan lag rnam par dbye ba la tha dad du bslabs pa/_gzugs tha dad du bslabs pa'i ri mo mkhan de dag thams cad 
[\[221b.2\]]la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas ras shig byin te/_khyed rnams kyis ras 'di la nga'i gzugs bris te 'on cig khyed cag thams cad kyis kyang 'di la ri mo bris shig_/de nas ri mo mkhan de dag tshogs nas ras de brgyangs pa las ri mo mkhan de dag gi nang nas 
[\[221b.3\]]ri mo mkhan gcig cig yul gzhan zhig tu song bar gyur la/_de nas ri mo mkhan phyi ma de dag gis de la rgyal po de'i gzugs bris na/_rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_ri mo mkhan gcig po de'i lag tu ma blangs na ras de rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par 
[\[221b.4\]]'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na ji tsam du don rnam par rig par bya ba'i phyir 'di dper byas te/_'di'i don cir blta zhe na/_rigs kyi bu ji ltar ri mo mkhan gcig po de med na 
[\[221b.5\]]ras de rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du rigs kyi bu rnam pa ji snyed dang /_spyod pa ji snyed dang /_brtson pa ji snyed kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su grub par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa de dag las gal te rnam pa gcig ma bstan na yang rnam pa thams cad 
[\[221b.6\]]kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/nam sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rnam pa yang dag par bsdus shing lta ba dang /_nyon mongs pa'i kun nas ldang ba dang /_mtshan ma la dmigs pa'i spros pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 
[\[221b.7\]]pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid yin no/_/bstan pa 'di nges par bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong gis rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid la bzod pa rab tu thob bo/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni shes rab yongs su dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis dang ldan pa 
[\[222a.2\]]yin te/_rnam pa bcu gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sngon gyi mtha' la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa 
[\[222a.3\]]dang /_da ltar byung ba la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang /_'dus byas la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang /_'dus ma byas la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes 
[\[222a.4\]]mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang /_'jig rten gyi bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas thams cad la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye 
[\[222a.5\]]shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang /_bden pa shes pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags 
[\[222a.6\]]pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang /_kun rdzob bstan pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang /_don dam pa bstan pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug 
[\[222a.7\]]pa dang /_sems can gyi dbang po dang brtson 'grus rnam pa tha dad pa'i phyir rab dang /_'bring dang /_tha ma'i dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pas sems can thams cad la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa yin 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]te/_de'i shes rab de yang 'phags pa zag pa med pa/_'jig rten las 'das pa/_nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang 'thun pa/_sems can gyi bsam pa'i rjes su zhugs pa/_gting dpag dka' ste mthong bar dka' zhing zab la khong du chud par dka' ba bye brag phyed cing nges par 
[\[222b.2\]]rtogs pa/_lta ba dang bral ba/_bag chags bsal ba/_bdag stong pa nyid du rtogs pa/_thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rjes su zhugs pa/_chos stong pa nyid kyi tshul shes pa/_don la nges par rtogs pa/_shin tu lcigs pa/_shin tu sbyangs pa/_ci yang snang ba med pa/_
[\[222b.3\]]'gal ba med pa/_ma 'gags pa/_dus dang dus ma yin pa la rtog pa/_dus las mi 'da' ba/_skyon med pa/_legs par bsrungs pa/_skyon med pa la dga' ba/_bden pa khong du chud pa/_'gog pa'i bden pa rjes su rtogs pa/_shin tu rgal ba thams cad du kha na ma tho 
[\[222b.4\]]ba med pa/_gcig tu spyod pa med pa spyod pa/_legs par spyad pa spyod pa/_sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la spyod pa/_'jig rten thams cad las phyir log kyang gang nas kyang 'ongs pa med pa/_yul thams cad las shin tu 'das kyang sangs rgyas kyi yul las phyir 
[\[222b.5\]]ma log pa/_rtsom pa thams cad las shin tu 'das kyang sems can yongs su smin par byed pa las phyir ma log pa/_spyod pa thams cad las shin tu 'das kyang dge ba'i spyod pa las phyir ma log pa/_sems kyi dmigs pa thams cad las shin tu 'das kyang 
[\[222b.6\]]sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa las phyir ma log pa/_nye bar len pa la spyod kyang nye bar len pa med par 'bar ba/_'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos kyang 'jig rten dang ma bral ba/_lus med kyang sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa dang bsam pa'i 
[\[222b.7\]]rjes su zhugs pa'o/_/de'i shes rab de yang de'i ngang tshul la spyod pa myur du khong du chud pa/_dbang po smin par 'gyur ba/_yun ring por lta ba rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par dge ba'i chos la brtson pa/_byang chub kyi snying po la gzhol ba/_dge ba sbyin pa la spyod pa nye bar len pa 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]med par 'bar ba/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/_bdud thams cad 'dul ba/_sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mthong ba/_don thams cad rjes su rtogs pa/_chos thams cad ro mtshungs 
[\[223a.2\]]pa/_thabs thams cad kyis yang dag par bzung ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni srid pa'i pha rol tu song ba dang dpag tu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/mtshan ma thams cad dang /_dmigs pa thams cad dang /_sems 
[\[223a.3\]]can gyi sems kyi spyod pa thams cad kyi pha rol du song bas de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/de'i shes rab yongs su dag pa ni gnyis te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yongs su dag pa dang /_thogs pa med pa'i ye 
[\[223a.4\]]shes kyi mtshan nyid yongs su dag pa ste/_de dag ni yongs su dag pa gnyis so/_/gzhan yongs su dag pa gnyis te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_dmigs pa yongs su dag pa dang /_lta ba yongs su dag pa ste/_de dag ni yongs su dag pa gnyis so/_/de'i shes rab de yang 
[\[223a.5\]]thams cad kyi rjes su song ba/_sems can gyi rjes su song ba/_chos kyi rjes su song ba'o/_/de'i shes rab de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis phyir mtshams sbyor ba yang med la skye ba'i gnas thams cad kyi mtshams kyang sbyor ro/_/de'i shes rab de gnas pa yang med la 
[\[223a.6\]]yul thams cad dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul la yang gnas so/_/de'i shes rab de ni mtha' dang yang bral la dbus la yang mi gnas so/_/de'i shes rab de ni phyogs bcur rnam par lta bas sgrib pa med pa'i spyod yul la 'byung ba shin tu mthong ba'i phyir 
[\[223a.7\]]sgrib pa med pa yang rnyed pa'o/_/de'i shes rab de ni chos thams cad shes shing mngon par rtogs pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'o/_/de'i shes rab de ni chos kyi don thams cad dang ldan yang ldan pa yang ma yin/_mi ldan pa yang ma yin/_bral ba yang ma yin te sbyor ba'am/_mi sbyor ba'am/_
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]chos gang gis kyang brjod par bya ba ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi 'byung gnas ni ye shes kyi 'byung gnas yin no/_/bsod nams kyi 'byung gnas yin no/_/thos pa'i 'byung gnas yin no/_/yon tan gyi 'byung gnas yin no/_/chos kyi 'byung 
[\[223b.2\]]gnas yin no/_/gzungs dang spobs pa'i 'byung gnas yin no/_/so so yang dag par rig pa'i 'byung gnas yin no/_/yon tan dang ye shes rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i 'byung gnas yin te/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[223b.3\]]phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa 'di bstan pa na 'khor de'i nang nas lha dang mi srog chags nyi khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong ni 
[\[223b.4\]]mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to/_/dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/lha'i bu khri ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag nas de dag tshig 'di skad ces 'dzer te/_bcom ldan 
[\[223b.5\]]'das gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di thos par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba lags na/_gang dag thos nas mos pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_
[\[223b.6\]]ston pa dang /_de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal zhes smras so//_//bam po gnyis pa/_de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de la byang 
[\[223b.7\]]chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la gnas te/_lus la rnam pa gnyis su so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa'i dran pa nye bar 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]'jog go_/rnam pa gnyis su so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mi sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa dang /_sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa'o/_/de la mi sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa gang zhe na/_'di 
[\[224a.2\]]lta ste/_kye ma lus 'di ni mi gtsang ba ste/_btsog pas yongs su gang ba/_yun thung zhing byis pa 'drid pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni mi sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa'o/_/de la sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gang lus 
[\[224a.3\]]mi gtsang ba grogs med pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/_chos kyi sku/_bsod nams kyi sku/_ye shes kyi sku/_rdo rje'i sku/_mi shigs pa'i sku/_zag pa med pa'i sku/_'jig rten gsum las bye brag tu 'phags pa'i sku/_gzugs mthong na sems can thams cad tshim 
[\[224a.4\]]par 'gyur ba'i sku thob par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ste/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa gnyis su so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[224a.5\]]lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa ni chos gnyis yongs su sbyong ste/_gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang /_rtag pa'i rnam pa'o/_/de la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa gang zhe na/_kye ma lus 'di ni mi rtag pa'i rnam pa ste/_ring por mi 
[\[224a.6\]]gnas pa/_tha mar 'chi ba yin par shes nas lus kyi phyir mi 'thun pa'i 'tsho ba mi spyod cing snying po nyid len to/_/de snying po gsum len te/_gsum gang zhe na/_lus kyi snying po dang /_longs spyod kyi snying po dang /_'tsho ba'i snying po dang gsum mo/_/de lus mi rtag go snyam 
[\[224a.7\]]nas sems can thams cad kyi bran dang slob mar khas blangs te ci bya'o cog la 'bad pa yin/_lus mi rtag go snyam nas lus kyi nyes pa yon po dang /_g.yo dang tshul 'chos pa thams cad mi byed do/_/lus mi rtag go snyam nas srog la bag mi rton par 'gyur te/_srog gi phyir yang 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]sdig pa mi byed do/_/lus mi rtag go snyam nas longs spyod la sred cing chags par mi byed de/_bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi rtag pa'i rnam pas lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/_de las yon tan 
[\[224b.2\]]gyi phan yon rab tu 'thob bo/_/de la rtag pa'i rnam pa gang zhe na/_gang lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dge ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyi dpyod pa'i ye shes skyes shing byung ba de dag sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad pa dang /_chos kyi rigs mi 'chad 
[\[224b.3\]]pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi rigs mi 'chad pa dang /_sems can gyi khams mtha' dag yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ste/_sems can thams cad la btang ba sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byed pa 'di ni rtag pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[224b.4\]]gang mi zad pa ni rtag pa zhes bya ste/_'dus ma byas ni mi zad pa zhes bya'o/_/'dus ma byas ni rtag pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba rtsom pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'dus ma byas nyid du yongs su sngo ba 'di ni rtag pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o/_/stong pa nyid 
[\[224b.5\]]dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa ni rtag pa zhes bya ste/_de la byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul dang /_mtshan ma med pa nges par brtags pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i rgyu 'thun pas brtson 'grus brtsam pa thams cad rtsom pa 'di ni rtag pa'i rnam pa 
[\[224b.6\]]zhes bya'o/_/nam mkha' ni rtag pa zhes bya ste/_de la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems rnam par mi rtog pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa 'di ni rtag pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' lus la lus kyi 
[\[224b.7\]]rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa de bdag gi lus de la sems can thams cad kyi lus nye bar 'dogs shing bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi lus sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gnas la gnas par bya'o snyam ste/_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zag pa med pa ltar rang gi 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]lus kyi chos nyid la yang de bzhin du rtog go_/de zag pa med pa'i chos la mkhas pas sems can thams cad kyi lus kyang de'i mtshan nyid du rab tu shes so/_/de zag pa med pa'i lus kyis zag pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sogs so/_/
[\[225a.2\]]de zag pa med pa'i sems kyis kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zag pa med pa'i thams cad mkhyen par yongs su sngo'o/_/de zag pa med pa'i chos thob pas zag pa las 'byung bar mi byed do/_/zag pa rnams gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'dod pa'i zag pa dang /_srid pa'i zag pa 
[\[225a.3\]]dang /_ma rig pa'i zag pa dang /_lta ba'i zag pa'o/_/de 'dod pa'i zag pa yongs su shes pa dang ldan pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsams bzhin du 'dod pa'i khams su skye'o/_/srid pa'i zag pa yongs su shes pa dang ldan pas dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[225a.4\]]bsags pa'i phyir bsams bzhin du srid pa yongs su 'dzin to/_/ma rig pa'i zag pa dang lta ba'i zag pa de gnyis rtsa ba nas gdon pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor la 'jug go_/lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa de lus la sngon gyi 
[\[225a.5\]]mtha' nas kyang ma byung bar so sor rtog go_/lus la phyi ma'i mthar yang mi 'pho bar so sor rtog go_/lus la da ltar byung ba na rang bzhin gyis dben par yang so sor rtog go_/de de ltar lus la rjes su lta zhing gnas pas lus dang ldan pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba mi skyed 
[\[225a.6\]]do/_/'jig tshogs la lta ba dang bral bas bdag gir mi byed do/_/bdag gir byed pa med pas yongs su 'dzin pa la yongs su mi 'dzin to/_/yongs su 'dzin pa med pas rtsod pa med pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/rtsod pa spangs pas gnod sems med do/_/gnod sems med pas 
[\[225a.7\]]bzod pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/bzod pa rab tu thob pas phyir khengs par yang mi 'gyur 'dud par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/khengs par yang mi 'gyur 'dud par yang mi 'gyur bas chos nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/chos nyid la gnas pas phyir yang chos ma yin pa spyod par mi 'gyur ro/_/chos 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]spyod pas chos dang ldan pa'i 'gros su song ngo /_/chos kyi 'gros su song bas chos dang ldan pa'i grogs po rab tu rnyed do/_/chos dang ldan pa'i grogs pos yongs su bzung bas chos dang ldan pa'i mnyan pa thos par 'gyur ro/_/chos thos pa dang ldan pas phyir yang yul rnams 
[\[225b.2\]]la zag par mi 'gyur ro/_/de yul la bsrungs pas ting nge 'dzin sgrub bo/_/mnyam par bzhag pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pas phyir yang rtog par mi byed do/_/rnam par rtog par mi byed do/_/rnam 
[\[225b.3\]]par mi rtog pas mi 'gyur ro/_/mi 'gyur bas phyir yang mi byed do/_/rnam par mi byed do/_/nam mi byed rnam par mi byed pa de ni chos mnyam pa nyid kyis chos ji lta ba bzhin thob nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[225b.4\]]lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[225b.5\]]tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa na tshor ba la bde bar gnas pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po thob par 'gyur ro/_/de 'di ltar gang la tshor ba med pa de ni bde ba yin no zhes slob ste/_de sems can thams cad kyi tshor ba spong ba'i 
[\[225b.6\]]phyir tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom mo/_/de sems can rnams kyi tshor ba 'gog pa'i phyir go cha bgos kyang bdag gi tshor ba 'gog par yang mi byed do/_/des tshor ba gang ci myong yang tshor ba de dag thams cad snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung 
[\[225b.7\]]zhing myong bar byed de/_de nam bde ba'i tshor ba myong ba de na 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po rnyed de/_bdag gi 'dod chags kyi bag la nyal ba yang rab tu spong ngo /_/nam sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba de na zhe sdang la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]chen po rnyed de/_bdag gi zhe sdang gi bag la nyal yang rab tu spong ngo /_/nam bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba myong ba de na gti mug la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po rnyed de bdag gi gti mug gi bag la nyal yang rab tu spong ngo /_/de 
[\[226a.2\]]bde ba'i tshor ba la rjes su chags par mi 'gyur te/_rjes su chags pa legs par 'joms par yang byed do/_/de sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la khong khro bar mi 'gyur te/_khong khro ba legs par 'joms par yang byed do/_/sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba la ma rig pa dang /_
[\[226a.3\]]ldan par mi 'gyur te/_ma rig pa legs par 'joms par yang byed do/_/des tshor ba gang ci myong ba de dag thams cad kyang mi rtag par shes shing myong bar byed do/_/sdug bsngal du shes shing myong bar byed do/_/bdag med par shes shing myong bar byed do/_/de bde ba'i tshor ba la ni mi rtag par 
[\[226a.4\]]shes par 'gyur ro/_/sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la ni zug rngur shes par 'gyur ro/_/sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba la ni zhi bar shes par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar na gang bde ba de ni mi rtag pa'o/_/gang sdug bsngal ba de ni sdug bsngal ba nyid do/_/gang bde ba yang ma yin 
[\[226a.5\]]sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa de ni bdag med pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' de ltar tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing gnas pa de chos thams cad skyes pa dang /_zhig pa dang /_zhu ba dang /_gnas pa med par shes so/_/chos thams cad la skye ba dang 'jig 
[\[226a.6\]]par yang so sor rtog go_/so sor rtog pa na chos skye ba de dag gang nas 'ong /_'gag pa rnams gang du sogs par 'gyur snyam du chos rnams kyi skye ba dang /_'jig pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/des chos rnams gang nas kyang mi 'ong /_gang du yang mi 'gro bar shes nas 
[\[226a.7\]]tshor ba thams cad rgyun chad par sgrub bo/_/bsgrubs nas kyang nan tan du mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can thams cad kyi tshor ba 'gag par byed kyi/_bdag 'ba' shig gi tshor ba 'gag par byed pa ni ma yin te/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa thabs mkhas pa dang /_snying rje chen pos yongs su zin pa'o/_/gang tshor ba 'gag pa yang rab tu shes la tshor ba 'gag pa mngon sum du yang mi byed de/_tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa la gnas pa de tshor ba 
[\[226b.2\]]rnams la dben pa dang /_rnam par dben par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes so/_/'di la ni myong ba gang yang med do/_/'di la ni tshor bar byed pa gang yang med do/_/chos de dag thams cad ni stong pa ste/_bdag dang bdag gi dang bral ba'o/_/byed pa po dang tshor ba po dang mi ldan pa'o/_/
[\[226b.3\]]rgyu dang rkyen la rag lus pa'o/_/bdag po med pa'o/_/nga'i ba med pa'o/_/yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'o/_/des yang dag par na rgyu dang rkyen de dag gi dngos po mi dmigs so/_/de ma dmigs nas 'di snyam du sems te/_ji ltar rkyen stong pa yin pa de bzhin du rkyen las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang stong 
[\[226b.4\]]pa'o/_snyam nas de stong pa nyid kyi don rig pas lus dben pa dang /_sems dben pa dang don shes pa dang chos rnams shes pa dang /_ye shes rig pas tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta 
[\[226b.5\]]ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran 
[\[226b.6\]]pa nye bar gzhag pas gnas pa byang chub kyi sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa shin tu nye bar gzhag ste/_sems dran pa'i ye shes kyis sems kun tu tshol lo/_/de sems kun tu tshol ba na sems nang na yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_sems phyi rol na yang yang dag par rjes su 
[\[226b.7\]]mi mthong /_sems phyi dang nang na yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_phung po rnams la yang sems yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_khams rnams la yang sems yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_skye mched rnams la yang sems yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/des 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]sems yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas sems ga las byung zhes sems kyi rgyun kun tu tshol zhing de 'di snyam du sems te/_dmigs pa yod pa las sems 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de yang 'di snyam du sems te/_ci dmigs pa de yang gzhan la sems de yang 
[\[227a.2\]]gzhan nam 'on te dmigs pa gang yin pa de nyid sems yin/_gal te dmigs pa yang gzhan la sems kyang gzhan yin na ni sems de gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/'on te dmigs pa gang yin pa de nyid sems yin na ni sems kyis sems de ji ltar mthong bar 'gyur te/_sems kyis 
[\[227a.3\]]sems mthong bar mi rung ngo /_/'di lta ste/_dper na ral gri'i so de nyid kyis ral gri'i so de nyid gcad par mi nus pa dang /_sor mo'i rtse mo de nyid kyis sor mo'i rtse mo de nyid la reg par mi nus pa de bzhin du sems de nyid kyis kyang sems de nyid mthong bar mi nus so snyam nas/_de 'di ltar 
[\[227a.4\]]tshul bzhin du rab tu sbyor ba las gang sems mi gnas pa chad pa ma yin pa/_rtag pa ma yin pa/_ther zug tu mi gnas pa/_rgyu med pa ma yin pa/_rkyen dang mi 'gal ba/_de las kyang ma yin gzhan las kyang ma yin pa/_de nyid kyang ma yin gzhan yang ma yin pa'i sems kyi rgyud 
[\[227a.5\]]sems kyi 'khri shing sems kyi chos nyid sems mi gnas pa dang /_sems rgyu ba med pa dang /_sems snang ba med pa dang /_sems kyi rang gi mtshan nyid ji ltar de bzhin nyid 'khrug par mi byed pa de ltar shes so/_/de ltar mthong ngo /_/de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du sems de dag dben pa 
[\[227a.6\]]nyid du rab tu shes/_de bzhin du mthong ba 'di ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang sems la cung zad tsam yang mi mthong /_rnam par mi mthong /_mi rtog rnam par mi rtog 
[\[227a.7\]]g.yo med rlom sems med/_spros pa med pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang ji ltar sems gzugs med pa de bzhin du sems kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang gzugs 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]med pa'o/_/ji ltar sems kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams gzugs med pa de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems su bsngos pa yang gzugs med pa'o/_/ji ltar byang chub kyi sems su bsngos pa gzugs med pa de bzhin du byang chub de yang gzugs med de de'i phyir sems ji 
[\[227b.2\]]lta bar spyod pa yang de bzhin no/_/spyod pa ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin no/_/byang chub ji lta bar yongs su bsngo ba yang de bzhin zhes bya ste/_sems kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo/_/byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni chos thams cad de/_gang 'di ltar sems rab tu rnam par 'byed pa shes pa 'di ni 
[\[227b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang mgyogs pa/_rab tu mgyogs pa mi gnas par rgyu ba/_spre'u dang rlung 'dra ba/_'bab chu'i rgyun dang 'bru mar gyi mar me dang 'dra ba rgyang ring por 'gro ba lus med pa/_yul 
[\[227b.4\]]la brkam pa/_skye mched drug la spyod yul ba/_gzhan dang gzhan gyi shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems gnas pa/_rtse gcig pa/_mi 'phro ba/_rnam par mi 'phro ba/_zhi gnas la rtse gcig pa/_g.yeng ba med pa 'di ni sems gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 
[\[227b.5\]]yongs su rdzogs pa gang zhe na/_gang sems la rnam par 'byed par shes pa dang /_sems la chos kyi dbyings su gnas par shes pa dang /_sems la sems gnas par shes pa dang /_sems la rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar shes pa dang /_sems la ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa dang /_
[\[227b.6\]]sems la mngon sum gyi shes pas rab tu shes pa dang /_sems la sgyu ma'i chos su shes pa dang /_sems la dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang /_sems la de kho nar shes pa dang /_sems la g.yo ba med cing gzung ba med par shes pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yongs 
[\[227b.7\]]su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o/_/de rang gi sems kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rang bzhin yang de yin par rab tu shes so/_/sems kyi rang bzhin de yongs su shes nas de bzhin du chos ston to/_/rang gi sems kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa sems can thams cad kyi sems 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]kyi ngo bo nyid kyang de yin par rab tu shes so/_/sems kyi ngo bo nyid du shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to/_/rang gi sems kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyang de yin par rab tu shes so/_/sems kyi mtshan nyid de shes 
[\[228a.2\]]nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to/_/ji ltar rang gi sems stong pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi sems kyang stong par rab tu shes so/_/sems de dag stong pa nyid du shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to/_/de rang gi sems yang dag par 'du ba gang yin pa sems can thams cad kyi 
[\[228a.3\]]sems yang dag par 'du ba yang de yin par rab tu shes so/_/sems yang dag par 'du ba de dag shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to/_/de rang gi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi sems mnyam pa nyid du rab tu shes so/_/sems can thams cad kyi sems mnyam 
[\[228a.4\]]pa nyid kyis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid du rab tu shes shing sems kyis 'gyur bar mi byed de rnam par mi 'gyur ro/_/sems gnas pas chos kyi dbyings gnas pa rjes su shes kyang sems gnas pa'i chos nyid 
[\[228a.5\]]de las kyang mi g.yo ste/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag 
[\[228a.6\]]pa gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams la chos kyis rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la gnas pa 'di snyam du sems te/_chos kho na skye ba rnams skye/_chos kho na 'gag pa rnams 'gag ste/_'di la bdag gam/_sems can nam/_srog gam/_skye 
[\[228a.7\]]ba po'am/_gso ba'am/_skyes bu 'am/_gang zag gam/_shed las skyes pa'am/_shed bu'am/_gang skye ba'am/_rga ba 'am/_'chi ba 'am/_'pho ba'am/_skye bar 'gyur ba gang yang med do/_/'di ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid de/_gal te bsgrubs na ni 'grub/_ma bsgrubs na 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]ni mi 'grub ste/_dge ba yang rung /_mi dge ba yang rung /_mi g.yo ba yang rung /_ji lta bur bsgrubs pa de lta bur 'grub mod kyi/_chos rnams la sgrub par byed pa yang med la chos rnams rgyu med par yang gag kyang mi skye'o snyam du nye bar brtags na 'di ltar chos dran pa'i ye shes skye ste/_gang 
[\[228b.2\]]bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa dang /_mi g.yo ba mngon par 'du byed pa dang gsum mo/_/de la bdag gis ni bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa la brtson par bya'o/_/de ni bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa/_mchog dam pa/_rab/_khyad par du 'phags pa bcu'i rgyur
