[\[248b.5\]]bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_mdog bzang po rgyas pa/_mchog dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/_btsas nas lo bcu drug lon pa dang /_de gzugs bzang ba dang /_longs spyod dang skyid pas dregs shing nga rgyal skyes te rgyags nas/_bcom 
[\[248b.6\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba de'i gan du mi 'gro/_sten par mi byed/_snyen par mi byed/_rim gro mi byed do/_/rigs kyi bu de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba de 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ma la 
[\[248b.7\]]rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba yod na de gzugs dang /_longs spyod dang skyid pas rgyags dregs te/_nga rgyal gyis de bzhin 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]gshegs pa'i drung du yang mi 'ong na/_gal te de rgyun mi 'chad par bskul na ni de de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du 'ong yang srid snyam mo/_/rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba des byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong 
[\[249a.2\]]po de dag bsdus so/_/bsdus nas kyang rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyi nang nas yid yongs su mi skyo bar lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal gyi khyim gyi sgor 'gro zhing bde ba thams cad ni spangs/_sdug bsngal thams cad ni dang du blangs te/_de 
[\[249a.3\]]las tha na kun tu smra ba'am/_yang dag par smra ba'am/_stan tsam yang mi rnyed kyi steng du gshe rgya zhing tshig ngan pa rtsub po mi snyan par zer yang spro bar 'gyur ba su yod ces tshul shing brims so/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar tshul shing brims kyang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[249a.4\]]brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag las byang chub sems dpa' 'ga' tsam yang spro bar ma gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das des tshul shing thogs te/_lan gnyis lan gsum du brims kyang sus kyang ma blangs pa dang /_rigs kyi bu de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[249a.5\]]dpa' chen po brtson 'grus 'bar ba zhes bya ba zhig byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa de stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[249a.6\]]dri ma med par snang ba ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du yid yongs su mi skyo bar bde ba thams cad ni 
[\[249a.7\]]spangs/_sdug bsngal thams cad ni ji mi snyam par bgyid de/_rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal gyi khyim du mchi'o zhes rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus 'bar gyis tshig de smras ma thag tu/_de nas de nyid kyi tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos nas lha'i bu brgya stong gis kyang steng gi bar snang las/_kye ma'o byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar gyis brtson 'grus chen po'i go cha bgos pa 'di ni legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub 
[\[249b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus 'bar ba de rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal gyi khyim du song ste/_khyim gyi sgo drung na 'dug pa dang /_de skye bo'i tshogs chen po des mthong nas gshe rgya zhing tshig ngan pa rtsub po sna tshogs smras te/_de la sa dang rdul kyang gtor/_
[\[249b.3\]]de la lag pa dang /_dbyug pa dang /_bong bas kyang brdegs so/_/des mthong zhing thos te/_lus la reg cing tshor bar gyur kyang byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar ba 'khrug pa'am/_gshe ba'am/_khong khro ba'am/_phyir log par ma gyur gyi steng du/_
[\[249b.4\]]brtson 'grus brtan pa'i stobs rab tu bskyed nas stobs dang rab tu ldan pa dang /_snying rje chen po yang skyed de/_de lo stong lon pa dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo khang gcig tu zhugs te/_smad pa dang /_bsdigs pa dang /_rdeg pa thams cad kyis kyang yongs su mi skyo 
[\[249b.5\]]bar/_de lo khri lon pa dang rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo khang gnyis kyi nang du zhugs so/_/de lo nyi khri lon pa dang rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo khang gsum pa'i nang du zhugs pa nas/_lo bdun khri lon pa dang rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo khang drug pa'i nang du zhugs so/_/de lo brgyad khri 
[\[249b.6\]]bzhi stong lon pa dang rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo khang bdun pa'i nang du zhugs pa dang /_de nas gdod rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal des tshig ster te/_dge slong khyod ci 'dod/_ci zhig tshol/_khyod la ci dgos smros shig dang /_ci nus kyis rab tu sbyin par bya'o/_/rgyal bu 
[\[249b.7\]]gzhon nu de dge slong de la ngo mtshar chen po'i 'du shes skyes nas ji tsam du dge slong des yongs su mi skyo ba mnags nus pa ni ngo mtshar to snyam mo/_/rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus 'bar ba des rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal de sems 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]rab tu dang bar shes nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/zas dang skom dang gos dang bza' ba rnams/_/gzhon nu bdag la dgos pa ci yang med/_/zang zing med pa'i sems ni nyer gzhag nas/_/bdag ni chos kyi pho nyar 'dir 'ongs so/_/
[\[250a.2\]]'jig rten don mdzad drang srong cher byung ba/_/mi mchog dri ma med par snang zhes bya/_/de ni sdug bsngal mthar 'byin chos ston te/_/sems can gang gis thos pas mi 'chi 'thob/_/bskal pa stong phrag bye ba grangs med na/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni brgya lam 'byung bar 'gyur/_/
[\[250a.3\]]da ltar 'jig rten mun nag sgron gyur pa/_/yon tan dam pa mnga' ba de skyes na/_/khyod ni 'di na 'dod pa'i yon tan chags/_/gzugs dang longs spyod rnams la rtag tu myos/_/skyid myos de bzhin rgyal srid myos pas na/_/chos kyi rgyal po lta bar yong mi 'gro/_/longs spyod mi 
[\[250a.4\]]rtag de bzhin rgyal srid srog_/rtswa rtse'i zil thigs 'dra zhes rgyal bas gsungs/_/gang phyir sangs rgyas thos kyang myos 'gyur ba/_/de ni rgyal bu khyod kyi cha ma yin/_/khyod ni 'di na byang chub mchog zhugs la/_/sems can dag kyang gnyer te grol bar gyis/_/khyod bdag 
[\[250a.5\]]da ltar 'dod pa'i bran gyur na/_/ji ltar myos pas skye bo 'dul bar 'gyur/_/nga rgyal spongs te nyon mongs rnams sol la/_/da ni rgyal ba'i drung du 'gro bar gyis/_/brtson 'grus skyed de 'jig rten snying brtse gyis/_/phyi ma'i dus na gdung bar gyur ta re/_/rgyal bus 
[\[250a.6\]]tshigs su bcad pa 'di thos nas/_/nga rgyal spangs te gus pa rab bskyed nas/_/brtson 'grus 'bar ba'i rkang la phyag 'tshal te/_/gang sngon bdag gis gnod bgyis bzod par gsol/_/bdag ni rgyal srid thams cad spang bar bya/_/'dod dang de bzhin longs spyod kun mi 
[\[250a.7\]]tshol/_/nga rgyal tha ba'i skyon dang dregs spangs te/_/myur du bde bar gshegs pa'i gan du 'gro/_/de ni srog chags bye ba brgyad cus bskor/_/me tog na bza' spos dang bdug pa thogs/_/dri ma med par snang ba skyes bu mchog_/rgyal ba de yi drung du nye bar song /_/
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]bde bar gshegs kyi gan du phyin nas kyang /_/zhabs la phyag 'tshal de nas mchod byas te/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de yi spyan sngar 'dug_/rgyal bu de yis tshig ni 'di smras so/_/gang phyir skyo med sems kyis bskul bas na/_/brtson 'grus 'bar ba bdag gi ston 
[\[250b.2\]]pa mgon/_/ji ltar de ni mchod pa'i 'os lags na/_/de la lan du phan pa bgyid mi nus/_/bdag ni 'jig rten mgon la bzod par gsol/_/chos kyi rgyal la gus pa gang ma bgyis/_/de dag thams cad de ring so sor bshags/_/bdag gi nongs pa 'jig 
[\[250b.3\]]rten mgon mkhyen mdzod/_/sems can don du snying rje bskyed nas su/_/bdag ni byang chub mchog la rab zhugs te/_/byang chub dam mchog ma thob bar du ni/_/slan chad bag med spyod pa mi bgyi'o/_/rgyal bu de yis rgyal srid rnam spangs te/_/sems can bye ba 
[\[250b.4\]]brgyad cu rnams kyis bskor/_/byang chub dam pa 'di ni yongs tshol zhing /_/mngon byung rgyal ba'i bstan la rab tu byung /_/rgyal bas de dag gi ni bsam mkhyen nas/_/byang chub lam mchog rab tu bstan pas na/_/chos thos sems can rtag tu dag pa rnams/_/
[\[250b.5\]]thams cad kyis kyang rjes 'thun bzod pa thob/_/rigs kyi bu ngas bskal pa 'am bskal pa las lhag par de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba de'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bsngags pa brjod cing /_gang chos bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de yongs su 
[\[250b.6\]]brjod kyang yon tan gyi mtha' zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar ba zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du dogs shing the tshom za 'am/_yid gnyis su gyur na de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe 
[\[250b.7\]]na/_de'i tshe de'i dus na nga nyid byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar ba zhes bya ba der gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du dogs shing the tshom za 'am/_yid gnyis su gyur na yang de 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di ni de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal zhes bya bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar sngon byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la 
[\[251a.2\]]yongs su mi skyo zhing 'di ltar shin tu stobs dang ldan te brtson 'grus nye bar ston to/_/rigs kyi bu de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par byed 'dod pas ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar ba zhes bya ba de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/
[\[251a.3\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu sems can yongs su smin par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las yin no/_/rigs kyi bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i las yin te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sdud par 
[\[251a.4\]]'gyur ba'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_bdud kyi las las shin tu 'da' ba byang chub sems dpa'i las dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba byang chub sems dpa'i las dang /_lus dang ngag dang yid brgyan pa byang chub sems dpa'i las dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[251a.5\]]chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa byang chub sems dpa'i las te/_rigs kyi bu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i las yin te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[251a.6\]]rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i las sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sdud par 'gyur ba bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_bsam pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes dang /_dbang po yongs su shes pa'i ye shes dang /_nad thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i sman sbyin pa'i ye shes 
[\[251a.7\]]dang /_nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa mi 'khrugs pa'i ye shes te/_rigs kyi bu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i las yin te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sdud par 'gyur ba'o/_/de nas byang chub 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po ches gtsug gi nor bu rin po che gang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas mngon par grub pa gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bcu nor bu rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu bkang bas 
[\[251b.2\]]kyang rin du mi bzod pa'i gtsug gi nor bu rin po che de de bzhin gshegs pa la phul nas tshig 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi gtsug na mchis pa'i nor bu rin po che 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la phul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bcom ldan 'das bdag spyi gtsug bltar 
[\[251b.3\]]mi snang ba thob pa dang /_bdag sangs rgyas kyi ye shes spyi bor gyur pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dang ldan par gyur cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/_nam 'dzum pa mdzad pa de na 
[\[251b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs 'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_le brgan dang /_shel dang dngul gyi kha dog lta bu byung ste/_de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa de dag 
[\[251b.5\]]'od kyis khyab par byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te zla ba dang nyi ma rnams kyi gzi brjid kyang gzi brjid kyis yongs su zad par byas nas slar log ste/_bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu 
[\[251b.6\]]nub par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa myur ba zhes bya ba stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su 
[\[251b.7\]]bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don zhus so/_/mi mnyam mnyam pa dam pa 'jig rten mig sbyin 'jig rten mchog_/shAkya'i rgyal sras dbang po zhi zhing dri gsum dri ma spangs/_/mtshungs med mtshungs 'das byams pas 'phags pa rgyal ba ri rab bzhin/_/ci slad 'dir 'dzum 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]ye shes 'byung gnas bdag la lung bstan gsol/_/gya gyu mi mnga' rab tu mnyen la shin tu snyan pa'i gsung /_/skyes bu dam pa bde rab sbyin pa dran mchog blo gros thugs/_/bde gshegs mos pa mchog dang bden pa lha dang mis mchod pa/_/ci slad 'dzum pa 'di mdzad 
[\[252a.2\]]phan pa mdzad pas bstan du gsol/_/stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' 'dom gang 'od dang bsod nams gzi brjid 'od/_/'khor gyi nang du seng ge lta bur rab sgrogs rgol ba bcom/_/thub pa srid gsum khyod dang mnyam pa'am lhag pa gang yang med/_/chos kyi dbang phyug ci slad 'dzum 
[\[252a.3\]]pa mdzad pa bstan du gsol/_/rab tu bzhad cing mchog tu dgyes pa shin tu dri med zhal/_/zla ba lta bur nam mkhar gshegs nas phyogs bcu lam me bar/_/mun pa bcom zhing rdul bcom 'od dang dpal ni rab rgyas pa/_/bde bar gshegs pa 'dzum mdzad phan pa mdzad pas bka' 
[\[252a.4\]]stsol cig_/gser ri 'od 'dra brtul zhugs grub pa bsod nams ye shes 'phro/_/mkhas pas rtag tu rab bsngags 'jig rten ngo mtshar mchod par 'os/_/srid pa'i dam pa 'jig rten 'das pa sbyin gnas mi zad cing /_/nam mkha'i ngos rab snang bar shAkya seng ge'i 'dzum pa bstan/_/
[\[252a.5\]]lha dang mis mchod khyod 'dras dang lha yul dag na'ang med/_/yid mnyam mos pa mnyam pa khrel yod dpal gyis rab tu rgyas/_/yon tan brgya rnams shin tu rgyas pa'i mtshan ni rab rdzogs pa/_/bde gshegs 'dzum pa mdzad pa thub pa dam pa bka' stsol cig_/kun tu khyod kyi ye 
[\[252a.6\]]shes dus gsum chags pa med par 'jug_/sems dang yid sbyor dbang po gang dang sems can bsam pa gang /_/sems can kun gyi bsam pa ci 'dra thams cad skad cig mkhyen/_/mi yi seng ges gang slad 'dzum mdzad rigs don bdag la gsungs/_/nam mkhar gnas 
[\[252a.7\]]pa'i lha mang yid kyang rab tu dga'/_/mi'i tshogs sa la gnas pa thal sbyar phyag 'tshal gyis/_/gang thos lha mi mun pa'i rdul rnams sel 'gyur ba/_/mi mchog gis ni bdud rtsi'i ro mchog dbye bar gsol/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa myur ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na rin po che 'dis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes spyi bor gyur pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ched du gang gtsug gi nor bu rin po che 'di de bzhin gshegs 
[\[252b.2\]]pa la phul ba mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che 'dis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mnyes par byas/_bsti 
[\[252b.3\]]stang du byas/_btsun par byas/_ri mor byas shing mchod nas thams cad du yang tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/_sems can dpag tu med pa dag kyang theg pa gsum po dag la yongs su smin par byas so/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na rin po che 'di bskal pa grangs 
[\[252b.4\]]med pa brgya stong na bskal pa dri ma med pa la 'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na 
[\[252b.5\]]med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma med pa de'i sa gzhi ni rin po che sna bdun du 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams de nas 'od gang byung ba des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[252b.6\]]zhing grangs med pa rnams snang bar 'gyur ro/_/'od de yang gser gyi kha dog lta bur 'gyur ro/_/sems can gang dag 'od des reg par gyur pa de dag kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi gzir bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma med pa de yang 'byor pa/_rgyas pa/_byang chub sems 
[\[252b.7\]]dpa' 'ba' shig gi gnas su 'gyur ro/_/der byang chub sems dpa' rin po che ma gtogs par rin po che gzhan 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de'i ming rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa rab tu thob par 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/de dag gi longs spyod dang kun spyod pa thams cad kyang bsams pa tsam gyis 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gang 'jig rten gyi khams der lha dang mi 'byung ba de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro/_/de na mi khom pa dang ngan song 
[\[253a.2\]]rnams kyi ming yang med par 'gyur ro/_/de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che 'byung ba bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal po ma gtogs par rgyal po gzhan 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/lha dang mi de dag thams cad kyang rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams de na bud med dang 
[\[253a.3\]]'khrig cing 'du ba'i ming yang med par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can long ba'am/_zhar ba'am/_zha bo 'am/_sgur po'am/_yan lag ma tshang bar 'gyur ba gang yang med de/_de dag thams cad kyang lus mtshan gyis legs par brgyan par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 
[\[253a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe'i tshad kyang bskal pa bar ma bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis thob par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de yang byang chub dang rab tu ldan pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa dang rab tu ldan pa/_snying rje chen po dang rab tu ldan pa/_theg pa chen po dang rab tu 
[\[253a.5\]]ldan pa ma gtogs par gtam gzhan ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang dbang po rno ste zur tsam gyis go bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag kyang chos kyi sgo'i tshig re res sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub rjes su rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de yang byang 
[\[253a.6\]]chub sems dpa' de dag la rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ro/_/de la rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_tshig gcig gis tshig thams cad la 'jug pa'o/_/tshig gcig po de yang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_tshig mi zad pa'o/_/tshig mi zad pa de yang gang zhe na/_
[\[253a.7\]]tshig mi zad pa zhes bya ba ni gang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang zad par byed mi nus pa'o/_/tshig mi zad pa de yang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_a zhes bya ba ni tshig mi zad pa ste/_a zhes bya ba la zhugs na yi ge'i 'bru thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar na yi ge thams cad ni mi zad 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]pa ste/_yi ge 'bru gnyis snga phyi med par thos par bya mi nus so/_/yi ge'i 'bru re re nas brjod kyi yi ge yang yi ge gnyis dang 'brel ba ma yin no/_/de bas na tshig gcig po de nyid rnam par rig pa'i tshig ste/_gang rnam par rig pa'i tshig de yang rnam par rig pa'i tshig ces rtog par mi byed 
[\[253b.2\]]rnam par rtog par mi byed do/_/de ltar tshig de mi rtog rnam par mi rtog par dgos pa byed de/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs la 'jug pa'o/_/de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che 'byung ba de byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs yang dag par rab 
[\[253b.3\]]tu ston par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu ngas bskal pa 'am bskal pa las lhag par 'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma med pa de'i bsngags pa brjod cing /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che 'byung ba de'i chos bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab 
[\[253b.4\]]pa de yongs su brjod kyang yon tan yongs su brjod pa zad par mi 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ni yon tan gyi rnam pa bkod pa tshad med pa de snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po ches bdag nyid lung bstan pa thos nas 
[\[253b.5\]]dga' mgu yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/_bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs/_/chos rnams kun gyi pha rol gshegs/_/'khrul pa'i 
[\[253b.6\]]skyon rnams thams cad las/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu 'das/_/ye shes chen po khyod re mtshar/_/sangs rgyas bye ba de snyed la/_/bdag gis sngon mchod gang bgyis pa/_/de dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen/_/'das dang ma 'ongs dus rnams dang /_/de bzhin da ltar 
[\[253b.7\]]byung ba yi/_/bdag gi spyod dang de bzhin du/_/srog chags kun gyi rab tu mkhyen/_/thub pa ci 'dra de 'dra bar/_/'jig rten sangs rgyas bdag 'gyur zhes/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bdag lung bstan/_/bdag ni the tshom yong ma mchis/_/sa rnams thams cad 'gags 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]kyang gda'/_/nyi zla mkha' las lhung yang gda'/_/bcom ldan khyod kyi zhal sgo nas/_/phyin ci log gi gsung mi 'byung /_/ye shes ldan la shes rab che/_/des ni bdag la bden tshig gis/_/byang chub mchog tu lung bstan pas/_/sangs rgyas bla na med 
[\[254a.2\]]par 'gyur/_/thugs kyis yid ni mkhyen pas na/_/bdag gi spyod pa ci 'dra dang /_/sangs rgyas zhing yang ci 'dra bar/_/de 'dra nyid du kun bstan to/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gsung thos nas/_/the tshom ma mchis dbang po tshim/_/sems can rnams la phan pa'i rgyur/_/
[\[254a.3\]]mchog gi spyod pa spyad par bgyi/_/bdag gi spyod pa ci 'dra ba/_/sngon gyi mthar ni rnam sbyangs pa/_/de bas shin tu dpag yas par/_/bdag gi spyod pa spyad par bgyi/_/'di ni le los mi 'da' bas/_/brtson 'grus brtan pa'i spyod pa 'di/_/zhum pa ma mchis sems 
[\[254a.4\]]kyis su/_/byang chub spyod pa spyad par bgyi/_/bdag ni byang chub lung bstan pa/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni spro ba stsal/_/ji srid 'dren par ma gyur pa/_/de srid brtson 'grus mi gtong ngo /_/rtag tu byang chub mchog gzhol te/_/sems can thams cad gnyer bar bgyi/_/byang 
[\[254a.5\]]chub dam pa don du btsal/_/de dag bdag gis bskyang bar bgyi/_/byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na rin po ches tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/_srog chags stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas 
[\[254a.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma med par skye bar sems kyis smon te tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das nam de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che 'byung ba des byang chub thob par gyur pa de na bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar gyur cig ces smras pa dang /_de dag thams 
[\[254a.7\]]cad bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar lung bstan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/kun chub par gyis 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]shig_/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig_/kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ngam/_klog pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nga lung ston to/_/kun dga' bo 
[\[254b.2\]]rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la lo stong du ci bzhed ces sbyin pa byin pa bas/_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos te/_'chang 
[\[254b.3\]]ngam/_klog gam/_de kho na bzhin du nan tan byed na/_'di ni de bas bsod nams ches mang ste/_tshad med grangs med par khong du chud par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 
[\[254b.4\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/de 
[\[254b.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i man ngag ces bya bar yang zung shig_/gtsug na rin po ches zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin chen dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad 
[\[254b.6\]]dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa 
[\[254b.7\]]las/_gtsug na rin po ches zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de d+harma tA shI las bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]{D92}]'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa ste 'phags pa lha mo dpal phreng gi seng ge'i sgra bstan pa/_bam po dang po/_rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya shrI mA la de bI sing ha nA da nA ma ma hA yA 
[\[255a.2\]]na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa lha mo dpal phreng gi seng ge'i sgra zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal 
[\[255a.3\]]mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas de'i tshe yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang /_btsun mo dam pa btsun mo phreng ldan mas lha mo dpal phreng chos rtogs nas ring po ma lon pa'i bar skabs su gtam glengs pa/_rgyal po chen po kye ma khyod kyi sras 
[\[255a.4\]]mo lha mo dpal phreng ni mdzangs shing gsal la zab cing mkhas te/_gal te des bcom ldan 'das mthong ba lta na tshegs chung ngus chos rtogs la/_bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa la yang the tshom ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/de nas yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 
[\[255a.5\]]gyis btsun mo phreng ldan ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/phreng ldan ma'u bu cag gis lha mo dpal phreng la pho nya nus pa zhig gtang gor ma chag go_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_btsun mo phreng ldan mas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi tshig de mnyan nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 
[\[255a.6\]]dang /_btsun mo phreng ldan mas bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa rnam pa du ma bris te/_nang kor ma yid brtan pa zla ba lta bu zhes bya ba de'i lag tu phrin yig bskur nas de mthar gyis song ste/_grong khyer 'thab med du phyin nas btsun mo'i 'khor du song ste/_lha mo dpal 
[\[255a.7\]]phreng la phyag 'tshal nas phan tshun kun dga' ba'i gtam byas te lha mo dpal phreng gi lag tu phrin yig byin no/_/de nas lha mo dpal phreng gis pha ma la gus pas phrin yig de lag pa gnyis kyis blangs nas mgo la gtugs te bdag nyid kyis phrin yig bklags nas/_phrin yig gi 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]don bzang ngo zhes nges par bzung ste/_don du nges par bzung nas mgo gcogs te ya mtshan du bzung nas lha mo dpal phreng gis nang kor ma zla ba lta bu la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/sangs rgyas zhes bya'i sgra 'di ni/_/'jig rten dag na shin tu dkon/_/gal te tshig 'di bden 
[\[255b.2\]]gyur na/_/bdag gis khyod la bgo ba sbyin/_/gal te bcom ldan sangs rgyas de/_/'jig rten don du byung gyur na/_/de ni bdag la thugs rje yis/_/bstan pa'i ched du 'dir spyon cig_/de nas de yi skad cig la/_/mgon po gshegs nas mkha' la bzhugs/_/bsam 
[\[255b.3\]]gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas sku/_/'od zer 'gyed cing bzhugs pa mthong /_/de nas de tshe lha mo ni/_/gus pas 'khor bcas langs nas kyang /_/spyi bor thal mo sbyar byas nas/_/smra ba'i mchog la bstod pa ni/_/mgon po khyod kyi sku gzugs dang /_/dpal dpe gang 
[\[255b.4\]]na'ang yod ma mchis/_/bsam yas dpe zla ma mchis pa'i/_/'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mgon po khyod kyi sku gzugs dang /_/ye shes la yang bas ma mchis/_/khyod kyi sangs rgyas chos mi bas/_/de bas thub khyod skyabs kyang lags/_/bsam yas 
[\[255b.5\]]rtsal ldan khyod kyis ni/_/sku gsung thugs kyi skyon rnams bsal/_/nyams ma mchis pa'i sa brnyes pa/_/chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/shes bya thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen/_/ye shes sku yi dbang phyug ste/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams thams cad kyi/_/mthar phyin 
[\[255b.6\]]khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gzhal yas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dpe las 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bsam yas chos khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/mtha' yas gzugs khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag ni da ltar mgon pos bskyabs/_/byang chub sa bon rnam par bskyed/_/
[\[255b.7\]]slan chad srid pa gzhan dag tu/_/thub pas bdag la phan gdags mdzod/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/sngon tshe rnams su lha mo khyod/_/ngas ni byang chub sbyor ba byas/_/phyis kyang tshe rabs gzhan dag tu/_/ngas ni rjes su gzung bar bya/_/lha mo 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]dpal phreng gis gsol pa/_/bdag gis 'di dang gzhan dag tu/_/bsod nams gang dang gang bgyis pa/_/bsod nams de yis mgon po khyod/_/rtag tu bdag gis mthong bar shog_/de nas lha mo dpal phreng dang lhan cig tu btsun mo kun dang thams cad 
[\[256a.2\]]dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dus pa'i nang du lha mo dpal phreng bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/_lha mo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la yang dag pa'i yon tan 
[\[256a.3\]]dag gis mngon par bstod pa'i bsod nams bsags pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis lha mo khyod bskal pa tshad med grangs med par lha dang mi'i rgyal srid phun sum tshogs pa myong bar 'gyur te/_tshe rabs thams cad du yang nga mthong ba dang bral bar mi 'gyur zhing nga la 
[\[256a.4\]]mngon sum du 'di lta bu'i bstod pa bsngags pas bsngags par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med grangs med pa dag la yang mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/da phyin chad bskal pa brgya stong phrag grangs med pa nyi shu na khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[256a.5\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po zhes bya bar 'gyur te/_de'i tshe yang lha mo khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ngan song dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe sems can rnams kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas par 'gyur te/_sems can de dag la nad kyang med 
[\[256a.6\]]rga ba yang med/_/yid du mi 'ong ba'i gnod pa yang med de/_mi dge ba'i las kyi lam rnams kyi ming yang mi grag par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag 'byung ba de dag gis ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyang 'di ltar bde ba dang /_gzugs 
[\[256a.7\]]dang /_kha dog dang /_dpal dang /_gzi brjid dang /_gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_longs spyod thams cad kyis zil gyis non par 'gyur te/_sems can de dag shin tu bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/lha mo sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]sems can gang dag 'byung ba de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs par 'gyur ro/_/lha mo de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba dag byas pa'i sems can rnams de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha mo dpal phreng gi lung bstan pa phun 
[\[256b.2\]]sum tshogs pa thos nas lha dang mi dpag tu med pa dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam btab bo/_/de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams der skye bar bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan to/_/de nas lha mo dpal phreng gis bcom ldan 'das las mngon 
[\[256b.3\]]sum du bdag nyid lung bstan pa thos nas thal mo sbyar te yi dam chen po bcu yang dag par blangs so/_/bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_bcom ldan 'das da slan chad bdag gis tshul khrims kyi dus las 'da' ba'i sems bskyed par mi bgyi ste/_bcom ldan 'das yi dam dang 
[\[256b.4\]]po 'di ni byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das da slan chad bdag gis bla ma dag la ma gus pa'i sems bskyed par mi bgyi ste/_bcom ldan 'das yi dam gnyis pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar 
[\[256b.5\]]du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das da slan chad bdag gis gang du yang sems can la khro ba dang /_gnod sems kyi sems bskyed par mi bgyi ste/_bcom ldan 'das yi dam gsum pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis 
[\[256b.6\]]yang dag par blang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das da slan chad bdag gis gzhan gyi dpal dang /_gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa dag la phrag dog gi sems bskyed par mi bgyi ste/_bcom ldan 'das yi dam bzhi pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis 
[\[256b.7\]]yang dag par blang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das da slan chad bdag gis tha na kham slad ma tsam la yang ser sna'i sems bskyed par mi bgyi ste/_bcom ldan 'das yi dam lnga pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo /_/bcom ldan 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]'das da slan chad bdag gis bdag nyid kyis longs spyod pa'i slad du nor yongs su gzung bar mi bgyi ste/_'on kyang bcom ldan 'das sems can dbul po sdug bsngal zhing mgon ma mchis pa yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du yongs su gzung bar 'tshal 
[\[257a.2\]]te/_bcom ldan 'das yi dam drug pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das da slan chad bdag gis bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pas na bdag la sman du re ba'i slad du sems can 
[\[257a.3\]]bsdu bar mi bgyi ste/_'on kyang bcom ldan 'das zang zing ma mchis pa'i sems dang /_chog par mi 'dzin pa dang ldog pa ma mchis par sems can yang dag par bsdu bar 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das yi dam bdun pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du 
[\[257a.4\]]bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das da slan chad bdag gis sems can mgon ma mchis pa dang /_go rar stsal ba dang bcings pa dang nad kyis nyam thag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang /_dbul po dang phongs par gyur pa dang /_tshegs chen pos 'tsho ba dag 
[\[257a.5\]]mthong na/_de dag la sman ma btags par gom pa gcig kyang dor bar mi bgyi'i/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa de dag mthong na sdug bsngal de dang de dag las yongs su thar bar bgyis la nor gyi bsdu bas bsgrubs nas slad kyis 
[\[257a.6\]]bdag mchi bar bgyis te/_bcom ldan 'das yi dam brgyad pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das da slan chad bdag gis phag 'tshong dang /_bya ba la sogs pa sdig pa'i las kyis 'tsho zhing de bzhin 
[\[257a.7\]]gshegs pas bka' stsal pa'i chos 'dul ba las nyams pa'i chos can dag mthong na yal bar mi dor gyi/_bcom ldan 'das grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang dang gang dag na bdag gis mchid nyan pa de dang de dag tu tshar dgum 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]pa'i rigs pa rnams la ni tshar dgum/_sman gdags pa'i rigs pa rnams la ni sman gdags par 'tshal la/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das tshar dgum pa dang /_sman gdags pas ni 'jig rten du dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba'i slad du ste/_
[\[257b.2\]]dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas na lha dang mi rnams kyi lus rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur zhing ngan song rnams yongs su 'grib par 'gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rjes su skor bar bgyid pa lags te/_bcom ldan 
[\[257b.3\]]'das yi dam dgu pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das da slan chad bdag gis dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba las bskyud par bgyi ba'i sems gcig tsam yang bskyed par mi bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du 
[\[257b.4\]]zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos gzung ba las bskyud na theg pa chen po bskyud par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po bskyud na pha rol tu phyin pa bskyud par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa bskyud na theg pa chen po las mi 'dun par 
[\[257b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang theg pa chen po las ma nges pa de ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la mi 'dun par 'gyur zhing rang nyam du gnas par 'gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das de ni byis pa so so'i skye bo'i sar mchi 
[\[257b.6\]]ba'i skal ba can du 'gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gis nyes dmigs dang /_gnod pa chen por mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa las ni bdag dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phan yon dpag tu ma mchis 
[\[257b.7\]]pa'i don yongs su grub par mthong ste/_bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i yi dam bcu pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi yi dam chen po bcu po 'di dag ni bcom ldan 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]'das kyi spyan sngar blangs pa lags te/_'di la chos kyi rje nyid bdag gi dbang du gyur pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das ston pa mngon sum du gyur du lags kyang sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu la la dag kye ma yi dam chen po bcu po 'di dag ni lcogs par dka'o snyam du bdag la the tshom 
[\[258a.2\]]za 'am/_yid gnyis 'tshal ba de dag ni bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyis yun ring por gnod pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang phung bar 'gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das de dag nyid la sman gdags pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'di bgyi bar 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 
[\[258a.3\]]'das bdag gis yi dam chen po bcu po gang dag blangs pa'i yi dam chen po bcu po 'di dag la bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid par 'gyur ba lta na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bden pa'i tshig 'dis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir lha'i me tog gi char 'bab par gyur cig_/lha'i 
[\[258a.4\]]sgra grag par gyur cig_/des kyang bdag gi bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'di len par gyur cig_/lha mo dpal phreng gis tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu de'i tshe lha'i me tog gi char chen po bab nas bar snang las lha'i sgra grag par gyur te/_des bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs de mnos nas lha mo de de bzhin no/_/
[\[258a.5\]]ji ltar khyod kyis bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs byas pa de ni de bzhin du 'gyur te gzhan du ma yin no zhes byas so/_/de nas rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul de yang mthong /_lha'i sgra mnos pa de yang thos nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor the tshom med cing mchog tu dga' bar gyur te/_lha mo dpal phreng dang mi 'bral zhing 
[\[258a.6\]]'grogs par smon lam btab bo/_/'khor de thams cad kyang de bzhin du 'bral bar mi 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan to/_/de nas lha mo dpal phreng gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar smon lam chen po gsum btab bo/_/gsum gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bden pa'i 
[\[258a.7\]]byin gyi rlabs 'dis sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa dag la sman btags pa gang lags pa'i bsod nams bsags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des bcom ldan 'das bdag tshe rabs thams cad du dam pa'i chos rtogs pa thob par gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi smon lam chen po dang po lags so/_/
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dam pa'i chos rtogs pa de thob nas kyang ngal ba dang yongs su skyo ba ma mchis par sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi smon lam chen po gnyis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dam pa'i chos bstan pa de yang lus dang 
[\[258b.2\]]srog la mi lta bar dam pa'i chos bsrung ba dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi smon lam chen po gsum pa lags te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni smon lam chen po gsum po de dag 'debs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dpal 
[\[258b.3\]]phreng gi smon lam chen po yul che ba gsum po 'di dag lung ston pa mdzad de/_lha mo 'di lta ste dper na gzugs su gtogs pa thams cad ni nam mkha'i khams kyi khongs su 'dus shing khongs su gtogs la khongs su chud do/_/lha mo de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 
[\[258b.4\]]dag kyang smon lam chen po 'di gsum gyi khongs su 'dus shing khongs su gtogs la khongs su chud de/_smon lam chen po gsum po de dag ni de ltar yul che'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di la smon lam chen po'i yul bstan pa 
[\[258b.5\]]gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bdag gis spobs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha mo khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas gnang gis khyod spobs par gyis shig de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems 
[\[258b.6\]]dpa'i smon lam gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gang dag lags pa de dag thams cad kyang 'di ltar dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i smon lam chen po gcig gi khongs su 'dus shing khongs su chud de/_bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de ltar yul che ba lags so/_/de nas 
[\[258b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dpal phreng la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_lha mo legs so legs so/_/lha mo khyod ni shes rab zab pa ste/_thabs kyis yongs su bsgos pa'i shes rab dang ldan no/_/lha mo sems can gang dag khyod kyis chos bstan pa'i don rtogs pa de dag ni dkon pa yin te/_
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]yun ring po nas sangs rgyas du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed bskyed pa yin no/_/lha mo khyod kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba bstan pa ji skad bshad pa de bzhin du 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang dam pa'i 
[\[259a.2\]]chos yongs su gzung ba bstan pa de nyid bshad do/_/'chad do/_/'chad par 'gyur ro/_/lha mo nga yang da ltar mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mchog thob nas dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba bstan pa rnam pa du mar ston te/_lha mo de ltar dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba bstan pa ngas rnam pa du 
[\[259a.3\]]mar bshad kyang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i yon tan rnams kyi mtha' 'am mu thug pa med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs pa la yang mtha' 'am mu thug pa med do/_/lha mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de ltar don che'o/_/lha mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de ltar 
[\[259a.4\]]phan yon che'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus don chen po bstan pa gzhan yang bdag gis spobs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha mo da de'i dus la bab par shes 
[\[259a.5\]]na khyod spobs par gyis shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu ma mchis pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags 
[\[259a.6\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni chos kyi sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong sdud pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dper na 'chags pa'i dus kyi tshe'i sprin chen po'i ni bdog mtha' yas pa'i rgyun dang /_rin po che mtha' yas pa'i rgyun dang ldan pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du 
[\[259a.7\]]dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa yang bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i chab kyi rgyun dpag tu ma mchis pa dang /_ye shes rin po che'i rgyun dpag tu ma mchis pa dang ldan pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dper na 'chags pa'i dus kyi tshe chab kyi phung po chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]'jig rten gyi khams kyi skye gnas de las ni gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kha dog sna tshogs pa dang /_dbyibs sna tshogs pa 'byung zhing /_'khor gling phran bye ba brgya phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi chab kyi phung po chen po de las 'byung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin 
[\[259b.2\]]pa theg pa chen po yang dag par 'grub pa'i 'byung khungs dang /_skye gnas su gyur pa de las byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad dang /_chos snang ba'i sgo rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang /_'jig rten gyi dbang phyug 
[\[259b.3\]]thams cad dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba lha dang mi rnams kyis sngon ma myong ba gang lags pa thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das dper na sa chen po ni khur chen po bzhi'i rten bgyid pa lags te/_bzhi po de dag gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_chab kyi 
[\[259b.4\]]phung po chen po rgya mtsho dang /_ri mang po thams cad dang gnas pa dang /_rtswa dang /_shing gel pa dang /_sman dang /_me tog dang /_nags tshal thams cad dang /_sems can gyi tshogs thams cad kyi rten bgyid de/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sa chen po khur chen po bzhi po 'di dag gi rten 
[\[259b.5\]]bgyid pa de bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni sa chen po bas kyang ches khur chen po bzhi khyer ba lags so/_/bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo sems can dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing 
[\[259b.6\]]thos pa dang mi ldan la chos can ma lags pa rnams lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par bgyid pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag la sbyor ba ni sa chen po bas kyang ches khur chen po khyer ba lags so/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo sems can kha cig nyan thos kyi theg pa la sbyor bar bgyid pa ni sa chen 
[\[259b.7\]]po bas kyang ches khur chen po khyer ba lags so/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo sems can kha cig rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sbyor bar bgyid pa ni sa chen po bas kyang ches khur chen po khyer ba lags so/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo sems can kha cig theg pa chen po la sbyor bar bgyid 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]pa ni sa chen po bas kyang ches khur chen po khyer ba lags te/_bcom ldan 'das bzhi po de dag ni khur chen po lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni khur chen po 'di bzhi khyer ba lags te/_sa 
[\[260a.2\]]chen po bas kyang ches rten du gyur pa dang /_sa chen po bas kyang ches khur chen po khyer ba dang /_khur mtha' yas pa khyer ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi gzhi rten du gyur pa dang /_byams pa bgyis pa dang snying rje can dang /_sman par 'tshal ba dang snying brtse ba dang /_chos kyis 
[\[260a.3\]]'jig rten gyi ma zhes bgyi ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dper na sa chen po ni rin po che sna bzhi'i 'byung gnas lags te/_sna bzhi po de dag gang zhe na/_rin po che rin thang ma mchis pa dag gi 'byung gnas dang /_rin po che rin thang mchis pa dag gi 'byung gnas dang /_rin 
[\[260a.4\]]po che de bas chung ba dag gi 'byung gnas dang /_rin po che de bas kyang chung ba dag gi 'byung gnas lags te bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sa chen po rin po che sna bzhi po 'di dag gi 'byung gnas su gyur pa de bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 
[\[260a.5\]]'dzin pa la brten nas sems can rnams kyis rin po che'i mchog chen po rin po che thams cad kyi dam par gyur pa bzhi'i khe rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na dge ba'i bshes gnyen rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de la brten nas sems can rnams kyis lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa 'thob 
[\[260a.6\]]par bgyid pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi khe rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /_nyan thos kyi theg par nye bar 'gro ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thob par bgyi ba rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par nye bar 'gro ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thob par bgyi ba rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /_yang dag par 
[\[260a.7\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su nye bar 'gro ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs ches mthon po thob par bgyi ba rnyed par 'gyur ba ste/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la brten nas sems can rnams kyis rin po che thams cad kyi mchog ngo 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]mtshar rmad du byung ba'i rin po che chen po bzhi'i khe rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das gter chen po rin po che mtha' yas pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bgyi ba de ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dam pa'i 
[\[260b.2\]]chos yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bgyi ba ni bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos kyang gzhan ma lags la/_dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po yang gzhan ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po nyid dam pa'i chos lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[260b.3\]]rnams kyang gzhan ma lags dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po yang gzhan ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa nyid pha rol du phyin pa rnams lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs 
[\[260b.4\]]su 'dzin pa ni sems can gang dag sbyin pas yongs su smin par bgyi ba de dag ni sbyin pas yongs su smin par bgyid de/_tha na lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag yongs su gtong bas kyang yongs su smin par bgyid de/_de ltar yongs su smin par bgyis pa rnams dam pa'i chos la gnas par 
[\[260b.5\]]'gyur ba 'di ni de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag tshul khrims kyis yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i sems can de dag ni dbang po drug bsdams pa dang /_lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi las yongs su dag pas yongs su smin par bgyid 
[\[260b.6\]]de/_tha na spyod lam gyis kyang de dag gi sems bsrung zhing yongs su smin par bgyid de/_de dag de lta de ltar yongs su smin par bgyis pas dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag bzod 
[\[260b.7\]]pas yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i sems can de dag la ni de dag gis de la spyos brgyad de gtse bar bgyis kyang gnod sems ma mchis shing sman par 'tshal ba dang /_bzod pa'i stobs dam pa dang ldan pas yongs su smin par bgyid de/_tha na bzhin gyi mdangs kyis kyang de dag gi sems 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]srung zhing yongs su smin par bgyid de/_de dag yongs su smin par bgyis pas dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag brtson 'grus kyis yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i sems 
[\[261a.2\]]can de dag ni sems ma zhum zhing le lo ma mchis pa dang /_'dun pa chen po dang brtson 'grus rtsom pa mchog dang ldan pas yongs su smin par bgyid de/_tha na rang gi spyod lam bsgrims pas kyang de dag gi sems srung zhing yongs su smin par bgyid de/_de dag de ltar yongs su 
[\[261a.3\]]smin par bgyis pas dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag bsam gtan gyis yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i sems can de dag ni sems mi g.yeng ba dang /_yid phyi rol du mi rgyu ba dang /_
[\[261a.4\]]dran pa 'khrul pa ma mchis pa mchog dang ldan pas yongs su smin par bgyid de/_tha na bgyis nas yun ring du lags pa dang /_smras nas yun ring du lags pa mi bskyud pas kyang de dag gi sems srung zhing yongs su smin par bgyid de/_de dag de ltar yongs su smin par bgyis pas 
[\[261a.5\]]dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag shes rab kyis yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i sems can de dag ni sems can gyi don 'dri ba dag la le lo ma mchis par lung ston pa dang /_bstan 
[\[261a.6\]]bcos thams cad dang /_rig pa dang bzo'i gnas thams cad kyi mthar phyin pas yongs su smin par bgyid de/_tha na bzo grwa'i gnas chen po dag tu yang de dag gi sems srung zhing yongs su smin par bgyid de/_de dag de ltar yongs su smin par bgyis pas dam pa'i chos la gnas 
[\[261a.7\]]par 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags la/_dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po yang gzhan ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po nyid pha 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]rol tu phyin pa rnams lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus don chen po bstan pa gzhan yang bdag gis spobs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha mo de bzhin gshegs pas gnang gi khyod kyis spobs par gyis shig_/de nas 
[\[261b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po zhes bgyi ba ni bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa yang gzhan ma lags la/_dam pa'i chos yongs su 
[\[261b.3\]]'dzin pa po yang gzhan ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po nyid dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa des ni bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i 
[\[261b.4\]]chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du yan lag gsum yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/_gsum gang zhe na/_'di ltar lus dang srog dang longs spyod rnams te/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo lus yongs su gtong bas ni sangs rgyas kyi sku 'khor ba'i phyi ma'i 
[\[261b.5\]]mtha'i mu dang mnyam pa rga ba dang /_na ba dang 'chi ba dang bral ba mi shigs pa/_rtag pa/_brtan pa/_zhi ba/_ther zug pa/_'chi 'pho dang bral ba/_mtha' yas pa/_yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs 
[\[261b.6\]]kyi bu mo srog yongs su gtong bas ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par 'phrul bar gnas pa 'khor ba'i phyi ma'i mtha'i mu dang mnyam pa 'chi 'pho dang bral ba/_mtha' yas pa rtag pa yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am 
[\[261b.7\]]rigs kyi bu mo longs spyod yongs su gtong bas ni sems can thams cad kyis mchod pa 'khor ba'i phyi ma'i mtha'i mu dang mnyam pa sems can thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa/_bas par mi 'gyur ba/_rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa/_rtag par rgyun mi 'chad cing rtag tu 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]gnas pa/_yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa yan lag gsum po 'di dag yongs su gtong bas ni yon tan shin tu rmad du byung ba 
[\[262a.2\]]gsum po de dag thob par 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyang lung ston par mdzad do/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i tshe dge slong dang dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma rnams bye zhing gnyis 
[\[262a.3\]]su gyur la sde sder chad de/_phyogs phyogs su gyes nas rtsod par gyur pa na g.yo ma mchis shing gya gyu ma mchis la sgyu ma mchis par chos la dga' zhing dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du chos can gyi phyogs la 'jug par bgyid na bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs 
[\[262a.4\]]kyi bu mo de zhugs pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad las lung bstan pa nges par thob par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de ltar brtson 'grus chen po lags pa snyam bdag bgyid de/_'di la bcom ldan 'das nyid spyan du gyur pa lags te/_ye 
[\[262a.5\]]shes su gyur pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das ni chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das ni mnga' bdag lags/_bcom ldan 'das ni ston pa lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dpal phreng gis dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa bstan pa 
[\[262a.6\]]la rjes su yi rang ba mdzad de/_lha mo de de bzhin te/_lha mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni brtson 'grus chen po yin no/_/lha mo dper na mi stobs dang ldan pas gnad du mi drag par bsnun du zin kyang snad par 'gyur zhing nad skyed par byed do/_/lha mo de bzhin du dam pa'i chos 
[\[262a.7\]]yongs su 'dzin pa ni chung du zin kyang bdud sdig can la gnod par 'gyur zhing mya ngan skyed la smre sngags 'don par byed do/_/lha mo ngas ni bdud sdig can la dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ji ltar gnod par 'gyur zhing mya ngan skyed la smre sngags 'don par byed pa de ltar gnod par 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]de ltar mya ngan skyed pa dang de ltar smre sngags 'don par byed pa'i dge ba'i chos gzhan gcig kyang ma mthong ngo /_/lha mo dper na ba lang gi mchog khyu mchog gis ni 'di ltar 'phang mtho ba dang chu zheng gis ba lang gi tshogs thams cad zil gyis mnan te mngon par brjid cing yang dag par 
[\[262b.2\]]mngon par brjid do/_/lha mo de bzhin du theg pa chen po pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa yang chung du zin kyang 'di ltar rgyas pa dang /_rgya chen por gyur pas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi dge ba'i chos thams cad zil gyis gnon to/_/lha mo dper na ri'i rgyal po 
[\[262b.3\]]ri rab kyis ni 'di ltar mtho ba dang /_rgya che bas ri nag po thams cad zil gyis gnon cing mngon par lhag ger 'dug go_/lha mo de bzhin du theg pa chen po pa'i lus dang srog la mi lta zhing /_phan gdags pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa yang 'di ltar rgyas 
[\[262b.4\]]pa dang rgya chen por gyur pas theg pa chen po pa theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa lus dang srog la lta ba rnams kyi dge ba'i chos thams cad zil gyis gnon na gzhan dag gi lta ci smos te/_lha mo de bas na sems can rnams dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba nyid yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug 
[\[262b.5\]]par bya/_yang dag par bstan par bya/_yang dag par gzengs bstod par bya/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya/_gzud par bya dgod par bya'o/_/lha mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de ltar don che'o/_/de ltar 'bras bu che'o/_/de ltar phan yon che'o/_/lha mo gal 
[\[262b.6\]]te bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med par dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i yon tan dang phan yon ngas bshad du zin kyang lha mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i yon tan dang /_phan yon bshad pa de dag gi mtha' 'am mur thug par mi 'gyur ro/_/lha mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa 
[\[262b.7\]]ni de ltar yon tan mtha' yas pa dang ldan no/_/lha mo dam pa'i yongs su gzung ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bzhed pa ngas bstan pa ded khyod kyis bshad pa spobs par gyis shig_/de nas lha mo dpal phreng gis bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]bskul ba mnos te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos zhes bgyi ba de ni theg pa chen po'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 
[\[263a.2\]]thams cad dang /_'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i chos thams cad ni theg pa chen pos rab tu phye ba'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na klung chen po bzhi ni mtsho ma dros pa las 'byung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du nyan thos dang rang sangs 
[\[263a.3\]]rgyas thams cad dang /_'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i chos thams cad kyang theg pa chen po las 'byung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das dper na sa bon gyi rnam pa gang ci yang lags pa dag dang /_rtswa dang shing gel pa dang sman dang /_nags tshal de dag thams cad ni sa chen 
[\[263a.4\]]po la rten cing sa chen po la gnas te skye zhing 'phel la rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gang lags pa dag dang /_'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i chos gang lags pa de dag thams cad ni theg pa chen po la rten cing 
[\[263a.5\]]theg pa chen po la gnas te skye zhing 'phel la rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas theg pa chen po la gnas shing theg pa chen po yongs su bzung na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad dang /_'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i chos 
[\[263a.6\]]thams cad kyang rten cing gnas te yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dam pa'i chos gnas pa dang /_dam pa'i chos nub pa dang /_so sor thar pa dang /_'dul ba dang /_rab tu 'byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs pa gnas drug po 'di dag dang /_
[\[263a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan cing btags pa gang lags pa'i gnas drug po de dag kyang theg pa chen po'i dgongs pa las byung ba lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos gnas pa zhes bgyi ba'i btags pa 'di ni theg pa chen po'i dgongs pa can lags te/_
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po gnas pa nyid ni dam pa'i chos gnas pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba zhes bgyi ba'i btags pa 'di ni theg pa chen po'i dgongs pa can lags te/_bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po nub pa nyid ni dam pa'i chos 
[\[263b.2\]]nub pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das so sor thar pa dang 'dul ba zhes bgyi ba'i chos 'di gnyis ni don gcig ste/_yi ge'i 'bru ni tha dad lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'dul ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni theg pa chen po pa rnams kyi bslab pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_
[\[263b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi slad du rab tu 'byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs pa lags pa'i slad du ste/_bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas 'di ltar 'dul ba zhes bgyi ba dang rab tu 'byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi ba'i btags pa 'di ni 
[\[263b.4\]]theg pa chen po'i cho ga'i tshul khrims kyi phung po lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa ma mchis so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi slad du rab tu 'byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs pa 
[\[263b.5\]]ni ma mchis kyi/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi slad du nyan thos rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa lags pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs 
[\[263b.6\]]pa nyid la skyabs su mchi ba lags te/_bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'jigs pa dang bcas pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'du byed thams cad la mi 
[\[263b.7\]]bzad par 'jigs pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa lags pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das dper na gshed mas ral gri gzas pa bzhin te/_bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas de dag kyang nges par 'byung ba shin tu bde ba thob pa ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/_
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]skyabs su gyur pa ni skyabs gzhan tshol ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sems can skyabs ma mchis pa rnams gang dang gang gis 'jigs skrag pa'i 'jigs skrag pa de dang de las 'byung ba tshol ba de bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs 
[\[264a.2\]]rgyas rnams la yang 'jigs pa de mchis te/_'jigs pa des skrags pas dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchi bar khas len pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'jigs pa 
[\[264a.3\]]dang bcas pa lags te/_bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang skye ba'i chos kyi lhag ma dang bcas pa lags te/_bcom ldan 'das de dag gi skye ba ma bas pa yang mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das de dag ni bsten par bgyi ba'i lhag ma 
[\[264a.4\]]dang bcas pa lags te/_des na de dag ni dag pa ma lags/_las mthar phyin pa ma lags te de dag gi bgyi ba mang lags so/_/de dag gi spang bar bgyi ba'i chos gzhan yang mang du mchis te/_de dag ma spangs pas dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang 
[\[264a.5\]]mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings dang ring ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[264a.6\]]sangs rgyas rnams ni mya ngan las 'das pa brnyes pas yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa lags la/_bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams ni yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das 
[\[264a.7\]]pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs lags te/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni mya ngan las 'das pa brnyes pas yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa lags la/_
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs lags te/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_
[\[264b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni mya ngan las 'das pa brnyes pas spang bar bgyi ba'i skyon thams cad spangs shing mchog tu yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa lags la/_bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_
[\[264b.3\]]rang sangs rgyas rnams ni skyon gyi lhag ma rnams dang bcas pa/_yongs su ma dag pa'i chos can lags pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs lags te/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom 
[\[264b.4\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni mya ngan las 'das pa brnyes pa'i slad du ste/_bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings dang ring ba lags 
[\[264b.5\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis rnam par grol ba la so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi mtha' dbugs phyin pa rjes su dran pa bzhi po gang lags pa de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa can dang /_lhag ma dang bcas pa dang /_
[\[264b.6\]]drang ba'i don dang rnam par phye ste lung bstan par bgyi ba lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'chi 'pho ni 'di gnyis lags te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_rgyun chad pa'i 'chi 'pho dang /_yongs su bsngos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'chi 'pho lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[264b.7\]]'das de la rgyun chad pa'i 'chi 'pho ni nying mtshams sbyor ba dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams kyi lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das yongs su bsngos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'chi 'pho ni dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]chen po dbang thob pa dang /_yid kyi lus rnams lags te/_byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de la 'chi 'pho 'di gnyis las rgyun chad pa'i 'chi 'pho'i dbang du bgyis te/_bdag gi skye ba zad do snyam du dgra bcom pa 
[\[265a.2\]]rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa 'byung lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar lhag ma dang bcas pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis pa la brten nas bdag gis tshangs par spyod pa bsten to snyam du dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa 
[\[265a.3\]]'byung lags so/_/byis pa so so'i skye bo dang lha dang mi bgyi ba dang bcas pa thams cad dang /_slob pa bdun po dag gis nying mtshams sbyor ba dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spang ba sngon ma bgyis pa de spangs pa la brten nas bya ba byas so snyam du dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang 
[\[265a.4\]]sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa 'byung lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes so zhes bgyi ba ni dgra bcom pas spang bar bgyi ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang /_yang srid par nying mtshams sbyor ba'i dbang du bgyis nas 'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes so snyam 
[\[265a.5\]]du dgra bcom pa rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa 'byung lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes so snyam pa'i shes pa de yang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa yang ma lags/_skye ba thams cad yongs su 'tshal ba las byung ba yang ma 
[\[265a.6\]]lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams la yang nyon mongs pa rnams ma spangs pa dang /_skye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su ma 'tshal ba yang mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa dag 
[\[265a.7\]]ni rnam pa gnyis te/_gnas kyi sa'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang /_kun nas ldang ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams so/_/bcom ldan 'das gnas kyi sa yang rnam pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di ltar lta ba gcig la gnas pa'i gnas kyi sa dang /_'dod pa'i 'dod chags la gnas 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]pa'i gnas kyi sa dang gzugs kyi 'dod chags la gnas pa'i gnas kyi sa dang /_srid pa'i 'dod chags la gnas pa'i gnas kyi sa ste/_bcom ldan 'das gnas kyi sa bzhi po de dag gis nyon mongs pa kun nas ldang ba thams cad skyed lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de dag 
[\[265b.2\]]kyang skad cig pa ste/_sems kyi skad cig pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyis thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas mchis pa ni sems dang mi ldan pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gnas kyi sa bzhi po 'di dag gi nang na stobs 
[\[265b.3\]]che ba gang lags pa de ni nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pa ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa stobs che ba'i grangs sam/_cha 'am/_bgrang ba'am/_dpe 'am/_rgyur yang mi bzod lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar na ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa ni stobs che ba 
[\[265b.4\]]lags te/_srid pa'i 'dod chags la gnas pa'i sa zhes kyang bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das dper na bdud sdig can ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du gtogs kyang 'di ltar gzugs dang /_kha dog dang /_gzi brjid dang /_stobs dang /_'khor dang /_dbang 
[\[265b.5\]]phyug gis gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams zil gyis gnon to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa srid pa'i 'dod chags la gnas pa'i gnas kyi sa zhes bgyi bas kyang gnas kyi sa bzhi po 'di dag zil gyis gnon te/_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gang 
[\[265b.6\]]gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed kyi rten du gyur pa dang /_nyon mongs pa bzhi dang yang yun ring po nas lhan cig gnas pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pas mi rdzi ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyis gzhom par bgyi ba 
[\[265b.7\]]lags te/_bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa ni stobs che ba lags so//_//bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma/_bcom ldan 'das dper na len pa'i rkyen gyis zag pa dang bcas pa'i las kyi rgyu las byung ba'i srid pa gsum 'byung ba de bzhin du/_
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa'i rkyen gyis zag pa ma mchis pa'i las kyi rgyu las byung ba'i dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dbang thob pa rnams kyi yid kyi lus gsum 'byung ste/_
[\[266a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa ni sa gsum po 'di dag tu yid kyi lus gsum po 'di dag 'byung ba dang /_zag pa ma mchis pa'i las mngon par sgrub pa'i rten lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das rkyen mchis na rkyen 'byung ste/_de lta lags pas ma rig pa'i 
[\[266a.3\]]gnas kyi sa ni yid kyi lus gsum po rnams dang /_zag pa ma mchis pa'i las kyi rkyen lags pa'i slad du srid pa'i 'dod chags la gnas pa'i gnas kyi sa dang ming 'dra ba lags so/_/de lta lags kyang srid pa'i 'dod chags la gnas pa'i gnas kyi sa dang las thun 
[\[266a.4\]]mong ba ni ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa ni gnas kyi sa bzhi po dag las tha dad pa kho na lags te/_yongs su grol ba'i sa pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sa spang bar bgyi ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyis gzhom 
[\[266a.5\]]par bgyi ba lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sa ni gnas kyi sa bzhi spangs kyang zag pa zad pa la dbang ba'i stobs kyang mi 'thob/_mngon sum du yang mi bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das zag pa 
[\[266a.6\]]zad pa zhes bgyi ba de ni ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_srid pa tha ma par gtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sas 
[\[266a.7\]]bsgribs shing chod la yongs su dkris te ldongs par bgyis pas chos de dang de dag rab tu ma 'tshal cing mi rtogs so/_/bcom ldan 'das chos de dang de dag ma 'tshal cing ma mthong bas spang bar bgyi ba'i chos de dang de dag mi spongs shing byang bar mi bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das spang 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]bar bgyi ba'i chos de dag ma spangs shing byang bar ma bgyis pas bcom ldan 'das de dag skyon las rnam par grol ba lhag ma dang bcas pa lags kyi/_skyon thams cad las rnam par grol ba ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de dag ni rnam par dag pa lhag ma dang bcas 
[\[266b.2\]]pa'i chos can lags kyi/_thams cad rnam par dag pa'i chos can ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de dag ni lhag ma dang bcas pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa lags kyi/_yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang dag skyon las rnam 
[\[266b.3\]]par grol ba lhag ma dang bcas pa lags kyi/_skyon thams cad las rnam par grol ba ni ma lags pa dang /_rnam par dag pa lhag ma dang bcas pa'i chos can lags kyi/_thams cad rnam par dag pa'i chos can ni ma lags pa dang /_lhag ma dang bcas pa'i yon tan 
[\[266b.4\]]dang ldan pa lags kyi/_yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa ni ma lags pa de dag ni bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal yongs su 'tshal ba lhag ma dang bcas pa lags so/_/kun 'byung ba spangs pa lhag ma dang bcas pa lags so/_/sdug bsngal 'gog pa mngon sum du bgyis pa lhag ma dang bcas pa lags so/_/sdug bsngal 'gog 
[\[266b.5\]]par 'gro ba'i lam bsgoms pa lhag ma dang bcas pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang dag sdug bsngal yongs su 'tshal ba lhag ma dang bcas pa dang /_sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba spangs pa lhag ma dang bcas pa dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog pa mngon sum du bgyis pa lhag ma 
[\[266b.6\]]dang bcas pa dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam bsgoms pa lhag ma dang bcas pa de dag ni bcom ldan 'das de'i yan lag gi mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_de'i yan lag gi mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de dag ni mya ngan las 
[\[266b.7\]]'das pa'i dbyings su zhugs pa zhes bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gang dag sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su 'tshal ba dang /_sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba thams cad spangs pa dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog pa thams cad mngon sum du bgyis pa dang /_sdug bsngal 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]'gog par 'gro ba'i lam thams cad bsgoms pa gang lags pa de dag ni/_bcom ldan 'das mi rtag pas bcom zhing rtag tu na ba'i 'jig rten du rtag pa dang /_zhi ba dang bsil ba'i dngos po'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob ste/_bcom ldan 
[\[267a.2\]]'das de dag ni skyob pa ma mchis pa dang /_skyabs ma mchis pa'i 'jig rten na/_'jig rten gyi skyob pa dang /_skyabs lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das bzang ngan du 'byed pa'i chos can dag ni mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa ma lags kyi/_
[\[267a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das ye shes mnyam pa dag gis mya ngan las 'das pa thob/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par grol ba mnyam pa dag gis mya ngan las 'das pa thob/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa'i ye shes gzigs pa mnyam pa dag gis mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i slad 
[\[267a.4\]]du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni ro gcig ste/_'di ltar rig pa dang rnam par grol ba'i ror ro mtshungs pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang la la dag ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa ma spangs shing byang bar ma bgyis pa de dag 
[\[267a.5\]]ni bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su ro gcig pa ma lags te/_'di ltar rig pa dang rnam par grol bar ro mtshungs pa ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyis ma spangs shing ma sbyangs pas ni spang bar bgyi ba'i 
[\[267a.6\]]chos gang gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed ma spangs shing ma sbyangs pa'i slad du ste/_bcom ldan 'das spang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed de dag ma spangs shing ma sbyangs pas chos gang gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed ma thob cing mngon 
[\[267a.7\]]sum du ma bgyis par gyur pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa ni sgom pas spang bar bgyi ba'i nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad 'byung ba'i 'byung gnas lags te/_bcom ldan 'das de las ni sems kyi nye ba'i 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]nyon mongs pa dang /_zhi gnas kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /_lhag mthong gi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /_rnal 'byor gyi nye 
[\[267b.2\]]ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /_shes pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /_'bras bu'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /_rtogs pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /_stobs kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa yang 'byung lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[267b.3\]]'das nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyis gzhom par bgyi ba de dag thams cad kyang ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa las 'byung lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa ni nye ba'i nyon mongs 
[\[267b.4\]]pa dang /_kun nas ldang ba thams cad kyi rgyu dang /_gzhi dang /_rkyen lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kun nas ldang ba gang lags pa de dag ni skad cig pa ste/_sems kyi skad cig pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyi 
[\[267b.5\]]sa thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas mchis pa ni sems dang mi ldan pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das spang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyis gzhom zhing spang bar bgyi ba'i chos de dag thams 
[\[267b.6\]]cad kyi gzhi dang rten ni 'di ltar ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dper na sa bon gyi rnam pa gang ci lags pa dag dang /_rtswa dang /_shing gel pa dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal de dag thams cad ni bcom ldan 'das sa la brten cing sa la 
[\[267b.7\]]gnas te skye zhing 'phel la rgyas par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sa chen po tshig cing zhig la mi gda' bar gyur te ma mchis par gyur na ni sa bon gyi rnam pa gang ci lags pa dag dang /_rtswa dang /_shing gel pa dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal de dag thams cad 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]kyang tshig cing zhig la mi gda' bar 'gyur zhing ma mchis par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du spang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyis gzhom par bgyi 
[\[268a.2\]]ba de dag thams cad kyang ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa la rten cing ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa la gnas te skye zhing 'phel la rgyas par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa spangs shing sbyangs te ma mchis par gyur na ni spang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang gA'i 
[\[268a.3\]]klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyis gzhom par bgyi ba de dag thams cad kyang spangs shing sbyangs te ma mchis par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa de dag thams cad spangs

[\[268a.7\]]'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes so zhes bgyi ba'i ye shes la yang rnam pa gnyis te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rgyal ba bla na ma mchis pas bdud bzhi bcom ste pham par mdzad nas chos kyi sku 'jig rten thams cad las 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]mngon par 'phags pa sems can thams cad kyis blta bar bgyi ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa brnyes te/_shes bya'i sa thams cad la thogs pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi dbang phyug mdzad pa na 'di las lhag par bya ba 'am/_rtogs par bya ba'i sa med do zhes yang dag par 
[\[268b.2\]]gzigs te/_stobs bcu po dag gi stobs dang ldan zhing mi 'jigs pa'i sa bla na med pa'i mchog tu yang dag par gshegs te/_shes bya thams cad la sgrib pa mi mnga' ba'i ye shes kyis rnam par gzigs nas 'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes so zhes bgyi ba'i 
[\[268b.3\]]ye shes kyis seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par mdzad do/_/bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa las rgal ba de ma thag tu rnam par grol ba dag gi bde ba nyams su myong ba rnams ni 'di ltar bdag ni 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa rnams

[\[272a.4\]]rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa/_nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi sbubs nas nges par grol ba/_sangs rgyas kyi chos tha dad du mi gnas pa/_grol bar shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed dang ldan pa ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i ming gis 
[\[272a.5\]]bstan pa'i slad du ste/_bcom ldan 'das de nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po chos kyi sku nyon mongs pa'i sbubs nas nges par grol ba zhes bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po shes pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyi ye 
[\[272a.6\]]shes lags te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis sngon ma mthong ma rtogs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ni thugs su chud cing mngon sum du mdzad do/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po stong 
[\[272a.7\]]pa nyid shes pa ni 'di gnyis lags te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi sbubs dang tha dad du gnas pa ma grol bas shes pa rnams kyis stong pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]pa'i snying po'i sangs rgyas kyi chos tha dad du mi gnas shing grol bas shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed dag gis mi stong pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po stong pa nyid shes pa rnam pa 'di gnyis la ni nyan thos 
[\[272b.2\]]chen po dag kyang bcom ldan 'das nyid la yid ches pas 'jug par bas te/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stong pa nyid shes pa ni phyin ci log gi dmigs pa bzhi po dag la 'jug pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas 
[\[272b.3\]]nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis sdug bsngal 'gog pa thams cad sngon ma mthong sngon ma rtogs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ni thugs su chud cing mngon sum du mdzad do/_/nyon mongs pa'i sbubs thams cad 'joms pa sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i 
[\[272b.4\]]lam thams cad kyang bsgoms so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di dag la bden pa gsum ni mi rtag pa lags so/_/bden pa gcig ni rtag pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das bden pa gsum ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid 
[\[272b.5\]]du gtogs pa'i slad du ste/_bcom ldan 'das gang 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid du gtogs pa de ni mi rtag pa lags so/_/gang mi rtag pa de ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa slu ba'i chos can lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa slu ba'i chos can de ni mi bden pa dang mi rtag pa lags te skyabs
