[\[272b.6\]]ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas 'phags pa'i sdug bsngal bden pa dang /_sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba bden pa dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa yang yang dag par na mi bden pa dang mi rtag pa lags te/_skyabs ma lags so/_/
[\[272b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das 'di la bden pa gcig ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid kyi yul las 'das pa lags te/_bcom ldan 'das gang 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid kyi yul las 'das pa de ni rtag pa lags so/_/gang rtag pa de ni mi slu ba'i chos can lags so/_/bcom 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]ldan 'das gang mi slu ba'i chos can de ni bden pa dang /_rtag pa dang /_skyabs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas 'di la sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa nyid ni yang dag par na bden pa dang /_rtag pa dang /_skyabs lags 
[\[273a.2\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyi rnam par shes pa'i yul las 'das pa sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa'i spyod yul ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dper na dmus 
[\[273a.3\]]long gzugs la lta mi nus pa dang /_bu btsa' ba'i gnas na mchis pa'i byis pa dgung bdun lags pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la lta mi nus pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa yang byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi rnam par shes pa'i yul yang 
[\[273a.4\]]ma lags/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa'i yul yang ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba de ni mtha' gnyis la lta ba'i phyin ci log pa rnams kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags so/_/
[\[273a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa zhes bgyi ba de ni shes pa dag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das mtha' gnyis su lta ba zhes bgyi ba de ni nye bar len pa'i phung po dag la bdag tu mngon par zhen pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo 
[\[273a.6\]]rtog ge ba dag gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di gnyis ni mthar lta ba zhes bgyi ste/_gnyis gang zhe na/_chad par lta ba dang /_rtag par lta ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te 'du byed rnams la mi rtag par lta na de ni de'i chad par lta ba ma 
[\[273a.7\]]lags te/_de ni de'i yang dag pa'i lta ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te mya ngan las 'das pa la rtag par lta ba de ni de'i rtag par lta ba ma lags te/_de ni de'i yang dag pa'i lta ba lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das rtog ge ba dag gi lta 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]ba ni 'di lta bu lags te/_lus dang /_dbang po dang /_tshor ba dang /_sems pa rnams tshe 'di nyid la 'jug par mthong nas srid pa'i mtshams sbyor ba la 'jug par mi bgyid cing ma 'tshal bas ldongs par gyur pa skad de chad par lta bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das rtog 
[\[273b.2\]]ge ba dag gi lta ba ni sems kyi rgyud la rmongs shing sems kyi skad cig 'jig pa la yang 'jug par mi bgyid la/_rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul du ma gyur pa skad de rtag par lta bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar rtog ge ba dag gi lta ba ni de lta bu dag lags pa skad de de dag 
[\[273b.3\]]ni don de las thal ba'i lta ba dang /_don de'i tha chad kyi lta ba dang /_gzhan gyi mtshan nyid dang 'dres pa'i lta bas chad par rlom sems bgyid pa dang /_rtag par rlom sems bgyid pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams ni zin pa'i phung po lnga po dag la phyin ci 
[\[273b.4\]]log par gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das de dag ni mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa dang /_bdag ma mchis pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa dang /_mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar 'du shes pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das thams 
[\[273b.5\]]cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa dag pas kyang sngon ma mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa la dad pas rtag par 'du shes pa 
[\[273b.6\]]dang /_bde bar 'du shes pa dang /_bdag tu 'du shes pa dang /_gtsang bar 'du shes pa'i sems can de dag ni bcom ldan 'das phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag ni yang dag pa'i lta ba can du 'gyur ba lags so/_/de ci'i slad 
[\[273b.7\]]du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku nyid rtag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bde ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bdag gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_gtsang ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag de 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku la de ltar mthong ba de dag ni yang dag pa mthong ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mthong ba gang lags pa de dag ni/_bcom ldan 'das kyi sras thugs las skyes pa dang /_zhal nas skyes pa 
[\[274a.2\]]dang /_chos las skyes pa dang /_chos kyis sprul pa dang /_chos kyi bgo skal la spyod pa zhes bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shes pa dag pa zhes bgyi ba ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags te 'di ltar shes pa dag pa 
[\[274a.3\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa ni shes pa dag pa de'i spyod yul yang ma lags yul yang ma lags na/_bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa rton pa bzhi'i shes pa can dag gi spyod yul ma lags shing yul ma lags pa lta smos kyang ci 
[\[274a.4\]]'tshal/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das theg pa gsum pa'i las dang po pa rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i chos can dag gis don de khong du chud par 'gyur zhing don de rtogs par 'gyur ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis rton pa bzhi bshad cing btags pa'i slad du'o/_/
[\[274a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das rton pa bzhi po 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das rton pa gcig pu 'di lta ste/_sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa ni rton pa thams cad kyi mchog 'jig rten las 'das pa lags te/_de ni yang dag par rton par bgyi ba dang /_
[\[274a.6\]]skyabs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni 'khor ba na rton pa lags te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nyid kyi dbang du bgyis nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon gyi mtha' med do zhes bshad cing btags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[274a.7\]]gshegs pa'i snying po mchis na 'khor ba zhes mchi na ni tshig de rigs pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba zhes bgyi ba ni zin pa dag gi dbang po rnams 'phos ma thag tu zin pa dag gi dbang po rnams len pa la 'khor ba zhes bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'chi 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]'pho dang /_skye ba zhes bgyi ba'i chos gnyis kyi ming de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gum zhes bgyi ba dang /_skyes zhes bgyi ba 'di ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gum zhes bgyi ba ni dbang po 
[\[274b.2\]]'gags pa 'di lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das skyes zhes bgyi ba 'di ni dbang po gsar pa rnams byung ba 'di lags te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la ni skye ba'am/_'gum pa'am/_'pho ba'am/_byung ba yang ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[274b.3\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid kyi yul las 'das pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni rtag pa dang /_brtan pa dang /_ther zug pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[274b.4\]]snying po ni tha dad du mi gnas shing 'brel la sbubs nas grol ba'i shes pa can dag gi gzhi dang /_rten dang /_gnas lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni 'brel pa ma mchis shing tha dad du gnas la shes pa grol ba ma lags pa phyi rol gyi 
[\[274b.5\]]'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi gzhi dang /_rten dang /_gnas kyang lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ma mchis na ni sdug bsngal la skyo ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa la 'dod cing don du gnyer ba dang smon pa yang ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du 
[\[274b.6\]]zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa drug po gang lags pa 'di dag dang /_rnam par shes pa gang lags pa 'di dang /_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos bdun po 'di dag ni mi gnas pa dang /_skad cig pa dang /_sdug bsngal rnams myong ba ma lags pas chos de 
[\[274b.7\]]dag ni sdug bsngal la skyo ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa la 'dod cing don du gnyer ba smon par mi rigs so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa'i mthar mchis pa dang /_mi skye ba dang /_mi 'gag pa'i chos can sdug bsngal myong ba 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]lags pas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po de ni sdug bsngal la yang skyo ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa la yang 'dod cing don du gnyer ba dang smon par 'os so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yang bdag 
[\[275a.2\]]ma lags/_sems can ma lags/_srog ma lags/_gang zag ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni sems can 'jig tshogs la lta bar lhung ba dag dang /_phyin ci log gis nyams par gyur pa dag dang /_stong pa nyid las 
[\[275a.3\]]sems g.yengs pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'di ni dam pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po lags so/_/chos kyi sku'i snying po lags so/_/'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi snying po lags so/_/rang 
[\[275a.4\]]bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi snying po lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa glo bur gyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pas nye bar nyon mongs pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul te/_bsam gyis mi khyab po 
[\[275a.5\]]snyam pa dag bgyid do/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i sems ni skad cig pa ste/_nyon mongs pa rnams kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa ma lags/_bcom ldan 'das mi dge ba'i sems kyang skad cig pa ste/_sems de yang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis 
[\[275a.6\]]kun nas nyon mongs pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa rnams ni sems la mi reg_/sems kyang nyon mongs pa rnams la mi reg pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di la ji ltar sems mi reg pa'i chos can nye bar nyon mongs par 'gyur/_bcom 
[\[275a.7\]]ldan 'das nye ba'i nyon mongs pa yang mchis la/_sems nye bar nyon mongs pa yang mchis pas bcom ldan 'das sems rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i don ni khong du chud par dka' ba lags te/_bcom ldan 'das 'di la bcom ldan 'das nyid spyan du gyur 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]pa lags te/_ye shes su gyur pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das ni chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das ni mnga' bdag lags/_bcom ldan 'das ni rton pa lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dpal phreng gi rtogs par dka' ba'i don 
[\[275b.2\]]bshad pa gsan nas rjes su yi rang ba mdzad de lha mo de de bzhin no/_/lha mo de de bzhin te/_sems rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i don ni rtogs par dka'o/_/lha mo chos 'di gnyis ni rtogs par dka' ba ste/_'di lta ste sems rang bzhin 
[\[275b.3\]]gyis yongs su dag pa rtogs par dka' ba dang /_sems de'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rtogs par dka' ba'o/_/lha mo chos 'di gnyis nyan nus pa ni khyod dam byang chub sems dpa' chos chen po dang ldan pa gzhan dag yin no/_/lha mo lhag ma nyan thos rnams ni chos 'di 
[\[275b.4\]]gnyis la de bzhin gshegs pa la dad pas 'gro bar zad de/_lha mo nga'i nyan thos gang dag dad pa dang ldan zhing dad pa'i dbang du byed pa de dag ni dad pa'i snang ba la brten nas chos dang 'thun par sdud pa'i shes pas 'di la nges par 'gyur ro/_/lha mo chos dang 'thun par sdud pa'i 
[\[275b.5\]]shes pa zhes bya ba ni lha mo dbang po'i rnam par rig pa yid kyi spyod yul la rnam par lta ba dang /_las kyi rnam par smin pa la rnam par lta ba dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams kyi gnyid la rnam par lta ba dang /_sems la dbang du gyur pa rnams kyi bsam gtan la dga' ba dang /_
[\[275b.6\]]bde ba la rnam par lta ba dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par lta ba ste/_lha mo rnam par lta ba'i rang bzhin rnam pa lnga la mkhas pa 'di dang ldan na lha mo da ltar dang /_nga 'das pa'i 'og ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nga'i nyan thos dad pa dang 
[\[275b.7\]]ldan zhing dad pa'i dbang du byed pa de dag dad pa'i snang ba la brten nas chos dang 'thun par sdud pa'i shes pas rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa dang /_sems kyi nye bar nyon mongs pa la nges par 'gyur ro/_/lha mo de dag gi nges pa de nyid ni theg pa chen po'i lam du 'jug pa'i rgyur 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]'gyur te/_lha mo de ltar na 'di lta ste/_chos zab mo mi spong ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la dad pas 'gro ba la ni phan pa mang ba yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di la sman pa 
[\[276a.2\]]mang ba'i don bshad pa gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bdag spobs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha mo khyod spobs par gyis shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gsum po 
[\[276a.3\]]'di dag ni rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo chos zab mo dag la ma rmas ma nyams par bdag nyid la srung ba dang /_bsod nams kyang mang du skyed pa dang /_theg pa chen po'i lam du yang zhugs par 'gyur ba lags so/_/gsum gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi 
[\[276a.4\]]bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang dag rang gis rig pa'i chos zab mo dang ldan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos dang 'thun par sdud pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos zab 
[\[276a.5\]]mo dag la bdag nyid kyi shes pa zhum par 'tshal nas 'di ni bdag gis mi shes te/_don 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen par zad do zhes bcom ldan 'das la sems rnam par gtod par bgyid de/_sems rnam par gtod pa de dang ldan pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[276a.6\]]'das gsum po 'di dag ni rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo chos zab mo dag la ma rmas ma nyams par bdag nyid la srung ba dang /_bsod nams kyang mang du skyed pa dang /_theg pa chen po'i lam du yang dag par zhugs par 'gyur ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs 
[\[276a.7\]]kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gsum po 'di dag las gzhan pa'i sems can gang lags pa de dag ni chos zab mo dag la nan tan gyis mchog tu bzung nas gob lob kyi sems 'dzin cing mngon par zhen te/_ston par bgyid kun tu smra bar bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]ni de dag la dam pa'i chos la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang /_gzhan mu stegs can dag sa bon rul ba lags te/_rgyal po'i thad du yang mchis la brlag par bgyi'o zhes mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das sa bon rul bar gyur pa de dag ni lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten 
[\[276b.2\]]gyis legs par tshar gcad par bgyi ba lags so/_/de nas lha mo dpal phreng gis de skad ces gsol nas/_'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dpal phreng la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_lha mo khyod kyis 
[\[276b.3\]]dus dang skabs su chos zab mo dag la bdag nyid yang dag par bsrung ba'i thabs kyi don bstan pa bshad pa dang /_dam pa'i chos kyi dgra tshar bcad pa bshad pa legs so/_/lha mo khyod ni sangs rgyas 'bum phrag bye ba mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin pas khyod kyis don 
[\[276b.4\]]bshad pa 'di las ngo mtshar che ba med do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal 'bar bas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lus la 'od kyis khyab par mdzad nas ta la bdun srid tsam du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/_zhabs kyi gom pa 'dor ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyis mnyan 
[\[276b.5\]]yod kyi grong khyer ga la ba der gshegs so/_/de nas lha mo dpal phreng 'khor dang bcas pas spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas lta bas chog mi shes shing mig mi 'dzums par lta bas bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing 'khod par gyur to/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mig rgyang gis mi 
[\[276b.6\]]slebs par gyur pa de'i tshe lha mo dpal phreng 'khor dang bcas pa mchog tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i bzhin dang ldan pas gcig gis gcig gi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams rnam pa du mar bsngags shing sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yid la byed pa ma brjed bzhin du grong khyer 
[\[276b.7\]]'thab med du dong ngo /_/de nas lha mo dpal phreng gis rang gi khyim thab rgyal po grags pa'i bshes gnyen theg pa chen po la nges par bcug go_/grong khyer chen po'i bud med kyi tshogs bu mo lo bdun lon pa yan chad thams cad theg pa chen po la btsud do/_/rgyal po grags pa'i bshes 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]gnyen gyis kyang grong khyer chen po'i skyes pa'i 'khor khye'u lo bdun lon pa yan chad thams cad theg pa chen po la btsud par gyur te/_de ltar grong khyer pa thams cad theg pa chen po la mngon du phyogs par byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyang rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du byon te nang du gshegs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[277a.2\]]dga' bo la yang bka' stsal cing /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin la yang dgongs so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la lha'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[277a.3\]]kun dga' bo la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgya cher yang dag par bstan te/_kau shi ka chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod kyis zung shig_/kau shi ka chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod kyis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la shod cig_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis 
[\[277a.4\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dag la shod cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 
[\[277a.5\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni yon tan mtha' yas pa dang ldan te/_kau shi ka nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang mdo sde 'di'i don thams cad ma lus par shes pa'am/_blta ba'i mnye bar brtag par mi nus na sems can gzhan dag gis lta ci smos/_kau shi 
[\[277a.6\]]ka de ltar na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni zab la yon tan chen po'i 'byung gnas yin no/_/kau shi ka de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i yon tan gyi ming yongs su brjod pa tsam zhig bshad kyis de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[277a.7\]]kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la legs so legs so zhes gsol te bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kau shi ka 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mtha' yas pa yang dag par bstod pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/kau shi ka 'di ni yi dam chen 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]po bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/smon lam thams cad sdud pa smon lam chen po zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/theg pa gcig tu yang dag par 'du ba bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/
[\[277b.2\]]'phags pa'i bden pa brgyad bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/chos kyi sku bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/stong pa nyid kyi don gyi dgongs pa yang dag par bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bden pa gcig tu bstan 
[\[277b.3\]]pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/rtag pa dang /_brtan pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_ther zug pa dang /_skyabs gcig tu gyur pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/phyin ci log gis bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i sems la dgongs pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/
[\[277b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras kyi yang dag pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/kau shi ka 'di ni lha mo dpal phreng gi seng ge'i sgra zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/kau shi ka mdo 'dir bstan pa gang dag bshad pa de dag thams cad ni rgyu ba bcad pa dang /_nges pa'i don dang /_rton pa gcig pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/kau shi 
[\[277b.5\]]ka lha mo dpal phreng gi seng ge'i sgra bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni ngas khyod kyi lag tu gtad kyis 'jig rten na dam pa'i chos ji srid gnas pa de srid du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad du yang dag par sgrogs shig_/ston cig_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te/_bcom ldan 
[\[277b.6\]]'das kyi spyan sngar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung zhing kun chub par byas nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_gzhan yang gang der 'dus par gyur pa dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/
[\[277b.7\]]'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las dpal phreng gis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_su ren dra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//_
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]{D93}]'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa ste 'phags pa drang srong rgyas pas zhus pa/_bam po dang po/_rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya r-i Shi byA sa pa ri pr-i ts+tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa drang 
[\[278a.2\]]srong rgyas pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi 'gram rgal bar bya ba ma yin pa/_khu byug dang /_ne tso dang /_bung ba dang /_ngang pa'i rgyal 
[\[278a.3\]]po dang /_bya'i tshogs du ma sgra snyan pa 'byin pa/_shing p+lag sha dang /_n+ya gro d+ha dang /_tsan dan dang /_mya ngan 'tshang dang /_sa la ki'i yal gas bskyabs pa/_rtag tu me tog dri zhim po sil mar bkram pa de na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_zag pa 
[\[278a.4\]]zad pa/_rdul zad pa/_chos las mi zlogs pa/_bsam gtan dang kha ton la gnas pa/_'chag sa dang khri'i steng na 'dug na ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar sa phyogs de mdzes par byed pa sha stag la/_kha cig ni nang du yang dag 'jog la gnas pa/_kha cig ni shing drung na gnas pa/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[278a.5\]]pa'i bka' kun bgro bar byed pa/_cha byad dul zhing brtan pa/_spyod lam rab tu zhi ba/_'dod pa la 'dod pa dang /_gnod sems dang /_snyom pa dang /_gnyid dang /_le lo dang bral ba sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge 
[\[278a.6\]]slong dag sbyin pa byin cig_/bya ba gang yin pa gyis shig_/tshul khrims kyi sdom pas bsdams shing dbang po sbas la yid zhi bar gnas par gyis shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong rab tu mang po la 'di lta ste/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_'od srung chen po dang /_shA ri'i bu dang /_
[\[278a.7\]]bak+ku la dang /_nam gru dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kau di n+ya dang /_de dag la sogs pa nyan thos chen po sha stag dang thabs cig ste/_yang dag par dga' ba dang /_yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam mdzad do/_/de'i tshe nub phyogs logs na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar snang ba zhig tshe 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]dang ldan pa kun dga' bos mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das nub phyogs logs na 'bar zhing snang ba zhugs kyi 'od zer lta bur gda' ba 'di ci lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' 
[\[278b.2\]]bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo 'di ni dri nag ma'i bu drang srong 'jig rten pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa drang srong rnams kyi mchog drang srong rgyas pa zhes bya ste/_drang srong dka' thub drag po la gnas pa/_bsnyen par gnas pa brgya stong gis dub pa/_lus kyi mdzes pa med 
[\[278b.3\]]pa lnga brgya tsam phyi bzhin du 'brang ba la drang srong dkar min gzhon nu dang /_mi lha dang /_rnam par bde srung gi bu dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mo'i bu dang /_sgra byed kyi bu dang /_phur bu rna dang /_me'i bu dang /_rnam par rko'i bu dang /_bsnyen par dka' dang /_de dag la sogs pas yongs su bskor nas 
[\[278b.4\]]rjes su 'chag pa'o/_/de nas de'i bar skabs su rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing dbang po zhib/_thugs zhib/_bsam gtan gyi dben pa la dgyes pa/_shing ljon pa stug po'i nang na bzhugs pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang rgyas pa 'di snyam du 
[\[278b.5\]]sems te/_kye ma'o ma la ngo mtshar te/_'di bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa phyin ci ma log pa gsung ba zhes 'jig rten du grags pa ni gnas yin no/_/ji ltar 'di kha dog rgyas pa mchog dang ldan zhing rmad du byung ba'i gzugs rgya chen po phun sum tshogs pa las na 'di gdon mi za bar de 
[\[278b.6\]]bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar bcom ldan 'das gzugs rgya chen po 'di lta bu dang ldan pas 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang phyug gi bdag po dug dang bcas pa bzhin du spangs te/_bud med rin po che sa 'tsho ma la sogs pa bud med drug stong yang spangs nas dka' thub kyi nags tshal 
[\[278b.7\]]gyi nang du gshegs te bzhugs pa 'di ni kye ma'o 'jig rten na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'o snyam du sems so/_/de nas drang srong mes sbyin gyi bus kyang rgyang ring po nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/_dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas tshul 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/_/shing sngon dag gi khrod 'dug cing /_/btso ma'i gser ltar ser bar snang /_/gzugs ni shin tu 'bar bas na/_/skye bo kun gyi dga' ba skyed/_/baidUr+ya ni dri med brag_/stug nang ri rab 
[\[279a.2\]]rtse gcig 'phags/_/ston gyi nyi ma rab lhan ltar/_/dpal gzugs 'bar ba 'di su zhig_/de nas drang srong chen po de dag thams cad dga' ste mig phye thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 
[\[279a.3\]]'dzam bu'i gling pa'i drang srong me'i phung po ltar 'bar ba/_ral pa'i cod pan can/_rgas pa/_rab tu rke ba/_zas mi za zhing bsnyen par gnas pa/_shing shun dang /_g.yang gzhi gyon pa/_thal bas byugs pa/_thang dang brag khrod na gnas pa/_bkres bkres ltar 'dug pa/_rlung 'gam 
[\[279a.4\]]pa/_zla ba phyed bsnyen gnas byas pa/_yan lag skem pa/_gcer bu pa shing shun gyon pa/_ag tshom dang /_sen mo dang /_spu ring ba/_bung ba'i kha dog lta bu/_dka' thub kyi nor can/_bzlas brjod dang /_sbyin sreg dang /_bsrung ba dang /_bkra shis pa byas pa/_sa dang /_bla 
[\[279a.5\]]gab med pa dang /_shing drung na gnas pa/_rkang pa gyen du sgreng ba/_cog cog por 'dug pa/_chu'i nang du 'jug pa/_me mdag 'bar ba dang /_sreg me rab tu 'bar ba dang /_nyi mas lus shin tu gdungs pa/_dka' thub drag pos yongs su bskor ba/_bab bab tu gnas pa/_rigs 
[\[279a.6\]]tsam gyis yongs su dga' ba/_bla na med pa'i ye shes dang bral ba de dag la ltos/_dge slong dag drang srong chen po 'di dag ni 'khor ba las 'byung ba mi shes pa dag ste/_'di dag ni 'dod pa dang rgyags pas myos pa/_yang srid par skye ba yongs su 'dzin pa/_lta ba'i rgyu ba yongs su ma dag pa sha 
[\[279a.7\]]stag go_/de nas dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das la sems thag pa nas skyabs su dong nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni tshangs par spyod pa'i tshogs sgrub pa ste/_de'i slad du bdag cag srid par skye ba mi 'dzin to/_/de nas drang srong chen po rgyas pas drang srong chen po 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]de dag gi sems dang mi 'jigs pa dman zhing lta ba dman par khad kyis khad kyis brtags nas gus pa skyes te/_rjes dang bcas par drang srong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas ral pa mang po brdzes te/_mchod phyir thogs thogs pa/_sngo sangs po/_mig gnyis ser ba/_skra rtsub cing 
[\[279b.2\]]grugs pa/_lag na dbyug gu gsum thogs pa/_gzugs rab tu mi sdug pa dang ldan pa/_nam mkha'i ngos las 'gro ba/_gtam sna tshogs kyi gtan tshigs dang ldan pa de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/'khor 'di ni kun tu rmongs 
[\[279b.3\]]pa ste/_'di na gnas lags na bdag 'dir mchis par bcom ldan 'das mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_drang srong chen po srid par skye ba thams cad kyang ngas shes te dngos po de yang rig go_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di 
[\[279b.4\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das drang srong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba gsal ba zur phyin pa/_zhib pa mkhas pa/_blo dang /_shes pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_ral pa'i zar bu'i cod pan can 'di su lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 'di 
[\[279b.5\]]ni drang srong chen po rgyas pa zhes bya ste/_rig byed rnams byed pa/_nus can bu'i bstan bcos kyis 'tsho ba/_yi ge sna tshogs sdud pa'o/_/de nas dgra bcom pa de dag thams cad kyis rgyas pa mthong nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni 'khor ba'i 
[\[279b.6\]]sdug bsngal las yongs su ma grol ba lags na/_dka' thub drag pos yongs su nyon mongs pa rnyed pa 'dis ci zhig thob/_dgra bcom pa de dag yang 'di snyam du sems te/_rgyas pa 'dis bcom ldan 'das la gtam gang bdag med pa'i gtam 'am/_sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang rab tu 
[\[279b.7\]]ldan pa'i gtam 'am/_ci'i rgyu dang rkyen gyi gtam zhig zhu snyam mo/_/de nas drang srong chen po rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba dang /_da ltar drang srong chen po tshogs pa 'di shin tu rnyed par dka' ba lags so/_/gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen po rgyas pa la 'di 
[\[280a.2\]]skad ces bka' stsal to/_/drang srong chen po khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /_dris pa de dang de de lta de ltar lung bstan par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po rgyas pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sbyin pa sbyin par bgyi/_sbyin pa ma lags pa'i don gang 
[\[280a.3\]]lags/_sbyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i don gang lags/_sbyin bdag ji ltar rab tu 'tshal bar bgyi/_ji ltar na gtong ba por 'gyur/_ji ltar na sbyin bdag lags la gtong ba po ma lags/_ji ltar na sbyin bdag sbyin pa'i mthar 'gro ba zhes bgyi/_spungs par gnas pa 'am/_brtsegs par gnas 
[\[280a.4\]]pa 'am/_ji ltar blta bar bgyi/_ji ltar na sbyin bdag len pa la mi gnas par sbyin pa sbyin pa lags/_sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ji ltar blta bar bgyi/_ji ltar na bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa lags/_bsod nams de'i rnam par smin pa ji ltar blta bar bgyi/_
[\[280a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das khyod yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba gang lags/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen po rgyas pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/drang srong chen po sems dang po bskyed pa'i gtam khyod kyis dris pa 'di ni rtsing ngo /_/de na gnas brtan sha 
[\[280a.6\]]ra dwa ti'i bu smin ma ring ba/_gnyer ma can/_mgo skya bos lag pa g.yas pas smin ma gzar nas mig lpags btegs te bltas nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/drang srong chen po rgyas pa 'di 'jig rten na grags pa yin na gtan tshigs kyi rig pa mi shes pa'i byis pa rogs rgod lta bur mkhas pa'i blo 
[\[280a.7\]]med de/_rgyu dang rkyen gyi gtam spangs shing bdag med pa'i gtam bor la lha yul ba'i rgyu'i gtam btang ste/_ci'i phyir sbyin pa'i gtam nyid zhus par gyur/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag gis drang srong chen po 'di la sbyin pa'i 'bras bu sbyin pa'i bka' mchid bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa la dris la/_nyan thos kyis bshad pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi tshul ma yin te mi dgos kyis/_kun 
[\[280b.2\]]dga' bo de skad ma zer cig 'di ni gnas ma yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis drang srong chen po rgyas pa ci dang ci 'tshal ba dris pa'i lan gdab par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i 
[\[280b.3\]]bu khyod kyang de skad mi 'tsham par ma zer/_nga'i mdun na nyan thos kyis the tshom bcad pa 'di ni mi rigs te/_nga la sems can gyi sems ma rangs par 'gyur ro/_/sems ma rangs nas 'di skad du gang gi phyir rgyas pas dris nyan thos 'chad du bcug pa las na de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams 
[\[280b.4\]]cad mkhyen pa ma yin du nges so/_/yang na ni sangs rgyas la ngar 'dzin pa yod do zhes zer bar 'gyur te/_sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba skyes nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das drang srong chen po rgyas pa'i the 
[\[280b.5\]]tshom bsal ba'i slad du bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen po rgyas pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/drang srong chen po sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i bya ba dang /_sbyin pa'i rnam par dbye ba dang /_sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i don gang yin pa dang /_sbyin bdag 
[\[280b.6\]]gis yongs su spyad na ji ltar sbyin pa sbyong ba dang /_de dag la byin na bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa ji ltar rab tu 'phel ba de nyon cig gang gi phyir sbyin pa zhes bya ba dang /_sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i don gang yin zhes bya ba ni drang srong chen po 'di la gtong ba pos sbyin pa'i dngos po yongs su gtang ste/_dad 
[\[280b.7\]]pa bskyed nas gzhan byed du bcug ste yul gzhan du song nas byed du bcug pa des kyang nor rnams rnam par gtong bar byed na nor gang gi yin pa de ni sbyin bdag yin no/_/byed du bcug pas byin pa ni gtong ba po yin gyi sbyin bdag ma yin no/_/gang rang gi dngos po bdag nyid kyis sbyin pa de ni gtong ba 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]po yang yin la sbyin bdag kyang yin no/_/drang srong chen po rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sbyin pa yongs su ma dag par blta'o/_/rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_drang srong chen po 'di la gtong ba po phyin ci log tu lta bar gyur cing ma dad pa dang ma dang ba mang la des 
[\[281a.2\]]sbyin pa byin na de'i sbyin pa de yongs su ma dag pa yin no/_/drang srong chen po gzhan yang phan btags pa'i lan du phan 'dogs par bya ba'i phyir sbyin pa byin na de yongs su ma dag pa yin no/_/des dman pa dang /_'dod pa'i rgyu'i phyir gang 'di lta bu'i sems kyis me la sbyin pa sbyin no zhe 'am/_me 
[\[281a.3\]]lce la sbyin pa sbyin no zhe'am/_chu la sbyin pa sbyin no zhe 'am/_des bdag yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir rgyal po la sbyin pa byin na sbyin pa de yongs su ma dag pa yin no/_/gang mi 'jigs pa'i phyir chom po la sogs pa la sbyin pa byin te/_thun mong ma yin pa lnga byin na sbyin pa yongs su ma dag 
[\[281a.4\]]pa yin no/_/dug sbyin pa dang /_mtshon cha sbyin pa dang /_srog chags bsad de sha sbyin pa dang /_bag med pa rnams la chang sbyin pa dang /_'di dag ni bdag gir 'gyur te bdag gi rim gro dang /_mchod par 'gyur ro snyam nas sems can bsdu ba dang 'thob pa'i phyir bsdu ba'i sbyin pa dang /_gang 
[\[281a.5\]]brjod pa dang /_sgra dang /_tshigs su bcad pa'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin pa dang /_gang gar dang glu dang /_bzhad gad dang /_rtsed mo dang /_gtam dang /_dga' bar bya ba'i phyir rol mo mkhan rnams la sbyin pa byin na sbyin pa de yongs su ma dag pa yin no/_/gang gza'i mtshan ma'i phyir skar mkhan la sbyin 
[\[281a.6\]]pa gtong bar byed pa dang /_gang gzhan gyi nor mdza' bo la sbyin pa dang /_gang gi khyim 'am zhing la gzhan gyi 'bru'i phung po 'am/_nas dang gro'i phung po la [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang bya za ba la de de la dga' ba dang mgu ba skyed na de yang sbyin pa yongs su ma dag pa yin no/_/gang bzo'i phyir sbyin pa byin pa dang /_
[\[281a.7\]]gang yang lus mi bde bas 'jigs pa'i phyir sman pa la sbyin pa dang /_gang yang slong ba rnams la spyos brgyad de tshig pa za bar byas nas sbyin pa byin na de yang yongs su ma dag pa yin no/_/gang yang sbyin pa byin pa 'di'i rnam par smin pa yod dam med ces the tshom za na de yang yongs su ma dag pa yin no/_/
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]gang yang sbyin pa byin nas gdung ba dang 'gyod pas gdungs na de yang yongs su ma dag pa yin no/_/gang yang sbyin pa byin nas gang bdag las khyer ba thams cad kyis tshe phyi ma la slar sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/snyam du 'di lta bu'i sems bskyed na de yang yongs su ma dag pa yin no/_/gang bsod nams kyi rnam 
[\[281b.2\]]par smin pa 'di ni bdag nyid kyis spyad kyi/_sems can gzhan gang la yang ma gyur cig snyam du de ltar sems bskyed na de yang yongs su ma dag pa yin no/_/gang lang tsho la bab pas sbyin pa byin pa dang /_phyis dar phyid pa dang rga ba'i gnas dang /_na bas gzir ba dang /_'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe dang /_gnad 
[\[281b.3\]]du phog pa'i sdug bsngal ba dang /_snang ba dang /_'chi ba'i mya ngan du gyur pa na sangs rgyas pa la dga' ba dang dad pa med par rtsa lag rnams kyis byed du bcug ste sbyin gnas rnams la sbyin pa byin na de yang yongs su ma dag pa yin no/_/gang yul gzhan na gnas na yang yul dang gnas che ge mo zhes bya ba na 
[\[281b.4\]]bdag sbyin bdag tu grags par 'gyur ro snyam ste grag pa'i rgyur sbyin pa byin na de yang yongs su ma dag pa yin no/_/gang yang kha zas gtong mi phod pa la 'jig rten pa mi dga' bar mthong nas sbyin phod pa'i nyes pa ni 'jig rten gyis bzod do snyam ste sbyin pa byin na de yang yongs su ma dag pa yin no/_/gang 
[\[281b.5\]]yang bud med snying du sdug ste chung mar blang bar bya ba'i don du bud med kyi gzhi las mdza' bshes dang gnyen 'dab dang 'brel ba'i phyogs la nor bu dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_rdo rje dang /_baidUr+ya dang /_dar dang /_byi ru dang /_du ku la'i ras la sogs pas mgu bar byed na de yang yongs su ma 
[\[281b.6\]]dag pa yin no/_/gang yang 'di ltar bdag la nor ni mang du yod la bdag la bu med de/_bdag gis gang rigs pa la gtang bar bya'o snyam ste sbyin pa sbyin na de yang yongs su ma dag pa yin no/_/gang yang tshe 'di la byin pas 'jig rten pha rol tu rnyed par 'gyur ro snyam pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa byin na 
[\[281b.7\]]de yang yongs su ma dag pa yin no/_/gang me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_zang zing 'dod pas dbul ba dang /_bkren pa dang /_sdug phongs pa gos dengs shing dri ma can rnams bkol te bor la phyug pa rgya chen po thob pa dag la sbyin pa byin na de yang sbyin pa yongs su ma dag pa yin te/_drang srong chen po 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag ni sbyin pa byin yang yongs su dag pa ma yin par blta'o/_/drang srong chen po de dag gi rnam par smin pa ni tshwa sgo can gyi zhing la sa bon ngan pa btab pa'i myu gu skye ba bzhin du blta ste/_sbyin pa de'i rnam par smin pa ni med pa ma yin mod kyi/_'on 
[\[282a.2\]]kyang zhing dang sa bon gyi nyes pas me tog dang 'bras bur mi 'gyur ro/_/drang srong chen po 'di lta ste/_dper na skyes bu la la zhig gang 'dod pa'i sa bon khyer te ma rmos ma bsal ba'i zhing la btab na/_de'i sa bon sa la gnas pa de la char pa bab nas bangs na gdon mi za bar myu gu skye nus par 'gyur te/_
[\[282a.3\]]'on kyang me tog dang 'bras bur ni mi 'gyur ro/_/drang srong chen po de bzhin du sbyin pa de'i rnam par dbye ba de yang bsam pa dang sbyor ba kun nas nyon mongs pa can du gyur pas 'bras bu rnam par smin pa grung por mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas drang srong chen po rgyas pas thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 
[\[282a.4\]]'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad mkhyen pa dang 'thun pa'i rnam par smin pa skye dgu rnams la phan pa dang bde ba bgyid pa ni bstan lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar tshul khrims 'chal pa dang /_tshul khrims dang ldan pa la stsal na sbyin pa'i rnam 
[\[282a.5\]]par smin pa chab mi 'tshal ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_drang srong chen po khyod sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa nyon cig_/drang srong chen po dad pas gang cung zad ci byin pa de dag thams cad ni sbyin pa zhes bya'o/_/drang srong chen po gang yang 'jig rten pha rol gyis 
[\[282a.6\]]'jigs pas snod la mi rtog par ma bslangs par yang tshul khrims dang ldan pa'am/_ngan pa'i tshul khrims 'chal pa la dad pa bskyed nas mig phye ste sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa byin na/_drang srong chen po de ni sbyin pa dag yin no/_/drang srong chen po gzhan yang sbyin pa 
[\[282a.7\]]lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/lnga gang zhe na/_'dron po dang /_nad pa dang /_nad g.yog dang /_chos smra ba dang /_yul gzhan du 'gro ba la dus su sbyin pa ste lnga po de dag go_/gzhan yang lnga ste/_chos sbyin pa dang /_zang zing sbyin pa dang /_gnas sbyin pa dang /_mar me sbyin pa dang /_
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]spos dang phreng ba sbyin pa'o/_/drang srong chen po rgyas pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa yongs su dag pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang dad pa bskyed de sems can thams cad la dmigs shing byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gus par byas te dul 
[\[282b.2\]]bas sbyin pa byin pa de thams cad ni yongs su dag pa yin no/_/thar par bsngos te sbyin pa byin pa ni yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang sbyin pa bla na med par blta ba lnga ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa la sbyin pa byin pa ni bla na med pa yin no/_/dge 'dun la sbyin pa byin 
[\[282b.3\]]pa ni bla na med pa yin no/_/chos smra ba la sbyin pa byin pa ni bla na med pa yin no/_/nad pa la sbyin pa byin pa ni bla na med pa yin no/_/pha ma la sbyin pa byin pa ni bla na med pa yin no/_/gzhan yang sbyin pa chen por 'gyur ba ni rgyal po rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug las nyams pa la sbyin pa byin na sbyin pa chen 
[\[282b.4\]]po yin no/_/rgyal pos mnar ba dang /_mgon med pa dang /_nad pa la sbyin pa byin na sbyin pa chen po yin no/_/rgyal pos spangs nas gzhan na yang nyam nga zhing srog chad la khad pa 'chi la thug pa las gsos na sbyin pa chen po yin no/_/na ba la sman byin na sbyin pa chen po yin no/_/tshul 
[\[282b.5\]]khrims phun sum tshogs pa'i 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la dus su sbyin pa byin na 'bras bu chen po yin no/_/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang /_shes rab phun sum tshogs pa dang /_rnam par grol ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba phun sum 
[\[282b.6\]]tshogs pa la sbyin pa byin na sbyin pa chen po yin no/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba bya rog dang /_'ug pa dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]la sogs pa la mi 'jigs pa byin na sbyin pa chen po yin no/_/gang la gang dgos pa dang /_mi bdog pa de'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni 
[\[282b.7\]]sbyin pa chen po yin te/_drang srong chen po de ltar na/_sbyin pa byin pa yongs su dag pa dang sbyin pa chen po yin no/_/sbyin pa yongs su dag pa 'di dag 'dod pas de ltar sbyin pa yongs su dag pa bsgom par bya'o/_/sems can gang dag gzhan dag gis de ltar bskul nas dad pa dang dang ba bskyed 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]de sbyin pa yongs su dag pa 'di la rjes su yi rang bar 'gyur ba de dag mtshungs par bsod nams skyed pa po dang sbyin bdag tu 'gyur te/_de ltar na gang rjes su yi rang ba dang /_gang skul ba de dag thams cad bsod nams skyed pa por mtshungs par 'gyur ro/_/drang srong chen 
[\[283a.2\]]po gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa ji ltar 'gyur/_ji ltar sbyin pa'i bsod nams zad par 'gyur zhes khyod kyis smras pa/_drang srong chen po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/drang 
[\[283a.3\]]srong chen po gang la la zhig bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_da ltar bzhugs pa la mchod pa byed pa de'i rnam par smin pa ni mtshungs mnyam zhing 'dra'o zhes nga 'chad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni gzugs chos kyi skus rab tu phye ba yin gyi/_chos gzugs kyi 
[\[283a.4\]]skus rab tu phye ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gang la la zhig nga 'dug pa'am/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la mchod na sems mtshungs pa'i phyir 'di gnyis la bsod nams kyi khyad par cung zad kyang med do/_/drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos ris su gtogs 
[\[283a.5\]]pa rnams la bsgo ba/_nga'i gang gis kyang deng phyin chad srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin pa len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi tshig 'byin pa dang /_phra ma dang /_ngag rtsub pa dang /_tshig kyal pa 'byin pa mi bya'o/_/brnab sems dang /_gnod sems dang /_
[\[283a.6\]]log par lta ba'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o zhes bsgo la/_de la mi la las rgyal pos bsgo ba de thos nas bsgo ba rnams rjes su srung na rgyal po de'i lus la mchod pa byed pa ma yin mod kyi rgyal po ngas bsgo ba bzhin du de dag gis byas so snyam ste dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag rgyal po des bstan cing bsgo ba 
[\[283a.7\]]rab tu srung zhing srog gcod pa la sogs pa kun du srung ba de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/gang dag rgyal po des bstan cing bsgo ba mi srung zhing mi dge ba'i las la sbyor ba de dag mi dge ba'i las byed pas tshe 'di la rgyal po de las sdug bsngal 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]rjes su 'thob par 'gyur/_de 'di nas shi ba'i dus byas nas kyang log par ltung bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/drang srong chen po de bzhin du gang dag gis nga la gzugs kyi skur mthong la bslab pa rnams rjes su mi srung ba de dag gis ci 'thob par 'gyur zhe na/_de dag gis log par lta ba bskyed 
[\[283b.2\]]nas lhas byin bzhin du sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dag nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na bslab pa rnams srung ba dang /_mchod pa yang byed par 'gyur ba de dag ni ngas mchog dam par shes so/_/drang srong chen po da ltar nga mchog tu phyin te sems can thams cad las khyad 
[\[283b.3\]]par du 'phags shing thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pas ma nges pa'i sems can rnams la ming bsgrags pas kyang bslab pa phun sum tshogs par bya'o/_/drang srong chen po gang la la zhig nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das te 'das pa'i 'og tu mchod pa byed pa de 'dug pa la mchod pa bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/drang srong 
[\[283b.4\]]chen po sems can de dag bsod nams lhag par bya ba gang byed pa thams cad ni bsod nams chen po'i 'phen pa byang chub tu 'gyur ba byas pa yin no/_/drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na chu ngogs kyi 'dam bu stug po'i nang du me btang na char pa'i rgyun 'bab pa'i chus de zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/drang srong chen po de bzhin du sbyin bdag 
[\[283b.5\]]sbyin pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po sdud par 'gyur ro/_/sbyin pa'i tshogs de yang sbyin pa po de nyid kyi rgyud la dad pa'i char pa bab na sbyin pa po nyid kyi rgyud la sogs par 'gyur mod kyi/_sbyin pa byin pa de yang phung por gnas pa'am/_spungs par gnas pa 'am/_phyogs na gnas par mi 
[\[283b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/gang yang 'di ltar sbyin pa byin pa de'i byin pa de ni sbyin pa po de la grib ma bzhin du rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur te/_des na sbyin pa po des bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa de mthong yang bsod nams de khong du mi chud do/_/drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na rgun 'bru dang /_bu ram shing ma btsir 
[\[283b.7\]]ba de la khu ba mi dmigs kyi btsir nas dmigs te/_rgun 'bru dang /_bu ram shing de'i khu ba de yang phung por gnas pa'am/_spungs par gnas pa'am/_phyogs na gnas par mi snang ngo /_/khu ba de ni rgun 'bru re re dang /_bu ram shing gi dum bu re re'i nang du 'dus pa yang ma yin no/_/drang 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]srong chen po de bzhin du sbyin pa byin pa de yang sbyin pa po'i lag pa'i rtse mo dang /_snying dang brang la rnam par mi gnas te/_sbyin pa de rnam par smin pa mi 'byin pa yang ma yin la sbyin bdag 'dor ba yang ma yin no/_/ji ltar rgun 'bru dang /_bu ram shing bor na khu ba de dmigs 
[\[284a.2\]]par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du sbyin bdag med na sbyin pa'i rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_tshe'i 'du byed ma btang bar yang sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa snang ba ma yin no/_/drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na shing n+ya gro d+ha sa bon kha ma 'bus par shing du snang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sbyin pa 
[\[284a.3\]]'phel ba las 'bras bu grung por 'gyur ro/_/drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na tshong pa la la zhig rdzas kyi tshogs nyung ngu zhig khyer te yul gzhan gyi grong khyer du song nas tshong 'dus khyad par can du rang gi rdzas nor chen por rgyas par bsgyur te/_de'i nor de nyung ngu las mang por gyur pa dang /_sbrang 
[\[284a.4\]]rtsi'i sbrang mas me tog ma rung bar byas pa ltar sbyin bdag gi rnam par smin pa yang cher sogs par 'gyur ro/_/dper na sprin ni ma 'ongs pa'i char pa'i chu rab tu 'dzin to/_/de bzhin du sbyin bdag kyang rnam par smin pa 'phen par byed de/_drang srong chen po de ltar sbyin bdag bsod nams 'phen 
[\[284a.5\]]par byed cing sbyin pa sbyin no/_/de'i 'bras bu la yang spyod do/_/de bas na len pas sbyin pa shes par byed do/_/drang srong chen po bsod nams zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pha rol tu rdzogs par byed pa 'am/_mthu rtsal thob pas srung ba ste/_de bas na bsod nams zhes bya'o/_/'jig rten pha rol 
[\[284a.6\]]nas gcig nas gcig tu lus dang longs spyod skyed par byed pa de'i phyir 'jig rten pha rol gyi zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po rgyas pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ni bka' stsal to/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam par 
[\[284a.7\]]shes pa lus su ji ltar 'jug_/rnam par shes pa 'di ji ltar na lus la chags pa skyed/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_drang srong chen po 'di lta ste/_dper na/_rgyal po grong khyer gyi dbus na 'dug na pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'jigs pas thog ma nyid du 'obs rko zhing rdzas 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]dang /_sman dang /_'phong gi slob dpon dang /_skyes bu dpa' bo sdud par byed cing rgyal mtshan bsgrengs nas gzhon nu rnams la smra'o/_/glang po che dang bal glang mo chang gis ra ro bar byed do/_/ri dang nags na gnas pa thams cad dang /_zhang blon la sogs pa thams cad sdud do/_/
[\[284b.2\]]dmag mi rnams kyang nor gyis bsdus nas 'di skad du thams cad kyang 'thab 'dod par gyis te/_so so'i lag cha thogs la ral gri phyung ste nyin mtshan ma nyal bar 'dug shig ces bsgo nas pha rol gyi dmag rta dang /_glang po che dang mir 'dres pa 'ongs pa dang /_'di ltar rgyal po des bdag 
[\[284b.3\]]gi dmag dbugs 'byin cing pha rol gyi dpung rang gi bsod nams zad pa dang /_mthu rtsal zad pa dang /_mtshon gyis rmas pa dang /_pham par ma gyur gyi bar du 'khor la glags mi rnyed par srung bar byed do/_/drang srong chen po de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po lus kyi grong khyer du song nas 
[\[284b.4\]]skye mched kyi grong khyer la mi rtag pa'i ngo bor gnas par mthong nas de'i tshe dad pa'i 'obs rko bar byed/_brtson 'grus la gnas te 'dug bzod pa'i go cha gyon/_brtsam pa chen po rtsom/_chos kyi glang po che rgyags par byed/_ye shes kyi rta la zhon zhing rgyug ste/_skye mched kyi grong khyer la 'di 
[\[284b.5\]]skad ces bag yod par ci bya ba dus su gyis shig_/pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi dpung thub par dka' ba mi rtag pa'i dmag dpag tu med pa 'ong gis/_da myur du sbyin pa'i go cha gyon cig_/ye shes kyi mtshon thogs shig_/ngo tsha shes pa dang /_khrel yod pa'i sgyogs sbyor cig_/tshul 
[\[284b.6\]]khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gtong ba'i srungs ma zhog shig ces skul lo/_/de dag kyang pha rol gyi dmag nye bar gnas pa de dang phan tshun mi 'thun pas 'bros so/_/de dag dang mi 'thun pas skye mched kyi grong khyer de zhig nas rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po de lus kyi grong khyer bor te de yul la phyogs 
[\[284b.7\]]nas 'bros so/_/rnam par shes pa bros nas lus dang dbang po'i tshogs khams kyi sbrul gyis gang bas skye mched drug zhig nas bdag po med pa yid brtan du mi rung ba'i lus kyi grong khyer 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/drang srong chen po de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i rgyal pos lus kyi grong khyer bor nas lus 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]gzhan yongs su 'dzin par byed de/_de ltar na rnam par shes pa 'di rgyal po ltar blta'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po rgyas pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pas bsod nams su nye bar mchi ba'am/_bsod nams ma 
[\[285a.2\]]lags par nye bar mchi ba'am/_mi g.yo bar nye bar mchi ba'i lus ji ltar rab tu 'tshal/_rnam par shes pa 'di nyid kyis bdag gi lus 'di yongs su btang ngam ma btang snyam du ji ltar rab tu 'tshal/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_drang srong chen po 'di lta ste/_dper na skyes bu rgya 
[\[285a.3\]]mtsho chen po rgal bar 'dod pas gzings chen po'i steng du 'dug nas chu'i nang du zhugs pa dang /_rgya mtsho chen po'i chu rlabs brgyud mar 'byung bas dkrugs pa/_mtho dma' can/_ku ma b+hi ra ma rungs pa dang /_'dzin khri dang /_chu srin byis pa gsod dang /_sbrul yod pa'i chu de'i tshu rol gyi 
[\[285a.4\]]'gram nas rlung gis phul nas 'bad mi dgos shing gnod pa med la bde bar gnas te pha rol gyi 'gram du phyin par gyur to/_/chu bo'i klung rab tu 'jigs pa de las thar pas gzings de la dga' ba bskyed nas gzings 'dis bdag mtsho chen po 'di las rgal to/_/snyam bsams nas gzings 
[\[285a.5\]]de la lan gsum bskor ba byas te gzings de la rab tu mchod pa byas so/_/drang srong chen po de bzhin du gang bsod nams byas pa'i sems can 'di nas shi 'phos pa de'i rnam par shes pa de 'di snyam du sems te/_lus 'dis bdag bde 'gro lha dang mir skye ba yongs su bzung ba dang ldan pas 
[\[285a.6\]]bdag don yod par mi'i lus thob par gyur te/_lus 'dis bdag ngan song du 'gro ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal te/_'dis lhar skye ba'i gnas yongs su bzung ngo zhes 'di ltar lus de la dga' ba bskyed nas bdag gis 'di la mchod pa legs par bya'o snyam mo/_/phyis lus de gzings bzhin 
[\[285a.7\]]du bor nas 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro'o/_/gang rang gi lus kyis bsod nams ma byas pa de'i rnam par shes pa de ni ji ltar skyes bu gzings rul bas mtsho chen po de'i nang du 'bying zhing zhig ste ma rung bar gyur nas skyes bu de yang nyam thag ste/_gzings zhig pa des 'jigs bzhin du 'gram du 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]phyin nas kyang seng ge dang stag yod pa'i 'jigs sar phyin par gyur nas de 'di skad ces zer ro/_/gzings rul bas nyon mongs kyi steng du log par song nas mtsho chen po chu'i rlabs kyis dkrugs pa sbrul gyis glongs par zhugs so zhes gzings de la de skad smra'o/_/de bzhin du rnam par shes pa 
[\[285b.2\]]'di bsod nams ma yin pa byas pa'i lus la brten nas ngan song gi sar song nas lus de la 'di skad zer ro/_/sdig pa'i lus 'dis ci zhig rnyed na sdig pa can gyi lus mngon par grub nas bdag khur lta bus non par gyur/_bdag lus rul pa 'di'i rgyus ngan song du mngon par phyogs shing 
[\[285b.3\]]zhugs te/_mchil pas nya zin pa bzhin no snyam mo/_/de ltar rnam par shes pa de legs par byas pa'i bsod nams kyis gzings bzang po bzhin du 'khor ba las rgal bar byed do/_/bsod nams ma yin pas ni log par ltung bar byed do/_/de ltar na rnam par shes pas bsod nams 
[\[285b.4\]]su nye bar 'gro ba dang /_bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba'i lus rnam pa 'di gnyis rab tu shes so/_/yang rnam par shes pas lus 'di yongs su btang nas gzhan lus gnyis par 'gro zhing nye bar 'gro'o/_/de mngal na gnas pa'i tshe zhag bdun gyi bar du rnam par shes pas bdag 
[\[285b.5\]]'di nas shi 'phos nas 'dir 'ongs so/_/las 'di byas so/_/bdag gis las 'di byas so zhes de dran nas de legs par byas pa'i las kyis dga' bzhin du 'gro'o/_/de rum na gnas pa na de'i ma la mtshan ma gsum 'byung ngo /_/gsum gang zhe na/_bzhin 'dzum zhing de'i bzhin 
[\[285b.6\]]rnyi rnyi po ma yin pa dang /_bzhin lha'i kha dog lta bur 'gyur zhing rkang pa g.yas pa la rab tu gnon la dku g.yas pa la lan du mar nyug pa dang /_de gos dkar po dang rab tu mdzes pa ste/_bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba'i rnam par shes pa ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe ma'i gzugs de lta bur 
[\[285b.7\]]blta'o/_/drang srong chen po gang bsod nams ma yin pa'i rnam par shes pas skyes par gyur pa de zhag bdun gyi bar du bdag de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes so/_/sdig pa'i las ni 'di byas so zhes de lta bu dran par 'gyur ro/_/de de lta bu dran nas yid mi bde ba skye'o/_/yid mi bde ba skyes pa 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]de'i ma la ltas mang du 'byung bar blta ste/_lus dri mi zhim par 'gyur ba dang /_lus rid par 'gyur ba dang /_lus la sems pas khyab par 'gyur ba dang /_yang dang yang du bzhin khro gnyer sdud par 'gyur ba dang /_gang tshun chad sems can de mngal du skyes par gyur pa 
[\[286a.2\]]de tshun chad khyim der nyon mongs pa dang /_gnod pa dang /_nad mang por 'gyur ro/_/sems can de btsas pa'i tshe yang na ni ma 'chi ba'i dus byed pa dang ldan par 'gyur/_yang na ni bdag nyid mngal na gnas pa'i tshe ma rung bar 'gyur te/_drang srong chen po de lta bu ni bsod nams ma 
[\[286a.3\]]yin pas nye bar 'gro ba'i sems can du blta'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po rgyas pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di la rnam par shes pa de thog ma mngal du skyes pa'i tshe ci dran/_ci rnam par shes par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[286a.4\]]stsal pa/_drang srong chen po 'di la rnam par shes pa thog ma skyes pa'i tshe 'di lta bu dran par 'gyur te/_kun dga' ra ba dang /_skyed mos tshal dang /_nags tshal dang /_rdzing dang /_lu ma dang /_gser gyi gzhal med khang mthong zhing 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir skye bo mdza' ba 'du 
[\[286a.5\]]bas gang ba dang /_mchog tu yid du 'ong ba'i bsod nams byed pa'i sems can gyis gang bar mthong ngo /_/lha'i shes pa'i snang bas tshe rabs brgya stong du ma rjes su dran no/_/rjes su dran zhing rjes su dran nas kyang dga' bskyed de/_'di ni skye ba lnga brgyar bdag gi mar gyur to zhes de 
[\[286a.6\]]ltar rab tu shes te/_de ltar rjes su dran nas ma de la chags par mi byed cing 'dod chags dang bral ba skyed de/_kye ma 'o 'di ltar yang skye ba dang 'byung ba ni sdug bsngal te 'khor bas ni chog go_/yongs su 'dzin pa 'dis kyang chog go snyam mo/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_
[\[286a.7\]]drang srong chen po rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can de mi chags na 'khor ba las 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_drang srong chen po thams cad de lta bu ni ma yin te/_rnam par shes pa de ni 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]gzugs med pa/_bstan tu med pa/_snang ba med pa'o/_/gang rnam par shes pa'i khams chags pa med par ma gyur par 'khor bar mi skye ba de lta bu'i gnas med do/_/bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba dang /_mi g.yo bar nye bar 'gro ba dang /_mya ngan las 'da' bar nyer bar 'gro ba 
[\[286b.2\]]thams cad ni de ltar 'gyur ro/_/drang srong chen po de dag ni 'di ltar blta ste/_rnam par shes pa gang de ltar sems pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i shas che bar blta ste/_lus kyi shas che bas ni mi nus so/_/rnam par shes pa ni tshor bar byed pa/_rnam par shes pa ni sems par byed pa ste/_
[\[286b.3\]]de'i phyir rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/_/drang srong chen po khyod kyis rnam par shes pa de de ltar khong du chud par bya'o/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/dgra rnams thams cad shin tu bsrung /_/nyon mongs sogs par byed pa'o/_/
[\[286b.4\]]shes dang mi shes shes pa po/_/shes rab dang ni gti mug ldan/_/lta dang nga rgyal ma rig dang /_/rnam par shes pa kun la yod/_/rnam par shes pa med par ni/_/gang yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rnam par shes pa med par ni/_/de dag 'du bar mi 'gyur te/_/cig car 
[\[286b.5\]]gyur na 'du bar 'gyur/_/gcig min 'khor lo shing rta bzhin/_/skyes bu mnyam du 'du ba ni/_/nyid dang gzhan dang gnyi gas min/_/gcig gis ma yin gzhan gyis min/_/glang gnyis ji lta bzhin du'o/_/shing rta sna sgyur gnyis dang ni/_/'khor lo gnyis su ldan pa dang /_/thag 
[\[286b.6\]]pa dag gis bcings byas pa/_/shing rta zhes ni yongs su grags/_/de ltar lus kyi shing rta yang /_/khams kyi 'du 'phrod rnams las 'byung /_/de las dbang po ldan gyur te/_/rnam par shes pas rab tu bstan/_/gnad dang mtshams su sbyor ba dang /_/de ltar rtsa dang 'jing chu dang /_/
[\[286b.7\]]skra dang rus pa so dang mgo_/sen mo lpags pas mdog byas dang /_/rgyu ma glo ba mkhal ma dang /_/snying dang mcher ba tshil bu dag_/thams cad mnyam du 'dus pa las/_/lus ni shin tu gnas pa yin/_/de la khams ni lus chen te/_/sems las dngos po kun 'byung bas/_/
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]de phyir rnam par shes kyir 'dod/_/de ni kha lo sgyur bar 'dod/_/drang srong chen po gzhan yang rnam par shes pa 'di ni phra ba/_gzugs med pa/_bstan du med pa/_mi mngon pa ste/_de ni kha dog dang /_dbyibs dang /_gzugs kyi dbang po ma yin no/_/dbang 
[\[287a.2\]]po rags pa bor ba'i phyin rnam par shes par blta ba gzhan med de/_mi'i snying 'phar ba dang /_'jigs pa gang las byung ba dang /_rnam par rtog pa dang /_rnam par dpyod pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni rnam par shes pa'i shas che ba yin gyi/_lus kyi shas che ba ma yin no/_/de nas 
[\[287a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po rgyas pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi rang bzhin ji ltar blta bar bgyi/_sems can dmyal bar nye bar mchi ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su nye bar mchi ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas su nye bar mchi ba'i rang bzhin ji 
[\[287a.4\]]ltar blta bar bgyi/_ji ltar lhar nye bar mchi ba dang /_ji ltar mir nye bar mchi ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang /_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams gang lags par blta bar bgyi/_dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis lha dang mir skye bar 'gyur/_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[287a.5\]]su skye bar 'gyur ba 'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_drang srong chen po khyod sems can rnams kyi rang bzhin dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang /_'chi 'pho dang skye ba nyon cig_/yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul 'di ni mngon 
[\[287a.6\]]par shes pa lnga'i yul ma yin no/_/'di ni lha rnams dang /_tshangs pa la sogs pa 'og min la thug pa rnams kyi ma yin te/_'di ni nyan thos rnams kyi skabs kyang ma yin na sems can gzhan rnams kyi lta ga la yin/_drang srong chen po gang dri ma gsum spangs pa/_chos nyid dang po 
[\[287a.7\]]thob pa/_nga'i bstan pa la rgyun du zhugs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i yul ni 'di yin te/_de lha dang drang srong thams cad kyi ni ma yin no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_drang srong chen po rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni da 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]rgas 'khogs gtugs pas 'bras bu rnams la btsal ba'i rngo mi thog go_/bdag da khur chen po bskur ba'i rngo mi thog go_/bdag da bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_tha ba thams cad spangs pa'i 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/_/bdag deng slan chad slob ma 
[\[287b.2\]]dang bcas/_g.yog dang bcas te gsum la skyabs su mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos nas 'gro ba gang du 'gyur ba de bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_drang srong chen po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_
[\[287b.3\]]lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang /_ltas gang yin pa ngas bshad do/_/drang srong chen po 'di la me tog dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba sbyin pa dang /_bsten pa dang /_bsgoms pa dang /_mang du byas pa dang /_dad pa dang ldan pa'i skyes bu ni 'chi ba'i dus byas na phreng thogs 
[\[287b.4\]]kyi lha'i nang du skye'o/_/drang srong chen po de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe de'i lus dri rab tu zhim pa'i spos kyis bsgos pa'i me tog bzhin du snang ngo /_/drang srong chen po de la me tog gi char mang po rab tu bab nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur/_de'i lus la me tog kha dog sna tshogs rab tu 'thor bar 
[\[287b.5\]]'gyur/_de'i rtsa lag snying du sdug pa gang yin pa de dag kyang me tog thogs shing mya ngan byed par 'gyur/_de'i bzhin gyi mdog snum par 'gyur/_de'i mig ha cang btsums pa yang ma yin/_ha cang phye ba yang ma yin par 'gyur/_rkang lag legs par smyang nas 'chi ba'i dus 
[\[287b.6\]]byed par 'gyur te/_de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe 'di lta bu'i rtags 'di dag 'byung /_'di lta bu'i ltas kyang mthong bar 'gyur te/_khang pa brtsegs pa me tog sna tshogs rab tu sbyangs pa/_me tog tha dad pas mdzes par byas pa/_bud med brgya stong gis bskor ba mthong nas rtsa lag 
[\[287b.7\]]rnams la 'di skad smra ste/_bdag gis rmi lam na khang pa brtsegs pa lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_me tog gi lda ldi sbyangs pa/_lha'i me tog bkram pa/_bud med brgya stong gis bskor ba de lta bu mthong ngo zhes bdag gi rtsa lag de dag la smras nas/_de dag gis kyang 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]phreng thogs kyi lha'i nang du skye bar rig go_/de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas phreng thogs kyi lha'i nang du skye ba na pha dang ma 'dus pa mthong nas skye ba yongs su 'dzin to/_/phreng ba thogs pa de dag kyang gnyis kyi dbang po gnyis sprod par 'gyur te/_'di lta ste dper na 'dzam 
[\[288a.2\]]bu'i gling pa'i mi bzhin no/_/de la de dag gi rnam par shes pa phan tshun 'dres shing dga' ba tsam gyis non pas 'jug par 'gyur gyi de dag khu ba 'byung ba ni ma yin no/_/drang srong chen po lha de dag ni lha mos mngal na zhag bdun du 'dzin to/_/zhag bdun 'das nas dku g.yas pa nas 
[\[288a.3\]]'byung ngo /_/drang srong chen po de de'i mngal nas byung nas lha'i me tog dri rab tu zhim pa mchog tu yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs pa brgyus pa'i phreng ba brang las 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/drang srong chen po de'i phreng ba dri rab tu zhim pa'i ngad rlung gis bdas nas phyogs kun du dpag tshad tsam 
[\[288a.4\]]du 'gro'o/_/phreng ba de la kha dog bdun yod pa 'di lta ste/_dkar po dang /_dmar po dang /_ser po dang /_sngon po dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_rma dang /_pad ma rA ga las lhag pa ste/_blta na sdug pa sna tshogs kyi phreng ba de dag de ma shi bar du ma rnyis par thogs par 'gyur 
[\[288a.5\]]te/_de'i phyir de phreng thogs zhes bya'o/_/drang srong chen po phreng thogs kyi lha de dag gi gnas de na shing ljon pa ha cang yang mi ring /_ha cang yang mi thung ba 'bras bu sna tshogs ha cang yang mi skyur/_ha cang yang mi mngar la bdud rtsi dang 'dra ba'i ro bro ba mang po bzang po lha'i ro bro ba yan 
[\[288a.6\]]lag brgyad dang ldan pa dag yod do/_/drang srong chen po shing de dag gi 'bras bu de dag gi tshad ni shing tog bil ba tsam mo/_/de dag gi nang nas lha rnams gang dang gang za bar 'dod pa'i zas de dang de de dag la nye bar gnas te/_lha de dag ni 'bras bu za bar lta'i/_kham gyis za ba'i 
[\[288a.7\]]zas can ni ma yin no/_/drang srong chen po lha de dag gis phyogs ni rab tu rno ba'i tsher ma'i bag med pa/_me tog gis mdzes par byas pa ne'u gsing gis khebs pa/_gser dang dngul gyi phreng ba sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/_yid tsam ser ba lta bur snang ba'o/_/drang 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]srong chen po gnas de na phreng ba thogs pa'i lha de dag lha'i bu mo mchog tu 'bar ba'i gos dang rgyan can/_skar khung dang /_kha khyer dang /_pu shu'i ngos la rgyu ba/_bde ba dang yid bde ba mchog dang ldan pa dag dang gnas so/_/de na de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni lo nyis stong thub bo/_/de na tshe zad pa'i 
[\[288b.2\]]ltas 'byung ba ni shing gang gi drung na 'dug 'dug pa'i shing de/_lo ma rnyis/_yal ga 'phyang /_me tog dang dri yang med par 'gyur te/_sems can de yang shing drung de na mi dga' ba rnyed par 'gyur/_de'i phreng ba sngon ma rnyis pa de yang rnyes par 'gyur/_lha'i 'jig rten gyi rlung bsil zhing bde bar 
[\[288b.3\]]ldang ba de yang dro bar ldang bar 'gyur ba ste/_de'i gnas de dag mthong nas lha'i bu mo de dag nga ro gcig tu snying rje rje skad smre sngags 'don te/_sems can de yang mtho ris kyi grong khyer lha'i shing dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bus mdzes par byas pa dang /_lha'i bu mo'i tshogs dang 
[\[288b.4\]]'dre ba yongs su btang nas bsod nams zad par 'gyur ba 'di ni mtho ris kyi nyes pa'o/_/drang srong chen po de nas lha'i bu mo de dag gis de'i mtha' skor nas nyam thag pa chen po'i sgrar ngu ste/_kyi hud mi rtag pa 'di ni snying rje med pa'o/_/'di ltar snying la dga' ba skyes shing 'khod 
[\[288b.5\]]'khod pa las mi 'dod bzhin du dbang med par mtho ris nas ltung ngam/_e ma'o lha gzhon nu da myur du mi'i 'jig rten du mir skye bar gyur cig ces mya ngan byed pa na rims drag pos btab nas de rims drag pos non te/_de'i lus gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/lus 'bar bas gnas 
[\[288b.6\]]de nas 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur te/_de'i 'bar ba de khar zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas shi 'phos nas pha dang ma 'dus pa mthong bas skye ba yongs su 'dzin to/_/drang srong chen po phreng thogs su nye bar 'gro ba'i lha'i bu de 'di ltar skye bar blta ste/_ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe ltas 
[\[288b.7\]]'byung ba ni mngal na gnas pa na me tog dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba 'dod pa dang /_'bras bu sna tshogs 'dod pa dang /_nags tshal sna tshogs stug po nyams dga' ba 'dod par 'gyur/_bde ba thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur/_lus la na ba med par mngal na 'dzin par 'gyur/_
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]rmi lam na bsod nams sna tshogs kyi tshong 'dus me tog gi phreng ba spyangs pa'i grong khyer mthong ste/_'di dag ni de'i mas ltas mthong ba'o/_/drang srong chen po gzhan yang lha gzhon nu de btsas nas phreng ba thogs pa'i lha las shi 'phos pas shin tu dga' ba chen po 
[\[289a.2\]]skye'o/_/gos dkar po la dga' bar 'gyur/_mdzes pa dang ldan par 'gyur/_shes pa dang ldan par 'gyur/_'dod pa la rab tu chags shing 'gro ba dang /_rgyu ba 'phyar bag can dang /_dus ston dang /_ltad mo dang /_phra ba'i gos la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur/_kun dga'i ra ba la 
[\[289a.3\]]dga' ba dang /_pha rol 'byor pa mthong na 'dod pa ste/_drang srong chen po 'di dag ni phreng thogs kyi lha las mir skye ba'i ltas su blta ba dag go/_//bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma/_drang srong chen po gzhan yang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba'i ltas dang /_'chi 'pho'i ltas su lta ba ni 
[\[289a.4\]]drang srong chen po 'di la dman pa'am/_mgon med pa la zas bzang po dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_kun 'thung ba'i chu grang mo dang /_chu mig dang /_mtshe'u dang /_lteng ka dang /_lu ma dang /_rdzing bu dang /_khron chu byin nas/_dad pa dang /_yid rab tu dga' zhing 'chi ba'i dus 
[\[289a.5\]]kyi tshe nyon mongs pa'i 'bar ba med pa'i lus su 'gyur/_de'i lus rid par mi 'gyur/_mdog ngan par mi 'gyur rngul dang dri ma chags par mi 'gyur/_de'i lus la nyam nga ba'i tshor ba mi 'byung /_skad dman pa dang /_rtsa lag dang bral zhing gdung ba dang ldan par mi 'gyur/_de bkres pa 
[\[289a.6\]]dang /_skom pas nyan par mi 'gyur/_de'i lus bskum pa dang /_smyang ba la sogs pas sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur/_bshang gci 'byung bar mi 'gyur/_yul las yongs su nyams pas sgyid lug par mi 'gyur/_de'i dbang po zhum par mi 'gyur ba ste/_de lta bu de ni mtho 
[\[289a.7\]]ris kyi bde ba dang ldan zhing 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/de'i lus yongs su btang nas rnam par shes pa de rab tu dga' bar rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i nang du skyed mos tshal dang /_nags tshal stug po'i nang du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de 'chi khar lha'i ris de mthong nas bzhin 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]me tog pad ma lta bur 'gyur/_de'i kha nas dri zhim po 'byung bar 'gyur/_de la me tog sna tshogs dri dang ldan pa'i rlung rjes su 'thun pa ldang bar 'gyur/_de shi nas kyang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i nang na pha ma 'dus nas skyed mos tshal na rtse zhing 'dod pa myong bas rgyags dregs nas 
[\[289b.2\]]lag pa g.yas pas lha mo'i lte ba la reg par mthong nas/_de'i rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa lha mo de'i pang par skye ba yongs su 'dzin to/_/de zhag bdun 'das nas dri ma med pa'i rna cha 'gul ba'i mgo dang ldan pa'i gzhon nur mngon par 'grub ste/_dgod pa dang /_gar byed pa dang /_
[\[289b.3\]]glu len pa dang /_'dod pa'i longs spyod skyed nus so/_/drang srong chen po de la rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i ris kyis phyogs ni dngul dang ldong ros rnam par bkra ba sna tshogs kyis spras shing mdzes par byas pa/_lha mo brgya stong gis legs par brgyan pa/_lha'i gnas mtho ba/_rang bzhin gyis 
[\[289b.4\]]mdzes pa/_reg na bde ba'i rlung ldang ba'o/_/drang srong chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha de dag gi skyed mos tshal ni dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong gru bzhi lham pa/_nor bu'i sgron mas snang bar byas pa/_shing gi yal ga dang rtse mo la dpag bsam gyi shing gi ras bcos bu dang /_rgya dar 
[\[289b.5\]]la'i lda ldi spyangs pa/_nags tshal gyi bar 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba/_khyim gyi bar na rtag tu pi bang dang /_gling ba dang /_rdza rnga dang /_khar rnga'i sgra 'byung ba'o/_/drang srong chen po lha'i gnas na gnas pa de dag zas kham gyi za ba can te/_dri rab tu zhim pa'i dri dang /_kha dog dang /_ro dang /_
[\[289b.6\]]reg pa dang /_yon tan phun sum tshogs par rig par bya'o/_/de dag re re la yang gser gzhong gnyis gnyis yod de de na gang zas gang 'dod pa de ni de'i phun sum tshogs par gzhong pa de las 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i me tog gi khu ba ro dang ldan pa mngon par 'grub ste/_de ni me tog 
[\[289b.7\]]gi chang zhes bya'o/_/drang srong chen po chang de ni dri rab tu zhim pa/_mchog tu bde ba bsil ba/_dris kyang ra ro ba mngon par 'grub na 'thungs pas lta ci smos te/_de na lha gzhon nu ra ro bar 'gyur ro/_/drang srong chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha de dag gi gzhal med khang ni mdzes byed ces 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]bya ste/_rtag tu me tog rgyas pa 'khri shing gis mdzes par byas pa/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_rdo rje 'bar ba'i ka ba brgya stong gis phyogs phyogs shin tu brtan pa/_lha'i mal cha dang /_gding ba bting bas sa phyogs shin tu rnam par phye ba/_lha mo bzor byas 
[\[290a.2\]]pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa/_steg cing 'jo ba'i rjes su chags pa/_lha'i gos 'bar zhing rnam par mdzes pas spud spud pa/_ka la ping ka dang /_bung ba'i tshogs kyi sgra lta bu dang ldan pa/_gzugs rab tu che zhing shin tu gzhon sha chags pa/_glu dang /_
[\[290a.3\]]gar dang /_sil snyan dang /_'dzum zhing rtse bas rgyags pa'i shas che la rab tu sgeg pa sha stag gis bskor cing gang ba ste/_gnas de'i ka ba ni gser chu dang /_dngul chus rnam par bris pa/_dar gyi rgyal mtshan sbyangs pa/_rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng ba'o/_/gzhal med 
[\[290a.4\]]khang de dag na 'di lta ste/_yul 'khor srung dang /_'phags skyes po dang /_mig mi bzang dang /_lus ngan po dang rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag lha'i 'dod pa dang /_bde ba dang /_rtse ba myong zhing rab tu dga' ste/_dga' ba dang bde ba dang ldan la/_glu dang /_gar dang /_sil 
[\[290a.5\]]snyan dang /_lha'i kha zas za bas dbang po tshim zhing bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gnas so/_/drang srong chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i ris de na lha gzhon nu de dag lag pa ring zhing sha rgyas pa/_glang po rgyags pa'i tshul du 'gro ba/_skyes bu stong gi stobs dang rtsal yod pa/_
[\[290a.6\]]lha'i lus shin tu 'jam pa sha stag go_/de dag gi dri chang gi shas che bas dpag tshad khor yug chang drir phyogs par byed do/_/lha de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni lo bzhi stong thub ste/_bar ma dor 'chi ba'i dus mi byed de/_de dag thams cad bde ba dang /_yid bde ba dang /_dga' 
[\[290a.7\]]bar gnas so/_/lha'i ris de na skal ba bzang po can gser dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis brgyan pa dag nags kyi phreng bas mdzes par brgyan pa/_dga' ba skyed pa la sogs pa'i skyed mos tshal bzang po dri nga ba med pa rnams ni snying dga' ba dang ldan par gnas so/_/de dag de na 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]gnas pa na me tog sil ma bkram zhing nor bu dang gser gyis mdzes par byas pa/_shin tu rnam par phye ba/_gru bzhi pa/_nor bu'i them skas kyis brgyan pa/_lha'i bu mo brgya stong glu snyan pa len pa/_nor bu'i snod rnams bdag nyid sgra 'byin pa'i rjes su chags pa na de dag gnas 
[\[290b.2\]]gnas pa las de dag bsod nams zad pas tshe zad par 'gyur ba'i ltas gnyis 'byung ste/_de thog mar grib ma mi snang bar 'gyur zhing me tog las dri mi 'byung ba dang /_lha'i bu mo dang kun smra ba'i sgra snyan pa mi thos pa'o/_/yang lha gzhon nu de lha yul ba'i lha'i gnas rnams su 'du zhing 
[\[290b.3\]]mi 'gro ste/_lha'i gnas lha'i bu mo brgya stong gis gang ba/_yal ga'i rtse mo la do shal dang /_se mo do dang me tog gi phreng ba spyangs pa/_nags tshal gyi bar gyi bya khu byug rgyags pa'i sgra 'byin pa de dag na lha'i bu mo'i tshogs tu zhing gos dri ma can gyon nas sa'i steng na 'gre ldog cing 
[\[290b.4\]]snying rje rje ltar lta ste/_sa'i steng na 'gre ldog pas me tog gi bla res brgyan pa'i sa phyogs dag na yang dga' ba mi rnyed de/_de dag gi lus las rngul 'byung zhing de dag mig mi 'dzums pa las mig 'dzum par 'gyur te/_nya chu'i gnas nas byung nas nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis gdungs pa bzhin 
[\[290b.5\]]du phan tshun du 'gre ldog cing gcig pu sa la gnas par mthong nas lha'i bu mo de dag gis bskor te/_snying rje rje ltar lta zhing skad 'thun par ngu ste/_'di skad ces kyi hud re sdug_/kyi hud re sdug_/kyi hud gzhon nu'i mchog de phyogs gang du song /_lus che la rgyan sna tshogs kyis 
[\[290b.6\]]brgyan pa/_'gram pa che la mdzes pa brang shin tu rgyas pa/_skyed mos tshal sna tshogs kyi bar na rgyu ba des bdag cag bor zhing lha yul ba'i lha'i gnas yid du 'ong ba yang bor te dgar 'gro zhes 'dzer to/_/de nas lha'i bu mo de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/rnam pa sna 
[\[290b.7\]]tshogs legs par bkod/_/lha yi nags kyis shin tu brgyan/_/zas dang dus ston gang gyur pa/_/rgyal po chen pos gnas byas pa/_/ka ba bzhi dang rab ldan pa/_/bsod nams kyi ni tshong 'dus mchog_/lha yi bud med gang bas dga'/_/me tog 'byor pa yid 'phrog 
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]pa/_/bor nas mi rtag pa 'di yis/_/sdug pa dag ni zin te song /_/de ltar lha'i bu bu mo de dag gis bskor te/_mchi ma zag skad 'gags shing thag ring po nyid nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste me tog gtor nas 'di skad ces kye ma'o sdug pa/_legs 
[\[291a.2\]]par byed pa'i 'jig rten mi'i 'jig rten du song ste/_dad pa'i gshol gyis bsod nams kyi zhing rmed par gyur cig ces 'dzer to/_/de ltar sems pas kun du khyab pa'i lus yongs su btang bar bdag gis rig nas de rims drag po mi bzad pas btab bo/_/rims drag 
[\[291a.3\]]po des lus bshig nas de'i lus mar gyi thigs pa rdo tshan la thim pa bzhin no/_/de'i lus yongs su rnyis nas 'drud pa zhes bya ba'i rlung gis rab tu bdas te/_rlung des de'i lus stong du gtor nas phye ma zhib mo bzhin du nam mkha'i dkyil nas lhung ngo /_/de ltar lhung nas mi'i srid par 
[\[291a.4\]]skye ba yongs su len te/_pha ma 'dus pa mthong nas rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis ma'i mngal du skye'o/_/de thog mar skyes shing ma'i mngal na gnas pa na mtshan ma 'byung ba ni de'i ma de kha zas la rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/_gos dmar po 'tsher ba la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur/_
[\[291a.5\]]skye bo sna tshogs phal po che la lta 'dod cing rtsa lag dang mdza' ba tsam du 'du shes skyed par 'gyur/_de de'i mngal du zhugs nas mngal na tshor ba skye bar mi 'gyur/_kha chu zag pa dang /_chu ser 'byung bar mi 'gyur/_de'i lus na bar mi 'gyur/_de de'i mngal na lag pa dang /_
[\[291a.6\]]rkang pa dang /_mgo shin tu yongs su rdzogs par grub nas/_de btsas pa dang gzi brjid dang ldan zhing mthong na dga' ba rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i gtam thos na dga' ba skye bar 'gyur/_sbyin pa la dga' ba dang /_chang la sred pa dang /_shin 
[\[291a.7\]]tu dri zhim pa'i cha byad 'dzin cing skyed mos tshal la dga' bar 'gyur/_bud med la dbang po mngon par rab tu chags par 'gyur/_yang dang yang zas 'dod par 'gyur/_glu dang /_gar dang /_sil snyan gyi rjes su 'jug par 'gyur/_mdog snum zhing sngo sangs por 'gyur/_
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]mig lha'i bai dUr+ya sngon po ltar 'gyur ro/_/drang srong chen po 'di dag ni lus dang sems kyi rgyud kyi bag chags kyis bsgos pas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris nas shi 'pho ba'i ltas su blta'o/_/drang srong chen po gang la la srog gcod pa spangs nas dad cing dang bas sbyin pa sbyin zhing /_ma 
[\[291b.2\]]byin par mi len pa dang /_bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_bldag pa dang /_gzhib pa dang /_yo byad kyi khyad par spangs nas nor bu dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_rdo rje dang /_bai dUr+ya la sogs pa rdzas thams cad rab tu sbyin pa la bstan pa dang /_bsgoms pa dang /_
[\[291b.3\]]mang du byas nas dad pa dang /_rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis me tog gi lda ldi 'bul ba dang /_mchod rten la mngon par phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa'i rnam par smin pas tshe yongs su zad pa'i dus na lus la nyon mongs pa chung bar 'gyur/_snum pa'i dri ma dang /_dri nga ba rnam par 
[\[291b.4\]]spangs nas rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rjes su dran zhing 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe rab tu dang ba'i ltas mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/'di ni de'i ltas yin te/_bzhin gser gyi kha dog lta bur 'gyur/_de'i sna yon por mi 'gyur/_de'i snying 'phar bar mi 'gyur/_mid pa nas sgra ngar ngar po 'byung 
[\[291b.5\]]bar mi 'gyur/_de'i lus la dbugs rgod par mi 'gyur/_de'i lus gdung bar mi 'gyur/_dbang po 'gyur ba ma yin/_yan lag dang nying lag kun du chad par mi 'gyur/_gshis kyi mtshams 'jigs par mi 'gyur/_mal gyi steng na 'gre zhing ldog pa byed par mi 'gyur/_dman pa'i 
[\[291b.6\]]tshig lta bu smra bar mi 'gyur/_rims nad kyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/_pha rol pos dug byin pas gnod par mi 'gyur/_me tog dang 'bras bu la brkam pa'i phyir shing la 'dzegs nas lhung bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/_yid du mi 'ong ba'i kha zas zos te/_
[\[291b.7\]]kha zas ma zhu bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te mi'i phung po yongs su btang nas kyang lha'i nang gi rnam par shes pas sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha rnams mthong ste/_khang pa brtsegs pa nor bu dang /_gser dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_dngul stong gis rnam par brgyan 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]cing shin tu rnam par phye bas spras pa/_gser gyi nya dang /_chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan dang /_rta babs dang /_ba dan gyis mdzes par byas pa/_rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyi sgra snyan pa 'byung ba dang /_gnas sna tshogs kyis bskor ba/_
[\[292a.2\]]shing 'dab chags pas brgyan pa'i nags tshal gyi nang na 'dug pa/_tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i chus chag chag btab pas 'dam du gyur pa/_lha'i nor bu'i sgron ma'i phreng bas brgyan cing mdzes par byas pa/_bud med 'bar ba sna tshogs rnam par rtse bas mdzes par byas pa/_
[\[292a.3\]]dpung rgyan dang /_gdu bu dang /_sor gdub dang /_se mo do dang /_do shal sna tshogs kyis brgyan cing mdzes par byas pa'i sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha rnams mthong ngo /_/drang srong chen po sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris de na lha'i bu de dag mchog gi skyed mos tshal du song ste rtse 
[\[292a.4\]]dga' la dga' mgur spyod cing 'dod pas rgyags myos nas de dag skyed mos tshal dang /_nags tshal gyi bar du 'gro zhing dga' ba skyed do/_/sems can de'i rnam par shes pa de bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba yin pas sems can des lha dang lha mo khri gcig gi steng na
